name: ITEM_20150317_000013
text: A standard weapon for the soldiers from the Royal Army. Also commonly carried by civilians.

name: ITEM_20150317_000015
text: This weapon is an improved version of its military counterpart.

name: ITEM_20150317_000017
text: This sword is exceptional for slashing.

name: ITEM_20150317_000019
text: Due to its ease in manufacturing, this sword is frequently chosen by adventurers as their first replacement for their training sword.

name: ITEM_20150317_000021
text: Recommended for those who desire a heavier and stronger sword.

name: ITEM_20150317_000023
text: Primary weapon of the cavalry, optimized for slashing. The guard on the hilt helps protect the user's hand.

name: ITEM_20150317_000025
text: The blade's large crescent edge cuts with immense power.

name: ITEM_20150317_000027
text: Its heavy weight is compensated by its very powerful slash.

name: ITEM_20150317_000029
text: Its twisted edge amplifies the damage it inflicts. A sword that is both practical and ornamental.

name: ITEM_20150317_000031
text: Its extremely sharp blade makes it a favorite among even the most experienced swordsmen.

name: ITEM_20150317_000035
text: A basic armament provided to full-time soldiers. Its overall quality is better than those sold in the market.

name: ITEM_20150317_000037
text: Looking at this weapon raises suspicions on its previous owner's past.

name: ITEM_20150317_000040
text: This sword combines both practicality and aesthetics.

name: ITEM_20150317_000064
text: A crude sword used by the Panto. You could craft a better version yourself.

name: ITEM_20150317_000066
text: Some say this weapon unleashes the grudge that plants hold against beasts.

name: ITEM_20150317_000068
text: Possibly due to gold's correlation with fortune, the Golden Falchion bestows its wielder with good luck during battle. Of course, it severely harms its foes.

name: ITEM_20150317_000070
text: The Steel Falchion is a good choice for those pursuing precision in their swordsmanship.

name: ITEM_20150317_000072
text: Its light weight and sturdiness allows the swordsman to unleash his full potential during an attack.

name: ITEM_20150317_000074
text: This sword is said to clear its wielder's mind with its Mandragora essence.

name: ITEM_20150317_000076
text: You should never ridicule a wizard for wielding a sword, especially if that sword is the Wizard Blade.

name: ITEM_20150317_000078
text: This sword is made from a recipe developed by an alchemist from the Winterspoon family, who claimed that he could make a better sword than a blacksmith.

name: ITEM_20150317_000080
text: This sword is worthy of its steep price. However, merchants would prefer that you return to buy other weapons than continue using it for a long time.

name: ITEM_20150317_000082
text: This weapon will make your swordsmanship swifter.

name: ITEM_20150317_000084
text: Veterans will often recount the thrill they experienced when advancing from a novice and first holding this sword.

name: ITEM_20150317_000086
text: A sword used by valiant adventurers. Ironically, it is often found on strong monsters. A person who obtains this sword is unknowingly exacting revenge for its previous owner.

name: ITEM_20150317_000088
text: An improved version of the Gladius made by extending the blade length.

name: ITEM_20150317_000090
text: This weapon gives you the opportunity to experience the capabilities of a Falchion.

name: ITEM_20150317_000092
text: - 2% chance to inflict an additional 600% damage

name: ITEM_20150317_000093
text: This sword occasionally gleams with the craftsmanship of its creator.

name: ITEM_20150317_000095
text: Despite its quality, it sells relatively well.

name: ITEM_20150317_000104
text: If you're unsatisfied with one type of Falchion, this is an alternative. However, you'll have to bear the extra cost for its crafting.

name: ITEM_20150317_000106
text: Many adventurers name their best sword after this weapon. This was the name of the sword wielded by an ancient warrior chosen by a goddess.

name: ITEM_20150317_000108
text: People will even go so far as to say that this weapon is overly cruel.

name: ITEM_20150317_000110
text: While unpopular during the Great Plant Cataclysm, the resurgence of strongly armored monsters is proving its value.

name: ITEM_20150317_000112
text: According to a theory, this sword is also used in conflicts amongst the demons.

name: ITEM_20150317_000114
text: One becomes the deathbringer by wielding this blade.

name: ITEM_20150317_000116
text: This serves as indirect evidence for the disputes between demons.

name: ITEM_20150317_000118
text: A sword carrying the might of a goddess that has smited many evils in the past.

name: ITEM_20150317_000120
text: This blade severely threatens both the life of its foe and the owner's finances. Of course, most swordsmen ignore the latter effect.

name: ITEM_20150317_000124
text: Some master craftsman and soldiers call this a 'mixed style two-handed sword.' They say this to justify themselves.

name: ITEM_20150317_000126
text: If you're an expert in two-handed weapons, the wave shaped edge can cause massive damage.

name: ITEM_20150317_000128
text: A Nodachi with a length 'just right' can amplify its slashing power and dominate the space between the wielder and their foe.

name: ITEM_20150317_000130
text: Claymores of this kingdom are made with an emphasis in weight and power.

name: ITEM_20150317_000132
text: The unusual fan-shaped blade offers potential to amplify its power and versatility to be adapted in many techniques.

name: ITEM_20150317_000134
text: Frequently carried by high ranking soldiers.

name: ITEM_20150317_000136
text: Contrary to its appearance, this sword is double-edged and often used by swordsmen pursuing practicality.

name: ITEM_20150317_000138
text: The structure of this sword allows its user to perform a stabbing attack.

name: ITEM_20150317_000141
text: The Great Ruklys carried this sword in his early days.

name: ITEM_20150317_000159
text: A great alternative for those unsatisfied with a regular Flamberge.

name: ITEM_20150317_000161
text: A sword with great capacity for improvement that compliments the wielder's innate power. Try its potential for yourself.

name: ITEM_20150317_000163
text: This sword is for those who seek more weight, more power, and more reach in their slashes.

name: ITEM_20150317_000165
text: Though popular in battles today, this weapon was considered a decorative or collectible item prior to the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_000167
text: How the Hogmas obtained or crafted this weapon is unimportant. We are more concerned with crafting and using it ourselves.

name: ITEM_20150317_000169
text: In the wake of the Great Plant Cataclysm, the Winterspoon family disclosed the crafting recipe for this weapon to all alchemists.

name: ITEM_20150317_000171
text: Swordsmen seeking raw power in a weapon frequently choose this sword as their first magic sword.

name: ITEM_20150317_000173
text: Those who like to temper their weapons craft this sword for their own use.

name: ITEM_20150317_000175
text: If you got this sword through the black market, it is clear evidence that you have obtained a certain level of reliability.

name: ITEM_20150317_000177
text: This sword shares the same inventor with the 'Primaluce' sword.

name: ITEM_20150317_000179
text: The enhancement of Katzbalger has been developed less than 100 years ago. Thus the crafting recipe for this weapon is unrelated to Ruklys.

name: ITEM_20150317_000181
text: Since Medzio Diena, fewer people have been concerned about the instability of magic weapons.

name: ITEM_20150317_000183
text: This sword can be a trustworthy extension of both your hands.

name: ITEM_20150317_000191
text: A good sword that has long been regarded as a necessity when facing demons.

name: ITEM_20150317_000193
text: Novice Wizards often pay no mind to this particular weapon. However, a seasoned one knows to steer away from its unseen power.

name: ITEM_20150317_000195
text: Like a flying dagger thrown in the darkest hours of the night, Naktis deals an unforeseen blow to its target.

name: ITEM_20150317_000197
text: Although some people dismiss this weapon as a 'tree cutting axe', its actual users will tell you that the Great Plant Cataclysm would have resulted in far worse losses without it.

name: ITEM_20150317_000199
text: There's a saying that claims that 'offense is the best defense.' Prove it with this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000203
text: Great power can sometimes be found from the intangible. Sometimes the volumeless can overpower the heavy.

name: ITEM_20150317_000205
text: Lends great power against beings who do not belong to the realms of night and day.

name: ITEM_20150317_000207
text: Gravity cannot be avoided by anyone or anything. But if one adapts to it, no one can underestimate its power.

name: ITEM_20150317_000210
text: A rod that all students of magic will use.

name: ITEM_20150317_000212
text: Magicians that graduate from their apprenticeship often switch to this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000214
text: The decorations found in a mage's equipment are added for function, not only for appearance.

name: ITEM_20150317_000216
text: When a rod is painstakingly carved by a famous wizard, it is bound to contain mystical power.

name: ITEM_20150317_000218
text: You can customize this rod further if you can supply the materials.

name: ITEM_20150317_000220
text: Legends say that evil wizards were the first to start using this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000222
text: It was once a popular weapon among ambitious young wizards.

name: ITEM_20150317_000224
text: The decoration is popular among experienced wizards.

name: ITEM_20150317_000226
text: A magical rune is used to amplify the power of this rod.

name: ITEM_20150317_000228
text: A precise fitting of the jewel to the shaft is required to craft this rod.

name: ITEM_20150317_000232
text: This rod was given to magicians who joined the army. Though the procedure has been abolished since the Great Plant Cataclysm, an abundant stock still remains.

name: ITEM_20150317_000234
text: The shape of this rod was popular in the past. Although old-fashioned, the rod performs rather decently.

name: ITEM_20150317_000237
text: Besides the assistance in casting magic, this rod was also designed for physical combat.

name: ITEM_20150317_000259
text: Wizards have been discovering new facts from monsters emerging from the Great Plant Cataclysm and applying them to varying situations.

name: ITEM_20150317_000261
text: Rumor says that every time the crafting recipe for this rod is sold, part of the money goes to the Cryomancer Master.

name: ITEM_20150317_000263
text: Only the Pyromancer Master knows the method of infusing the power of the Goddess Gabija into these rods.

name: ITEM_20150317_000265
text: Although priests frown upon the manipulation of spirits during its manufacturing, wizards ignore this objection.

name: ITEM_20150317_000267
text: A simple rod for enhancing magic, easily craftable by beginner mages.

name: ITEM_20150317_000269
text: The increase in demons after the Great Plant Cataclysm increased the price of this already-expensive rod.

name: ITEM_20150317_000271
text: Despite the similarity in the name with another weapon, this weapon has no direct relation to the Winterspoon family.

name: ITEM_20150317_000273
text: A weapon that fills the role of a stepping stone to advanced wizardry for aspiring wizards. Once the wizard achieves his objective for higher learning, this weapon is replaced by another.

name: ITEM_20150317_000275
text: It is popular among wizards who like to stand out.

name: ITEM_20150317_000277
text: It is often given as a small gift amongst wizards thanks to its affordable price.

name: ITEM_20150317_000279
text: This equipment is certainly odd, regardless of who uses it.

name: ITEM_20150317_000281
text: You may be the first wizard in history to ever use this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000290
text: This rod's nickname is 'The Staff of Patience.' Legends say that Agailla Flurry, the greatest wizard in history, devised this rod to train her apprentices.

name: ITEM_20150317_000292
text: Though the Pyromancer Master has been researching a way to mitigate the unstable drawbacks of this staff, there have been no development so far.

name: ITEM_20150317_000294
text: A weapon made for and only for wizards. Thus, wizards usually ignore the flaws of this staff.

name: ITEM_20150317_000296
text: A rod containing the power of the Deathweaver.

name: ITEM_20150317_000299
text: Rumors say that the high price of this rod's recipe is due to the Cryomancer Master's insistence.

name: ITEM_20150317_000301
text: A rod that was crafted long time ago using the best available magic knowledge at the time. As a result it is impossible to add to the rod, even with the current advancements in magic.

name: ITEM_20150317_000303
text: A twinkling star is always visible.

name: ITEM_20150317_000307
text: A simple weapon that can even be crafted at home.

name: ITEM_20150317_000309
text: A bow widely crafted and used by people across the kingdom and its territories.

name: ITEM_20150317_000311
text: It's a bow for beginners, though some proficient archers prefer to keep using it.

name: ITEM_20150317_000313
text: A small distance can sometimes be the deciding factor between life and death. This bow is a good choice if you want a longer reach.

name: ITEM_20150317_000315
text: A bow with improved flexibility through the application of various materials.

name: ITEM_20150317_000317
text: It symbolizes the stalwart resolve of an unyielding archer.

name: ITEM_20150317_000319
text: It is presumably named after the place where its inventor came from.

name: ITEM_20150317_000321
text: A bow preferred by the Cavalry.

name: ITEM_20150317_000323
text: The first ever recorded case of applying magic in the bowcrafting process. Since then it has found its own market.

name: ITEM_20150317_000325
text: A bow modified for more power by archers confident in their arm strength.

name: ITEM_20150317_000329
text: This bow has been crafted to meet the minimum requirements of the army.

name: ITEM_20150317_000331
text: It shows signs of the effort put into unstringing and restringing the bow every day. Despite its age, the bow is in good condition.

name: ITEM_20150317_000334
text: This bow is the best among those crafted without using magic in the process.

name: ITEM_20150317_000356
text: This bow, popular among hunters, became even more widespread after the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_000358
text: This bow has great precision and can frequently cause unexpected damage to the foe.

name: ITEM_20150317_000360
text: A Self Bow made with random bones will sometimes not have synergy with gold.

name: ITEM_20150317_000362
text: It was named for its effect of increasing the agility of the user.

name: ITEM_20150317_000364
text: The application of Alchemy in bowcrafting remained theoretical until circumstances made it a trend in recent production.

name: ITEM_20150317_000366
text: In the past, only wealthy hunters bought this bow. With the dire events in recent history, however, anyone who can afford to is purchasing or crafting it.

name: ITEM_20150317_000368
text: Due to increases in demand for high quality bows since the Great Plant Cataclysm, this bow is being crafted quite frequently.

name: ITEM_20150317_000370
text: This bow is a good choice regardless of one's muscle strength. This is because if the user has strong arms, he can shoot with more power and if he doesn't, the bow compensates for it.

name: ITEM_20150317_000372
text: Like the name suggests, this bow strikes with poisonous attacks.

name: ITEM_20150317_000374
text: One can feel the sensation of hunting a large monster with this bow thanks to its solid weight.

name: ITEM_20150317_000376
text: Tricky to manufacture, but worth the trouble.

name: ITEM_20150317_000378
text: Usually purchased by new users of magic bows.

name: ITEM_20150317_000381
text: If there are no other bows left available for purchase, buy this and hope for the best.

name: ITEM_20150317_000383
text: Apart from being a magical bow, it is generally considered to be mediocre, but the user might make exceptional use of it.

name: ITEM_20150317_000392
text: Prior to the Great Plant Cataclysm, hunters rarely used this bow. It might soud strange, but the bow would cause excessive damage to the prey.

name: ITEM_20150317_000394
text: There are proud archers who don't want any variables affecting their archery skill outside of their own abilities. This bow is a perfect match for them.

name: ITEM_20150317_000396
text: For an unknown reason the spell bound to this bow has become a curse to both the foe and the user. Regardless, the bow is still used by archers for its merits.

name: ITEM_20150317_000398
text: This poison-imbued bow is so toxic that it afflicts its user as well.

name: ITEM_20150317_000400
text: This bow will send your enemies to their deaths.

name: ITEM_20150317_000402
text: The engravings say: "Straighten your back and broaden your shoulders; pull the bowstring and push the bow as you shoot."

name: ITEM_20150317_000404
text: This bow was created by Lydia Schaffen. She frequently used this bow throughout her life, but intentionally withheld the crafting method from the Astral Tower and the Schaffenstar, two entities founded by Lydia herself.

name: ITEM_20150317_000406
text: A new bow designed and developed through a joint effort of master bowcrafters. It was conceived with the hope of overcoming the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_000410
text: Useful when having a free hand is more important than having more attack power.

name: ITEM_20150317_000412
text: Modern crossbows use many different materials, mostly monster parts.

name: ITEM_20150317_000414
text: A weapon that is easy to reload.

name: ITEM_20150317_000416
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master uses this to teach beginners.

name: ITEM_20150317_000418
text: Although craftable wood is hard to find due to the Great Plant Cataclysm, this weapon is not hard to make.

name: ITEM_20150317_000420
text: Because monster bones are sometimes cursed, a seal is attached to this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000422
text: There is a long history of research on adapting siege weaponry for single-person use. This weapon is the culmination of that research.

name: ITEM_20150317_000424
text: The mechanism assists beginners in using it, but experienced users will benefit from the extra power.

name: ITEM_20150317_000428
text: A powerful crossbow, infamous for being used by the assassin Ebonypawn.

name: ITEM_20150317_000447
text: Though slightly heavy, the magics infused into the bow itself offset this downside.

name: ITEM_20150317_000449
text: For those with good aim, this is a good crossbow to deal fatal blows to targets.

name: ITEM_20150317_000451
text: A very popular crossbow among archers because of its high quality and lack of drawbacks.

name: ITEM_20150317_000453
text: Weapons based on alchemy are in great demand since the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_000455
text: This weapon is specialized in taking down well-equipped enemies.

name: ITEM_20150317_000457
text: Not good enough to be considered the "Lord of Crossbows," but the title of "Queen" seems fair.

name: ITEM_20150317_000459
text: Frequently used by archers operating in areas with poor visibility or strong winds.

name: ITEM_20150317_000461
text: Rumors say that black market weapons are intentionally made to be expensive to maintain.

name: ITEM_20150317_000463
text: This weapon is recommended if you intend to permanently put the target to sleep.

name: ITEM_20150317_000465
text: This weapon will only deal as much damage as you expect it to every time you pull the trigger.

name: ITEM_20150317_000467
text: You could be the very first person to draw out the true potential of this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000475
text: In the past, only archers who completed the training in the Astral Tower could use this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000477
text: The Ranger Master developed this weapon based on research data on the monsters in the Kateen Forest after the Great Plant Cataclysm. However, she recommends that no one uses it.

name: ITEM_20150317_000479
text: Can large monsters be hunted using only a one-handed crossbow? This is the answer.

name: ITEM_20150317_000481
text: This is not a Deathweaver's weapon. The original owner was probably a pitiful victim.

name: ITEM_20150317_000483
text: This weapon is preparation enough to give wild beasts a taste of pain.

name: ITEM_20150317_000485
text: The greatest archer in history, Lydia Schaffen, did not hesitate in hunting down demons. It's difficult to obtain this weapon because the Schaffenstar did not release the recipe to the public.

name: ITEM_20150317_000487
text: This recipe was disclosed to the public after Ebonypawn threw away his weapon while being chased by Fiona Ieva. However, many fell foolishly challenging monsters while only relying on this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000491
text: A very simple weapon for anyone to use without difficulty.

name: ITEM_20150317_000493
text: Even an ordinary wooden stick can become a holy item if wielded by a cleric.

name: ITEM_20150317_000495
text: A weapon at least of this caliber is necessary to carry out the goddess' punishment.

name: ITEM_20150317_000497
text: This is the minimum requirement to prove that one is no longer an apprentice cleric.

name: ITEM_20150317_000499
text: It is also known as 'the mace of repentance' among clerics.

name: ITEM_20150317_000501
text: Seasoned clerics attack the enemy in a multitude of ways using the ornament at the head of this mallet.

name: ITEM_20150317_000503
text: If you come across a cleric who handles this weapon well, you will never say that they are inexperienced in battle again.

name: ITEM_20150317_000505
text: Did you say blunt weapons can't pierce through armor? There are always exceptions.

name: ITEM_20150317_000507
text: Only those who has ceaselessly trained their body can wield the weight of this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000509
text: Since the emergence of monsters, many maces underwent exterior changes.

name: ITEM_20150317_000513
text: Despite being a Chaplain's official weapon, expedition priests rarely use them.

name: ITEM_20150317_000515
text: There is evidence that it has been used as a tool rather than as a weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000518
text: The original intention was to craft a single, heavy weapon by combining several blunt weapons.

name: ITEM_20150317_000539
text: If you feel like you've heard of this name somewhere else before, it's likely just your imagination. This hammer was crafted strictly based on mathematical engineering.

name: ITEM_20150317_000542
text: Blunt instruments usually cause Strike-type damage, but there are always exceptions to everything.

name: ITEM_20150317_000544
text: The ultimate pupose of impact damage is to shatter a foe's armor and shield. Test it out yourself.

name: ITEM_20150317_000546
text: Although rare, a cleric can make an exception in their vow to protect life. You should be particularly humble when facing a cleric holding this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000548
text: It is considered to be the weakest among alchemically crafted weapons. A frail hammer, of all things...

name: ITEM_20150317_000550
text: An old club designed when the kingdom was founded. It's rather hard to obtain this right now.

name: ITEM_20150317_000552
text: A basic armament for clerics facing demons.

name: ITEM_20150317_000554
text: In the old days it was readily available to Pardoners at an affordable price, but since the Great Plant Cataclysm those days are long gone.

name: ITEM_20150317_000556
text: The initial concept of this weapon was conceived by Monks. Presently, it is widely used by all of the clergy.

name: ITEM_20150317_000558
text: When properly refined, work tools can become weapons. There is no need to carry both a weapon and a tool into the depths of a mine.

name: ITEM_20150317_000560
text: Craftable by clerics, mages, alchemists, and even blacksmiths. This club can easily be enchanted with magic.

name: ITEM_20150317_000562
text: The power of this weapon is completely independent of its user's ability or faith.

name: ITEM_20150317_000564
text: Don't be disappointed that there were no iconic figures in history who used this weapon. You might become the first.

name: ITEM_20150317_000573
text: Because clerics are confident in their own faith, the recipe for this weapon is often found, ironically, at unexpected locations.

name: ITEM_20150317_000575
text: New possibilities have been discovered for weaponcrafting thanks to the emergence of new monsters since the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_000577
text: It is said that the inventor of this weapon lived long before the founding period of the kingdom. It is incredible that its recipe has survived to this date.

name: ITEM_20150317_000579
text: This weapon used to be only obtainable by clerics with permission from the royal household. Such restrictions have become meaningless since the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_000581
text: - 3% chance to inflict [Stun] on an enemy for 3 seconds

name: ITEM_20150317_000582
text: Some Vubbes do carry useful weapons.

name: ITEM_20150317_000584
text: A moment of silence for the previous owner who became the sacrifice required to make this.

name: ITEM_20150317_000586
text: No matter what monster you face, this weapon will leave a dent.

name: ITEM_20150317_000588
text: Some clerics prefer to disorient their target through means other than preaching.

name: ITEM_20150317_000590
text: It is consecrated with the power of the goddess during the crafting process. Elder demons can't stand the sight of this weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000594
text: Though made of wood, it has been crafted to meet the minimum requirements of a shield.

name: ITEM_20150317_000596
text: Surprisingly, reinforcing bucklers with a metal rim is a fairly recent development. Historians presume this trend first started around the founding period of the kingdom.

name: ITEM_20150317_000598
text: After examining a shield he improvised during an emergency, the Peltasta Master refined it into a new, multipurpose shield.

name: ITEM_20150317_000600
text: The metal kite shield used by the cavalry has been further improved and enhanced by warriors who preferred sturdiness over solid weight.

name: ITEM_20150317_000602
text: With advancements in battle techniques, the weight of a shield has become a secondary consideration. This shield design is heavily influenced by this trend.

name: ITEM_20150317_000604
text: The sightings of monsters with unprecedented strength created a need for a kite shield made of stronger materials.

name: ITEM_20150317_000606
text: The light weight, versatility and sturdiness of this shield makes it a popular choice among many people.

name: ITEM_20150317_000608
text: Many nobles and Cavalry members often carry this shield for its resiliency against powerful blows.

name: ITEM_20150317_000610
text: Made to gauge the effectiveness of a compact shield that required less materials. It's better than nothing.

name: ITEM_20150317_000612
text: Legends say that the first person to invent this type of shield was the Peltasta Master.

name: ITEM_20150317_000623
text: This shield is famous for being the first to succeed in increasing one's resistance. It was infused with magic during its creation.

name: ITEM_20150317_000625
text: This shield is crafted by making use of the wood's magical properties.

name: ITEM_20150317_000627
text: Magic is infused into this shield through an alchemical process rather than through blessings from Goddess Gabija.

name: ITEM_20150317_000629
text: In the past, vast amounts of resources were required to craft this shield. Lately, it can be crafted fairly easily.

name: ITEM_20150317_000631
text: The sturdy protective effect of this shield protects the user against unexpected dangers.

name: ITEM_20150317_000633
text: This shield provides excellent defense against Lightning property attacks.

name: ITEM_20150317_000635
text: According to its users, this shield begins to heat up if equipped for too long.

name: ITEM_20150317_000637
text: This shield is known to have magical properties that increases the bearer's vitality.

name: ITEM_20150317_000639
text: It is still unknown how monsters obtained this shield.

name: ITEM_20150317_000648
text: Its weight limits the wearer's actions, but this is more than compensated by its efficacy and defensive capabilities.

name: ITEM_20150317_000650
text: Though its quality is also great, it is a favorite among those looking for a distinctive look or decorative appeal.

name: ITEM_20150317_000652
text: The recipe for this shield has only been discovered recently. It may not be possible to craft it after the Great Plant Cataclysm ends.

name: ITEM_20150317_000654
text: - 1% chance to regenerate 200 HP every second for 5 seconds when taking damage

name: ITEM_20150317_000656
text: There are records of Maven using this kind of shield when he used to adventure around the world prior to his dwelling in the Great Cathedral.

name: ITEM_20150317_000658
text: According to a legend, Ruklys crafted this shield from a recipe he seized from the Demon King, and used the shield himself.

name: ITEM_20150317_000660
text: Useful equipment that will aid you in combat. {nl}Right-click to equip.

name: ITEM_20150317_000668
text: A standard, military-issue weapon for common soldiers.

name: ITEM_20150317_000670
text: A spear given to senior soldiers or commanders.

name: ITEM_20150317_000672
text: Initially developed for the cavalry, it has been widely adopted by many branches of the army.

name: ITEM_20150317_000676
text: Recently, the number of people who dislike the shape of this spear has been increasing.

name: ITEM_20150317_000678
text: A Hasta improved with a longer spear haft.

name: ITEM_20150317_000692
text: A spear that is good with a shield and also proficient in both ranged attacks and melee strikes.

name: ITEM_20150317_000694
text: A prototype model of the Sauroter. If necessary, this spear can be used in reverse.

name: ITEM_20150317_000696
text: Though heavier than some other spears, the spell bound to this weapon offsets its weight to a certain extent.

name: ITEM_20150317_000698
text: There are no weapons that cannot be crafted with alchemy, but this doesn't necessarily mean they will be better than those from a blacksmith.

name: ITEM_20150317_000700
text: Recommended when you want more offensive power than what your spear skills can produce.

name: ITEM_20150317_000702
text: Since the Great Plant Cataclysm, many recipes were found through the use of alternative ingredients from monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_000704
text: This spear is bound with a spell that boosts the user's agility.

name: ITEM_20150317_000705
text: This magic spear will help the user hit their target.

name: ITEM_20150317_000707
text: A great choice if you want a customized spear, though the price reflects the quality of the weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000709
text: An imperial order issued long ago prohibits trade of this spear outside of the Fedimian territory.

name: ITEM_20150317_000715
text: It displays great power against demons, but this is mostly because of its alchemical and magical properties rather than its divine attributes.

name: ITEM_20150317_000717
text: It is speculated that the power in this magic spear belongs to a spirit.

name: ITEM_20150317_000719
text: A powerful spear devised to pierce through the target's armor.

name: ITEM_20150317_000721
text: The origin of its recipe is a matter of no importance. Its effectiveness against the most rampant of monsters is what matters.

name: ITEM_20150317_000723
text: At first glance it may seem like a dangerous weapon to wield, but once you try it for yourself, you'll find that it is quite safe.

name: ITEM_20150317_000725
text: There are many ways to fight in a battle using a spear, such as: cutting, throwing, and smashing. What really sets this spear apart from a regular pole, however, is its piercing capabilities.

name: ITEM_20150317_000727
text: Users who like to use this spear frequently say the following:

name: ITEM_20150317_000728
text: This is a one-handed spear like no other.

name: ITEM_20150317_000731
text: As the cavalry faded from the kingdom's history, this pike became shorter and more accessible.

name: ITEM_20150317_000733
text: Originally popular in the remote territories of the kingdom, the spear has become widely produced after the Civil War.

name: ITEM_20150317_000735
text: - Deals 3 successive hits on Large-type targets

name: ITEM_20150317_000736
text: If you're able to master maneuvering the three blades, you can perform a series of flashy, continuous attacks.

name: ITEM_20150317_000738
text: When the design of the Partisan gained popularity among the nobles, they began making different variations of it.

name: ITEM_20150317_000740
text: Although the Cavalry has faded from the modern army, their weapons are still being actively utilized.

name: ITEM_20150317_000742
text: The municipal authority of Fedimian holds the rights to craft this weapon as per a decree handed down long ago.

name: ITEM_20150317_000748
text: Sometimes combining different fields leads to good results. The expertise of the Fletcher Master has helped create a good spear.

name: ITEM_20150317_000750
text: Recommended for spear users who like to evade enemies and hit them with swift, agile attacks.

name: ITEM_20150317_000752
text: Alchemically crafted weapons are being re-evaluated and are trending with the resurgence of the monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_000754
text: The insecticidal effect of this weapon is excellent.

name: ITEM_20150317_000756
text: Every attack with this weapon feels like three strikes. There is no need to describe it further.

name: ITEM_20150317_000758
text: Pursuing your own individuality and fashion will always entail a hefty cost.

name: ITEM_20150317_000760
text: Recommended if you're fighting large enemies.

name: ITEM_20150317_000762
text: Despite its age, it performs admirably. Though it's uncertain whether or not it can withstand another strengthening.

name: ITEM_20150317_000766
text: This weapon works well against monsters who were not originally enemies of mankind.

name: ITEM_20150317_000768
text: Queen-like dignity, agility, and a courageous attitude toward strong opponents,' are the praises this weapon garners from its users.

name: ITEM_20150317_000770
text: Though his reputation is questionable, no one denies the fact that Ruklys was a great warrior. This spear created by him during the Civil War is a great weapon that permits diverse customization.

name: ITEM_20150317_000772
text: Although it's unfortunate that the inventor never thought of infusing the blessings of the Goddess Gabija, the user should be able to withstand a bit of heat to give their enemies a taste of this spear's fiery flames.

name: ITEM_20150317_000774
text: Weapons crafted by alchemy are bound to be flawed somewhere, but this weapon is different. When fighting large monsters, this spear hits three times as hard.

name: ITEM_20150317_000777
text: The essence of wandcrafting is discovering the magical properties hidden away in ordinary objects.

name: ITEM_20150317_000779
text: Crafters say that it has become easier to empower a wooden wand's attributes since the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_000781
text: This wand was named after its place of origin, the King's Plateau.

name: ITEM_20150317_000783
text: It is crafted from a bone, but is unrelated to the essence of that bone.

name: ITEM_20150317_000785
text: Though often misunderstood and feared, the period of time known as 'night' is simply one of nature's basic cycles. This wand is the same.

name: ITEM_20150317_000787
text: This wand is the creation of an unnamed Bokor Master who lived during the same period as Agailla Flurry.

name: ITEM_20150317_000789
text: The history of the wand long precedes that of swords. Since those ancient times, the power contained in wands have been steadily increasing.

name: ITEM_20150317_000791
text: There are disputes on whether this wand was or was not originally crafted in the demon realm.

name: ITEM_20150317_000793
text: Being able to use this wand means that the user either underwent powerful psychic training or is innately strong.

name: ITEM_20150317_000795
text: Most equipment crafted with Alchemy suffer from low durability, but in the case of this weapon it doesn't matter.

name: ITEM_20150317_000797
text: Necromancers were the first to devise this wand, but it is now used by many different professions.

name: ITEM_20150317_000799
text: A theory suggests there's more power that can be drawn from this wand depending on the abilities of the dead used to craft it.

name: ITEM_20150317_000801
text: The effects may all seem the same, but the usage of the wand differs between jobs depending on the strength of their soul.

name: ITEM_20150317_000803
text: The orders issued by previous Masters for the search and arrest of the culprit who leaked this recipe to merchants have been essentially voided in recent times.

name: ITEM_20150317_000805
text: Be careful not to be mesmerized by ghosts when you gather materials for this wand.

name: ITEM_20150317_000807
text: Some people call this the 'Guano Wand.' It's pretty difficult to argue against that title.

name: ITEM_20150317_000809
text: Equipment that used to be issued only to Bokors or Necromancers that joined the army. It is now also being used by people unrelated to the army.

name: ITEM_20150317_000811
text: Users of this wand must be able to control their own darkness within.

name: ITEM_20150317_000813
text: People with strong mind and self-realization can utilize Levereuse to its full potential during battle.

name: ITEM_20150317_000815
text: Prior to the Great Plant Cataclym, there was nobody who would use this weapon because it used demonic powers. However, with the vanishing of the goddesses, desperate people have begun using it.

name: ITEM_20150317_000818
text: A small knife used for various purposes such as battle, cooking, or camping.

name: ITEM_20150317_000820
text: Stronger than normal knives. Some use it for throwing.

name: ITEM_20150317_000822
text: Used as a support weapon but very capable of defending or deflecting enemy attacks.

name: ITEM_20150317_000823
text: A short dagger with double edge. It's an evolved form of the tool knife used by the Highlanders with an elongated blade.

name: ITEM_20150317_000824
text: A dagger made to be easily used left-handed. Designed with the purpose of blocking an opponent's sword by using the Guard skill. The grip is mirrored so that it fits well to your left hand.

name: ITEM_20150317_000826
text: Single-edged, sharply pointed dagger. A specialized design for stabbing.

name: ITEM_20150317_000828
text: Single-edge dagger with extremely sharp, long thin tip. It has an 'S' shape body with a heavy, delicately decorated hilt.

name: ITEM_20150317_000831
text: It's considered more of a temporary travel aid than a weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000833
text: Alternative to the wooden staff when a wizard is preparing to go on a journey.

name: ITEM_20150317_000835
text: Veteran wizards can fend off weak foes using this staff, without the use of magic.

name: ITEM_20150317_000837
text: A staff widely enjoyed by wizards of the past, but for no particular reason.

name: ITEM_20150317_000839
text: This staff displays the diversity of preference amongst wizards.

name: ITEM_20150317_000841
text: The decorations on this staff are magically crafted.

name: ITEM_20150317_000843
text: This staff was made by translating magical concepts into mathematical ones.

name: ITEM_20150317_000845
text: A group of wizards believed they could bend the power of demons to their will and found some success, as seen with this staff.

name: ITEM_20150317_000847
text: Crafted based on an ancient recipe handed down through generations. Some magicians still believe there are undiscovered powers in this staff.

name: ITEM_20150317_000868
text: A result of rudimentary research attempting to increase the quality of staves by combining several items.

name: ITEM_20150317_000870
text: Magic enshrouds this staff with freezing cold aura.

name: ITEM_20150317_000872
text: Made through a balanced crafting method so that it performs consistently, using any kind of magic.

name: ITEM_20150317_000874
text: The Pyromancer Master from a previous generation researched a way to enhance the elemental traits of weapons via alchemy. Whether or not his research helped in reducing the load on Goddess Gabija, as he initially wanted, is unclear.

name: ITEM_20150317_000876
text: The Cryomancer Master said he created this recipe based on ancient knowledge he discovered at a secret location in the Plateau.

name: ITEM_20150317_000878
text: According to a rumor, the Chronomancer Master was disappointed after examining the recipe of this weapon once it became publicly available.

name: ITEM_20150317_000880
text: Despite all attempts by the purchaser or the crafter to hide its production, the Pyromancer Master can sense when this staff was crafted.

name: ITEM_20150317_000882
text: This is a proof that even ordinary ingredients can result in good equipment, if used appropriately.

name: ITEM_20150317_000884
text: Although Black Market members are proficient weapon crafters, this staff is a fairly recent success in crafting a new weapon since the Imperni staff.

name: ITEM_20150317_000886
text: There are wizards who prefer vast magical stamina rather than magical power.

name: ITEM_20150317_000888
text: This weapon shows that there are many ways to imbue magic into a weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000890
text: No one has become famous yet using this weapon. Hopefully you will be the first one.

name: ITEM_20150317_000899
text: The fire at the tip may go out, but it won't be due to it running out of fuel.

name: ITEM_20150317_000901
text: Some say that the Cryomancer Master jokingly challenged the Pyromancer Master to fight him with this staff using ice magic while he was barehanded.

name: ITEM_20150317_000903
text: In the recipe for this weapon, instructions are written on how to obtain help from the Goddesses Saule and Gabija during the crafting process.

name: ITEM_20150317_000905
text: Legends say that the original Maledic is still in the demonic dimension, and that the imitations seen in this world are only projected illusions.

name: ITEM_20150317_000907
text: A group of wizards succeeded in crafting the powerful Maledoom while they were developing a crafting process for Maledic.

name: ITEM_20150317_000910
text: According to one tale, Agailla Flurry used to carry this kind of staff when she was constructing the Mage Tower.

name: ITEM_20150317_000912
text: Hauberk, a Demon Lord sealed ages ago, revealed the secrets of the demon realm. Agailla Flurry created this recipe using this revealed information.

name: ITEM_20150317_000915
text: This item may save your life.

name: ITEM_20150317_000918
text: A pair of shoes that can be worn in a variety of areas and terrain throughout the kingdom. Not wearing shoes is quite dangerous.

name: ITEM_20150317_000921
text: There are no adventurers who journey out without these.

name: ITEM_20150317_000924
text: It doesn't matter what kind of leather it is made of as long as it protects the wearer.

name: ITEM_20150317_000926
text: Though it is made of lighter material, it offers similar defenses to leather products at a low price. It also has the added benefit of being lighter.

name: ITEM_20150317_000928
text: Wearing this makes your feet feel lighter.

name: ITEM_20150317_000930
text: Find something else to wear in the highlands. It's cold.

name: ITEM_20150317_000934
text: Rumor says leather supplies have increased since the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_000936
text: Make sure you get a pair of these if you plan to tread into Thorn Forest.

name: ITEM_20150317_000938
text: Although heavy, these provide stability to your lower body.

name: ITEM_20150317_000940
text: Easy to decorate or imbue with elemental magics.

name: ITEM_20150317_000942
text: You will need ingredients from monsters if you want to make a harder leather for your equipment.

name: ITEM_20150317_000944
text: The stiffness of these boots can harm the wearer's feet.

name: ITEM_20150317_000946
text: These give firm support to your body.

name: ITEM_20150317_000948
text: Never loses its toughness thanks to the ingredients used in this armor.

name: ITEM_20150317_000950
text: The good thing about a stronger base material is that it offers a lot of  room for improvement.

name: ITEM_20150317_000952
text: It has poor ventilation despite how it looks.

name: ITEM_20150317_000954
text: There's no need to take the whole thing apart just because one of the middle rings are missing.

name: ITEM_20150317_000957
text: Believe it or not, the crafter claims this equipment offers protection on par with plate armor.

name: ITEM_20150317_000959
text: It has even more overhead for improvement than Chain Gloves due to its better materials.

name: ITEM_20150317_000961
text: People say it's fairly comfortable because of the way the rings are structured.

name: ITEM_20150317_000963
text: If you want to minimize injuries during battle, you must be able to carry at least this much weight in armor.

name: ITEM_20150317_000965
text: Offers the protection and durability of plate armor.

name: ITEM_20150317_000967
text: Since the Great Plant Cataclysm, many ingredients from monsters were used to craft armor; this is one of them.

name: ITEM_20150317_000969
text: There has been some success in extracting the magic properties from plant monsters and applying it to armor.

name: ITEM_20150317_000971
text: Plant monsters offer as much leather-like materials as animal monsters do - this is an example of its practical application.

name: ITEM_20150317_000973
text: It is lighter than other boots with similar defensive capabilities.

name: ITEM_20150317_000975
text: It doesn't feel bad for a pair of pants made from wooden, non-fibrous materials.

name: ITEM_20150317_000978
text: If you expected defense similar to a cloth shirt from this, you would be surprised at its leather-like defense.

name: ITEM_20150317_000980
text: If you don't have an aversion to insects, this is a good piece of armor to not only protect yourself, but also to hold a weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_000982
text: A swordsman's boots must be at least as sturdy as this one. This is not only to protect him from his enemies, but also to guard against him dropping his own weapon on his feet.

name: ITEM_20150317_000984
text: Some warriors believe that the materials used for this item will attract its vengeful kin.

name: ITEM_20150317_000986
text: This equipment offers superior protection to plate armor by strengthening it with the shells of an insectoid monster.

name: ITEM_20150317_000988
text: It is believed to provide great camouflage and have agile, evasive properties.

name: ITEM_20150317_000990
text: Many choose these boots for its magic evasion rather than its defense.

name: ITEM_20150317_000992
text: One of the benefits of the Great Plant Cataclysm is that crafters have found a way to reuse monsters' remains for stronger armor.

name: ITEM_20150317_000994
text: Some monster ingredients can be turned into different materials by being heat treated. The comfortable Veris Boots use such methods.

name: ITEM_20150317_000996
text: Please examine these for thorns prior to wearing them for the first time.

name: ITEM_20150317_000998
text: Surprisingly, this light robe is harder than any other unprocessed animal leather.

name: ITEM_20150317_001000
text: Swordsmen like to wear this into real battles.

name: ITEM_20150317_001002
text: Traditional Scale Boots enhanced by adding stones while crafting.

name: ITEM_20150317_001004
text: Previously this name was given for its final shape, not its materials. This changed recently, like it did for Scale Leggings.

name: ITEM_20150317_001006
text: Due to its merits in its appearance and the materials used to make it, most swordsmen will likely wear this armor at least once in their time.

name: ITEM_20150317_001008
text: Equipment made from monster ingredients are said to be tougher, though there is no evidence that supports this claim.

name: ITEM_20150317_001010
text: Some Gribas can sense the scent of their kind from these boots.

name: ITEM_20150317_001012
text: Since the Great Plant Cataclysm, many equipment crafted from new material, like these pants, are replacing traditional ones.

name: ITEM_20150317_001014
text: One theory suggests that the Vubbes found this recipe before humans did. Very light, but also very hard.

name: ITEM_20150317_001016
text: A favorite of swordsmen thanks to its great defense.

name: ITEM_20150317_001018
text: Although it may entangle your feet at times, the defense it provides is worth the trouble.

name: ITEM_20150317_001020
text: Until a few years ago, only the wealthy swordsmen could wear this prestigious armor.

name: ITEM_20150317_001022
text: Good armor that offers solid defense and occasionally deflects enemy attacks.

name: ITEM_20150317_001024
text: Though it rarely happens, these pants can petrify the wearer.

name: ITEM_20150317_001026
text: It has a below average defense, but many wear it for the magic evasion.

name: ITEM_20150317_001028
text: The increased vitality given by these pants feels imaginary, but is in fact totally real.

name: ITEM_20150317_001030
text: Do not take this off during the battle. Your life is not only in your body.

name: ITEM_20150317_001048
text: Frequently used by those who want agile and precise maneuverability.

name: ITEM_20150317_001050
text: Once you put these on, you can tell that they're a lot quieter than they look.

name: ITEM_20150317_001052
text: Easy to enhance and, if you know how to, can be utilized in many ways.

name: ITEM_20150317_001054
text: Minivern's high defense becomes a great gift for crafters after it dies, like in this armor.

name: ITEM_20150317_001056
text: It is the best equipment from those made with traditional crafting methods.

name: ITEM_20150317_001058
text: With the recent discovery of a method to fuse bone and metal together, the quality of ordinary Plate Greaves have improved.

name: ITEM_20150317_001060
text: The crafting method for this equipment is not novel. The gathering of the materials for it, however, is very difficult.

name: ITEM_20150317_001062
text: Standard armor given to the Royal Guard prior to the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_001070
text: Although not as sturdy as armor, they are light and comfortable.

name: ITEM_20150317_001084
text: Worn and enjoyed by spell casters.

name: ITEM_20150317_001087
text: They are believed to provide exceptional magic defense.

name: ITEM_20150317_001089
text: People still choose this robe for its magic defense.

name: ITEM_20150317_001150
text: These gloves are used by Archon.

name: ITEM_20150317_001152
text: Boots coated with Ravinepede poison. Provides resistance against poison.

name: ITEM_20150317_001156
text: Shnayim fragments are used to craft these shoes.

name: ITEM_20150317_001158
text: Unprecedented magical equipment like these gloves are raising suspicions that this tribe is being sponsored by a powerful entity.

name: ITEM_20150317_001160
text: You feel lighter when you wear these shoes.

name: ITEM_20150317_001162
text: Please do not intentionally take hits to test the magic defense of these pants.

name: ITEM_20150317_001164
text: Though the ingredients are unknown, this armor is quite useful.

name: ITEM_20150317_001254
text: Crafted by a recipe resulting from hundreds of years worth of miners' experience and wisdom.

name: ITEM_20150317_001300
text: The fact that such equipment is so affordable is a blessing for beginners.

name: ITEM_20150317_001302
text: This talisman is the reason why attacks sometimes have no effect on Vubbes.

name: ITEM_20150317_001304
text: Rumor says that the teeth of a Chupacabra can whisper to each other while chattering. Regardless, they definitely contain some magical power.

name: ITEM_20150317_001306
text: It's not recommended to take this off while you're carrying something.

name: ITEM_20150317_001308
text: You might feel like you became lighter, but in reality you will not have become any thinner.

name: ITEM_20150317_001310
text: In battle, a small factor may make the difference between life and death. You certainly won't regret wearing this necklace.

name: ITEM_20150317_001312
text: Sadly it won't help you much when studying.

name: ITEM_20150317_001314
text: This necklace brings out the power of the wearer's soul.

name: ITEM_20150317_001316
text: Handicrafts from Fedimian have had a strong reputation for hundreds of years. You can feel the difference when you compare them to non-Fedimian items.

name: ITEM_20150317_001322
text: Increases the magic power of the wearer.

name: ITEM_20150317_001328
text: Necklace bestowed with the blessings of the Cathedral.

name: ITEM_20150317_001333
text: According to legend; after learning its secret recipe, Lydia Schaffen used to wear this necklace to polish her skills during her initial period as a poor apprentice.

name: ITEM_20150317_001335
text: It is said that a human wizard gave the recipe for this necklace to the Pantos a long time ago as a gift when the Pantos and humankind were not hostile to one another.

name: ITEM_20150317_001337
text: Used to be awarded by the Pyromancer Master to beginners. This tradition ceased after the goddesses disappeared.

name: ITEM_20150317_001339
text: Since their assumption of office prior to the Great Plant Cataclysm, the Cryomancer Master has stopped the tradition of awarding this pendant to people. Now this pendant must be either obtained or crafted by the users themselves.

name: ITEM_20150317_001341
text: Fusing two magic objects becomes easy once you find the catalyst. Humans, however, are not the only race who can discover such catalyst.

name: ITEM_20150317_001343
text: Many new magic items that use the power of monsters have been invented since the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_001345
text: The Pyromancer Master is unrelated to the creation of this item.

name: ITEM_20150317_001347
text: According to a rumor, the Cryomancer Master makes a profit every time this item is sold.

name: ITEM_20150317_001349
text: The people primarily involved in manufacturing this item are wizards expelled from the Mage Tower.

name: ITEM_20150317_001351
text: According to a legend, Agailla Flurry prepared several dozen copies of this item and fought the Demon King until all of them were destroyed.

name: ITEM_20150317_001353
text: An item crafted by combining and condensing everything known to be good for one's health through magic.

name: ITEM_20150317_001355
text: The recipe for this item has been around for many years in the kingdom, but a theory suggests its origin to be the hometown of the Barbarian Master. There is speculation that its crafting method in the two areas are different.

name: ITEM_20150317_001357
text: The darkness of the demon realm seen by this eye has turned, and now it serves to protect you.

name: ITEM_20150317_001359
text: When a plan to return to this world as an undead was thwarted, the power and intent were contained into this necklace.

name: ITEM_20150317_001361
text: Misfortune may chase you if you carry something that is not yours. Worry not, since the name and the origin of this necklace is unknown.

name: ITEM_20150317_001364
text: The remains of a noble soldier has found a new owner.

name: ITEM_20150317_001366
text: Its origin dates back to the gift presented by a wise man to the Great King Zachariel as a symbol of servitude during the founding period of the kingdom. A later king released the recipe, and many were crafted in the past. Now, however, it is difficult to find the recipe.

name: ITEM_20150317_001368
text: Some people say that this item proves the theory that the demons were the first to find the secret method of increasing all abilities simultaneously, not the humans.

name: ITEM_20150317_001370
text: By combining two elements that normally do not mix, you can maximize the power of one of them. One must, however, consider the loss of other's benefits and traits resulting from this combination.

name: ITEM_20150317_001372
text: Although this item could not protect its previous owner, it did remain with them until the end. Hopefully this necklace succeeds in both tasks for you.

name: ITEM_20150317_001374
text: An item that contains the grace of Goddess Zemyna who disapproves any sort of dispute. It endows an incredible protection to the wearer, but at a severe cost to the wearer's offensive power.

name: ITEM_20150317_001376
text: If you're seeking a way to improve every single ability of a person, the answer is already there. However, it is not easy to realize that answer for your own use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001378
text: Rumors has it that the one who wears this item will leave a part of his soul in a different world. Despite the vast number of people who are still researching on this matter, the mechanism of this item remains a mystery.

name: ITEM_20150317_001382
text: The slot where the gem was attached is still clearly visible.

name: ITEM_20150317_001384
text: Some monster leathers, although they don't contain any magical attributes, can gain magical effects depending on how they are crafted. You should not dismiss this item based on its material.

name: ITEM_20150317_001386
text: Some people hold a misconception that this item increases your muscle strength, which is completely inaccurate.

name: ITEM_20150317_001388
text: An increase in your mental strength is not because of an amplification of your ability but a stronger bonding with your surroundings. This, in turn, will replenish your energy.

name: ITEM_20150317_001390
text: Accuracy is, in essence, the ability to exert precise control over your body. The Accuracy Bangle enables that kind of self-control.

name: ITEM_20150317_001392
text: It is said that the blessings of Zemyna, the goddess of the Earth, lie within this equipment.

name: ITEM_20150317_001394
text: Although devoid of any magical effect, it will certainly increase your defense.

name: ITEM_20150317_001396
text: For equipment requiring little to no magic effect, Fedimian items are reputed to have a long history of great craftsmanship and quality.

name: ITEM_20150317_001401
text: Most consider this item as the worn and damaged version of the Iron Bangle.

name: ITEM_20150317_001404
text: It is made of a lightweight wood.

name: ITEM_20150317_001411
text: This item used to be mainly made of crystals from the Crystal Mine. Production of this item has become difficult as the mine has been experiencing many difficulties as of late.

name: ITEM_20150317_001413
text: According to the wearers of this item, one feels as though their life force and vitality are overflowing.

name: ITEM_20150317_001415
text: This bracelet has sadly been used for more battles between humans in the past than battles against monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_001417
text: This item has been manufactured with various poisons since its origin and, with the Great Plant Cataclysm, materials have become even easier to find.

name: ITEM_20150317_001419
text: After quickly discovering the weaknesses of the Plants, the Winterspoon family has openly been sharing ways to use this information with people.

name: ITEM_20150317_001421
text: When inorganic matter mutates and becomes a monster, there is a way to weaken them by manipulating their spirits. This equipment contains a mechanism that does that.

name: ITEM_20150317_001423
text: This bangle has been well known among hunters for a long time. With the sudden proliferation of monsters in recent times, more people are using it.

name: ITEM_20150317_001425
text: The bloodthirsty instinct contained in one of its materials is said to impact the accuracy of the wearer.

name: ITEM_20150317_001427
text: A very old recipe of which the time of origin cannot be determined. Although rare, it has been found in many diverse locations.

name: ITEM_20150317_001429
text: Originally from demons who passed the recipe down to Vubbes, this recipe was released by human warriors who stole it from the Vubbes.

name: ITEM_20150317_001431
text: There is a rumor that the price of jewels are about to skyrocket thanks to the increasing number of people who want to wear this.

name: ITEM_20150317_001433
text: Some say they can smell the scent of the sea from this item, but that's most likely just a psychological delusion.

name: ITEM_20150317_001435
text: You can tell where the Bearkaras' power comes from.

name: ITEM_20150317_001437
text: If this is your first time wearing something on your wrist, this is a good choice.

name: ITEM_20150317_001439
text: This band was invented during the rule of King Kadumel when gladiator games were popular. With the increasing threat from monsters, this recipe is garnering attention.

name: ITEM_20150317_001441
text: It was named after a scientist who discovered ways to deal with the new species that came after the Great Plant Cataclysm.

name: ITEM_20150317_001443
text: If you look closely, you can read an engraving:

name: ITEM_20150317_001444
text: Crafted by the first humans, blessed by the origins of life when light and darkness existed equally

name: ITEM_20150317_001448
text: It is told that this bangle is a memento dedicated to the Great King crafted by his followers after his death.

name: ITEM_20150317_001450
text: According to a legend, a warrior obtained this bracelet at the cost of relinquishing his sanity and humanity for pure frenzy, in order to seal away a very strong Demon King.

name: ITEM_20150317_001452
text: You can use a special skill.

name: ITEM_20150317_001458
text: It was made with elegance for the Royal Palace and formal events while not being restrictive to the movements of your limbs.

name: ITEM_20150317_001460
text: Peltastas prefer a fancy outfit because they care more about flaunting their battle actions to their allies than the dangers of being spotted by an enemy.

name: ITEM_20150317_001462
text: A costume made for versatile leg movement such as jumping and throwing a spear. Also appropriate for events requiring formal attire.

name: ITEM_20150317_001464
text: This costume inherits a traditional look that has continued for a thousand years.

name: ITEM_20150317_001466
text: Although Barbarians do not follow a particular style, this would be closest to their usual preference.

name: ITEM_20150317_001468
text: Made to be appropriate for a horse rider. Also minimizes the burden to the mount.

name: ITEM_20150317_001470
text: This costume consists of several layers of independent clothes. It demonstrates the wisdom of the seafarers.

name: ITEM_20150317_001472
text: It expresses their free spirit while maintaining the traditional look from the the Doppelsoeldners' place of origin.

name: ITEM_20150317_001474
text: Made to weather any storm while also boasting defensive capabilities suitable for pitched battle.

name: ITEM_20150317_001476
text: A traditional costume reflecting a Squire's requirement for clothing suited for long distance travel through various terrain.

name: ITEM_20150317_001483
text: Pyromancers believe their costume represents their image as both a wizard and a gentlemanly cleric.

name: ITEM_20150317_001485
text: Crafted to withstand not only a cool breeze but freezing cold temperatures. The costume has been modified to be extremely practical reflecting the current master's personality.

name: ITEM_20150317_001487
text: Despite its neat look, the costume is very loose when worn. This is because Psychokinos hate being confined, whether it is their soul or their body.

name: ITEM_20150317_001489
text: This multilayered costume is designed in such a way that it can be taken off layer by layer during an emergency.

name: ITEM_20150317_001491
text: For a spellcaster robe, it is quite battle-optimized. If one thinks about the creatures they have to deal with, however, it's very much justified.

name: ITEM_20150317_001493
text: Due to their nature of pursuing connections among things, Linkers prefer a simple and plain outfit that will remind one of nothing at all. They say they do this so that people will not have a standardized view of Linkers.

name: ITEM_20150317_001495
text: Chronomancers claim that their costume was Agailla Flurry's favorite style.

name: ITEM_20150317_001497
text: Although Necromancers themselves do not want to look sombre, their costume is dark enough to conduct a funeral.

name: ITEM_20150317_001499
text: In truth, their costume does not match the magic they practice, but tradition is a very strong factor that cannot be ignored.

name: ITEM_20150317_001501
text: It was crafted with careful consideration so as to not be identified with any particular branch of magic.

name: ITEM_20150317_001505
text: A costume optimized and designed for long term survival in the forest.

name: ITEM_20150317_001507
text: It once used to be a uniform of the guards of a large city. However the costume remained the same even after Quarrel Shooters were long disassociated with such a role.

name: ITEM_20150317_001509
text: The Ranger's costume is an evolutionary change of the Quarrel Shooter's costume.

name: ITEM_20150317_001511
text: Although Sappers are related to the Army, their outfit is unregulated due to their specialist role.

name: ITEM_20150317_001513
text: A very traditional costume from their hometown reflecting their history.

name: ITEM_20150317_001515
text: This costume allows the wearer to freely turn their torso while mounted, and has been designed to be comfortable for the wearer's legs.

name: ITEM_20150317_001517
text: A costume designed with a focused consideration on the time of activity rather than the environment.

name: ITEM_20150317_001519
text: Similarly designed to the Scout's costume but with better mobility. It is clearly inappropriate for formal events.

name: ITEM_20150317_001521
text: A solemn and valiant costume that gives reassurance and a trustworthy feeling to others.

name: ITEM_20150317_001523
text: It offers a surprising defensive capability due to the thick fabrics used. Considering its wearer's role, mobility can be sacrificed without issue.

name: ITEM_20150317_001529
text: Priests believe they are the most neutral and traditional among the clerics and their costume reflects this belief.

name: ITEM_20150317_001531
text: The Krivis proudly claim that they are the guardians of the oldest traditional faith. Their costume dates back to the Great King Zachariel's rule.

name: ITEM_20150317_001533
text: A costume fitting for any activity, whether it's for looking into a crystal ball, for knitting, or for swinging a weapon.

name: ITEM_20150317_001535
text: The long drape used in this costume is said to be helpful for ourdoor living.

name: ITEM_20150317_001537
text: This outfit was heavily influenced by the location of origin of its wearer.

name: ITEM_20150317_001539
text: Needless to say, clothes uncomfortable for sculpting are not even considered.

name: ITEM_20150317_001541
text: Soft and light, this costume is said to comfort and calm your body and soul.

name: ITEM_20150317_001543
text: A costume emphasizing the solemnity of a cleric while being comfortable enough for physical training.

name: ITEM_20150317_001545
text: Like their suits, this costume gives a sense of faith to others.

name: ITEM_20150317_001547
text: Paladins have two sets of costumes for different purpose: one for indoor prayer and another for outdoor battle. This one is for the latter.

name: ITEM_20150317_001552
text: A costume for the hair slot.{nl}Right-click to equip.

name: ITEM_20150317_001554
text: This will gain you affection from a certain animal.

name: ITEM_20150317_001557
text: Goggles used to protect your eyes.

name: ITEM_20150317_001562
text: Allows you to keep your eyes open in any condition. Fogging might be an issue, though.

name: ITEM_20150317_001564
text: Headgear based on the ears of a Lepusbunny. Using this won't improve your hearing.

name: ITEM_20150317_001566
text: Easily found during autumn. It may smell like the Ginkgo fruit.

name: ITEM_20150317_001568
text: Experience the sensation of a Tiger Swallowtail landing on your head.

name: ITEM_20150317_001570
text: Can be used as a writing tool if needed.

name: ITEM_20150317_001572
text: A mushroom might grow on your head.

name: ITEM_20150317_001574
text: With great power comes great responsibility.

name: ITEM_20150317_001576
text: You might be mistaken for a flower child.

name: ITEM_20150317_001578
text: A mask with a silly tiger face on it.

name: ITEM_20150317_001580
text: If you face the real Tini, it will be very different from a doll.

name: ITEM_20150317_001582
text: A helmet with a wing decoration.

name: ITEM_20150317_001586
text: Nobody knows why the egg was nested on someone's head.

name: ITEM_20150317_001588
text: If you don't feed it properly, you might become bald due to the hungry chick.

name: ITEM_20150317_001590
text: Now you'll always have eggs for breakfast.

name: ITEM_20150317_001592
text: A hat used for a special event or when marching.

name: ITEM_20150317_001596
text: The latest, trending glasses. It has a pair of colored lenses.

name: ITEM_20150317_001598
text: Very good when you have a fever or for cooling your head.

name: ITEM_20150317_001602
text: Don't mind the feather being larger than the hat.

name: ITEM_20150317_001604
text: Head decoration made to look like a maple leaf. Keep it away from fire.

name: ITEM_20150317_001606
text: An ornate hat with tassels. Used sometimes by a high ranking official or by reputable people.

name: ITEM_20150317_001608
text: Wearing this won't give you any healing powers.

name: ITEM_20150317_001610
text: Headband made with flowers from the Kateen Forest. It emanates a faint blue light.

name: ITEM_20150317_001612
text: Wearing this will make you cuter.

name: ITEM_20150317_001616
text: In some regions people dance while wearing this mask to cast away evil spirits.

name: ITEM_20150317_001619
text: Based on a folk tale creature from a faraway land.

name: ITEM_20150317_001621
text: Made to look like the face of a fox. People say this mask used to be worn by some assassins.

name: ITEM_20150317_001623
text: If you wear this, you will enjoy a better depth perception.

name: ITEM_20150317_001625
text: If you wear this, your headbutting power may increase.

name: ITEM_20150317_001627
text: Wearing this won't give you any special powers against demons or vice-versa.

name: ITEM_20150317_001629
text: Sometimes the bride will wear this during her wedding.

name: ITEM_20150317_001631
text: Blocks the light so you can sleep better.

name: ITEM_20150317_001635
text: Don't lose it, it's made of solid gold.

name: ITEM_20150317_001637
text: Towing a sled while wearing this might not be a bad idea.

name: ITEM_20150317_001639
text: Decorations are attached to this helmet to demand respect.

name: ITEM_20150317_001641
text: The metal of this helmet has been gilded with gold plate.

name: ITEM_20150317_001643
text: A helmet made of strong plate metal. Often worn by knights.

name: ITEM_20150317_001645
text: Connoisseurs often get into disputes regarding the cuteness factor of a straight ear versus a folded ear.

name: ITEM_20150317_001647
text: A hat that represents a Kepa.

name: ITEM_20150317_001649
text: Flaunt your pink-pink-ish attractiveness and cuteness at the same time.

name: ITEM_20150317_001651
text: It is said to be a mask used in a faraway land.

name: ITEM_20150317_001653
text: A mask based on the white tiger, a very rare animal.

name: ITEM_20150317_001657
text: The horn of a Unicorn. It is considered a mythical item.

name: ITEM_20150317_001659
text: Although you cannot become a demon, you can attach these to your head.

name: ITEM_20150317_001661
text: If you look carefully, you can see tiny soft hairs on these ears.

name: ITEM_20150317_001663
text: A helmet previously used by Mirtis.

name: ITEM_20150317_001665
text: Why do people want to attach wings to their heads?

name: ITEM_20150317_001667
text: I now know that feeling of being alone. This was a mistake.

name: ITEM_20150317_001669
text: The angels who committed sins are said to have had their wings turned black by their corruption.

name: ITEM_20150317_001671
text: How can I serve you today, master?

name: ITEM_20150317_001673
text: A helmet that is symbolic of the Wugushi.

name: ITEM_20150317_001676
text: It completely cuts you off from any external sound, including Mandragoras' screams.

name: ITEM_20150317_001715
text: Reduces the defense of Devil-type monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_001771
text: Restores HP every 2 seconds. {nl}192 HP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 30 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001773
text: Restores HP every 2 seconds. {nl}320 HP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 45 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001775
text: Restores HP every 2 seconds. {nl}640 HP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 60 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001777
text: Restores SP every 2 seconds. {nl}144 SP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 30 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001778
text: Restores SP every 2 seconds. {nl}240 SP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 45 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001780
text: Restores SP every 2 seconds. {nl}480 SP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 60 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001782
text: Restores 15 Stamina. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 30 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001784
text: Restores 30 Stamina. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 45 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001786
text: Restores 40 Stamina. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 60 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001788
text: Restores HP and SP every 2 seconds. {nl}224 HP and SP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 30 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001790
text: Restores HP and SP every 2 seconds. {nl}373 HP and SP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 30 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001792
text: Restores HP and SP every 2 seconds. {nl}744 HP and SP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 30 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001796
text: Inflicts periodic Poison Damage (Lv1) to the monster when used.

name: ITEM_20150317_001797
text: Can be only used on Beast-type monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_001803
text: Increases your movement speed by 5 for 180 seconds.{nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 30 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150317_001805
text: Allows you to warp to any activated Goddess Statue. Your current location will be saved at a Goddess Statue.

name: ITEM_20150317_001809
text: Restores 32~35 SP. Easy to acquire.{nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001811
text: A flower that can be used as a herb.

name: ITEM_20150317_001813
text: A purple colored flower that has regenerative effects when boiled. Restores 8 Stamina. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001815
text: A herb that grows in sunny fields.

name: ITEM_20150317_001819
text: A herb used by a priest during a ceremony for the dead.

name: ITEM_20150317_001824
text: Sweet-tasting herb. It is sometimes used for treatment of wounds. Restores HP.

name: ITEM_20150317_001826
text: Only those who have peeled its skin it knows how it feels.

name: ITEM_20150317_001829
text: It tastes bad but restores your SP.

name: ITEM_20150317_001831
text: Sticky liquid with a sweet taste.

name: ITEM_20150317_001835
text: Restores 350~400 SP. A well-known delicacy among food connoisseurs. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001839
text: You can obtain this from the Mission Glassmole and Mission Woodspirit from a Lv50 Mission.

name: ITEM_20150317_001841
text: Gives you the fortitude of an ox. Your Stamina will not deplete for 10 minutes.

name: ITEM_20150317_001853
text: A scroll that will open a mission portal. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001861
text: Area of Ruins Mission Warp Stone

name: ITEM_20150317_001864
text: Water blessed with a holy spirit. Used by priests.

name: ITEM_20150317_001866
text: A white powder that is consumed when priests cast a magic spell. It is said to amplify their magical power.

name: ITEM_20150317_001870
text: Restores 350~400 SP. A well-known delicacy among food connoisseurs. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001872
text: Teleports you to Klaipeda. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001877
text: Velheider's favorite food. Completely restores your companion's HP and restores their Stamina by 30.

name: ITEM_20150317_001879
text: Hoglan's favorite food. Completely restores your companion's HP and restores their Stamina by 30.

name: ITEM_20150317_001881
text: Arma's favorite food. Completely restores your companion's HP and restores their Stamina by 30.

name: ITEM_20150317_001884
text: Adds 30 EXP. {nl}50% chance of receiving additional EXP. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001886
text: Adds 120 EXP. {nl}50% chance of receiving additional EXP. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001888
text: Adds 500 EXP. {nl}50% chance of receiving additional EXP. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001890
text: Adds 2000 EXP. {nl}50% chance of receiving additional EXP. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001892
text: Adds 6000 EXP. {nl}50% chance of receiving additional EXP. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001894
text: Adds 12000 EXP. {nl}50% chance of receiving additional EXP. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001896
text: Adds 24000 EXP. {nl}50% chance of receiving additional EXP. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001898
text: Permanently increases your maximum HP by 30. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001900
text: Permanently increases your maximum SP by 20. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001902
text: Permanently increases your maximum Stamina by 5. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001904
text: Permanently increases your maximum Weight by 100. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001919
text: Permanently increases your STR by 1. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001921
text: Permanently increases your DEX by 1. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001923
text: Permanently increases your CON by 1. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001925
text: Permanently increases your INT by 1. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001927
text: Permanently increases your SPR by 1. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001929
text: Gives 1 Status Point. Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001930
text: Permanently increases your maximum carry weight by 50. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001932
text: Reduce the cooldown duration of all skills by 50% for 10 minutes. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 10 minutes.

name: ITEM_20150317_001934
text: Resets all the Status Points of your character.{nl}(CBT Tester only)

name: ITEM_20150317_001936
text: Adds 36000 EXP. {nl}50% chance of receiving additional EXP. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001938
