text: Adds 60000 EXP. {nl}50% chance of receiving additional EXP. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001940
text: Increases weapon damage by 3. {nl}Can be used after assigning it to a quick slot.

name: ITEM_20150317_001942
text: Increases weapon damage by 5. {nl}Can be used after assigning it to a quick slot.

name: ITEM_20150317_001944
text: Increases weapon damage by 14. {nl}Can be used after assigning it to a quick slot.

name: ITEM_20150317_001946
text: Reduces damage taken by 4. {nl}Can be used after assigning it to a quick slot.

name: ITEM_20150317_001948
text: Reduces damage taken by 8. {nl}Can be used after assigning it to a quick slot.

name: ITEM_20150317_001954
text: An old relic found in a well. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001956
text: A collection where you can register your items.{nl}You can register an item by right-clicking it.

name: ITEM_20150317_001970
text: You can improve the ability of an item by placing and hammering it on this anvil. {nl}Purchasable from Item Merchant.{nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150317_001973
text: A card containing the power of a strong monster.

name: ITEM_20150317_002086
text: Amplifies your voice. Use [/y 'chat'] to send your message to all maps in your server.{nl}Can be used from Lv. 40.

name: ITEM_20150317_002088
text: A quest item obtained from monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_002089
text: A dark magic stone obtainable only from Vubbes that have been exposed to crystals for a long period of time.

name: ITEM_20150317_002091
text: The ingredient of a consumable item. {nl} Tradable with NPCs.

name: ITEM_20150317_002092
text: A sweet-smelling flower leaf. {nl}Obtained from Hanamings.

name: ITEM_20150317_002095
text: A key to open a Lv2 Treasure Chest.

name: ITEM_20150317_002097
text: A key to open a Lv3 Treasure Chest.

name: ITEM_20150317_002099
text: A key to open a Lv4 Treasure Chest.

name: ITEM_20150317_002101
text: A key to open a Lv5 Treasure Chest.

name: ITEM_20150317_002104
text: A long stem that tastes slightly spicy. {nl}Obtained from Kepas.

name: ITEM_20150317_002106
text: A thin back shell. A faint pattern is visible. {nl}Obtained from Leaf Bugs.

name: ITEM_20150317_002108
text: A leaf that tastes slightly bitter. It becomes thicker as it gets closer to the stem. {nl}Obtained from Chinencys.

name: ITEM_20150317_002110
text: A sturdy shell with a hexagonal pattern on it. {nl}Obtained from Infro Rocktors.

name: ITEM_20150317_002112
text: A small and sharp tooth. {nl}Obtained from a Chupacabra.

name: ITEM_20150317_002114
text: A blunt feeler with a hairy surface. {nl}Obtained from Weavers.

name: ITEM_20150317_002118
text: It is wide and wrinkly. {nl}Obtained from Jukopuses.

name: ITEM_20150317_002120
text: The crystal formation found inside the plant comes from the solidification of its sap. {nl}Obtained from Red Kepas.

name: ITEM_20150317_002122
text: Material obtained from monsters. {nl}Used for crafting.

name: ITEM_20150317_002124
text: A charm carried by Vubbes. It's very crudely made. {nl}Obtained from Vubbes.

name: ITEM_20150317_002126
text: A mutant variation of the Nucl, the power source of mutant monsters. Contains highly condensed magic that might explode if handled carelessly. {nl}Obtained from Stone Orcas.

name: ITEM_20150317_002128
text: Slim, black feelers. {nl}Obtained from Crystal Spiders.

name: ITEM_20150317_002130
text: Thin and sharp feelers. {nl}Obtained from Yekubites.

name: ITEM_20150317_002132
text: It can be used to craft many tools thanks to its hardness. {nl}Obtained from Pantos.

name: ITEM_20150317_002134
text: The stem can be processed into fabric. Not suitable for eating. {nl}Obtained from Zignuts.

name: ITEM_20150317_002136
text: Care is required as it's very brittle.

text: A page from a torn diary written by a local resident. Let's keep reading.

name: ITEM_20150317_002803
text: Contains instructions on how to craft an item. Access the recipe in the crafting menu in Rest Mode.

name: ITEM_20150317_002805
text: It teleports you to another Goddess Statue. Your current location will be saved.

name: ITEM_20150317_002807
text: A jewel that instantly teleports you to a saved location. {nl}Cooldown of 15 minutes.

name: ITEM_20150317_002809
text: A stone that will transport you to Klaipeda. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 20 minutes.

name: ITEM_20150317_002814
text: Magic catalyst used by the Bokors. Bokors craft their own Bokor doll for a better spiritual magic effect.

name: ITEM_20150317_002816
text: An old scroll hidden by the Pyromancer. Illegible hieroglyphs and symbols are written over it.

name: ITEM_20150317_002818
text: A bag that seems to have belonged to a messenger. Contains a few reports and some food supplies.

name: ITEM_20150317_002820
text: The remains of a soldier killed by a monster. The person is no longer recognizable.

name: ITEM_20150317_002822
text: A patch of moss collected to investigate abnormal phenomena. Much can be discovered from investigating it.

name: ITEM_20150317_002824
text: Grass which discoloration is presumed to be caused by influence of demons.

name: ITEM_20150317_002826
text: Creepy, disturbing wood bark that has been altered from its original shape. It is presumed to have changed due to influence of the demons.

name: ITEM_20150317_002828
text: A report written by Blakk. Contains reconnaissance details of the nearby region.

name: ITEM_20150317_002830
text: A report written by York. Contains observations on recent monster activity. Let's take this to Commander Volda.

name: ITEM_20150317_002832
text: Herb pouch carried by Vubbes. Roughly made but effective enough.

name: ITEM_20150317_002834
text: Booty gathered by Vubbes. As for the sorting...

name: ITEM_20150317_002836
text: Supplies looted and gathered by Vubbes. You can see that some of them have been used.

name: ITEM_20150317_002838
text: Feather decorations in Vubbes' arrows. Useful for monster research.

name: ITEM_20150317_002840
text: Report written by Moody. It details the attacks from monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_002841
text: Diligent Owl Sculpture's wing fragment. It is imbued with holy power.

name: ITEM_20150317_002842
text: Wing fragment of the Fearful Owl Sculpture's friend. It became an ordinary piece of wood.

name: ITEM_20150317_002844
text: Unpolished gem ore. The gem within the stone is also dull as it hasn't been polished yet.

name: ITEM_20150317_002846
text: Serum collected from the blood of Vubbes. Requested of the Commander by Vaidotas.

name: ITEM_20150317_002848
text: A unequal crystal fragment. A material requested by Vaidotas.

name: ITEM_20150317_002849
text: Serum collected from the blood of dead Vubbes.

name: ITEM_20150317_002851
text: A key to release the seal of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: ITEM_20150317_002857
text: A map showing the location of something. Treasure, maybe?

name: ITEM_20150317_002859
text: Varkis dedicated his life to writing this journal. It is very important to him.

name: ITEM_20150317_002860
text: Boulder to be carved into a Memorial Stone

name: ITEM_20150317_002861
text: A material to make a memorial to remember the dead people in this area.

name: ITEM_20150317_002863
text: A tool kit including a chisel, hammer, rope and more.

name: ITEM_20150317_002865
text: A memorial for the people who died in this area is engraved here.

name: ITEM_20150317_002867
text: This device searches for evil spirits by absorbing energy from soldiers.

name: ITEM_20150317_002869
text: A small piece of rock that broke off from a stone pillar. Its purpose is not certain, but looks expensive.

name: ITEM_20150317_002871
text: Refined powder collected from a stone pillar's surface. Its use is unclear.

name: ITEM_20150317_002873
text: A small piece of a stone that was found in the monster's stomach. Seems to be part of a victim's relics.

name: ITEM_20150317_002875
text: A spell scroll that opens a distortion in the spatial fabric. Here you can obtain the key that belonged to the Great King.

name: ITEM_20150317_002877
text: A key used for releasing the seal of Great King Zachariel.

name: ITEM_20150317_002879
text: One of the task requirements by the Hoplite Master. Looks extremely sturdy.

name: ITEM_20150317_002881
text: One of the task requirements by the Hoplite Master. It would be fatal to be stabbed by it.

name: ITEM_20150317_002883
text: One of the task requirements by the Hoplite Master. It scatters at the slightest breath.

name: ITEM_20150317_002887
text: Material required for Psychokino Master's research.

name: ITEM_20150317_002889
text: A potion made by the Psychokino Master. Contains the stamen of Mersium. Looks a little dangerous.

name: ITEM_20150317_002890
text: Material requested by the Linker Master. He said he needed it for some sort of experiement. Wonder what it's for?

name: ITEM_20150317_002893
text: The Sapper Master requested these goods to be returned to their original owner. Did he steal these?

name: ITEM_20150317_002895
text: Leather requested by the Quarrel Shooter Master. Looks like it will be used for armorcrafting.

name: ITEM_20150317_002897
text: A giant stone used as a replacement on the Klaipda Castle Wall. Now, how to move this...

name: ITEM_20150317_002899
text: Not sure what's inside but it smells foul.

name: ITEM_20150317_002901
text: The sculpting material that Tesla wanted so badly. Looks extremely hard.

name: ITEM_20150317_002903
text: A pot that absorbs the essence of fire from nearby monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_002905
text: Items to be offered to the Goddess Statue.

name: ITEM_20150317_002906
text: Priest Master's Holy Water of Purification

name: ITEM_20150317_002907
text: Holy Water used for banishing evil spirits. A very pure water.

name: ITEM_20150317_002909
text: Materials for the Wizard Master's research.

name: ITEM_20150317_002913
text: Scroll made for researching the paranormal phenomena in Klaipeda.

name: ITEM_20150317_002915
text: Holy Water used for treating patients. It has a regenerative effect.

name: ITEM_20150317_002917
text: Holy Water used for treating patients. It has a sterilizing effect.

name: ITEM_20150317_002919
text: Holy Water used for treating patients. It has a revitalizing effect.

name: ITEM_20150317_002921
text: A demonic essence requested by the Psychokino Master. It emanates a sinister evil aura.

name: ITEM_20150317_002923
text: A demonic essence requested by the Psychokino Master. If you stare at it for too long you might be possessed.

name: ITEM_20150317_002925
text: This might be a map marked with the location of the Fletcher's Secret Manual. Why would the Quarrel Shooter Master want the Fletcher's...?

name: ITEM_20150317_002926
text: Cloth Piece with a Peculiar Scent

name: ITEM_20150317_002927
text: A piece of cloth suspected to be from Ebonypawn.

name: ITEM_20150317_002929
text: An accelerant required for the Sapper Master's experiements. It catches on fire quickly.

name: ITEM_20150317_002931
text: A bomb produced by the Sapper Master's bomb for testing.

name: ITEM_20150317_002933
text: A piece of cloth probably from the outfit of the Item Merchant's Father. You can feel great effort from the needlepoints.

name: ITEM_20150317_002934
text: Box of Food for Stray Cat

name: ITEM_20150317_002935
text: A box containing a delicacy liked by the stray cats. Used to catch stray cats. It has a fishy smell.

name: ITEM_20150317_002937
text: Spirit of fire collected into a pot.

name: ITEM_20150317_002939
text: Material requested by the Cryomancer Master as an alternative payment for his teaching fees.

name: ITEM_20150317_002941
text: Material requested by the Cryomancer Master as an alternative payment for his teaching fees. Will this be of any use for a Cryomancer?

name: ITEM_20150317_002943
text: A stiff, hard piece from the inner side of Phyracon. Material requested by the Wizard Master.

name: ITEM_20150317_002945
text: A smooth scale found below the rougher outer scale of Drake. Material requested by the Wizard Master.

name: ITEM_20150317_002946
text: Scroll made to compare the phenomena in Fedimian and Klaipeda.

name: ITEM_20150317_002948
text: L-shaped rod used by miners to dowse or divine underground veins of mineral or other anomalies.

name: ITEM_20150317_002949
text: You can obtain an object hidden on the 3rd floor.

name: ITEM_20150317_002951
text: A lump of something that smells terribly foul. You can see a glimpse of a ring-like object inside.

name: ITEM_20150317_002953
text: A completely dried up twig. It has a lot of tiny thorns.

name: ITEM_20150317_002957
text: A detailed tactic is explained alongside the map.

name: ITEM_20150317_002966
text: Ingredient for crafting the Memory Fragment. It is very thick.

name: ITEM_20150317_002968
text: Sunset Flag Forest Reconnaissance Report. The scribbles that seems rushed give it an eerie chill.

name: ITEM_20150317_002969
text: Water Bottle hidden by the Supply Officer

name: ITEM_20150317_002970
text: A water bottle hidden by the Supply Officer.{nl}It smells old and musty.

name: ITEM_20150317_002972
text: An indispensable material for capturing Gaigalas. It smells musty.

name: ITEM_20150317_002973
text: An indispensable material for capturing Gaigalas. It's full of moss.

name: ITEM_20150317_002980
text: Pieces of gold, a Lichenclop's favorite material. Tediously collected.

name: ITEM_20150317_002982
text: Contains articles to help research such as pens, papers, digging tools and some foodstuffs.

name: ITEM_20150317_002984
text: Herb used to treat neurological ailments.

name: ITEM_20150317_002986
text: File containing research data on the Royal Mausoleum.

name: ITEM_20150317_002987
text: File containing research data on the Royal Mausoleum. It's been ripped apart.

name: ITEM_20150317_002990
text: Piece of Record on Mysterious Pattern (2)

name: ITEM_20150317_002992
text: Dabio obtained this medicine for Jonas. Very effective in treating senility.

name: ITEM_20150317_002994
text: Replenishes your HP when a monster is defeated within the magic circle

name: ITEM_20150317_002996
text: Explosive to open up a Secret Passage

name: ITEM_20150317_002997
text: Explosive to block the Vubbe Raiders' Secret Passage

name: ITEM_20150317_002999
text: A fragment of the Woodsman that sometimes wiggles creepily.

name: ITEM_20150317_003001
text: A report on suspicious activities written by Scatt, member of the joint investigation team.

name: ITEM_20150317_003003
text: A scroll that allows you to collect spirits. Only usable on certain monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_003004
text: Spirit of the Red Vubbe Shooter

name: ITEM_20150317_003005
text: An orb that has a Red Vubbe Shooter's spirit sealed within.

name: ITEM_20150317_003007
text: Owl Sculpture's upper piece. Restoration is, unfortunately, infeasible.

name: ITEM_20150317_003009
text: Lower piece of the Owl Sculpture. The shape is barely recognizable.

name: ITEM_20150317_003010
text: Pedestal piece of the Owl Sculpture. It's about to break in half.

name: ITEM_20150317_003012
text: A special oil to burn the Owl Sculpture which has unfortunately been shattered.

name: ITEM_20150317_003014
text: A wheat box containing a small number of grains. The box has been ripped apart.

name: ITEM_20150317_003016
text: A pouch full of strange pills. These  fills Vubbes with courage but cause diarrhea in humans.

name: ITEM_20150317_003018
text: A telescope lens used at the Astral Tower.

name: ITEM_20150317_003022
text: A stone carried by the Hogmas. It attracts monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_003024
text: Friedka believes that this amulet is the key to the ruin's secrets.

name: ITEM_20150317_003026
text: Supplies of the unit which Lindt is a part of. A Wendigo ran away with it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003028
text: A herb with a decent painkiller effect.

name: ITEM_20150317_003030
text: This stone is said to attract Saugas. Could it be true?

name: ITEM_20150317_003032
text: A fragment of a relic swallowed by Denoptic. A monster that feeds on stone, how curious.

name: ITEM_20150317_003034
text: A pouch of coins meant for payment. Grave Robber Kujang asked you to deliver this to Grave Robber Bushobell.

name: ITEM_20150317_003036
text: Treasure that belonged to human victims and was hoarded by the monster.

name: ITEM_20150317_003041
text: Belongings from a soldier, stolen by a Leafbug. Looks like it's been stolen many times since then.

name: ITEM_20150317_003043
text: A ripped cloth piece from Vubbe. It's from the dirty waist area.

name: ITEM_20150317_003045
text: If you gather enough of these, they may have a use.

name: ITEM_20150317_003047
text: Goods used as a provision for emergencies in Miners' Village.

name: ITEM_20150317_003049
text: Stone required to reinforce the Crystal Mine's exterior walls. Collect them before the wall crumbles.

name: ITEM_20150317_003051
text: A stick used to expel Sequoia. It has a few holy spirits.

name: ITEM_20150317_003052
text: Piece of Wood with Holy Spirit

name: ITEM_20150317_003053
text: Ingredient for a tool that chases away road-blocking Sequoia. You can feel the faint holy power.

name: ITEM_20150317_003054
text: Spirit crystals from Owl Sculptures that have been swallowed by monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_003056
text: Warrior's Essence. It is very necessary to give Sequoia the very best bit.

name: ITEM_20150317_003058
text: The first soul stone. It harbors the strong grudge of a corrupt individual.

name: ITEM_20150317_003060
text: The second soul stone. It harbors the strong grudge of a corrupt individual.

name: ITEM_20150317_003062
text: The third soul stone. It harbors the strong grudge of a corrupt individual.

name: ITEM_20150317_003064
text: A sign that the Angry Owl Sculpture had.

name: ITEM_20150317_003066
text: This stick was made by upgrading a Stinging Stick. It is capable of subduing Sequoia.

name: ITEM_20150317_003067
text: The larvae of Meduja are eating away at the memories of life. They're sparkly.

name: ITEM_20150317_003069
text: The luggage of a dead merchant. His spirit is obsessed with it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003071
text: A scroll of protection. It seems the scholar's spirit was vanquished before using it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003073
text: A rubbed copy of the monument that the female explorer was looking for.

name: ITEM_20150317_003075
text: The branch that was burned when the Sequoia made a disturbance.

name: ITEM_20150317_003077
text: This stick was made by upgrading a Spiritual Stick. It holds the grudges of the Owl Sculptures.

name: ITEM_20150317_003078
text: Keepsake from dead soldiers killed by monsters. It seems that the keepsake can comfort the soldiers' victimized souls.

name: ITEM_20150317_003080
text: This smell reminds me of my hometown. I miss my home.

name: ITEM_20150317_003082
text: Abnormally smelling juices are oozing from it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003086
text: A monster decoy used to complete the last mission of dead soldiers.

name: ITEM_20150317_003088
text: Test it on a monster to confirm that it is working.

name: ITEM_20150317_003090
text: A Bushspider's leg that has been taken off.

name: ITEM_20150317_003092
text: Old Kepa skin. Powder falls off it when shaken.

name: ITEM_20150317_003093
text: Needed to make the decoy more convincing. Will this decoy work well?

name: ITEM_20150317_003095
text: Corpses of Johan's squad. Treat them well.

name: ITEM_20150317_003098
text: Portable supplies to be sent first to Danyus' squad.

name: ITEM_20150317_003100
text: A hook that soldier Roy has to collect. He can return to his troops as soon as he collects it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003105
text: A material used to fix the wagon. Cut from the the hard part of the stem of a Hamming.

name: ITEM_20150317_003107
text: Fluid secreted from Tini's gland. Touching it will sting you.

name: ITEM_20150317_003109
text: Herbicide made from the fluid of a Tini. You can remove thornbushes with it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003112
text: A certificate awarded to soldiers who have safely completed their training.

name: ITEM_20150317_003114
text: Collection of only soft parts of Plantain Grass. It tastes bitter when chewed.

name: ITEM_20150317_003116
text: This meat is definitely the right choice for growing one's strength.

name: ITEM_20150317_003118
text: Empty potion bottle stolen by a Vubbe. It sparkles as if it has been vigorously cleaned.

name: ITEM_20150317_003123
text: A pouch that a Vubbe has been keeping to spread evil spirits.

name: ITEM_20150317_003125
text: A precious relic that the Krivis keep with them to symbolize their faithfulness.

name: ITEM_20150317_003127
text: An item that proves one's ability to the Sword Master. It's the heart of Stone Orca.

name: ITEM_20150317_003130
text: A Vubbe ointment that is used to treat their injured. It's not possible to use it as is.

name: ITEM_20150317_003132
text: A power source used by Guardians for movement.

name: ITEM_20150317_003134
text: The source of the magic that encircles the Royal Mausoleum.

name: ITEM_20150317_003135
text: Broken Slate of the Royal Mausoleum

name: ITEM_20150317_003136
text: A slate that ordered the Guardians to attack evil things. They are attacking everyone because it is broken.

name: ITEM_20150317_003138
text: A stone that lights stone lanterns. Although it is burning, it isn't very hot.

name: ITEM_20150317_003140
text: Overusing the inhibitor can cause it to overheat and break.

name: ITEM_20150317_003142
text: A magic source that shows the locations of the Royal Mausoleum's Guardians.

name: ITEM_20150317_003144
text: A mark of Wheelens. Collecting them gives the power to defeat enemies.

name: ITEM_20150317_003146
text: A diary that Coben asked you to find.

name: ITEM_20150317_003153
text: If you set up this jar, it will absorb magical power from around you.

name: ITEM_20150317_003155
text: Could be a cause of the disease.

name: ITEM_20150317_003157
text: The tail of a diseased Big Cockatrice.

name: ITEM_20150317_003159
text: A gem that absorbs a monster's life force. It absorbs the life force of monsters defeated near it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003161
text: A scroll required to solve the seal of King Zachariel. It is the first seal.

name: ITEM_20150317_003163
text: An ingredient to make a Crystal Gem.

name: ITEM_20150317_003166
text: Any monster that uses fire abilities has a source. It is used to make Flame Gems.

name: ITEM_20150317_003168
text: Makes finding fire easy but how Grita got it is a mystery.

name: ITEM_20150317_003171
text: Research material stolen by monsters. It seems that monsters like to steal such documents.

name: ITEM_20150317_003176
text: Hard lime be used to make Knockoff Goods.

name: ITEM_20150317_003178
text: Decicive evidence of Knockoff Goods. It isn't finished yet.

name: ITEM_20150317_003180
text: Piece of a building with beautiful pattern on it. It seems that the architect put a lot of work into making it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003182
text: There are various tools inside, like a dowsing rod to check for underground tombs.

name: ITEM_20150317_003184
text: The Saugas store their loot in bags. They share their loot equally.

name: ITEM_20150317_003186
text: A very ancient looking token of an archaeologist.

name: ITEM_20150317_003188
text: The highly toxic poison of a Woodfung. It releases this poison into the air when frightened.

name: ITEM_20150317_003191
text: Increases your attack speed and movement speed while attacking. {nl} Also speeds up cast time and lowers cooldowns. {nl} {#ff0000} Caution: Taking this more than 3 times a day, may cause insomnia{nl}, headache, or indigestion symptoms. {/}

name: ITEM_20150317_003195
text: A sack holding a monster's head

name: ITEM_20150317_003197
text: A sack holding a monster's trunk

name: ITEM_20150317_003199
text: A sack holding a monster's hand

name: ITEM_20150317_003202
text: Lizardman Blood is used in experiments conducted by necromancers.

name: ITEM_20150317_003204
text: A soul jar given by the necromancer Drasyus. It will inhale monsters who are on the verge of death.

name: ITEM_20150317_003205
text: First Clue of the Great King

name: ITEM_20150317_003206
text: A clue to undo the seal at the entrance of Mausoleum.

name: ITEM_20150317_003207
text: Second Clue of the Great King

name: ITEM_20150317_003208
text: Third Clue of the Great King

name: ITEM_20150317_003209
text: Fourth Clue of the Great King

name: ITEM_20150317_003210
text: Fifth Clue of the Great King

name: ITEM_20150317_003212
text: A sword with a piece missing from it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003214
text: These relics might help identify the dead bodies.

name: ITEM_20150317_003216
text: This piece fits into the Chipped Sword.

name: ITEM_20150317_003218
text: Wood picked from the wood pile by Cahill.

name: ITEM_20150317_003220
text: This is used for various leather products.

name: ITEM_20150317_003222
text: A letter containing the heart of Mose Diesel.

name: ITEM_20150317_003224
text: Mose Diesel made these crutches for the village youngster Cahill

name: ITEM_20150317_003226
text: The first material Ahylas Jonas requested to undo the seal.

name: ITEM_20150317_003229
text: A crystal needed to release the seals in Broken Pillar Canyon

name: ITEM_20150317_003231
text: Research materials that the new researcher lost. Some of the papers were crumpled when they were stepped on.

name: ITEM_20150317_003232
text: Map marking the Great King's Inheritance

name: ITEM_20150317_003233
text: Could someone eventually find out the location of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance?

name: ITEM_20150317_003234
text: An antidote that can counteract a Scorpion's poison. Let's get this to Dezic.

name: ITEM_20150317_003236
text: It seems it will explode if it is touched. Be careful.

name: ITEM_20150317_003238
text: A Hogma's tooth used to scratch out something on the slate.

name: ITEM_20150317_003240
text: Meat gotten by slaying Infroburk. It looks tough.

name: ITEM_20150317_003242
text: This trunk looks like that of a normal tree.

name: ITEM_20150317_003244
text: It seems to use as a firewood.

name: ITEM_20150317_003246
text: Lydia Schaffen's tombstone piece regained from Cemetery Golems and Guri.

name: ITEM_20150317_003247
text: Piece of Lydia Schaffen's Broken Tombstone

name: ITEM_20150317_003248
text: A piece of a broken tombstone found from a Sea Turtle. You have to put the pieces of tombstone together to see whose it is.

name: ITEM_20150317_003250
text: Finally restored the tombstone. What is in there?

name: ITEM_20150317_003252
text: A piece of Flurry's tombstone that a Tama picked up and ate.

name: ITEM_20150317_003254
text: Bag filled with odds and ends

name: ITEM_20150317_003256
text: A magical black powder made from coal that makes ink stick clearly onto parchment.

name: ITEM_20150317_003258
text: A material needed to open the sealed manual. Doesn't go out no matter how much you try.

name: ITEM_20150317_003260
text: The Holy Ark for holding souls has been broken. Will collecting its pieces be enough?

name: ITEM_20150317_003262
text: A monster's Small Crystal that the Suspicious Chair asked you to collect. To call it a crystal is a stretch, though.

name: ITEM_20150317_003264
text: The voice of the soul sealed within the Sealed Stone. You can hear a faint whisper from it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003266
text: A crystal infused with magic to prevent the sealed soul from escaping.

name: ITEM_20150317_003268
text: The Variation Mediator substance that the Variation Magician Furry Odd asked you to collect.

name: ITEM_20150317_003270
text: A crystal that has been carelessly burnt.

name: ITEM_20150317_003272
text: A burning charm. Because it was in a monster's stomach, it is wet and smells bad.

name: ITEM_20150317_003274
text: Silver dye used for Simon Shaw's tattoo. It is relatively easy to get.

name: ITEM_20150317_003276
text: Parchment Cordelier gave you. Although coal powder has been used, it is hard to see the letters because the parchment has darkened.

name: ITEM_20150317_003278
text: Contains a power source that moves the Fallenlem. Grita, who can't use magic, needs it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003280
text: Needed to stabilize the Flame Gem.

name: ITEM_20150317_003282
text: Material needed to make a Bokor doll.

name: ITEM_20150317_003285
text: A method for removing thorny vines is written on the paper.

name: ITEM_20150317_003287
text: An ember to burn the thorny vines.

name: ITEM_20150317_003289
text: A strong acid solution that can melt through thorn vines.

name: ITEM_20150317_003291
text: A crystal needed to remove thorn vines by holy power. It needs charging and refining to be used.

name: ITEM_20150317_003293
text: Thornball Wreckage burns well, even in rain.

name: ITEM_20150317_003294
text: Some fluid with a sour smell that oozed out from a toenail.

name: ITEM_20150317_003296
text: A useful fluid for flushing out the mini Griba that has become a parasite on Greepelli's hair.

name: ITEM_20150317_003298
text: Adele treasures this ring. Let's get it back to Adele.

name: ITEM_20150317_003300
text: A poisonous mushroom from Truffle. Most people think it's a horn.

name: ITEM_20150317_003301
text: A strong acidic solution that can melt through thorn stems.

name: ITEM_20150317_003303
text: An Operor's saliva that has the power to purify corrupted magical crystals.

name: ITEM_20150317_003305
text: A completely purified magical crystal. It can remove the thorn vines blocking the path.

name: ITEM_20150317_003307
text: Highly volatile sap. Essential for burning away wet thorn vines.

name: ITEM_20150317_003309
text: A medicine effective in restoring one's mind.

name: ITEM_20150317_003311
text: A crystal of power gotten from defeating Corylus. It is used to make a crystal of light.

name: ITEM_20150317_003313
text: A crystal filled with enough energy to activate the underground enchantment.

name: ITEM_20150317_003315
text: Visual plans, where you can see the goal area for the operation. It is in the middle.

name: ITEM_20150317_003317
text: Pollen used to exorcise evil spirits.

name: ITEM_20150317_003319
text: A latch used to tie down the handle of the cable car's lever.

name: ITEM_20150317_003321
text: A metal part shaped like a wheel that monsters had stolen. It is clearly a part of the cable car.

name: ITEM_20150317_003323
text: Sweet tasting Plateau specialty sugar beets. Young animals love them.

name: ITEM_20150317_003325
text: Parts acquired from around the broken cable car

name: ITEM_20150317_003327
text: Good medicine for when the atmosphere becomes contaminated and hazy.

name: ITEM_20150317_003329
text: A Fragaras' resin is an effective exorcising material.

name: ITEM_20150317_003331
text: A ceremonial rope carried by a Panto Shaman

name: ITEM_20150317_003333
text: A mane taken from the nape of a defeated Mushcaria

name: ITEM_20150317_003335
text: A legendary holy utensil used to defeat Gesti. Seems like it's not the right time to use this.

name: ITEM_20150317_003336
text: A legendary holy utensil used to defeat Gesti. It needs to be recharged before it can be used.

name: ITEM_20150317_003337
text: A legendary holy utensil used to defeat Gesti. It's ready to be used.

name: ITEM_20150317_003339
text: A catalyst containing a Voodoo Doll. Activates the Voodoo Doll when used.

name: ITEM_20150317_003341
text: An igniter found in a beacon mound.

name: ITEM_20150317_003343
text: Counterfeit goods passed to you from Kevin. They're not finished.

name: ITEM_20150317_003345
text: Lowers the strength of monsters when used on them.

name: ITEM_20150317_003347
text: A piece broken off from the altar on the second floor of the Cathedral

name: ITEM_20150317_003349
text: When used, you become invisible to demons for 10 seconds. The effect disappears if you attack or take damage.

name: ITEM_20150317_003350
text: Lesser Bead of the Divine Spirit

name: ITEM_20150317_003351
text: When used, a Divine Spirit appears and provokes nearby demons.

name: ITEM_20150317_003353
text: An index describing how to obtain the Legendary Key from the West Barrier.

name: ITEM_20150317_003355
text: A special key for finding revelations and hidden places.

name: ITEM_20150317_003357
text: It creates an awakening effect if it is mixed with Thorn Flower Powder Stimulant.

name: ITEM_20150317_003359
text: It has a better effect than the Thorn Flower Powder.

name: ITEM_20150317_003361
text: It has an awakening effect if mixed with a Merog's spit.

name: ITEM_20150317_003363
text: Material requested by the Elementalist Master to prove your qualification.

name: ITEM_20150317_003367
text: A vessel to hold water enchanted with spiritual power.

name: ITEM_20150317_003370
text: An enemy that dies with this charm attached to it, is supposed to be under our control... It seems kind of shabby.

name: ITEM_20150317_003372
text: A pot filled with the magical energy that flows through the Royal Mausoleum.

name: ITEM_20150317_003374
text: Ingredient necessary to redecorate the Obelisk. It has a high level of acidity.

name: ITEM_20150317_003376
text: Paralysis Powder that can stun the Black Maize in Rhombuspaving Dale.

name: ITEM_20150317_003378
text: Ingredient necessary for the paint used in painting inscriptions onto the Obelisk. It's black in color.

name: ITEM_20150317_003380
text: Ingredient necessary to redecorate the Obelisk. It's very sticky.

name: ITEM_20150317_003382
text: A scroll used to mark the divine symbol of a Paladin onto demons

name: ITEM_20150317_003384
text: The sacred energies of the Shrine still infuse them.

name: ITEM_20150317_003386
text: A key to release the restraint ward tied by Goddess Saule

name: ITEM_20150317_003388
text: A great herb requested by the Cleric Master.

name: ITEM_20150317_003390
text: An offering pocket that clerics use to worship the Goddess Statue.

name: ITEM_20150317_003392
text: A balm used to repair Goddess Statue. It has an unusual, but gentle scent.

name: ITEM_20150317_003397
text: A shield requested of the Fletcher Master from the Peltasta Master.

name: ITEM_20150317_003399
text: A necessary permit needed for a ship to enter the port.

name: ITEM_20150317_003401
text: A necessary map for sailing. It describes the ocean currents and wind directions.

name: ITEM_20150317_003403
text: What kind of contract is this?

name: ITEM_20150317_003405
text: A bag that can hold a lot of whetstones.

name: ITEM_20150317_003407
text: A body fluid sample extracted from a Moya.

name: ITEM_20150317_003409
text: An arrow sample created by the Fletcher Master. It has good balance.

name: ITEM_20150317_003411
text: Wood that the Fletcher Master is looking for. It produces a fine timbre when knocked on.

name: ITEM_20150317_003413
text: There is a clear sound coming from one of these trees. Let's knock on the tree and investigate.

name: ITEM_20150317_003415
text: A simple tube that can shoot a neruotoxin dart.

name: ITEM_20150317_003417
text: A special poison made from a Stoulet's bodily fluids. It only reacts with the neurotoxin dart used with the Simple Tube.

name: ITEM_20150317_003419
text: An easy tactic made for beginner Centurions, it is nonetheless difficult to remember without practice.

name: ITEM_20150317_003421
text: A flare mainly used by Scouts. Used to find hidden monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_003423
text: A rubbing of Lydia Schaffen requested by the Quarrel Shooter Master for testing.

name: ITEM_20150317_003425
text: A jewel suffering from a very powerful curse. It seems to be continuously calling to someone.

name: ITEM_20150317_003427
text: Jar of fire obtained from  Mostems. Mostems treasure them.

name: ITEM_20150317_003429
text: Blue Fisherman Bones. It too small to hold.

name: ITEM_20150317_003433
text: The beak of a Harpeia. It is very sharp.

name: ITEM_20150317_003435
text: Used to easily escape from enemies during a crisis. Bang!

name: ITEM_20150317_003437
text: An orb very useful for taunting enemies

name: ITEM_20150317_003439
text: A rope with a noose attached to it. Used for throwing and tying up enemies.

name: ITEM_20150317_003441
text: Letter of introduction that Sapper Master wrote to the Highlander Master

name: ITEM_20150317_003443
text: Confirmation from the Highlander Master that you accomplished all of the necessary requirements for advancement.

name: ITEM_20150317_003445
text: Crystal with Tanu's ability to purify

name: ITEM_20150317_003449
text: Liquid extracted from Gorge Metoses. It is used as an ingredient in medicine used for alleviating mental illness symptoms.

name: ITEM_20150317_003451
text: Kepeck's record of relics transcribed verbatim. Only the shape and size of the relics are recorded.

name: ITEM_20150317_003453
text: Rubbings requested by the epigraphist Smith

name: ITEM_20150317_003454
text: A torn letter found from a dead body. Let's find a place to place the relics.

name: ITEM_20150317_003456
text: A scroll describing the secret moves of the legendary thief, Zubeck. Grants 1 Stat Point when used.

name: ITEM_20150317_003458
text: Gem containing an aura of fire. It will be helpful to the Goddess Gabija.

name: ITEM_20150317_003460
text: A herb that makes one feel languid

name: ITEM_20150317_003462
text: A flower with a powerful fragrance. There is a rumor that souls inhabit this flower.

name: ITEM_20150317_003464
text: Explosives made to prevent monsters from advancing into Andale Village.

name: ITEM_20150317_003466
text: The chemical essence of the Languid Herb has been concentrated for use in this bomb.

name: ITEM_20150317_003468
text: A bait used to attract Sparnas. It made by lumping together old grains.

name: ITEM_20150317_003470
text: Supplies requested by the supplier to be delivered to the Danus unit.

name: ITEM_20150317_003472
text: A report of the forgotten Naru's development records.

name: ITEM_20150317_003474
text: A pouch of supplies looted by Vubbes. Let's take these to Yukurt to investigate the odd behaviour of the Vubbes.

name: ITEM_20150317_003476
text: Fat that reeks with a Ducky's scent.

name: ITEM_20150317_003478
text: Full of tools used to repair the scarecrow.

name: ITEM_20150317_003480
text: A marker found from Chapparition. The voices of the killed innocents echo from it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003481
text: A necklace that a ghost asked you to take to his younger brother. A modest pendant is attached to it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003482
text: A bag full of money. What was the Reaper doing with this?

name: ITEM_20150317_003484
text: A messenger's hastily scribbled note. It describes a great threat.

name: ITEM_20150317_003486
text: There are verses on it to appease the souls of those who died while researching the Royal Mausoleum.

name: ITEM_20150317_003488
text: A page torn from a book. It looks like the author is Shaman Show.

name: ITEM_20150317_003490
text: A pilgrim's mark swallowed by a monster. The owner is nowhere to be found.

name: ITEM_20150317_003492
text: Marble Parts found attached to the monsters in the Cathedral.

name: ITEM_20150317_003494
text: A book that Koven hid in a box.

name: ITEM_20150317_003496
text: Koven gave you this key, saying it opened a locked box.{nl}Let's look for this box.

name: ITEM_20150317_003500
text: The practice wood carving is completely broken.

name: ITEM_20150317_003504
text: The broken practice wood carving has fixed. It has been reinforced to be more durable.

name: ITEM_20150317_003506
text: Log required to fix the practice wood carving.

name: ITEM_20150317_003508
text: Rope required to fix the scarecrow.

name: ITEM_20150317_003510
text: An orb necessary to complete the spell that wakes the Sleeping Owls to defeat Gaigalas.

name: ITEM_20150317_003511
text: An unstable divine utensil. It cannot be used in its current state.

name: ITEM_20150317_003513
text: A huge fang obtained from the Minotaur at the Deserted Market

name: ITEM_20150317_003515
text: Parts needed for a new trap devised by the Sapper Master.

name: ITEM_20150317_003517
text: The stone demanded by the Fletcher Master for his teachings.

name: ITEM_20150317_003519
text: A trinket belonging to the old Legwyn family.

name: ITEM_20150317_003520
text: An ingredient of a drug required to cure the patient.

name: ITEM_20150317_003522
text: A holy relic used by Krivises as a symbol of their faith. Lost in the city by someone.

name: ITEM_20150317_003524
text: An essence filled with the resentment of many souls.

name: ITEM_20150317_003528
text: The claws requested by the Monk Master as proof of your oath.

name: ITEM_20150317_003530
text: Offering envelope embossed with the Pardoner's Crest

name: ITEM_20150317_003532
text: Mali seeds obtained from killing Malis.

name: ITEM_20150317_003534
text: A scroll to summon a Destructive Shaman Doll

name: ITEM_20150317_003536
text: Part of a broken enchantment used to protect Mazas' nest. Can it be restored?

name: ITEM_20150317_003538
text: A material that is needed to wake up the Nepenthes. It doesn't catch fire in its current state.

name: ITEM_20150317_003540
text: The fat of a Mallardu that has been prepared to burn well. Use it to wake up the Nepenthes.

name: ITEM_20150317_003542
text: It must be gathered from the Nepenthes while it's alive for it to have any effect.

name: ITEM_20150317_003544
text: Secretion that can be used to attract Biteregina

name: ITEM_20150317_003546
text: An enemy killed with this charm attached to them will join your side!

name: ITEM_20150317_003547
text: First revelation found from the Crystal Mine

name: ITEM_20150317_003549
text: Rodelin's eye. It is said to be able to erase an enemy's senses.

name: ITEM_20150317_003551
text: An ingredient necessary to make the Holy Bomb. It must be purified before it can be used.

name: ITEM_20150317_003553
text: An ingredient necessary to make the Holy Bomb. The purified result of Wicked Essence.

name: ITEM_20150317_003555
text: When consumed it will prevent demons from detecting your presence!

name: ITEM_20150317_003557
text: A bomb blessed with holy power. It can defeat Glizardon in a single blow.

name: ITEM_20150317_003559
text: Scroll given by the Security Guard

name: ITEM_20150317_003560
text: Once the scroll is used, one can distinguish which Hogmas are wearing necklaces.

name: ITEM_20150317_003562
text: On the back "To ...oved Rukl..s, Lydia." is visible.

name: ITEM_20150317_003564
text: A skirt hem obtained by defeating Pawndel and Pawnd. An ingredient needed to make the Demon Transform Scroll.

name: ITEM_20150317_003566
text: A demon's soul collected in order to identify demon monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_003570
text: Bucket used to hold water. Seems like a rope can be tied to it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003572
text: A very long rope. Seems like something can be tied to it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003574
text: Use this scroll to transform to Pawndel or Pawnd.

name: ITEM_20150317_003576
text: A Power Crystal processed and filled with the strength of light. It can release the enchantment that binds the sealed Cathedral doors.

name: ITEM_20150317_003578
text: Old and muddy necklace dropped by someone long ago.

name: ITEM_20150317_003580
text: Wooden arrow used by High Vubbe Archers. It might be useful for kindling.

name: ITEM_20150317_003581
text: Ingredient necessary to make the Crude Divining Rod used to search for the First Tombstone Fragment. You need to collect a lot of them.

name: ITEM_20150317_003583
text: A divining rod used to search for the First Tombstone Fragment which has been hidden somewhere underground. Looks weak enough to be broken by even the slightest amount of force.

name: ITEM_20150317_003585
text: A rubble that the epigraphist Raymond ordered you to collect with the suspicion that it might contain a part of the Second Tombstone. A Second Tombstone Fragment may or may not be in here...

name: ITEM_20150317_003587
text: The sap of a stumpy tree requested by general goods merchant Edang. Its powerful medical properties have made it a highly valued commodity.

name: ITEM_20150317_003589
text: A tool used to collect the sap of a Treearmblow

name: ITEM_20150317_003591
text: The first part of the lost Ruklys monument

name: ITEM_20150317_003593
text: The second part of the lost Ruklys monument

name: ITEM_20150317_003595
text: The third part of the lost Ruklys monument

name: ITEM_20150317_003597
text: The fourth part of the lost Ruklys monument

name: ITEM_20150317_003599
text: The Fifth Tombstone Fragment is mixed into this pile of debris.

name: ITEM_20150317_003601
text: A finished part of the lost Ruklys monument

name: ITEM_20150317_003602
text: There are illegible words written on it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003603
text: The second revelation found from the Tenet Church

name: ITEM_20150317_003605
text: A package that the treasure hunter Edang asked you to deliver to the epigraphist Raymond

name: ITEM_20150317_003607
text: A fragment prepared so epigraphist Smith can easily restore it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003609
text: A rubbing of the First Lydia Schaffen Monument

name: ITEM_20150317_003611
text: A rubbing of the Second Lydia Schaffen Monument

name: ITEM_20150317_003613
text: A rubbing of the Third Lydia Schaffen Monument

name: ITEM_20150317_003615
text: A rubbing of the Fourth Lydia Schaffen Monument

name: ITEM_20150317_003617
text: A rubbing of the Fifth Lydia Schaffen Monument

name: ITEM_20150317_003619
text: An Arrow Bundle that Hunter Talas requested to be fire hardened in order to be used against Infroburks.

name: ITEM_20150317_003621
text: Experimental materials requested by necromancer Drashus. Take it to Drashus.

name: ITEM_20150317_003623
text: Waterweed that grows in the Clearawl Brook. Drashus uses it when summoning powerful spirits.

name: ITEM_20150317_003625
text: If you defeat a Lizardman after using this stone, it will follow you.

name: ITEM_20150317_003627
text: If you defeat a Infrobuck after using this stone, it will follow you.

name: ITEM_20150317_003629
text: A tool given to you by Hunter Talas to make rubbings of the Lydia Schaffen Monmuments.

name: ITEM_20150317_003631
text: An arrowhead hardened by fire to be used against Infrobucks.

name: ITEM_20150317_003633
text: Charcoal obtained from defeating the Long Arm Tree. Touching it leaves a black stain.

name: ITEM_20150317_003635
text: A bomb that can light the Long-Branched Tree on fire.

name: ITEM_20150317_003636
text: Revelation that Bramble had. It's unreadable - let's take it to Goddess Saule.

name: ITEM_20150317_003638
text: It is said to be able to wake the sleeping Boowook.

name: ITEM_20150317_003640
text: A Zolem's Magic Stone needed to lure a Unicorn

name: ITEM_20150317_003642
text: A trophy taken from a defeated Unicorn. Let's take it to Fedimian Army Officer.

name: ITEM_20150317_003644
text: A beehive that has had all its honey sucked out of it, leaving the beeswax.

name: ITEM_20150317_003646
text: A cork stopper that was sealing the oil barrel.

name: ITEM_20150317_003652
text: The claws of a monster that only appears in the Square of Lament in the Petrified City.

name: ITEM_20150317_003654
text: Goods stolen by the Dico Thieves operating in the Square of Lament.{nl}They have been exposed to the Petrifying Frost to make them look as if they were from the Petrified City.

name: ITEM_20150317_003656
text: A water bottle engraved with a code in order to find Grave Robber Benjaminas hiding in the midst of guards at the Square of Lament in the Petrified City.

name: ITEM_20150317_003658
text: A map that looks ancient. It looks like it will crumble.

name: ITEM_20150317_003660
text: Obtained from monsters at the Square of Lament in the Petrified City.

name: ITEM_20150317_003662
text: Chunks of Meat that can easily be obtained from Monsters. But humans can not eat it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003664
text: Inner stems of reeds commonly seen on Starving Demon's Way. It is too tough to eat raw even if the outer stem is removed.

name: ITEM_20150317_003666
text: The inner layer of bark dug out from a tree on Starving Demon's Way. Don't eat too much of it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003668
text: An item exchanged between lovers as a symbol of their love. A cute music box that fits into a small pouch.

name: ITEM_20150317_003670
text: Meat peeled off during the hunting of monsters. The terrible smell alone makes it hard to eat.

name: ITEM_20150317_003672
text: The leaf bud of an Asellu grown on the Starving Demon's Way. It has many practical uses in crafting and in medicine.

name: ITEM_20150317_003674
text: Unidentifiable food scraps. Can be used as monster bait. When a monster comes into sight, you can throw it by pressing the V key.

name: ITEM_20150317_003676
text: The energy source of a Tree Root Crystal that can remove the pollutant sprayed on Tree Root Crystals.

name: ITEM_20150317_003678
text: Reagent to distinguish the monster that killed pilgrims at the scattered stairs.

name: ITEM_20150317_003682
text: A collection of flowers on the altar devoted to appease the angry spirits.

name: ITEM_20150317_003684
text: A sheet of the Pilgrim's Scripture.

name: ITEM_20150317_003686
text: A scripture that is necessary for all pilgrims.

name: ITEM_20150317_003687
text: Condensed Rage of the Pilgrims that the Fire Rod had.

name: ITEM_20150317_003688
text: Purple Tree Fault Forest Sanctum Map

name: ITEM_20150317_003689
text: A map that shows all the sanctums of the Purple Tree Fault Forest. Right-click to open the map.{nl}Please return it to the recovery box for the next pilgrim passing through the woods.{nl}Location of recovery box: On the corner to Pretense Intersection.

name: ITEM_20150317_003690
text: Holy water obtained from the Priest Master to purify the polluted sanctums in Purple Tree Fault Forest.

name: ITEM_20150317_003692
text: Gesso said to be used when repairing malfunctioning Goddess Statues in the Purple Tree Fault Forest.

name: ITEM_20150317_003694
text: Water said to be used when tempering the gesso.

name: ITEM_20150317_003696
text: Marks left by Naktis in monsters to command them.(Temporary)

name: ITEM_20150317_003698
text: Pure Water flowing within a small part of Fault Forest.

name: ITEM_20150317_003700
text: A leather pouch used to store water

name: ITEM_20150317_003702
text: Reed flowers picked from reeds in Purple Tree Fault Forest.

name: ITEM_20150317_003704
text: A purifier that the Pardoner Master sells. It is used when the sacred property of something is sullied. It's very expensive, though.

name: ITEM_20150317_003706
text: Dew gathered from a tombstone early in the morning. One might have qualms against it, but it can be drunk.

name: ITEM_20150317_003708
text: A lantern that lights one's surroundings.

name: ITEM_20150317_003710
text: A medicine created by Pilgrim Theophilis. He claims it will ward off curses.

name: ITEM_20150317_003712
text: The skin of a monster that Theophilis will need to create a medicine.

name: ITEM_20150317_003714
text: A small, portable portrait with someone's face drawn on it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003716
text: A handkerchief given to a son leaving on a pilgrimage from his loving mother.

name: ITEM_20150317_003718
text: Sap obtained from trees cut at the Pretense Intersection.

name: ITEM_20150317_003720
text: A jar used to store sap or water.

name: ITEM_20150317_003722
text: The eyes of the Succubus with the [Necklace of Greed - Stamina] lodged in it. Theophilis can probably extract the necklace if we take it to him.

name: ITEM_20150317_003724
text: The upper part of the stone with the drawn sacred pattern.

name: ITEM_20150317_003726
text: The middle part of the stone with the drawn sacred pattern.

name: ITEM_20150317_003728
text: The lower part of the stone with the drawn sacred pattern.

name: ITEM_20150317_003730
text: A fragment of a honeycomb that emits a strong, sweet scent.

name: ITEM_20150317_003732
text: An unidentified fragment of a magic stone that was placed on the altar.

name: ITEM_20150317_003734
text: A piece of honeycomb that is sweet to the tongue.

name: ITEM_20150317_003735
text: The crystal of a spirit filled with a holy aura.

name: ITEM_20150317_003737
text: A scripture containing the power of sacred texts.

name: ITEM_20150317_003739
text: Scriptures containing a bishop's soul. It is able to call up the bishop at any time.

name: ITEM_20150317_003741
text: A teardrop-shaped jewel. Required to find Maven's key.

name: ITEM_20150317_003743
text: A round jewel. Required to find Maven's key.

name: ITEM_20150317_003746
text: Relics of the guards that have been petrified by the Petrifying Frost in the Deserted Market of the Petrified City.

name: ITEM_20150317_003748
text: Backpack filled with tools necessary to start a farm.

name: ITEM_20150317_003750
text: A branch of a bee tree containing the power of the Goddess Austeja.

name: ITEM_20150317_003752
text: The ashes of a demon incinerated by Goddess Austeja's power.

name: ITEM_20150317_003754
text: An orb that can destroy demon seals and barriers

name: ITEM_20150317_003758
text: Wood that can be placed on the land to resemble a scarecrow.

name: ITEM_20150317_003760
text: Vomited after the monster died; a half-digested mass of dough.

name: ITEM_20150317_003761
text: The third revelation found in the Thorn Forest.

name: ITEM_20150317_003762
text: The fourth revelation found in the Royal Mausoleum.

name: ITEM_20150317_003763
text: It cannot be read yet. Take it to Saule for interpretation.

name: ITEM_20150317_003765
text: A tool used to make a rubbing of the petrified book found on Ruklys Street.

name: ITEM_20150317_003767
text: Tool used to find out the past disaster of Ruklys Street

name: ITEM_20150317_003769
text: Talisman attached by an unknown pilgrim to seal the power of the Tree Root Crystal.

name: ITEM_20150317_003771
text: Austeja's Symbol related to the altar.

name: ITEM_20150317_003773
text: A symbol containing Goddess Austeja's power, it has the ability to block demonic powers.

name: ITEM_20150317_003775
text: Lost luggage of the Spring Light Woods merchant

name: ITEM_20150317_003777
text: A sweet-smelling jelly that can bring the Spring Flower out from hiding.

name: ITEM_20150317_003779
text: Mysterious grass that arises from the ground when it smells honey.

name: ITEM_20150317_003786
text: Documents related to the research of the curse of Naktis.

name: ITEM_20150317_003794
text: Recipes written to turn into monsters

name: ITEM_20150317_003796
text: Material needed to make drugs to disguise as Naktis

name: ITEM_20150317_003797
text: Medicine that can turn you into a monster

name: ITEM_20150317_003799
text: A key retrieved from a servant of Naktis.

name: ITEM_20150317_003801
text: Monster meat for use in the Sanctuary. Because it's a lean part of the meat, it doesn't smell that much.

name: ITEM_20150317_003803
text: A crest that can find monsters that have eaten the Sanctuary's insignia. It's a symbol of the Cleric Master's faith.

name: ITEM_20150317_003805
text: The tough leather of a monster. Its toughness makes it watertight.

name: ITEM_20150317_003807
text: A pouch made from a monster's Tough Leather

name: ITEM_20150317_003809
text: A monster's Tough Leather Pouch that has been filled with water.

name: ITEM_20150317_003811
text: The sixth revelation found in the Great Cathedral.

name: ITEM_20150317_003813
text: Documents related to the story of Naktis and the demons.

name: ITEM_20150317_003817
text: A tasty candy ball made for the workers at the Petrified City in Kaliss.

name: ITEM_20150317_003819
text: A memento of a guard who died to the Petrifying Frost.

name: ITEM_20150317_003821
text: An ingredient requested by Bokor Edita in order to call forth spirits.

name: ITEM_20150317_003823
text: An elixer that, when used on petrified people, summons their spirits.

name: ITEM_20150317_003825
text: When used on a monster that is being petrified, it thaws them out.

name: ITEM_20150317_003827
text: A petrified sample of a monster in the process of being petrified.

name: ITEM_20150317_003829
text: A comparatively well-reserved record from the Ruklys Era.

name: ITEM_20150317_003831
text: A scroll that contains powerful magic that blocks all sound. Use it on Gargoyle.

name: ITEM_20150317_003833
text: A jewel that holds an unstable flame spirit.

name: ITEM_20150317_003835
text: A mysterious compass that guides you on repairing the purifiers.

name: ITEM_20150317_003844
text: An item that shows you possible choices.

name: ITEM_20150317_003846
text: Lubricant for machineries in the mine

name: ITEM_20150317_003848
text: A part of Crystal Mine 2F's Main Purifier that was broken by monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_003850
text: Parts of Crystal Mine 2F's Main Purifier that was broken by the Stone Whale.

name: ITEM_20150317_003853
text: Honey liqueur that shows the craftsmanship of the brewer.

name: ITEM_20150317_003855
text: A magic scroll that can absorb weak Petrifying Frost.

name: ITEM_20150317_003857
text: A flower turned to stone by being exposed to the Petrifying Frost at the Square of Lament in the Petrified City. Said to be sold at extravagant prices elsewhere.

name: ITEM_20150317_003861
text: Inside it might contain a Silk Token!

name: ITEM_20150317_003863
text: Military supplies stolen from the Royal Army's guards by Dico Doguldan.

name: ITEM_20150317_003865
text: Rubbing of the petrified book on Ruklys Street

name: ITEM_20150317_003867
text: Supplies Officer Hans gave you, requesting you to remove the smell of monsters.

name: ITEM_20150317_003869
text: Supply covered with monster's odor. It smells terrible.

name: ITEM_20150317_003871
text: Lime powder for repairing the Guard Tower.

name: ITEM_20150317_003873
text: A powerful bomb can cause a big disturbance

name: ITEM_20150317_003875
text: A sticky liquid that can attach even heavy items to anything.

name: ITEM_20150317_003876
text: A dangerous bomb that will explode soon after being thrown.

name: ITEM_20150317_003878
text: Bomb with a high power output. It is extremely loud.

name: ITEM_20150317_003880
text: Advertisement fliers distributed by the Royal Army

name: ITEM_20150317_003882
text: Research on the Petrifying Frost requested by the Knights of Kaliss.

name: ITEM_20150317_003884
text: A lengthy advertisement noting the Kingdom's honor and pride.

name: ITEM_20150317_003888
text: The part of a Dumaro that has the most meat.

name: ITEM_20150317_003895
text: The strong roots of a Large Red Kepa.

name: ITEM_20150317_003902
text: Key obtained from Yonazolem. Seems to fit a treasure chest of some sort.

name: ITEM_20150317_003904
text: Moss that has attached to the back of the monster. It is dirty but dry.

name: ITEM_20150317_003906
text: A scripture that anyone calling themselves a pilgrim of the Great Cathedral would carry with them.

name: ITEM_20150317_003908
text: Reagent for soul testing that Graschius gave you. The key is to secretly spray it without drawing the monster's attention.

name: ITEM_20150317_003910
text: Cold fluid that can be obtained from monsters on rare occasions.

name: ITEM_20150317_003912
text: A bag with Theophilis' tools in it.

name: ITEM_20150317_003914
text: A piece of paper swallowed by a monster. It looks like someone's portrait.

name: ITEM_20150317_003917
text: The relics of soldiers who died protecting the Miners' Village.

name: ITEM_20150317_003919
text: Food that the Vubbes plundered in the Miners' Village. Some of it has been eaten.

name: ITEM_20150317_003920
text: Wooden boards to be used to craft a Wooden Buckler.

name: ITEM_20150317_003921
text: Shield parts needed to convince the Peltasta to join your side.

name: ITEM_20150323_003938
text: Obtained from Colimencia of the Kobalt Forest quest.

name: ITEM_20150323_003939
text: Obtained from Merge of the Septyni Valley quest.

name: ITEM_20150323_003940
text: An ingredient to make the Saphie Necklace. Obtained from Rikaus in Sirdgela Forest.

name: ITEM_20150323_003941
text: An ingredient to make the Saphie Necklace. Obtained from Bramble in Kvailas Forest.

name: ITEM_20150323_003942
text: Obtained from Yonazolem in Ramstis Ridge.

name: ITEM_20150323_003943
text: Obtained from Scorpio in Akmens Ridge.

name: ITEM_20150323_003944
text: Obtained from Unicorn in Escanciu Village.

name: ITEM_20150323_003945
text: Obtained from Reaverpede in Escanciu Village.

name: ITEM_20150323_003946
text: Obtained from Devilglove in the Fedimian Suburbs.

name: ITEM_20150323_003947
text: Obtained from Moa in the Fedimian Suburbs.

name: ITEM_20150323_003948
text: An empty flask capable of holding liquids. Sold by the Alchemist Master.

name: ITEM_20150323_003950
text: A catalyst that promotes magical reactions. Frequently used by Alchemists.

name: ITEM_20150323_003952
text: Contains tools to repair weapons. Sold by the Squire Master.

name: ITEM_20150323_003958
text: Material required for the Sapper Master's expermients. It burns easily.

name: ITEM_20150323_003961
text: A crystal needed to release the seals in Ramstis Ridge

name: ITEM_20150323_003964
text: A map that shows all of Sirdgela Forest. There are marks interspersed across the map.

name: ITEM_20150323_003966
text: Material requested by Elementalist Master to prove your qualification

name: ITEM_20150323_003969
text: Paralysis powder that can stun the Black Maize in the Vieta Gorge

name: ITEM_20150323_003972
text: A fishing rod made from a Fisherman's prized wood, from which you can hear a whistling sound. Check it out by breaking it open.

name: ITEM_20150323_003975
text: Report recording the strange phenomena in Paupys Crossing

name: ITEM_20150323_003976
text: Giant canine obtained from the Minotaurus of Roxona Marketplace

name: ITEM_20150323_003978
text: A stone that the Fletcher Master requested in exchange for his teaching.

name: ITEM_20150323_003980
text: A canine that the Monk Master requested as proof of your commitment.

name: ITEM_20150323_003981
text: Monster's toenail that can only be found from the petrified city of Verkti Square.

name: ITEM_20150323_003982
text: The goods stolen by the Dico Thieves in the petrified city of Verkti Square. In order to make these like the Verkti Square goods, they have been exposed to the Petrifying Frost.

name: ITEM_20150323_003983
text: A water bottle engraved with a password to find the Grave Robber Benjaminas hidden among the guards of the petrified city of Verkti Square.

name: ITEM_20150323_003984
text: A fragrant stone powder obtained from monsters in the petrified city of Verkti Square.

name: ITEM_20150323_003987
text: Tender leaves of wild herbs commonly seen on Starving Demon's Way. They are edible, but do not seem to be appetizing for humans.

name: ITEM_20150323_003989
text: A reagent used to identify the monsters that killed pilgrims on Altar Way.

name: ITEM_20150323_003990
text: A map that shows all the sanctums of Purple Tree Fault Forest. Right-click to open the map.{nl}Please return it to the recovery box for the next pilgrim passing through the Forest of Prayer.{nl}Location of the recovery box: On the corner to Apsimesti Crossroads.

name: ITEM_20150323_003991
text: Holy water gained from the Priest Master to purify the corrupted sanctum in the Forest of Prayer.

name: ITEM_20150323_003992
text: Plaster powder used to repair the broken Goddess Statue in the Forest of Prayer.

name: ITEM_20150323_003993
text: Water from a small stream flowing in the Forest of Prayer.

name: ITEM_20150323_003994
text: Reed flower cut from reeds in the Forest of Prayer.

name: ITEM_20150323_003996
text: A crystal that solidified from the sap that the parasitic Tree Ambulo sucked out of reeds.

name: ITEM_20150323_003999
text: Sap obtained from the cut trees at the Apsimesti Crossroad.

name: ITEM_20150323_004000
text: Top of the stone carved with the Divine Tree.

name: ITEM_20150323_004001
text: Middle of the stone carved with the Divine Tree.

name: ITEM_20150323_004002
text: Bottom of the stone carved with the Divine Tree.

name: ITEM_20150323_004004
text: The first key of Mayburn. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

name: ITEM_20150323_004005
text: Keepsake of a guard who was petrified by the frost in the petrified city of Roxona Marketplace.

name: ITEM_20150323_004008
text: Wood of the appropriate length and width to make a scarecrow. It will make an amazing scarecrow.

name: ITEM_20150323_004010
text: Cursed energy that has been condensed. Spat out from a monster as it died.

name: ITEM_20150323_004011
text: A symbol originally decorating the Austeja altar. It was broken during the monsters' attack.

name: ITEM_20150323_004013
text: A package that the merchant Dulke lost. It contains sundry goods.

name: ITEM_20150323_004014
text: The second key of Mayburn. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

name: ITEM_20150323_004015
text: The third key of Mayburn. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

name: ITEM_20150323_004016
text: The fourth key of Mayburn. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

name: ITEM_20150323_004017
text: The fifth key of Mayburn. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

name: ITEM_20150323_004019
text: Symbol than can supply magic energy to the Karuna Altar. The magical energies of the altar have discharged over the long years.

name: ITEM_20150323_004021
text: A cloudy liquid with something trapped in it. Is it really a solvent?

name: ITEM_20150323_004023
text: He claims that taking this will give the user resistance against wicked energies... Let's test it out on monsters.

name: ITEM_20150323_004025
text: A herb needed to treat Naktis' curse.

name: ITEM_20150323_004026
text: Meat stuffed full of medicine that cures gluttony's curse. It must be force fed to cursed pilgrims.

name: ITEM_20150323_004029
text: A very old document that outlines how to transform into a demon.

name: ITEM_20150323_004030
text: A material needed to make a Demon Transform Scroll. A lot is needed.

name: ITEM_20150323_004031
text: A scroll that allows the user to transform into a demon at any time. The type of demon depends on the materials used to make it, however.

name: ITEM_20150323_004033
text: Literature regarding curses and the Demon Lord who controls them. It covers Naktis in depth.

name: ITEM_20150323_004035
text: Material requested by the Peltasta Master

name: ITEM_20150323_004036
text: A stone flower that was exposed to the Petrifying Frost in the petrified city of Verkti Square. It's supposedly very expensive outside the city.

name: ITEM_20150323_004038
text: Monster Secretion Glands of Blut's followers.

name: ITEM_20150323_004040
text: A part of Hauberk's body extorted by his followers when they betrayed him.

name: ITEM_20150323_004041
text: Marbles used by Kupole Norgaile to interrogate demons.

name: ITEM_20150323_004043
text: A portion of the torn soul of the Demon Lord Hauberk.

name: ITEM_20150323_004045
text: A crystal blessed with spatial powers by Goddess Vakarine for Kupole Zydrone. It has been modified by Zydrone so that humans can use it.

name: ITEM_20150323_004047
text: A jewel made by Hauberk to give a portion of his power to his servants.

name: ITEM_20150323_004049
text: A Spectral Orb made by Kupole Daiva to survey demons. This can be used to find Hauberk in hiding.

name: ITEM_20150323_004051
text: A rune blessed by Goddess Vakarine. The rune absorbs the souls of demons.

name: ITEM_20150323_004053
text: The mark of condemned criminals given to vicious monsters in Demon Prison.

name: ITEM_20150323_004055
text: The fragment of a seal containing Hauberk's soul.

name: ITEM_20150323_004057
text: A necklace that was in the possession of the Kupoles.

name: ITEM_20150323_004059
text: A crystal of the power given to demons as they passed through the dimensional crack.

name: ITEM_20150323_004061
text: An empty given by Goddess Vakarine to restore Dionys.

name: ITEM_20150323_004063
text: A keepsake of people that have been ruthlessly slain after entering the Demon Prison.

name: ITEM_20150323_004065
text: A crystal of Dionys' magic separated from the now frenzied Dionys.

name: ITEM_20150323_004066
text: Claws embedded in demons when Dionys attacked them.

name: ITEM_20150323_004068
text: Obtained by dealing with demons in Demon Prison District 4 by Kupole Sigita's request.

name: ITEM_20150323_004069
text: Formine Armor parts. The part that protects the front of one's chest.

name: ITEM_20150323_004070
text: Formine Armor parts. It protects one's shoulders.

name: ITEM_20150323_004071
text: Formine Armor parts. It is used to pad one's back.

name: ITEM_20150323_004072
text: Formine Armor parts. The part that wraps around one's waist.

name: ITEM_20150323_004074
text: Kindling that was carried by monsters. The wood was dried out more than usual and is useful for maintaining a fire.

name: ITEM_20150323_004075
text: A rare, cold body fluid that can be found from monsters. Use it to cool the altar.

name: ITEM_20150323_004080
text: A warp scroll that allows you to quickly return to the Pardoner Master at Crystal Brook. Please note that it is only usable when there is trouble at the Sanctum, so hoarding these scrolls is meaningless.

name: ITEM_20150323_004082
text: A strong rope obtained from a monster. It is useful to tie something.

name: ITEM_20150323_004083
text: Hardtack that someone hid in some grass.

name: ITEM_20150323_004087
text: Leaves of the Sweet Herb. Useful when eaten with bitter medicines.

name: ITEM_20150323_004089
text: A nutritious tonic made by diluting the Baron's concentrate with Scorpio venom.

name: ITEM_20150323_004093
text: Pieces of a spoiled rice cake.

name: ITEM_20150323_004095
text: A rice cake that is still fresh.

name: ITEM_20150323_004097
text: A fully grown white radish freshly picked from the fields. It looks healthy, without blemish.

name: ITEM_20150323_004099
text: Low quality wood torn from wagons or boxes strewn across the farm. May be able to weave it into something useful.

name: ITEM_20150323_004101
text: A shaman doll said to have been given by the Baron to Arunas. It is said that burning this in a magic circle will remove the strange aura.

name: ITEM_20150323_004103
text: An empty bottle from the Wizard Apprentice. Useful in various ways.

name: ITEM_20150323_004105
text: A bottle filled with the energy of a monster.

name: ITEM_20150323_004107
text: A bottle that is 1/3 full with a Yellow Ellom's evil energy

name: ITEM_20150323_004108
text: A bottle that is 2/3 full with a Yellow Ellom's evil energy

name: ITEM_20150323_004109
text: A bottle filled with a Yellow Ellom's evil energy

name: ITEM_20150323_004111
text: A bottle that is 1/3 full with a Keposeed's evil energy

name: ITEM_20150323_004112
text: A bottle that is 2/3 full with a Keposeed's evil energy

name: ITEM_20150323_004113
text: A bottle filled with a Keposeed's evil energy

name: ITEM_20150323_004116
text: A bottle filled with poison gathered from monsters given by Wizard Apprentice Limas.

name: ITEM_20150323_004118
text: The head of a small stone statue.

name: ITEM_20150323_004120
text: The upper body of a small stone statue.

name: ITEM_20150323_004122
text: The lower body of a small stone statue.

name: ITEM_20150323_004124
text: The wings of a small stone statue.

name: ITEM_20150323_004126
text: A blunt piece of wood that used to be the head of a wooden hammer

name: ITEM_20150323_004128
text: A wooden rod that used to be part of the shaft of a wooden hammer

name: ITEM_20150323_004130
text: A wooden hammer that is used to open kegs. Poorly made, it is not very durable.

name: ITEM_20150323_004132
text: Sticky liquid that monsters spit out as they died. May be useful as an adhesive thanks to the high viscosity.

name: ITEM_20150323_004134
text: The seeds of something obtained from monsters.

name: ITEM_20150323_004136
text: A bitter drink. It is extremely bitter.

name: ITEM_20150323_004138
text: A wooden stick cut from nearby fences.

name: ITEM_20150323_004143
text: A jar full of a monster's poison.

name: ITEM_20150323_004155
text: A handwritten recommendation from Horacius. Used to persuade suspicious farmers.

name: ITEM_20150323_004157
text: A perfectly uprooted dandelion. The roots and leaves are used as food and medicine. Getting rid of the bitterness is key.

name: ITEM_20150323_004161
text: A chewy beef jerky properly dried with a dryer.

name: ITEM_20150323_004162
text: Hard stone obtained from monsters. It is said to be able to break seals.

name: ITEM_20150323_004164
text: A seed bag stolen by monsters.

name: ITEM_20150323_004166
text: Lump of Meat from an unknown source.

name: ITEM_20150323_004167
text: A list of signatures of people agreeing to revolt.

name: ITEM_20150323_004169
text: A small goddess statue put together from parts found in various locations.

name: ITEM_20150323_004171
text: A Tipio's Skin that's needed to recruit the Peltasta's assistance.

name: ITEM_20150323_004173
text: A research report written by Priest Yosana. It contains research on the types of curses.

name: ITEM_20150323_004175
text: A research report written by Priest Roana. It contains research on how curses are made.

name: ITEM_20150323_004177
text: A research report written by Priest Prosit. It contains research on the effects of curses.

name: ITEM_20150323_004178
text: A relic that was once treasured by the Church has, unfortunately, been discarded across the Cathedral.

name: ITEM_20150323_004179
text: An orb that can detect holy power. It can help the user find the Graceful Relic.

name: ITEM_20150323_004181
text: A Demon sample needed to reveal the secret of curses

name: ITEM_20150323_004184
text: A research report on curses written by Priest Yosana. He said it disappeared in the blink of an eye.

name: ITEM_20150323_004186
text: It can cleanse demonic fluids with the holy aura of the Cathedral. Try using it on Demons.

name: ITEM_20150323_004187
text: A holy relic treasured by the Church. It conceals itself when it detects evil energies.

name: ITEM_20150323_004188
text: A curse that is constantly spreading. It can't be destroyed in the usual way.

name: ITEM_20150323_004189
text: Durable wood suitable for making a scarecrow and a fence.

name: ITEM_20150323_004191
text: A dagger that embitters the beholder's disposition.

name: ITEM_20150323_004193
text: A monster used for making a scarecrow

name: ITEM_20150323_004195
text: Leaves on Ellum's head. Elly needs them.

name: ITEM_20150323_004197
text: A soil sample collected from around the Farmer's Cabin. It is severely corrupted.

name: ITEM_20150323_004199
text: A soil sample collected from around the Abandoned Workshop. It is severely corrupted.

name: ITEM_20150323_004201
text: Fluids extracted from organs of Tanu. Used in the purification rituals of the Druids.

name: ITEM_20150323_004203
text: A branch taken from the mysterious sapling. It seems to retain some of the power it had as the sapling.

name: ITEM_20150323_004205
text: Small Box found from the soil in the ground. The lock seems to be loose.

name: ITEM_20150323_004207
text: A dirty bag. Miren's name  is embroidered on the inside.

name: ITEM_20150323_004209
text: Leafnut Egg. It is assumed that it is useful as a material in Alchemy.

name: ITEM_20150323_004211
text: Parasitic Eggs monster from the grape vine roots. Very nasty.

name: ITEM_20150323_004213
text: An unripe grape that still has a green tinge.

name: ITEM_20150323_004215
text: A piece of a horn obtained from the body of the Drake. Give it to the private officer as evidence.

name: ITEM_20150323_004217
text: A stolen bag of grain that the soldiers at Shaton Farm took as a bribe.

name: ITEM_20150323_004219
text: Druid's special Antidote to neutralize the poison of grapes.

name: ITEM_20150323_004221
text: A wooden branch containing Druidic powers. It is said that it can subdue monsters.

name: ITEM_20150323_004223
text: Special Stone Bowl that Druid's primarily use for rituals. It is currently empty.

name: ITEM_20150323_004225
text: Special Stone Bowl that Druids primarily use for rituals. It is filled with water.

name: ITEM_20150323_004227
text: Louis' important seed bags that have been brought up secretly to avoid the soldiers.

name: ITEM_20150323_004229
text: Gold Necklace with an engraved sentence that symbolizes the membership of the Shaton Family. There are traces of blood spatter.

name: ITEM_20150323_004231
text: Tail stinger to prove the defeat of Lauzinute.

name: ITEM_20150323_004233
text: Medicine bag that the Butler Valen ordered from Klaipeda. It contains the drug to cure an internal disease.

name: ITEM_20150323_004235
text: Leaves that used to be on Beeteros' head. They seem to be convenient to use.

name: ITEM_20150323_004237
text: Monster sample requested by Researcher Gareth

name: ITEM_20150323_004244
text: Fragment from when you destroyed the altar.

name: ITEM_20150323_004247
text: An ingredient to make an antidote

name: ITEM_20150323_004249
text: Poison which came out of an unidentified dagger.

name: ITEM_20150323_004254
text: A plant control device given to you by Researcher Gareth.

name: ITEM_20150323_004256
text: An atidote recipe written by the Hunter Master.

name: ITEM_20150401_004466
text: Necklace of the Five Sins Collection

name: ITEM_20150401_004467
text: A collection of five necklaces. Each necklace is inscribed with one of the five topics of a pilgrim's path. Made by Maven, the founder of the Great Cathedral. You can add it through the Magic Association NPC's Collection window with right-click.

name: ITEM_20150401_004493
text: A crystal that shines with starlight. What it reveals is a mystery.

name: ITEM_20150401_004495
text: A small piece of the Star Stone. Reacts with other pieces of the Star Stone.

name: ITEM_20150401_004497
text: Beads used by Kupole Medeina when interrogating demons.

name: ITEM_20150401_004500
text: A explosive used by workers during the construction of the Fortress of the Land. Highly flammable.

name: ITEM_20150401_004502
text: It's rumored that the king's voice can be heard from the barracks of the Royal Mausoleum Guard.

name: ITEM_20150401_004504
text: A warm loaf of Snack bread received from Marus.

name: ITEM_20150401_004508
text: A loaf of snack bread that is still fresh.

name: ITEM_20150401_004509
text: Magic doll that Rimas gave to Arunas. It removes unusual energies when burned in a magic circle.

name: ITEM_20150401_004511
text: Wood sticks cut from nearby fences. Expected to be made into Wood Poles.

name: ITEM_20150401_004513
text: Leather obtained from monsters. It is used as a material to various weapons.

name: ITEM_20150401_004515
text: A perfectly uprooted Niole. The roots and leaves are used as food and medicine. Getting rid of the bitterness is key.

name: ITEM_20150401_004517
text: Orange Dandel Wing piece. Since it's not particularly useful as firewood, let us keep the fire put.

name: ITEM_20150401_004519
text: It can surpress magic when set up in areas where there is strong magic.

name: ITEM_20150401_004521
text: A crystal that guides the user to mystical places.

name: ITEM_20150406_004530
text: Crystal gained by processing a Crystal Fragment. {nl}It can be used to clear the gas of 2nd Mine Lot.

name: ITEM_20150406_004532
text: Crystal gained by processing a Crystal Fragment. {nl}It can be used to speed growth.

name: ITEM_20150406_004534
text: Crystal gained by processing a Crystal Fragment. {nl}It can be used to find more money.

name: ITEM_20150406_004536
text: Crystal gained by processing a Crystal Fragment. {nl}It can be used to restore HP.

name: ITEM_20150406_004538
text: Crystal gained by processing a Crystal Fragment. {nl}It can be used to restore MP.

name: ITEM_20150406_004540
text: Crystal gained by processing a Crystal Fragment. {nl}It can be used to increase your movement speed.

name: ITEM_20150406_004542
