text: Powder gained by grinding a Crystal Fragment. {nl}It can be used to detect hidden monsters in 2nd Mine Lot.

name: ITEM_20150406_004544
text: Crystal gained by processing a Crystal Fragment. {nl}It can be used to resonate with the special crystal of 2nd Mine Lot's 2nd Gallery.

name: ITEM_20150406_004550
text: There are barbed. Adds an on-hit effect.

name: ITEM_20150406_004552
text: A crystal fragment that can be obtained from Lot 2 in the Crystal Mine. It is possible to obtain a special crystal when collecting a large amount of these.

name: ITEM_20150406_004554
text: An arrow with an explosive payload.

name: ITEM_20150406_004557
text: An experimental bomb created by the Sapper Master.{nl}The throw distance can be controlled by holding down the key.

name: ITEM_20150406_004559
text: An orb that can destroy demonic enchantments. You can gather energy by using it around Austeja's Altar.

name: ITEM_20150406_004561
text: It's a mark of proof from Hauberk that he handed out to his men.

name: ITEM_20150406_004563
text: Fragment of Nuaele that was used to dominate demons monsters.

name: ITEM_20150406_004565
text: Expedition Memento of the ones who were brutally murdered by the demons.

name: ITEM_20150406_004567
text: A bottle given to you by Wizard Rimas, who claims it contains the purified strength of monsters.

name: ITEM_20150406_004570
text: Grain pouch retrieved from monsters. Some of it has been eaten.

name: ITEM_20150406_004572
text: Wooden Rod cut from nearby fences. There are plans to make it into a weapon.

name: ITEM_20150406_004574
text: Pot that can collect the poison of monsters.

name: ITEM_20150406_004575
text: A plow for ploughing fields. It has a keen blade.

name: ITEM_20150406_004576
text: A spade for clearing weeds. It has a sharp point.

name: ITEM_20150406_004577
text: Farm equipment for making furrows. It has a sharp point.

name: ITEM_20150406_004578
text: Farm equipment for removing stones. It is well made.

name: ITEM_20150406_004579
text: Farm equipment for separating fields. It has a lot of sharp points.

name: ITEM_20150406_004583
text: Wing of an Orange Dandel. Seems flammable.

name: ITEM_20150406_004590
text: Sharp claws of the Lizardmen. Elly needs them.

name: ITEM_20150406_004592
text: Tama Body Fluids. Used in the purification rituals of the Druids.

name: ITEM_20150406_004593
text: A small chest found with the sapling. It doesn't seem to be locked.

name: ITEM_20150406_004595
text: Old Leaves stuck on top of the Shell of Tama. They seem to be intertwined with the shell.

name: ITEM_20150406_004597
text: Young Grapevine Roots dug under the grape vines.

name: ITEM_20150406_004599
text: A horn fragment obtained from the Stumpy Tree. Give it to the private officer as evidence.

name: ITEM_20150406_004600
text: Stone Bowl containing a lot of water. The unique aura seems to attract monsters.

name: ITEM_20150406_004602
text: A snout horn that proves that the Tree Root Mole has been killed.

name: ITEM_20150414_004616
text: Don't test this armor's Magic Defense by intentionally getting hit.

name: ITEM_20150414_004626
text: When you pop the bubbles, you feel better.

name: ITEM_20150414_004628
text: A mushroom with a hint of a woody scent.

name: ITEM_20150414_004630
text: A soft, white bread. It tastes better if jam is spread on it.

name: ITEM_20150414_004632
text: A vegetable with a crunchy texture.

name: ITEM_20150414_004636
text: A sturdy shell with a hexagonal pattern on it. {nl}Obtained from Infrorocktors.

name: ITEM_20150414_004638
text: A thin, pointy feeler. {nl}Obtained from Yekubites.

name: ITEM_20150414_004640
text: It is thin, but capable of withstanding tremendous pressure. {nl}Obtained from Infroburks.

name: ITEM_20150414_004642
text: An angular, hardened shell. {nl}Obtained from Red Infrorocktors.

name: ITEM_20150414_004645
text: A mysterious stone with the power of fire. {nl}Purchasable from the Fletcher Master.

name: ITEM_20150414_004647
text: The bones of an Infrorocktor are just as sturdy as the shell. {nl}Obtained from Infrorocktors.

name: ITEM_20150414_004649
text: Teeth that developed to grind meat. {nl}Obtained from Yekubites.

name: ITEM_20150414_004651
text: A crystal that only grows on the tail of Yekubite, it grows in size as the monster ages. {nl}Obtained from Yekubites.

name: ITEM_20150414_004655
text: A bottle of venom that can be used to make a powerful poison. {nl}Purchasable from the Wugushi Master.

name: ITEM_20150414_004657
text: It contains tools necessary for camping. {nl}Purchasable from the Squire Master.

name: ITEM_20150414_004659
text: A black powder used to make explosives. {nl}Purchasable from the Fletcher Master.

name: ITEM_20150414_004690
text: The power source that moves the Red Infro Rockter. Grita, who can't use magic, needs it.

name: ITEM_20150414_004692
text: A lump of meat easily obtained from Kowak. Unfit for human consumption.

name: ITEM_20150414_004693
text: A leafbud found commonly on the wild grasses of Starving Demon's Way. Edible, but not very tasty.

name: ITEM_20150414_004695
text: A piece of a Kepari's flesh torn off while hunting. The disgusting smell make it impossible to eat.

name: ITEM_20150414_004696
text: An energy source sprinkled by the Tree Root Crystal. These need to be collected to remove the contamination.

name: ITEM_20150414_004697
text: Reveals monsters that killed Pilgrims with the Curse of Rage when sprayed on them.

name: ITEM_20150414_004699
text: A flower to be offered on the altar to soothe angry souls.

name: ITEM_20150414_004701
text: A map that shows all the blessed sanctums in the Forest of Prayer.{nl}Right-click to open the map. Please return the map when you are done exploring the Forest of Prayer for the other pilgrims. {nl}Return Location: Road to Apsimesti Crossroads

name: ITEM_20150414_004702
text: Water for cleaning plaster powder off theafter repairing the Goddess Statue. It is very clean.

name: ITEM_20150414_004703
text: An imprint that Naktis placed on monsters as a way to control them.

name: ITEM_20150414_004704
text: Water from a small brook in the Forest of Prayer. It looks potable.

name: ITEM_20150414_004709
text: Meat for feeding the breeding hawks. Hawks like it.

name: ITEM_20150414_004711
text: A mark containing Blut's power. He seems to have distributed them to his underling demons.

name: ITEM_20150414_004712
text: A mark given by the Demon Lord Hauberk to his servants as a sign of their loyalty.

name: ITEM_20150414_004714
text: An orb that Kupole Arune used to interrogate Demons. Hauberk's aid is needed.

name: ITEM_20150414_004715
text: A crystal blessed with spatial powers by Goddess Vakarine. It has been modified by Zydrone so that humans can use it.

name: ITEM_20150414_004716
text: A spectrum sphere created by Kupole Daiva to keep watch on demons. It can be used to find the hiding Hauberk.

name: ITEM_20150414_004717
text: A rune containing the Goddess Vakarine's power. It absorbs the souls of Demons.

name: ITEM_20150414_004719
text: A sign of sealing that the Kupoles put on the vicious demons in the Demon Prison.

name: ITEM_20150414_004720
text: A sealed fragment of Hauberk's shredded soul.

name: ITEM_20150414_004721
text: A fragment that Nuaele planted in the demons to ensure their obedience.

name: ITEM_20150414_004722
text: Traces left by Demons that passed through the dimensional crack.

name: ITEM_20150414_004723
text: An empty soul needed to restore Dionys as quickly as possible.

name: ITEM_20150414_004724
text: A trinket left by adventurers who entered the Demon Prison. It seems they were killed by demons.

name: ITEM_20150414_004725
text: A token fragment dropped from the Lada Seal. Evidence that Dionys spread riots after he lost his ego.

name: ITEM_20150414_004726
text: A claw found stuck in a demon. It looks like it was attacked by Dionys.

name: ITEM_20150414_004727
text: Kupole Sigita says that other Demons will take this tooth as a warning.

name: ITEM_20150414_004728
text: The tough root of a Red Large Kepa. An ingredient needed for the abdominal section of a front plate.

name: ITEM_20150414_004729
text: A Red Kepa tooth that can be used to make a shoulder guard.

name: ITEM_20150414_004730
text: The leather of a Jukopus. It can be used to make the abdominal section of a back plate.

name: ITEM_20150414_004731
text: Vubbe Robber leather that is needed to make a chest protector.

name: ITEM_20150414_004732
text: A bag containing a variety of alchemical tools.

name: ITEM_20150414_004733
text: A picture frame swallowed by a monster. There is evidence that something was put in here before.

name: ITEM_20150414_004734
text: A scroll that warps the user to the Pardoner Master in the Crystal Brook. It can only be used when the Sanctuary is in danger, so hoarding them is pointless.

name: ITEM_20150414_004735
text: Hardtack that was hidden in a grass pile by someone. There is dirt on it.

name: ITEM_20150414_004736
text: Venom collected from Scorpio.{nl}Is it really an ingredient for an energy drink?

name: ITEM_20150414_004737
text: The leaf of a sweet herb. When chewed while taking a bitter medicine, it covers the taste with its sweetness.

name: ITEM_20150414_004738
text: Timber that looks usable as firewood. Burn it in a pile in the magic circle.

name: ITEM_20150414_004739
text: An empty bottle given to you by Wizard Limas. A common glass bottle.

name: ITEM_20150414_004741
text: A bottle one third of the way filled with the evil aura of an Ellum. It must be fully filled.

name: ITEM_20150414_004742
text: A bottle two thirds of the way filled with the evil aura of an Ellum. It is nearly full.

name: ITEM_20150414_004743
text: A bottle fully filled with the evil aura of an Ellum.

name: ITEM_20150414_004744
text: A bottle one third of the way filled with the evil aura of a Keposeed. It must be fully filled.

name: ITEM_20150414_004745
text: A bottle two thirds of the way filled with the evil aura of a Keposeed. It is nearly full.

name: ITEM_20150414_004746
text: The head of a small statue. What kind of statue could it be?

name: ITEM_20150414_004747
text: The torso of a small statue. Its hands are clasped together.

name: ITEM_20150414_004748
text: The lower half of a small statue. It is hard to identify due to its fragmentation.

name: ITEM_20150414_004749
text: The wings of a small statue. The wings don't seem avian.

name: ITEM_20150414_004751
text: Mucus that a monster spat out. Seems like it would make a good adhesive base.

name: ITEM_20150414_004752
text: A bitter drink that imbues its consumer with strength.

name: ITEM_20150414_004753
text: Leather obtained from monsters. It can be used to create a variety of weapons.

name: ITEM_20150414_004754
text: A jar used to collect the poisons of various monsters. It looks very old.

name: ITEM_20150414_004757
text: A letter written by Horatius for borrowing the farming tool.

name: ITEM_20150414_004758
text: A Neolle pulled out to its rots. The root and leaf are used for consumption.

name: ITEM_20150414_004760
text: A magic stone made by Yonas. They say it can be used to destroy the magic circle.

name: ITEM_20150414_004761
text: A seed pouch stolen by monsters. There are nibble marks on it.

name: ITEM_20150414_004762
text: An unidentifiable lump of meat. Smells fishy.

name: ITEM_20150414_004763
text: A small Goddess Statue restored by refusing its lost, scattered fragments piece by piece.

name: ITEM_20150414_004767
text: Well-seasoned timber that would make a strong fence.

name: ITEM_20150414_004768
text: A dagger which was placed on top of a piece of leather carved with a magic circle. Something about it feels ominous.

name: ITEM_20150414_004769
text: A Lizardman's sharp claw. The mysterious saplings react to it.

name: ITEM_20150414_004770
text: Body fluid extracted from an Orange Tama. It's used in the Druid's purification ceremony.

name: ITEM_20150414_004771
text: A small box found with seedlings. It's full of seeds.

name: ITEM_20150414_004773
text: The remains of a Tama from when it died. It is needed by a researcher.

name: ITEM_20150414_004774
text: The root of a grape vine requested by Researcher Monahan. It looks healthy, unlike its stem.

name: ITEM_20150414_004775
text: The horn of a Stumpy Tree Sheep. The manager of the farm said he must have it.

name: ITEM_20150414_004776
text: An antidote that can heal the poisoned farmers. Get it to them as soon as possible.

name: ITEM_20150414_004777
text: A special stone bowl used during the Druid's ritual.

name: ITEM_20150414_004778
text: A stone bowl filled with water. The strange aura it emits seems to attract monsters.

name: ITEM_20150414_004780
text: A valuable seed pouch stolen by Weiss without alerting the attention of the soldiers.

name: ITEM_20150414_004781
text: A golden necklace carved with the symbol of the Chatten Family. It's spattered with blood.

name: ITEM_20150414_004783
text: A horn that proves that the owner has killed the Tree Root Mole.

name: ITEM_20150414_004784
text: A monster sample requested by Researcher Gareth. Will this reveal why the crops have been suffering?

name: ITEM_20150414_004785
text: A monster sample requested by the Pyromancer. It is still warm.

name: ITEM_20150414_004786
text: An antidote that can heal the poisoned miners. The Hunter Master knows the recipe.

name: ITEM_20150414_004787
text: Leather carved with an unknown symbol. It looks like a magic circle.

name: ITEM_20150414_004788
text: A potion obtained from the Hunter Master. It makes an antidote when mixed with a Rimedeed Leaf.

name: ITEM_20150414_004789
text: Poison from an unidentified dagger. It seems to be related with the leather marked with a magic circle.

name: ITEM_20150414_004790
text: A device that controls the growth of monsters. It seems to also work on crops.

name: ITEM_20150414_004791
text: An antidote recipe written by the Hunter Master. Combine the detoxifying solvent with the Rimedeed Leaf.

name: ITEM_20150414_004793
text: A special potion that only Charlotte knows how to make. It causes plants to wither die.

name: ITEM_20150428_004794
text: This equipment will help you in battle.

name: ITEM_20150428_004839
text: - Causes an explosion after every 10th consecutive attack.

name: ITEM_20150428_004840
text: Seems weak, but it causes an explosion on the user's 10th attack.

name: ITEM_20150428_004881
text: Armor used by the Legwyn family.

name: ITEM_20150428_004897
text: Increases your movement speed by 2 for 180 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 30 seconds.

name: ITEM_20150428_004898
text: This fruit has a sweet and sour flavor. {nl}Restores HP every 2 seconds. 180 HP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20150428_004899
text: A crystal obtained by processing a piece of crystal. {nl}It will protect you from the poisonous gas from Lot 2.

name: ITEM_20150428_004900
text: A crystal obtained by processing a piece of crystal. {nl}Restores HP every 2 seconds. 440 HP is restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 30 seconds.

text: Adds 10 Attack to your weapon. {nl}Can be used after assigning it to a quick slot.

text: Adds 15 Attack to your weapon. {nl}Can be used after assigning it to a quick slot.

name: ITEM_20150428_004908
text: Adds 20 Attack to your weapon. {nl}Can be used after assigning it to a quick slot.

name: ITEM_20150428_005033
text: If you forgot which direction of the cane it was installed on, it will be heading towards you.

name: ITEM_20150428_005035
text: Hard to see because it is so thin.

name: ITEM_20150428_005037
text: It appears when space-time is distorted.

name: ITEM_20150428_005039
text: A torn page of a diary from a villager who lived in Andale Village. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150428_005040
text: A journal of an unknown adventurer who was exploring the Legwyn family residence. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005041
text: Reply letters from a man named Beikeol. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005042
text: A statement for someone of the Legwyn family who ordered goods. It's for a medicine that has a dangerous side effect. It's readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005043
text: A soiled journal discovered in the Waterway. The diary owner's name is illegible. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005044
text: So old it seems like it will crumble at the slightest touch. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005045
text: A note left by a pilgrim a very long time ago. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005046
text: It seems like it was left here as a last ditch effort by some pilgrim. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005047
text: A part of a pilgrim's torn diary. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005048
text: A hastily scribbled record of a pilgrim. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005049
text: A will left by a dying pilgrim. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005050
text: A burnt journal left by pilgrims. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005051
text: A lost diary of some kind. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005052
text: Seems like a scribbled diary written by someone in rage. Looking carefully, it seems readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005053
text: The journal of a person found in a place where mankind is not allowed to enter. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150428_005054
text: An order made at Vakarine's command. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150428_005055
text: An order that was written and attached here a long time ago. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005056
text: A document recorded in the time of the Great King Zachariel. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005057
text: Warning notices from hundreds of years ago. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150428_005058
text: A carelessly crumpled message. It seems barely readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005059
text: Ceremonial ropes that the Panto Magician was carrying around.

name: ITEM_20150428_005061
text: The fat of a Mallardu that was well preserved and will burn easily. Wake Nepenthes up with it.

name: ITEM_20150428_005062
text: The first revelation found in the Crystal Mine. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005064
text: The second revelation found in the Tenet Church. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005066
text: Meat Loaf that can be easily obtained from Kepo. However, you can't eat it as is.

name: ITEM_20150428_005067
text: The third revelation found in the Thorn Forest. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005068
text: The fourth revelation found in the Royal Mausoleum. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005069
text: The sixth revelation found in the Great Cathedral. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150428_005070
text: There are claims that the voice of the king can be heard at the Royal Mausoleum Constructors' Chapel.

name: ITEM_20150428_005071
text: An experimental soul reagent that Gracius gave you.

name: ITEM_20150428_005073
text: Said to reveal monsters that have killed pilgrims under the Curse of Rage when sprayed on them. However, this is still experimental.

name: ITEM_20150428_005074
text: The fifth revelation found in the Great Cathedral. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005078
text: A mysterious crystal dropped by a Vubbe. It resonates when used near a device in the Lot 2 - 2F.

name: ITEM_20150511_005079
text: Varkis' completed research reports. Contains information related to the Royal Mausoleum. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005080
text: An old scroll hidden by the Pyromancer. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005081
text: Blak's report. Contains scouted information of the nearby area. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005082
text: York's report. It contains information concerning the recently increased monster activity. Take it to Lieutenant Volda. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005083
text: Journal that Varkis has recorded his entire life in. Seems like he highly valued it. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005084
text: Detailed information on future operations alongside a map. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005085
text: Scouting report of the Sunset Flag Forest. The scratched writing gives you an eerie feeling. Readable, but...

name: ITEM_20150511_005086
text: File folder that contains the research records of the Royal Mausoleum. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005087
text: An archive that Jonas devoted his lifetime to create. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005088
text: A report by Joint Investigation Unit Member Scott regarding suspicious activity in the area. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005089
text: Parts of it are covered in blood and unable to be read. Some parts are legible.

name: ITEM_20150511_005090
text: A certification awarded to soldiers who have safely completed training. Read it proudly.

name: ITEM_20150511_005091
text: Leather that can be used in a variety of ways. The age of the leather means that it can be used immediately.

name: ITEM_20150511_005092
text: A research report lost by the newbie Royal Mausoleum researcher. Someone has stepped on it  and blurred the characters. It's just barely readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005093
text: Instructions on how to eliminate the thorny vine. Familiarize yourself with it.

name: ITEM_20150511_005094
text: A permit needed in order for ships to enter the harbor. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005095
text: The messenger's note. He told you not to read it but... Should we?

name: ITEM_20150511_005096
text: First rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150511_005097
text: Second rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150511_005098
text: Third rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150511_005099
text: Fourth rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150511_005100
text: Fifth rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150511_005101
text: Old documents that describe how one can turn into a demon. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150511_005102
text: The letter Horacious wrote for borrowing the farm equipment. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005103
text: Part 2 of Varkis' research found in the Dykyne Crossroads. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005104
text: Part 3 of Varkis' research found in the Snake Neck Bluffs. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005105
text: Part 4 of Varkis' research found in the Ipati Cliffs. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005108
text: Priest Yosana's research report. It contains information on the expression of curses. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005109
text: Priest Roana's research report. It contains information on lifting curses. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005110
text: Priest Prosit's research report. It contains information on the effects of curses and how they propogate. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150511_005111
text: The sealed research report that describes the curses that Priest Yosana gathered together. The priest said it disappeared in an instant.

name: ITEM_20150714_005112
text: The increased length of geomnal complements the deficiencies of the gladius sword

name: ITEM_20150714_005138
text: Crafted to deal with extreme cold. Reflects the current master's personality which focuses on practicality.

name: ITEM_20150714_005276
text: A complex gear seems to be used for the complex machine. You can obtain it from Marionette in Roxona Reconstuction Agency West Building.

name: ITEM_20150714_005278
text: A fragment of Dullahan's armor. {nl}Obtained from Dullahan in Roxona Reconstuction Agency East Building.

name: ITEM_20150714_005279
text: A heavy lump of scrap metal. {nl}Obtained from Anchor.

name: ITEM_20150714_005281
text: There is a little color difference between Dimmer beads. {nl}Obtained from Velfiggy.

name: ITEM_20150714_005283
text: A mutant variation of the Nucl, the power source of mutant monster. Contains highly condensed magic that might explode if handled carelessly. {nl}Obtain from Stone Orcas.

name: ITEM_20150714_005284
text: A record written by the teacher of Hones and Laius. It seems to contain very important information.

name: ITEM_20150714_005294
text: Contains condensed fury of the pilgrims.

name: ITEM_20150714_005297
text: A tasty candy ball from the Knights of Kaliss made for the workers of the Petrified City.

name: ITEM_20150714_005300
text: An orb that collects aura. It can be taken out and put depending on use.

name: ITEM_20150714_005302
text: A mysterious jewel that can lead to the correct path.

name: ITEM_20150714_005304
text: The broken pieces belonging to the Eyes of Truth. It is only available to collect all fragments.

name: ITEM_20150714_005306
text: This allows you to see the substance of a soul. Use it on a unsubstantial monster.

name: ITEM_20150714_005308
text: Has the power to attract wandering souls.{nl}It's necessary to find a condensed grudge.

name: ITEM_20150714_005310
text: A memo written by Disciple Hones about his teacher. Might be useful for releasing the device installed at Underground Grave of Ritinis. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150714_005311
text: Spatial Magic Gem Fragment of Contract

name: ITEM_20150714_005312
text: A space magic stone fragment of the broken contract. In order to work correctly, it seems to need the restore operation.

name: ITEM_20150714_005313
text: If you collect the more space magic stones, you can go to a hidden place of the teacher.

name: ITEM_20150714_005314
text: A magic stone used to move the Teleport. You can go a hidden place of the teacher.

name: ITEM_20150714_005316
text: A powder contained the spirirt of holy purification gave by Vita. You can purify the evil spirit to use it.

name: ITEM_20150714_005318
text: Remains tied to the contract with the demons. Not free even in death.

name: ITEM_20150714_005322
text: A seal crafted by Valius with the power to suppress evil energy.

name: ITEM_20150714_005323
text: A magic scroll capable of absorbing weak Petrifying Frost.

name: ITEM_20150714_005325
text: The monster who was the sign of a weak armor. Movement speed increased slightly.

name: ITEM_20150714_005326
text: The detector that Cryomancer Kostas requested. Krio maenseo Costas petrified by asking the detector. It might be broken.

name: ITEM_20150714_005328
text: Using it on the monsters in the main street will make the monsters frenzy.

name: ITEM_20150714_005330
text: A powerful bomb that can make a big fuss after a certain time.

name: ITEM_20150714_005335
text: A propaganda to encourage the surrender sprayed by Royal Army when the rebellion, 600 years ago

name: ITEM_20150714_005336
text: Part of a soul torn from Demon Lord Hauberk.

name: ITEM_20150714_005337
text: Hauberk's soul divided itself in order to escape.

name: ITEM_20150714_005338
text: the ground of the fort built at the time, was hustle and explosives used. Complaints can be easily attaching to burst.

name: ITEM_20150714_005339
text: that the Tomb building can hear the voice of the king in the chapel Here is rumored Jar.

name: ITEM_20150714_005341
text: Stone obtained by defeating monsters at the Roxona Marketplace.

name: ITEM_20150714_005343
text: A strong scented grass that attracts monsters. Rubbing this onto objects will make monsters surround the objects and protect them from danger.

name: ITEM_20150714_005345
text: Digested, severely Damaged Artifacts. They can only barely be recognized by their shape.

name: ITEM_20150714_005347
text: A crystal found in the petrified monster prolonged exposure to frost. When processing occurs on the Petrifying Frost immunity for a while.

name: ITEM_20150714_005349
text: horsepower catalyst that can be obtained from monsters exposed to steam. It can be reacted in the vapor horsepower.

name: ITEM_20150714_005350
text: Pas-de-warp order to give you the future master. Sanctuary is available only when you experience problems do not mean excessive hoarding.

name: ITEM_20150714_005351
text: Monster have collected a variety of tools stolen from humans. It should be possible to find a rubbing tool here when searching properly.

name: ITEM_20150714_005353
text: A thin membrane that can be used as a substitute for paper.

name: ITEM_20150714_005355
text: It can turn body fluids into acids. Be careful not to touch it.

name: ITEM_20150714_005357
text: Body fluid of a monster that has turned into an acid. Handle it carefully.

name: ITEM_20150714_005359
text: A solution that can dilute toxic materials to be used for a range of purposes.

name: ITEM_20150714_005361
text: A needle that can paralyze monsters.

name: ITEM_20150714_005363
text: Stiff monster hair, used when creating a rough brush.

name: ITEM_20150714_005365
text: A rough brush that can clean the dustiest of places.

name: ITEM_20150714_005367
text: A liquid extract obtained from Craute grass. Monsters like it.

name: ITEM_20150714_005369
text: Common bone powder. It can be used to make a sticky liquid that helps ink stick to surfaces.

name: ITEM_20150714_005371
text: Ink obtained from the Alchemist Master.

name: ITEM_20150714_005372
text: A rubbing of a tombstone. The thread of fate will break and thou shalt wander.

name: ITEM_20150714_005373
text: A rubbing of a tombstone. The walls of the king shall outlive him.

name: ITEM_20150714_005374
text: A rubbing of a tombstone. Life is easy when one is born with a silver spoon in their mouth.

name: ITEM_20150714_005375
text: A rubbing of a tombstone. After even death fades there will yet be a world.

name: ITEM_20150714_005377
text: A rubbing of a tombstone given to you by the aspiring Oracle Adrijus at Nuoridin Falls. It says, "After even death fades there will yet be a world". It was written by another Oracle-in-training a long time ago, so the importance isn't clear yet.

name: ITEM_20150714_005379
text: A flat piece of stone that might make a good shovel head.

name: ITEM_20150714_005381
text: A wooden stick that might serve reasonably well as the handle of a hammer.

name: ITEM_20150714_005383
text: A crudely made shovel. It has poor durability and looks like it will break after a single use.

name: ITEM_20150714_005385
text: A small inscription that was taken from the collapsed tombstone at the Namyu Temple Site's former garden.

name: ITEM_20150714_005387
text: A stone fragment that looks like it came from a tombstone.

name: ITEM_20150714_005389
text: A basket full of lure traps given to you by the blacksmith. If you shake it too much, they will fall out.

name: ITEM_20150714_005391
text: A sticky liquid obtained from monsters. It can be used as an adhesive.

name: ITEM_20150714_005393
text: A bundle of dry brush gathered up. Looks like it would burn well.

name: ITEM_20150714_005396
text: A journal recorded by Itebaras. It records the inscriptions on the tombstones at the Namu Temple Ruins.

name: ITEM_20150714_005398
text: A bone fragment from a Halloventor Archer. It can be used as an anti-rusting agent.

name: ITEM_20150714_005400
text: The metal plate that Justas is looking for.

name: ITEM_20150714_005402
text: The metal plate that Justas is looking for. Heavily rusted from sitting in the well for so long.

name: ITEM_20150714_005404
text: A cord and magnet that Justas gave to you. If you attach the rope to the well's pulley system, you can get the metal plate at the bottom.

name: ITEM_20150714_005406
text: An extract obtained from defeated monsters.

name: ITEM_20150714_005408
text: Rust powder scraped off a rusty metal plate. Some monsters will react to it.

name: ITEM_20150714_005410
text: A bubbling liquid. Mix it with an acidic solution to create a rust remover.

name: ITEM_20150714_005411
text: A metal plate sought after by Alwida.

name: ITEM_20150714_005412
text: Corrosives given to you by Alwida. It can corrode metal plates.

name: ITEM_20150714_005413
text: A metal plate that was laid below vines. It's in good condition.

name: ITEM_20150714_005414
text: A stick obtained from monsters. It's uniquely metallic.

name: ITEM_20150714_005416
text: A stone with an unusual aura. By rubbing it against a stick one can make a Detection Rod.

name: ITEM_20150714_005418
text: A Detection Rod that can find metal plates. Crudely made, and looks like it won't last long.

name: ITEM_20150714_005419
text: A metal plate found with a Detection Rod.

name: ITEM_20150714_005425
text: Coagulant given to you by the Blacksmith.

name: ITEM_20150714_005426
text: Copy of the Nuoridin Falls Prophecy

name: ITEM_20150714_005427
text: A copy of the Nuoridin Falls Prophecy given to you by Adrius.

name: ITEM_20150714_005429
text: Tools for taking rubbings from tombstones.

name: ITEM_20150714_005431
text: A fixative for making ink stick to tombstones.

name: ITEM_20150714_005433
text: White fur bundle cut from a Rambear. It appears gray, as if dirt ridden.

name: ITEM_20150714_005435
text: A censer in which Vaidotas has put in a special combination of incenses. The scent weakens the Vubbes.

name: ITEM_20150714_005436
text: Chemical agents that cause Vubbes to hallucinate, preventing them from approaching the entrance.

name: ITEM_20150714_005438
text: A lump from a Moa, a predator of the Pantos. It smells awful.

name: ITEM_20150714_005440
text: A Fisherman's eye. It feels like it's staring at you.

name: ITEM_20150714_005442
text: A dying essence found in an Ellom's body. It's sticky.

name: ITEM_20150714_005444
text: Made by properly stringing together Ellom Essences and Fisherman Eyes

name: ITEM_20150714_005446
text: An eye that can see hidden souls. It was made by the Bokor Master requested by Knight Commander Uska, who was investigating disappearances regarding the Klaipeda Market.

name: ITEM_20150714_005448
text: A necessary ingredient to make the straw doll.

name: ITEM_20150714_005450
text: An orb prepared by the Bokor Master in order to soothe the souls of the injustly slain people of the Andale Village.

name: ITEM_20150714_005452
text: An Orb of Comfort that has been fully filled. It can soothe the souls of the injustly slain people of the Andale Village.

name: ITEM_20150714_005454
text: A crystal that Goddess Saule filled with her power to purify the Thorn Forest.

name: ITEM_20150714_005456
text: A magical tool of the Cryomancer Master. It can freeze even the soul of a monster.

name: ITEM_20150714_005458
text: A fragment of a monster's soul, solidified into a frosty crystal.

name: ITEM_20150714_005460
text: An ingredient needed for the Cryomancer Master's test.

name: ITEM_20150714_005462
text: An orb made by Zubeck to easily locate his secret stash.

name: ITEM_20150714_005464
text: A scripture needed for repairing the sealed tower in the Uskis Arable Land.

name: ITEM_20150714_005467
text: A potion that the Royal Army had. Used when making Resounding Bomb.

name: ITEM_20150714_005469
text: A bomb that doesn't have much explosive power, but creates a huge noise when set off.

name: ITEM_20150714_005471
text: A bomb discovered in the Outpost area. Seems like it's become a dud.

name: ITEM_20150714_005473
text: A box with tools to safely remove bombs

name: ITEM_20150714_005475
text: A sample of the poisonous wedge needle used to attack the monks. The Hunter Tracker Captain might be able to identify it.

name: ITEM_20150714_005476
text: An antidote that the Hunters always have with them. It cures simple poisons immediately.

name: ITEM_20150714_005478
text: Ebonypawn's trap. It's in perfect working condition.

name: ITEM_20150714_005480
text: Monk Wiley's treasured sheet of scripture. Looks like they were scattered during the uproar.

name: ITEM_20150714_005482
text: Mushrooms commonly found in the Thorn Forest. It seems they must be cooked to be edible.

name: ITEM_20150714_005484
text: A piece of a Rocktor's leg. Can be used in weapons due to its shape and hardness.

name: ITEM_20150714_005486
text: A thorn found on the Chafperor's forearm. Venom oozes from it.

name: ITEM_20150714_005488
text: A thorny tree that grows on wicked energies. Its thorns are poisonous.

name: ITEM_20150714_005490
text: Water from the spring. It's been contaminated with poison.

name: ITEM_20150714_005492
text: A bowl used to extract the poison out of the contaminated spring water. There's a hollow spot in which the poison collects.

name: ITEM_20150714_005494
text: A leaf attached to the head of a Woodluwa. It can be used as an ingredient for an antidote.

name: ITEM_20150714_005496
text: A medicinal herb that Chevas from the Bastille Company was looking for. He says it will aid against poisonous attacks.

name: ITEM_20150714_005497
text: It's an empty beehive without any honey in it. Where is the honey?

name: ITEM_20150714_005499
text: A sweet-smelling secretion from a Woodluwa. It can soften hardened honeycombs.

name: ITEM_20150714_005501
text: A large cap from the head of a liverwort plant. It exudes a strange smell.

name: ITEM_20150714_005503
text: A fragment that broke off a Stonecon. It twitches ever so slightly.

name: ITEM_20150714_005505
text: An old book from the grave of a dead man. Hunter Natasha may be able to find something of use from this book.

name: ITEM_20150714_005507
text: A letter found in an old book left behind by a dead man. It contains an order for an assassination as well a confirmation of its execution.

name: ITEM_20150714_005509
text: An aquatic plant that grows in watery environments. It can filter and purify water.

name: ITEM_20150714_005511
text: A crystal ball found in a wooden box at the monastery. Used to activate the device in the prayer hall.

name: ITEM_20150714_005513
text: A strong potion used for removing odors. It has an antiseptic scent to it.

name: ITEM_20150714_005515
text: Scriptures that were scattered by rampaging monsters. Bring them to Mohaim.

name: ITEM_20150717_005516
text: It's as if the powerful blade shows its user the way of the sword.

name: ITEM_20150717_005517
text: The true power of this blade is its ability to cleave everything between you and your enemy.

name: ITEM_20150717_005518
text: You can feel the experienced tough from the handle, and a cold cruelty from blade. Great users only experience the first case.

name: ITEM_20150717_005519
text: The souls of the swordsmen fighting to death with sword in hand is reflected in this blade.

name: ITEM_20150717_005520
text: The pommel can be used to stab as well but there's no need to try it.

name: ITEM_20150717_005521
text: It seems less vulnerable to the environment even the origin is a ridding battle.

name: ITEM_20150717_005522
text: A normal sword regardless of the power with a magic. Of course, If there are people who ignore the power of this sword, they can be damaged by this sword.

name: ITEM_20150717_005523
text: Hope always this sword exists between you and enemy.

name: ITEM_20150717_005527
text: Sometimes it shows the solid spirit of the blacksmith.

name: ITEM_20150717_005528
text: The sale of this sword is frequently undertaken by salesmanship rather than performance.

name: ITEM_20150717_005530
text: The strength of the Deathweaver is nestled within.

name: ITEM_20150717_005531
text: It has the ability to damage souls, but it tends to only exert damage on demons.

name: ITEM_20150717_005532
text: If your two hands can handle it, this sword will be a great friend during your adventures.

name: ITEM_20150717_005533
text: This sword has absorbed the experience of an elite soldier. Whether you are a mercenary or not, if you enjoy fighting you will appreciate this sword.

name: ITEM_20150717_005534
text: Due to security reasons, the kingdom's Dress Sword is always in development.

name: ITEM_20150717_005535
text: Since long past, this sword has been adored by warriors who prefer to wield a blade with both hands.

name: ITEM_20150717_005536
text: In the kingdom's history, it'll be difficult to find an actual example of execution by the sword.

name: ITEM_20150717_005537
text: This sword's power far exceeds its outer look.

name: ITEM_20150717_005538
text: Don't you feel a foreboding presence from the enemy? It seems this isn't over yet.

name: ITEM_20150717_005539
text: Originally, the practical weapons were manufactured in the form of entry-level weapons.

name: ITEM_20150717_005540
text: Look forward to the hidden potential bestowed in this weapon by its maker.

name: ITEM_20150717_005541
text: Don't ignore this sword just because of the sales tactics used by the seller. They wouldn't have had to use so much tact if the sword had no disadvantages.

name: ITEM_20150717_005542
text: - 2% chance to increase magic defense for 15 seconds after receiving magic damage

name: ITEM_20150717_005543
text: If you are ready to face death, draw this sword.

name: ITEM_20150717_005544
text: If you sharpen your soul while making a weapon, the size of the enemy will not matter. You can expect larger damage inflicted on larger enemies.

name: ITEM_20150717_005545
text: Some people call this the mixed form of a two-handed basic blade. Using it as their main weapon until they are acknowledged by others.

name: ITEM_20150717_005546
text: Some say the decorative snake occasionally blinks it's eyes. There are no eye witnesses, so the claim may be a hoax.

name: ITEM_20150717_005547
text: This weapon is a staff condensed with magic through complicated methods.

name: ITEM_20150717_005548
text: This staff has teeth. Let the enemy know that it is not just for show.

name: ITEM_20150717_005549
text: Mages with years of experience enjoy this equipment.

name: ITEM_20150717_005550
text: In reality, this has nothing to do with astronomy. However, this equipment should not be taken lightly.

name: ITEM_20150717_005551
text: Life, magic, and endless wisdom are the symbols used to craft this staff.

name: ITEM_20150717_005552
text: There is not much like this to have as your guard.

name: ITEM_20150717_005553
text: If you take a look at this staff, you can see a great transformation has simplified it. This does not mean the power has been greatly reduced.

name: ITEM_20150717_005554
text: - Increases all Cryomancer skill levels by 1

name: ITEM_20150717_005555
text: - Increases the Earthquake skill level by 3

name: ITEM_20150717_005556
text: The catastrophic effect of this equipment is activated independently from the user's skill.

name: ITEM_20150717_005557
text: From all the people that have used this equipment, we are rooting for you to become the most renowned throughout history.

name: ITEM_20150717_005558
text: - Basic attacks have a 1% chance to reduce the enemy's magic defense and increases physical defense for 30 seconds

name: ITEM_20150717_005559
text: - Basic attacks have a 2% chance to burn the target for 10 seconds

name: ITEM_20150717_005560
text: We have found death without discretion. It is time to apply what we have discovered on the enemy.

name: ITEM_20150717_005561
text: You can't always draw power from wandering souls. However, if you succeed an item which increases your hidden potential will be created.

name: ITEM_20150717_005562
text: The craftsman takes pride in bringing out the optimum curvature of this recurve bow.

name: ITEM_20150717_005563
text: The archers from the Astral Tower do not care for this bow. However, others living in these treacherous times might find this bow useful.

name: ITEM_20150717_005564
text: Just because it is called the sniper's bow doesn't mean you have to take single shots.

name: ITEM_20150717_005565
text: During perilous times, if secret and terror are wielded in the shooter's hands, they will draw out the will to live.

name: ITEM_20150717_005566
text: When the device that increases draw power was first used on the bow was indeed the times of Lydia Schaffen. However, the inventor was not Lydia Schaffen, but her companion the first Fletcher Master.

name: ITEM_20150717_005567
text: This bow requires a lot more strength from the user than expected. The view of the arrow in flight will leave a sense of satisfaction.

name: ITEM_20150717_005568
text: Unlike its name, this bow will be welcomed by any archer. Rogues aren't the only ones who prefer this bow.

name: ITEM_20150717_005569
text: The burden of bows has been alleviated, it does not decrease the power by much.

name: ITEM_20150717_005570
text: - Increases all Hunter skill levels by 2

name: ITEM_20150717_005571
text: - Basic attacks have a 2% chance to poison enemies for 20 seconds

name: ITEM_20150717_005572
text: If you don't have the other bow, then this bow is a good choice to buy.

name: ITEM_20150717_005573
text: The Weapon Merchant said that even Lydia Schaffen bought this. It's not wrong saying this since she's not complaining.

name: ITEM_20150717_005574
text: - 100% critical rate on Beast-type enemies{nl} - -25% damage on non-Beast-type enemies.

name: ITEM_20150717_005575
text: This arrow would kill your enemies.

name: ITEM_20150717_005576
text: It is required for the owner to have powerful strength. But you feel like this when you see the carrying out arrow.

name: ITEM_20150717_005578
text: If you are specialized in crossbows instead of bows, then this is a good equipment to help you become more advanced.

name: ITEM_20150717_005579
text: In the old days, the majority of the body from this equipment was made by silver. The silver products were famous in Fedimian.

name: ITEM_20150717_005580
text: There is a theory that the person who improved this weapon like this is Ebonypawn. But, that's just a groundless rumor.

name: ITEM_20150717_005581
text: A weapon designed to deal great damage with small projectile and projectiles.

name: ITEM_20150717_005582
text: It is easier to handle than it seems.

name: ITEM_20150717_005583
text: It is inevitable to use this in emergencies, but still it's a last resort to strike enemies with this equipment in close combat.

name: ITEM_20150717_005584
text: Careful attention of the user is necessary to avoid ruining the fine structure of this equipment. Its craftmenship adds a layer of complexity compared to regular weapons, which give credence to its value.

name: ITEM_20150717_005585
text: A modified weapon based on the Fedimian Turret that was made in the recent days.

name: ITEM_20150717_005586
text: - Increases all Quarrel Shooter skill levels by 2

name: ITEM_20150717_005588
text: Shot with hope to make a great damage every shoting.

name: ITEM_20150717_005589
text: Please be that person that shows what real value this weapon has.

name: ITEM_20150717_005590
text: Unlike the different weapons of same names, this name is related with the weapon effect. It has a magic to get the opponent like a death nest.

name: ITEM_20150717_005591
text: Beasts who are not from this world absolutely love the pain and suffering from this.

name: ITEM_20150717_005592
text: There are traces of it being used for other purposes. But even ordinary equipment can show the divinity of the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20150717_005593
text: Many priests, wizards and warriors use this personally as an advantage in battle. Although, this weapon is not officially supported by the Royal Army.

name: ITEM_20150717_005594
text: It has a form to display the unique character of this town, but the material is not silver.

name: ITEM_20150717_005595
text: Don't worry about the damage of this rune, just give it your all with your strikes and hits.

name: ITEM_20150717_005596
text: Someone told this weapon have more thorns. But, the thorns of this weapon is proper now like the building has a one lighting rod.

name: ITEM_20150717_005597
text: Test this on all solid targets. This includes: monsters, shields, locked doors and all other kinds of locks.

name: ITEM_20150717_005598
text: Although there was no war in the kingdom history, the war weapons have been improved constantly. Do not need to say about Ruklys Civil War.

name: ITEM_20150717_005599
text: Blacksmiths and those with another job often buy this to actually use it.

name: ITEM_20150717_005600
text: Even though it is produced in Fedimian, it does not have a different name to it.

name: ITEM_20150717_005601
text: - Increases all Monk skill levels by 2

name: ITEM_20150717_005602
text: It is better to just slash regardless of the time of Master's innate power.

name: ITEM_20150717_005603
text: Using this weapon, you can feel its quality ain't too shabby, even though this was an impulse purchase.

name: ITEM_20150717_005604
text: - Increases basic attack of [Out of Body] equal to your amount of SPR

name: ITEM_20150717_005605
text: Don't think it's weak even it is Vubbe's weapon. It will occasionally give you lost your mind.

name: ITEM_20150717_005606
text: A weapon that crafted to have a lot of magic and effort even regardless of a unique feature.

name: ITEM_20150717_005607
text: Results have shown that this item is powerful against Mutant-type monsters. However, nobody knows why.

name: ITEM_20150717_005608
text: Don't think it is poor just because of its form. It has a strong durability and has a good appearance to distinguish from other weapons.

name: ITEM_20150717_005609
text: The Battle ways using this unique form of the shield has been upgraded by lots of Masters.

name: ITEM_20150717_005610
text: In the fast, There were a lot of shield crafted by Fedimian. Since Medzio Diena, the lot of type shield have been crafted due to the dangerous world.

name: ITEM_20150717_005611
text: Unlike the some of misunderstanding, This type is not origin from the kingdom outside. Since Medzio Diena, It made an effect, surely the shield is origin from the some place of the kingdom.

name: ITEM_20150717_005612
text: This shield is specialized for mounted battles. It performed well at the battle of Hamasi. After the Taniel period which stabilized the kingdom, it has been produced constantly.

name: ITEM_20150717_005613
text: This is the equipment that was crafted from the shield, which is used on mount battles, by focusing on its defensive rate instead of focusing on its mass. Unlike a cavalry shield, it may be too much for a foot soldier.

name: ITEM_20150717_005614
text: The history of the Tower Shield is even longer than the small shields. The soldiers who followed Zachariel during the war of the country were used to this kind of shields.

name: ITEM_20150717_005615
text: It would cure you with a probability higher than getting hit by a meteor.

name: ITEM_20150717_005616
text: The Royal Army used it for the ceremony, but many warriors find it useful during real battles.

name: ITEM_20150717_005617
text: As Alchupiz was used in many ceremonies of the kingdom, it was modified accordingly. Along with some decorations on it, its quality was improved.

name: ITEM_20150717_005618
text: If a person is confident on using this well, many skills such as hanging or tangling the opponent's weapon are possible.

name: ITEM_20150717_005619
text: According to the words that were passed down from long ago, Doppelsoeldners who were gathered by King Kadumel fought against Ruklys' army that were equipped with those.

name: ITEM_20150717_005620
text: In order to use this weapon effectively, the blade of the weapon should always be sharpened.

name: ITEM_20150717_005621
text: If one feels that his weapon deals additional damages on the demons, that's just a feeling.

name: ITEM_20150717_005622
text: This weapon is a modified Alchupiz made by civilians in the direction they liked.

name: ITEM_20150717_005623
text: - Increases all Hoplite skill levels by 2

name: ITEM_20150717_005624
text: - Increases damage by 100% when using [Spear Throw]

name: ITEM_20150717_005625
text: King Kadumel was incompetent in military techniques, but he put in lot of effort on weapons. As a result, some weapons' origins are related to him.

name: ITEM_20150717_005626
text: There's a saying that it was created to give useful weapons to the recruited soldiers.

name: ITEM_20150717_005627
text: Even if multiple weapons share the same origin, some of them develped further than the other ones.

name: ITEM_20150717_005628
text: - Deals 3 successive hits on Large-type targets{nl}  - Increases all Cataphract skill levels by 1

name: ITEM_20150717_005629
text: A spear that has been used in a variety of fields throughout the history of the kingdom such as hunting, duels and war.

name: ITEM_20150717_005630
text: - 1% chance to reduce an enemy's movement speed for 10 seconds

name: ITEM_20150717_005631
text: The weapons that were crafted through alchemy tend to have some flaws. This weapon is different. 3 successive hits are launched when you attack a large-type monster.

name: ITEM_20150717_005632
text: When you need a strong magic, this equipment will be reliable.

name: ITEM_20150717_005633
text: The process of crafting is more complex than a steel staff, but as a result, more advanced equipment woulld come out from the processes.

name: ITEM_20150717_005634
text: This cane symbolizes many virtues. Justice, truth, space and more.

name: ITEM_20150717_005635
text: Instead of focusing on its virtue, more emphasis was put on the quality of the Square Staff.

name: ITEM_20150717_005636
text: The history of the Mage Staff is longer than Agailla Flurry who was one of the greatest wizards in the entire history.

name: ITEM_20150717_005637
text: It was Agailla Flurry who trimmed this Mage Staff like this and the staff was named to commemorate her achievements.

name: ITEM_20150717_005638
text: According to an old saying, the origin of the cane is related to the Demon Lord Helgasercle.

name: ITEM_20150717_005639
text: Sometimes, there's a person who doesn't know what is the top of the cane.

name: ITEM_20150717_005642
text: - 20% chance to inflict [Burn] on an enemy for 10 seconds when using [Hell Breath]

name: ITEM_20150717_005644
text: The people who were related to Black Market make this kind of weapons well, but they successfully crafted Black Staff recently.

name: ITEM_20150717_005645
text: Sometimes, the efforts of the master craftsman result in good products. And, that object sometimes shows its true abilities.

name: ITEM_20150717_005646
text: This equipment was sold a lot commercially. And the quality of it is not that bad.

name: ITEM_20150717_005647
text: You would have to pay adequate rewards in order to put the power of dark spirits into the equipment.

name: ITEM_20150717_005649
text: When weapons were introduced in the kingdom, there were many directions for the development. With this weapon, the emphasis is on making it smaller, the convenience for consecutive shootings, and the satisfaction for design.

name: ITEM_20150717_005650
text: Some people want strong weapons that have one strong shot and the ones that are convenient to carry. The weapon that fulfills those requirements is this.

name: ITEM_20150717_005652
text: - Increases all Schwarzer Reiter skill levels by 1

name: ITEM_20150717_005653
text: A weapon that was proposed as the focal point in the kingdom's history of weapon development. This was designed not to lose its strengths even in various situations.

name: ITEM_20150717_005654
text: Even just a century ago, this was used only in the kingdom's southern region. It is becoming more common in other areas nowadays.

name: ITEM_20150717_005655
text: The shape and the pattern of the equipment is not originated from the kingdom. It is apparent that the outside culture has been penetrated into the kingdom.

name: ITEM_20150717_005656
text: The name of the place originated from the great Woodlands. The name has been first adopted from the hideout of the aristocrats that used to live in the great Woodlands so unlike its name, it possesses relatively fancy appearance.

name: ITEM_20150717_005657
text: The name has been first originated from the Woodlands. This was first created from the hideout of the aristocrats so its appearance looks fancy compared to its name.

name: ITEM_20150717_005658
text: The equipment with this pattern originated from the Kadumel Era. At then, it was the official equipment of the Royal Army, but the number of people who started to use this equipment gradually decreased after the Kadumel Era. However, there are still many people using it.

name: ITEM_20150717_005659
text: You can feel its excellency by lowering your expectations from hearing its name.

name: ITEM_20150717_005660
text: It may not be as great as the merchant claims, but it isn't so bad either.

name: ITEM_20150717_005661
text: As the Vubbes started to swing their arms after Medzio Diena, the equipment to prepare for the attacks of the Vubbes has developed. If the Vubbes causes more violence, there is a chance that the performance of the equipment may get better although the name of the equipment may be the same.

name: ITEM_20150717_005662
text: Unlike other equipment whose names originated from monsters, this equipment have been made at Gele Plateau from long time ago.

name: ITEM_20150717_005663
text: This is the by-product of the period when the wizards and the priests haven't been good together in the history. Because of Maven, that trouble disappeared from the history, but the craft manual is being still used usefully in many areas.

name: ITEM_20150717_005664
text: This is the equipment that has been changed a lot from the original equipment from the Kadumel Era. It generally possesses the improved qualities.

name: ITEM_20150717_005665
text: For the amusement of the aristocrats, a kind of Metal Plate armor was needed so it was changed practically from then. It is being keep improved and developed after Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20150717_005666
text: Under the stabilized royal regime, the Metal Plate armor has developed with various reasons even when there weren't any large scale wars going on. The requests of the aristocrats who didn't forget the importance of military training were accepted many times and as a result, it has the shape of nowadays.

name: ITEM_20150717_005667
text: Not only the wars and the tastes of the aristocrats developed the history of the battlegear. The master craftsmen in Fedimian have been creating many equipment and craft items by utilizing their unique experimental minds for a long time. Also this is the result of the support from the goddesses who are trying to develop the cizilization of the humans.

name: ITEM_20150717_005668
text: According to an old saying, Jane, the disciple of Agailla Flurry, created this equipment. She resolved her limit by doing so, but there aren't any clear records remaining.

name: ITEM_20150717_005669
text: After Medzio Diena, the equipment that were used for the hunting and the adventures are receiving the spotlight. As the number of violent monsters increases, the adventurous hunting which was unique before is becoming daily lives.

name: ITEM_20150717_005670
text: Its appearance looks good since it was used for the designs of the court guards and its defensive rate is also great.

name: ITEM_20150717_005671
text: From long time ago, many wizards bought this equipment when they accumulated enough money. This equipment fulfills the needs of performance as well as the needs of designs.

name: ITEM_20150717_005672
text: This equipment possesses more privacy than it looks. Also, the light reflection is weak in the night times so the scouts have used this equipment often.

name: ITEM_20150717_005673
text: The pattern of the foot soldiers that was adopted from the beginning of the kingdom has been continued until now. At some times in the past, the kingdom soldiers wore this and aligned in front of 3 layer castle walls.

name: ITEM_20150717_005674
text: This equipment possesses the passion of the archmages to improve themselves to the next level.

name: ITEM_20150717_005675
text: The previous Skirmisher equipment is being crafted with improved qualities as the monsters go rampant since Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20150717_005676
text: This equipment was once adopted as the official equipment of the foot soldiers inside the castle of the capital. As the time passed by after that, this equipment was used constantly even in the periods when it wasn't adopted by the kingdom.

text: A small piece of rock that broke off from a stone pillar. Its purpose is not certain, but looks expensive.

name: ITEM_20150918_006346
text: Refined powder collected from a stone pillar's surface. Its use is unclear.

name: ITEM_20150918_006347
text: A small piece of a stone that was found in the monster's stomach.{nl}Seems to be part of a victim's relics.

name: ITEM_20150918_006348
text: A scroll that opens a distortion in space. With this, it is possible to obtain the key that belonged to the Great King Zachariel.

name: ITEM_20150918_006349
text: A key used for releasing the seal of the Great King Zachariel.

name: ITEM_20150918_006350
text: One of the task requirements by the Hoplite Master. Looks extremely sturdy.

name: ITEM_20150918_006351
text: One of the task requirements by the Hoplite Master. It would be fatal to be stabbed by it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006352
text: One of the task requirements by the Hoplite Master. It scatters at the slightest breath.

name: ITEM_20150918_006353
text: Material required for Psychokino Master's research.

name: ITEM_20150918_006354
text: A potion made by the Psychokino Master. Contains the stamen of Matsum. Looks a little dangerous.

name: ITEM_20150918_006355
text: The materials which Linker Master requested to you to use on his test. Why does he need those?

name: ITEM_20150918_006356
text: The Sapper Master requested these goods to be returned to their original owner. Did he steal these?

name: ITEM_20150918_006357
text: Leather requested by the Quarrel Shooter Master. Looks like it will be used for armor-crafting.

name: ITEM_20150918_006358
text: A giant stone used as a replacement on the Klaipeda Castle Wall. Now, how to move this...

name: ITEM_20150918_006359
text: Not sure what's inside but it smells foul.

name: ITEM_20150918_006360
text: The sculpting material that Tesla wanted so badly. Looks extremely hard.

name: ITEM_20150918_006361
text: A pot that absorbs the essence of fire from nearby monsters.

name: ITEM_20150918_006362
text: Items to be offered to the Goddess Statue.

name: ITEM_20150918_006363
text: Holy Water used for banishing evil spirits. A very pure water.

name: ITEM_20150918_006364
text: These are the materials that are needed to help the research of Wizard Master.

name: ITEM_20150918_006365
text: Scroll made for researching the paranormal phenomena in Klaipeda.

name: ITEM_20150918_006366
text: Holy Water used for treating patients. It has a regenerative effect.

name: ITEM_20150918_006367
text: Holy Water used for treating patients. It has a sterilizing effect.

name: ITEM_20150918_006368
text: Holy Water used for treating patients. It has a revitalizing effect.

name: ITEM_20150918_006369
text: A demonic essence requested by the Psychokino Master. It emanates a sinister evil aura.

name: ITEM_20150918_006370
text: A demonic essence requested by the Psychokino Master. If you stare at it for too long you might be possessed.

name: ITEM_20150918_006371
text: This might be a map marked with the location of the Fletcher's Secret Manual. Why would the Quarrel Shooter Master want the Fletcher's...?

name: ITEM_20150918_006372
text: A piece of cloth suspected to be from Ebonypawn.

name: ITEM_20150918_006373
text: Material required for the Sapper Master's experiments. It burns easily.

name: ITEM_20150918_006374
text: An experimental bomb created by the Sapper Master.{nl}The throw distance can be controlled by holding down the key.

name: ITEM_20150918_006375
text: Clothes that seem belong to the father of the Klaipeda Tools Merchant. A gentle embroidery is sewed on it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006376
text: A box containing a delicacy liked by the stray cats. Used to catch stray cats. It has a fishy smell.

name: ITEM_20150918_006377
text: Energy of fire collected into a pot.

name: ITEM_20150918_006378
text: Material requested by the Cryomancer Master as an alternative payment for his teaching fees.

name: ITEM_20150918_006379
text: Material requested by the Cryomancer Master as an alternative payment for his teaching fees. Will this be of any use for a Cryomancer?

name: ITEM_20150918_006380
text: A stiff, hard piece from the inner side of Phyracon. Material requested by the Wizard Master.

name: ITEM_20150918_006381
text: A smooth scale found below the rougher outer scale of Drake. Material requested by the Wizard Master.

name: ITEM_20150918_006382
text: Scroll made to compare the phenomena in Fedimian and Klaipeda.

name: ITEM_20150918_006383
text: You can obtain an object hidden on the 3rd floor.

name: ITEM_20150918_006384
text: A lump of something that smells terribly foul. You can see a glimpse of a ring-like object inside.

name: ITEM_20150918_006385
text: A completely dried up twig. It has a lot of tiny thorns.

name: ITEM_20150918_006386
text: Detailed information on future operations alongside a map. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006387
text: An ingredient for crafting shards of memory.{nl}It is very thick.

name: ITEM_20150918_006388
text: A scouting report of the Sunset Flag Forest.{nl}The scratched writing gives you an eerie feeling. Readable, but...

name: ITEM_20150918_006389
text: A water bottle hidden by the Supply Officer.{nl}It smells old and musty.

name: ITEM_20150918_006390
text: An indispensable material for capturing Gaigalas.{nl}It smells musty.

name: ITEM_20150918_006391
text: An indispensable material for capturing Gaigalas. It's full of moss.

name: ITEM_20150918_006392
text: Articles made of gold, a Lichenclop's favorite material. Tediously collected.

name: ITEM_20150918_006393
text: Contains articles to help research such as pens, papers, digging tools and some foodstuffs.

name: ITEM_20150918_006394
text: A herb used to treat neurological ailments.

name: ITEM_20150918_006395
text: A file folder that contains the research records of the Royal Mausoleum. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006396
text: A file containing research data on the Royal Mausoleum. It's been ripped apart.

name: ITEM_20150918_006397
text: An archive that Jonas devoted his lifetime to create. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006398
text: Davio obtained this medicine for Jonas. It's very effective in treating senility.

name: ITEM_20150918_006399
text: Replenishes your HP when a monster is defeated within the magic circle

name: ITEM_20150918_006400
text: Explosive to block the Vubbe Raiders' Secret Passage

name: ITEM_20150918_006401
text: A fragment of Woodsman that sometimes wiggles creepily.

name: ITEM_20150918_006402
text: A report by Joint Investigation Unit Member Scott regarding suspicious activity in the area. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006403
text: A scroll that allows you to collect spirits. Only usable on certain monsters.

name: ITEM_20150918_006404
text: An orb that has a Red Vubbe Shooter's spirit sealed within.

name: ITEM_20150918_006405
text: The Owl Sculpture's upper piece.{nl}Restoration is, unfortunately, infeasible.

name: ITEM_20150918_006406
text: The Owl Sculpture's lower piece.{nl}The shape is barely recognizable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006407
text: A pedestal piece of the Owl Sculpture.{nl}It's about to break in half.

name: ITEM_20150918_006408
text: A special oil to burn the Owl Sculpture which has unfortunately been shattered.

name: ITEM_20150918_006409
text: A wheat box containing a small number of grains. The box has been ripped apart.

name: ITEM_20150918_006410
text: A pocket which contains the strange medicine. When the Vubbes consume it, they become brave, but if humans consume it, they will have stomachache.

name: ITEM_20150918_006411
text: A telescope lens used at the Astral Tower.

name: ITEM_20150918_006413
text: A stone carried by the Hogmas. It attracts monsters.

name: ITEM_20150918_006414
text: Friedka believes that this amulet is the key to the ruin's secrets.

name: ITEM_20150918_006415
text: Supplies of the unit which Lynt is a part of. A Wendigo ran away with it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006416
text: A herb with a decent painkiller effect.

name: ITEM_20150918_006417
text: This stone is said to attract Sauga. Could this be true?

name: ITEM_20150918_006418
text: A fragment of a relic swallowed by Denoptic. A monster that feeds on stone, how curious.

name: ITEM_20150918_006419
text: A pouch of coins meant for payment. Grave Robber Kujang asked you to deliver this to Grave Robber Bushobell.

name: ITEM_20150918_006420
text: Treasure that belonged to human victims and was hoarded by the monster.

name: ITEM_20150918_006421
text: The belongings of a soldier, stolen by a Leaf Bug. {nl}Looks like it's not the first time it has been stolen.

name: ITEM_20150918_006422
text: A ripped cloth piece from Vubbe. It's from the dirty waist area.

name: ITEM_20150918_006423
text: If seems you can use this somewhere if you gather enough Vubbe toenails.

name: ITEM_20150918_006424
text: Goods used as a provision for emergencies in the Mining Town.

name: ITEM_20150918_006425
text: Material required for reinforcement of the mine's exterior wall. Collect them before the wall crumbles.

name: ITEM_20150918_006426
text: A stick used to expel Sequoia. It has a few holy spirits.

name: ITEM_20150918_006427
text: Ingredient for a tool that chases away road-blocking Sequoia. You can feel the faint holy power.

name: ITEM_20150918_006428
text: Warrior's Essence. It is very necessary to give Sequoia the very best bit.

name: ITEM_20150918_006429
text: This stick was made by upgrading a Stinging Stick. It is capable of subduing Sequoia.

name: ITEM_20150918_006430
text: The larvae of Meduja are eating away at the memories of life. They're sparkly.

name: ITEM_20150918_006431
text: The luggage of a dead merchant. His spirit is obsessed with it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006432
text: A scroll of protection. It seems the scholar's spirit was vanquished before using it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006433
text: A rubbed copy of the monument that the female explorer was looking for.

name: ITEM_20150918_006434
text: This stick was made by upgrading a Spiritual Stick. It holds the grudges of the Owl Sculptures...

name: ITEM_20150918_006435
text: A keepsake from a dead soldier who was killed by monsters. It seems that the keepsake can comfort the soldiers' victimized spirit.

name: ITEM_20150918_006436
text: This smell reminds me of my hometown.{nl}I miss my home.

name: ITEM_20150918_006438
text: Abnormally smelling juices are oozing from it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006439
text: A monster bait to complete the last mission of dead soldiers.

name: ITEM_20150918_006440
text: Let's test it on a monster to confirm that it is working.

name: ITEM_20150918_006441
text: Old Kepa skin. The powder falls off it when shaken.

name: ITEM_20150918_006442
text: Needed to make the bait more convincing. Will this bait work well?

name: ITEM_20150918_006443
text: A corpse of Johan's squad. Please treat them well.

name: ITEM_20150918_006444
text: A hook that soldier Roy has to collect. He can return to his troops as soon as he collects it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006445
text: Parts of it are covered in blood and unable to be read. Some parts are legible.

name: ITEM_20150918_006446
text: A material used to fix the wagon. Cut from the the hard part of the stem of a Hamming.

name: ITEM_20150918_006447
text: Fluid secreted from a Tini's gland. It has a sting to it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006448
text: A herbicide made from the fluid of a Tini. You can remove thornbushes with it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006449
text: A certification awarded to soldiers who have safely completed training. Read it proudly.

name: ITEM_20150918_006450
text: The soft parts of Plantain Grass gathered up. It tastes bitter when chewed.

name: ITEM_20150918_006451
text: Empty potion bottle stolen by a Vubbe. It sparkles as if it has been vigorously cleaned.

name: ITEM_20150918_006452
text: An item that proves one's ability to the Sword Master. It's the heart of Stone Orca.

name: ITEM_20150918_006453
text: A Vubbe ointment that is used to treat their injured. It's not possible to use it as is.

name: ITEM_20150918_006454
text: A slate that ordered the Guardians to attack evil things. They are attacking everyone because it is broken.

name: ITEM_20150918_006455
text: A stone that lights stone lanterns.{nl}Although it is burning, it isn't very hot.

name: ITEM_20150918_006456
text: Overusing the inhibitor can cause it to overheat and break.

name: ITEM_20150918_006457
text: A token of Wheelens. Collecting them gives the power to defeat enemies.

name: ITEM_20150918_006458
text: A diary that Coben asked you to find.

name: ITEM_20150918_006459
text: A lump of fat that was pulled out after defeating Cockatrice.

name: ITEM_20150918_006461
text: If you set up this jar, it will absorb magical power from around you.

name: ITEM_20150918_006462
text: Could be a cause of the disease.

name: ITEM_20150918_006463
text: A gem that absorbs a monster's life force. It absorbs the life force of monsters defeated near it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006464
text: A scroll required to solve the seal of King Zachariel. It is the first seal.

name: ITEM_20150918_006465
text: Any monster that uses fire abilities has a source.{nl}It is used to make Flame Gems.

name: ITEM_20150918_006466
text: Makes finding fire easy but how Grita got it is a mystery.

name: ITEM_20150918_006467
text: Research material stolen by monsters. It seems that monsters like to steal such documents.

name: ITEM_20150918_006468
text: Hard lime used to make forgeries.

name: ITEM_20150918_006469
text: A counterfeit item proving the existence of forgery.{nl}It is yet to be finished.

name: ITEM_20150918_006470
text: Piece of a building with beautiful pattern on it. It seems that the architect put a lot of work into making it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006471
text: There are various tools inside, like a dowsing rod to check for underground tombs.

name: ITEM_20150918_006472
text: The Saugas store their loot in bags.{nl}They share their loot equally.

name: ITEM_20150918_006473
text: A very ancient looking token of an archaeologist.

name: ITEM_20150918_006474
text: The highly toxic poison of a Woodfung. It releases this poison into the air when frightened.

name: ITEM_20150918_006475
text: A sack holding a monster's hand

name: ITEM_20150918_006476
text: Lizardman Blood is used in experiments conducted by necromancers.

name: ITEM_20150918_006477
text: A soul jar given by the Necromancer Drasius. It will inhale monsters who are on the verge of death.

name: ITEM_20150918_006478
text: A symbol which represents that someone passed the ordeal that was prepared by the Great King Zachariel. It seems to be related to the seal of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: ITEM_20150918_006479
text: A sword with a piece missing from it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006480
text: These relics might help identify the dead bodies.

name: ITEM_20150918_006481
text: This piece fits into the Chipped Sword.

name: ITEM_20150918_006482
text: Wood picked from the wood pile by Cahill.

name: ITEM_20150918_006483
text: Leather that can be used in a variety of ways. The age of the leather means that it can be used immediately.

name: ITEM_20150918_006484
text: A letter containing the heart of Moses Diesel.

name: ITEM_20150918_006485
text: Moses Diesel made these crutches for the village youngster Cahill.

name: ITEM_20150918_006486
text: The first material Ahylas Jonas requested to undo the seal.

name: ITEM_20150918_006487
text: An ingredient to make a Crystal Gem.

name: ITEM_20150918_006488
text: A crystal needed to release the seal of Ramstis Ridge

name: ITEM_20150918_006489
text: A research report lost by the new Royal Mausoleum researcher. Someone has stepped on it and blurred the characters. It's just barely readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006490
text: Could someone eventually find out the location of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance?

name: ITEM_20150918_006491
text: An antidote that can counteract Scorpion's poison. Let's bring this to Dezic.

name: ITEM_20150918_006492
text: It seems it will explode if it is touched. Be careful.

name: ITEM_20150918_006493
text: Meat gotten by slaying Infroburks. It looks tough.

name: ITEM_20150918_006494
text: It seems to use as a firewood.

name: ITEM_20150918_006495
text: Lydia Schaffen's tombstone piece regained from Cemetery Golems and Guri.

name: ITEM_20150918_006496
text: A piece of a broken tombstone found from a Sea Turtle. You have to put the pieces of tombstone together to see whose it is.

name: ITEM_20150918_006497
text: Finally restored the tombstone. What is in there?

name: ITEM_20150918_006498
text: A piece of Flurry's tombstone that a Tama picked up and ate.

name: ITEM_20150918_006499
text: Luggage filled with odds and ends.

name: ITEM_20150918_006500
text: A magical black powder made from coal that makes ink stick clearly onto parchment.

name: ITEM_20150918_006501
text: A material needed to open the sealed manual. Doesn't go out no matter how much you try.

name: ITEM_20150918_006502
text: The Holy Ark for holding souls has been broken. Will collecting its pieces be enough?

name: ITEM_20150918_006503
text: A monster's Small Crystal that the Suspicious Chair asked you to collect. To call it a crystal is a stretch, though.

name: ITEM_20150918_006504
text: The voice of a spirit sealed within the Sealed Stone. You can hear a faint whisper from it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006505
text: A crystal infused with magic to prevent the sealed spirit from escaping.

name: ITEM_20150918_006506
text: The Variation Mediator substance that the Variation Magician Furry Odd asked you to collect.

name: ITEM_20150918_006507
text: A crystal that has been carelessly burnt.

name: ITEM_20150918_006508
text: A burning charm. Because it was in a monster's stomach, it is wet and smells bad.

name: ITEM_20150918_006509
text: Silver dye used for Simon Shaw's tattoo. It is relatively easy to get.

name: ITEM_20150918_006510
text: A parchment given to you by Cordelier. Although black coal powder has been used on it, it is hard to see the letters because of the dark color.

name: ITEM_20150918_006511
text: The power source that moves the Red Infrorocktor. Grita, who can't use magic, needs it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006512
text: Needed to stabilize the Jewel of Prominence.

name: ITEM_20150918_006513
text: It contains instructions on how to eliminate the thorn vines. Familiarize yourself with it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006514
text: A crystal needed to remove thorn vines by holy power. It needs charging and refining to be used.

name: ITEM_20150918_006515
text: The remains of a Thornball. Burns well, even in the rain.

name: ITEM_20150918_006516
text: Some fluid with a sour smell that oozed out from a toenail.

name: ITEM_20150918_006517
text: A useful fluid for flushing out the mini Griba that has become a parasite on Greepelli's hair.

name: ITEM_20150918_006518
text: Adele treasures this ring. Let's get it back to Adele.

name: ITEM_20150918_006519
text: A strong acid solution that can melt through thorn stems.

name: ITEM_20150918_006520
text: An Operor's stinger that has the power to purify corrupted magic crystals.

name: ITEM_20150918_006521
text: A completely purified magical crystal. It can remove the thorn vines blocking the path.

name: ITEM_20150918_006522
text: A highly volatile sap. It is essential for burning away wet thorn vines.

name: ITEM_20150918_006523
text: A medicine effective in restoring one's mind.

name: ITEM_20150918_006524
text: A crystal of power gotten from defeating Corylus.{nl}It is used to make a crystal of light.

name: ITEM_20150918_006525
text: A crystal filled with enough energy to activate the underground enchantment.

name: ITEM_20150918_006526
text: A map that shows all of Sirdgela Forest. There are marks interspersed across the map.

name: ITEM_20150918_006527
text: Pollen used to exorcise evil spirits.

name: ITEM_20150918_006528
text: A latch used to tie down the handle of the cable car's lever.

name: ITEM_20150918_006529
text: A metal part shaped like a wheel that monsters had stolen. It is clearly a part of the cable car.

name: ITEM_20150918_006530
