text: Sweet tasting Plateau specialty sugar beets. Young animals love them.

name: ITEM_20150918_006531
text: Parts acquired from around the broken cable car

name: ITEM_20150918_006532
text: Good medicine for when the atmosphere becomes contaminated and hazy.

name: ITEM_20150918_006533
text: A Fragaras' resin is an effective exorcising material.

name: ITEM_20150918_006534
text: Ceremonial ropes that the Panto Magician was carrying around

name: ITEM_20150918_006535
text: A mane taken from the nape of a defeated Mushcaria

name: ITEM_20150918_006536
text: A legendary utensil used to defeat Gesti. Seems like it's not the right time to use this.

name: ITEM_20150918_006537
text: A legendary utensil used to defeat Gesti. It needs to be recharged before it can be used.

name: ITEM_20150918_006538
text: The legendary utensil that will be used for defeating Gesti. You are ready to use it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006539
text: A catalyst containing a Voodoo Doll. Activates the Voodoo Doll when used.

name: ITEM_20150918_006540
text: Counterfeit goods passed to you from Kevin. They're not finished.

name: ITEM_20150918_006541
text: Lowers the strength of monsters when used on them.

name: ITEM_20150918_006542
text: A piece broken off from the altar on the second floor of the Church.

name: ITEM_20150918_006543
text: When used, you become invisible to demons for 10 seconds. The effect disappears if you attack or take damage.

name: ITEM_20150918_006544
text: When used, a Divine Spirit appears and provokes nearby demons.

name: ITEM_20150918_006545
text: A special key for finding revelations and hidden places.

name: ITEM_20150918_006546
text: It creates an awakening effect if it is mixed with the Thorn Flower Powder Stimulant.

name: ITEM_20150918_006547
text: It has a better effect than the Thorn Flower Powder.

name: ITEM_20150918_006548
text: It has an awakening effect if mixed with a Merog's spit.

name: ITEM_20150918_006549
text: The materials that Elementalist Master requested to you in order to prove

name: ITEM_20150918_006550
text: A vessel to hold water enchanted with spiritual power.

name: ITEM_20150918_006551
text: An enemy that dies with this charm attached to it is supposed to be under our control but... It seems kind of shabby.

name: ITEM_20150918_006552
text: A jar filled with the magic energy that flows through the Royal Mausoleum.

name: ITEM_20150918_006553
text: Ingredient necessary to redecorate the obelisk. It has a high level of acidity.

name: ITEM_20150918_006554
text: Paralysis powder that can stun the Black Maize in Vieta Gorge.

name: ITEM_20150918_006555
text: Ingredient necessary for the paint used in painting inscriptions onto the obelisk. It's black in color.

name: ITEM_20150918_006556
text: An ingredient necessary to redecorate the obelisk.{nl}It's very sticky.

name: ITEM_20150918_006557
text: A scroll used to mark the divine symbol of a Paladin onto demons

name: ITEM_20150918_006558
text: The sacred energies of the shrine still infuse them.

name: ITEM_20150918_006559
text: The key to release Goddess Saule from the demon's confinement.

name: ITEM_20150918_006560
text: A balm used to repair Goddess Statue. It has an unusual, but gentle, scent.

name: ITEM_20150918_006561
text: A balm used to repair Goddess Statue. It has an unusual, but gentle, scent.

name: ITEM_20150918_006563
text: A permit needed in order for ships to enter the harbor. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006564
text: A necessary map for sailing. It describes the ocean currents and wind directions.

name: ITEM_20150918_006565
text: What kind of contract is this?

name: ITEM_20150918_006566
text: A body fluid sample extracted from a Moya

name: ITEM_20150918_006567
text: An arrow sample created by the Fletcher Master. It has good balance.

name: ITEM_20150918_006568
text: Wood that the Fletcher Master is looking for. It produces a fine timbre when knocked on.

name: ITEM_20150918_006569
text: A fishing rod made from a Fisherman's prized wood, from which you can hear a whistling sound. Check it out by breaking it open.

name: ITEM_20150918_006570
text: A simple tube that can shoot a neurotoxin dart

name: ITEM_20150918_006571
text: A special poison made from a Stoulet's bodily fluids. It only reacts with the neurotoxin dart used with the Simple Tube.

name: ITEM_20150918_006572
text: An easy tactic made for beginner Centurions, it is nonetheless difficult to remember without practice.

name: ITEM_20150918_006573
text: A flare mainly used by Scouts. Used to find hidden monsters.

name: ITEM_20150918_006574
text: A rubbing of Lydia Schaffen requested by the Quarrel Shooter Master for testing.

name: ITEM_20150918_006575
text: A jewel suffering from a very powerful curse. It seems to be continuously calling to someone.

name: ITEM_20150918_006576
text: Jar of fire obtained from Mothstems. Mothstems treasure them.

name: ITEM_20150918_006577
text: Blue Fisherman Bones. It too small to hold.

name: ITEM_20150918_006579
text: The beak of a Harpeia. It is very sharp.

name: ITEM_20150918_006580
text: When you're in a pinch, it helps you easily foil your foes. Pow!

name: ITEM_20150918_006581
text: A rope with a noose attached to it. Used for throwing and tying up enemies.

name: ITEM_20150918_006582
text: Letter of introduction that Sapper Master wrote to the Highlander Master

name: ITEM_20150918_006583
text: Confirmation from the Highlander Master that you accomplished all of the necessary requirements for advancement.

name: ITEM_20150918_006584
text: A crystal that holds Tanu's ability to purify.

name: ITEM_20150918_006585
text: Liquid extracted from Gorge Metoses. It is used as an ingredient in medicine used for alleviating mental illness symptoms.

name: ITEM_20150918_006586
text: Notes on the relic as dictated by Kepeck.{nl}Only the shape and size of the relics are noted.

name: ITEM_20150918_006587
text: A torn letter found from a dead body. Let's find a place to place the relics.

name: ITEM_20150918_006588
text: A scroll describing the secret moves of the legendary thief, Zubeck. Grants 1 Stat Point when used.

name: ITEM_20150918_006589
text: Gem containing an aura of fire. It will be helpful to the Goddess Gabija.

name: ITEM_20150918_006590
text: A herb that makes one feel languid.

name: ITEM_20150918_006591
text: A flower with a powerful fragrance. There is a rumor that souls inhabit this flower.

name: ITEM_20150918_006592
text: A bomb made to prevent monsters from advancing into Andale Village.

name: ITEM_20150918_006593
text: The chemical essence of the Languid Herb has been concentrated for use in this bomb.

name: ITEM_20150918_006594
text: A bait used to attract Sparnas. It made by lumping together old grains.

name: ITEM_20150918_006595
text: Supplies requested by the supplier to be delivered to the Danus' unit.

name: ITEM_20150918_006596
text: A pouch of supplies looted by Vubbes. Let's take these to Yukurt to investigate the odd behaviour of the Vubbes.

name: ITEM_20150918_006597
text: It's oil that reeks with a Ducky's scent.

name: ITEM_20150918_006598
text: Full of tools used to repair the scarecrow.

name: ITEM_20150918_006599
text: A marker found from Chapparition. The voices of the killed innocents echo from it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006600
text: A necklace that a ghost asked you to take to his younger brother. A modest pendant is attached to it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006601
text: A bag full of money. What was the Reaper doing with this?

name: ITEM_20150918_006602
text: The messenger's note. He told you not to read it but... Should we?

name: ITEM_20150918_006603
text: There are verses on it to appease the souls of those who died while researching the Royal Mausoleum.

name: ITEM_20150918_006604
text: A page torn from a book. It looks like the author is Shaman Show.

name: ITEM_20150918_006605
text: A pilgrim's mark swallowed by a monster. The owner is nowhere to be found.

name: ITEM_20150918_006606
text: Coben gave you this key, saying it opened a locked box. Let's look for this box.

name: ITEM_20150918_006607
text: The practice wood carving is completely broken.

name: ITEM_20150918_006608
text: The broken practice wood carving has fixed. It has been reinforced to be more durable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006609
text: Log required to fix the practice wood carving

name: ITEM_20150918_006610
text: Rope required to fix the scarecrow

name: ITEM_20150918_006611
text: An orb necessary to complete the spell that wakes the Sleeping Owls to aid Gaigalas.

name: ITEM_20150918_006612
text: Unstable holy utensil. It cannot be used in its current state.

name: ITEM_20150918_006613
text: Giant canine obtained from the Minotaur of Roxona Marketplace

name: ITEM_20150918_006614
text: Parts needed for a new trap devised by the Sapper Master.

name: ITEM_20150918_006615
text: A trinket belonging to the old Legwyn Family

name: ITEM_20150918_006616
text: A holy relic used by the Krivis as a symbol of their faith. Lost in the city by someone.

name: ITEM_20150918_006618
text: Offering envelope embossed with the Pardoner's Crest

name: ITEM_20150918_006619
text: Mali Seeds obtained from killing Malis.

name: ITEM_20150918_006620
text: A scroll to summon a Destructive Shaman Doll

name: ITEM_20150918_006621
text: Part of a broken enchantment used to protect Mazas' nest. Can it be restored?

name: ITEM_20150918_006622
text: A material that is needed to wake up the Nepenthes. It doesn't catch fire in its current state.

name: ITEM_20150918_006623
text: The fat of a Mallardu that was well preserved and will burn easily. Wake Nepenthes with it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006624
text: It must be gathered from the Nepenthes while it's alive for it to have any effect.

name: ITEM_20150918_006625
text: Secretion that can be used to attract Biteregina

name: ITEM_20150918_006626
text: An enemy killed with this charm attached to them will join your side!

name: ITEM_20150918_006627
text: The first revelation found in the Crystal Mine. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006628
text: Rodelin's eye. It is said to be able to erase an enemy's senses.

name: ITEM_20150918_006629
text: Material needed to create a Holy Bomb. It must be purified before it can be used.

name: ITEM_20150918_006630
text: Material needed to create a Holy Bomb. The purified result of a Vicious Essence.

name: ITEM_20150918_006631
text: Consuming this will prevent demons from detecting your presence!

name: ITEM_20150918_006632
text: The bomb with the sacred power. You can defeat Glizardon at once!

name: ITEM_20150918_006633
text: Once the scroll is used, one can distinguish which Hogmas are wearing necklaces.

name: ITEM_20150918_006634
text: On the back "To ...oved Rukl...s, Lydia." is visible.

name: ITEM_20150918_006635
text: A skirt hem obtained by defeating Pawndel and Pawnd. Material needed to make the Demon Transform Scroll.

name: ITEM_20150918_006636
text: A bucket used to hold water. Seems like a rope can be tied to it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006637
text: A very long rope. Seems like something can be tied to it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006638
text: Use this scroll to transform into Pawndel or Pawnd.

name: ITEM_20150918_006639
text: A Power Crystal processed and filled with the power of light. It can release the enchantment that binds the sealed church gates.

name: ITEM_20150918_006640
text: Old and muddy necklace dropped by someone long ago.

name: ITEM_20150918_006641
text: Wooden arrow used by High Vubbe Archers. It might be useful for kindling.

name: ITEM_20150918_006642
text: Ingredient necessary to make the Crude Divining Rod used to search for the First Tombstone Fragment. You need to collect a lot of them.

name: ITEM_20150918_006643
text: A divining rod used to search for the First Tombstone Fragment which has been hidden somewhere underground. Looks weak enough to be broken by even the slightest amount of force.

name: ITEM_20150918_006644
text: The sap of a stumpy tree requested by hawker Eden. Its powerful medical properties have made it a highly valued commodity.

name: ITEM_20150918_006645
text: A tool used to collect the sap of a Tree Ambulo.

name: ITEM_20150918_006646
text: The first part of the lost Ruklys monument

name: ITEM_20150918_006647
text: The second part of the lost Ruklys monument

name: ITEM_20150918_006648
text: The third part of the lost Ruklys monument

name: ITEM_20150918_006649
text: The fourth part of the lost Ruklys monument

name: ITEM_20150918_006650
text: The Fifth Tombstone Fragment is mixed into this pile of debris.

name: ITEM_20150918_006651
text: A finished part of the lost Ruklys monument

name: ITEM_20150918_006652
text: There are illegible words written on it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006653
text: The second revelation found in the Tenet Church. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006654
text: A package that Treasure Hunter Eden asked you to deliver to Epigraphist Raymond.

name: ITEM_20150918_006655
text: A fragment prepared so Epigraphist Schmid can easily restore it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006656
text: The first rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150918_006657
text: The second rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150918_006658
text: The third rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150918_006659
text: The fourth rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150918_006660
text: The fifth rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150918_006661
text: Experimental materials requested by Necromancer Drasius. Take it to Drasius.

name: ITEM_20150918_006662
text: Waterweed that grows in the Clearawl Brook. Drasius uses it when summoning powerful spirits.

name: ITEM_20150918_006663
text: If you defeat a Lizardman after using this stone, it will follow you.

name: ITEM_20150918_006664
text: If you defeat a Infroburk after using this stone, it will follow you.

name: ITEM_20150918_006665
text: A tool given to you by Hunter Talas to make rubbings of Lydia Schaffen's Monuments.

name: ITEM_20150918_006666
text: An arrowhead hardened by fire to be used against Infroburks.

name: ITEM_20150918_006667
text: Charcoal obtained from defeating a Long-Branched Tree. Touching it leaves a black stain.

name: ITEM_20150918_006668
text: A bomb that can light the Long-Branched Tree on fire.

name: ITEM_20150918_006669
text: A revelation that Bramble had. It's unreadable - let's take it to Goddess Saule.

name: ITEM_20150918_006670
text: It is said to be able to wake the sleeping Boowook.

name: ITEM_20150918_006671
text: A Zolem's Magic Stone needed to lure a Unicorn.

name: ITEM_20150918_006672
text: A trophy taken from a defeated Unicorn. Let's take it to the Fedimian Army Officer.

name: ITEM_20150918_006673
text: A cork stopper that was sealing the oil barrel.

name: ITEM_20150918_006675
text: A claw of a Rambear that lurks in the petrified city of Verkti Square.

name: ITEM_20150918_006676
text: A water bottle engraved with a password to find the grave robber Benjaminas hidden among the guards of the Petrified City of Verkti Square.

name: ITEM_20150918_006677
text: A map that looks ancient. It looks like it will crumble.

name: ITEM_20150918_006678
text: A fragrant stone powder obtained from monsters in the petrified city of Verkti Square.

name: ITEM_20150918_006679
text: Meat loaf that can be easily obtained from Kepo. However, you can't eat it as is.

name: ITEM_20150918_006680
text: The inner layer of bark dug out from a tree on the Starving Demon's Way. Don't eat too much of it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006681
text: An item exchanged between lovers as a symbol of their love. A cute music box that fits into a small pouch.

name: ITEM_20150918_006682
text: A piece of a Kepari's flesh torn off while hunting. The disgusting smell make it impossible to eat.

name: ITEM_20150918_006683
text: The leaf bud of an Asellu grown on the Starving Demon's Way. It has many practical uses in crafting and in medicine.

name: ITEM_20150918_006684
text: Unidentifiable food scraps. Can be used as monster bait. When a monster comes into sight, you can throw it by pressing the V key.

name: ITEM_20150918_006685
text: An energy source sprinkled by the Tree Root Crystal. These need to be collected to remove the contamination.

name: ITEM_20150918_006686
text: It reveals monsters that killed pilgrims with the Curse of Rage when sprayed on them.

name: ITEM_20150918_006688
text: A flower to be offered on the altar to soothe angry souls.

name: ITEM_20150918_006689
text: Water for cleaning plaster powder off after repairing the Goddess Statue. It is very clean.

name: ITEM_20150918_006690
text: Water from a small brook in the Forest of Prayer.{nl}It looks potable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006691
text: Dew gathered from a tombstone early in the morning. One might have qualms against it, but it can be drunk.

name: ITEM_20150918_006692
text: Medicine created by the pilgrim, Theophilis. He claims it will ward off curses.

name: ITEM_20150918_006693
text: The Succubus' eyes with the [Necklace of Greed - Stamina] lodged in it. Theophilis can probably extract the necklace if we take it to him.

name: ITEM_20150918_006694
text: A piece of a honeycomb that emits a strong and sweet scent.

name: ITEM_20150918_006695
text: An unidentified piece of a demonic stone that was put on the altar.

name: ITEM_20150918_006696
text: A piece of honeycomb that is sweet to the tongue.

name: ITEM_20150918_006697
text: The crystal of a spirit filled with a holy aura.

name: ITEM_20150918_006698
text: A scripture containing the power of sacred texts.

name: ITEM_20150918_006699
text: A scripture containing a bishop's soul.{nl}It's able to call up the bishop at any time.

name: ITEM_20150918_006700
text: A teardrop-shaped jewel.{nl}Required to find Maven's key.

name: ITEM_20150918_006701
text: A round jewel. Required to find Maven's key.

name: ITEM_20150918_006702
text: The first key of Maven. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

name: ITEM_20150918_006703
text: Keepsake of a guard who was petrified by the frost in the petrified city of Roxona Marketplace.

name: ITEM_20150918_006704
text: A backpack filled with tools necessary to start a farm.

name: ITEM_20150918_006705
text: A branch of a bee tree containing the power of Goddess Austeja.

name: ITEM_20150918_006706
text: The ash of a demon incinerated by Goddess Austeja's power.

name: ITEM_20150918_006707
text: An orb that can destroy demonic enchantments. You can gather magic by using it around Austeja's Altar.

name: ITEM_20150918_006709
text: Wood of the appropriate length and width to make a scarecrow. It will make an amazing scarecrow.

name: ITEM_20150918_006710
text: Curse energy that has been condensed.{nl}Spat out from a monster as it died.

name: ITEM_20150918_006711
text: The third revelation found in the Thorn Forest. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006712
text: The fourth revelation found in the Royal Mausoleum. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006713
text: It cannot be read yet. Take it to Saule for interpretation.

name: ITEM_20150918_006714
text: Tool used to make a rubbing of the petrified book found on Ruklys Street.

name: ITEM_20150918_006715
text: Tool used to find out the past disaster of Ruklys Street

name: ITEM_20150918_006716
text: A symbol originally decorating the Austeja Altar. It was broken during the monsters' attack.

name: ITEM_20150918_006717
text: A symbol containing Goddess Austeja's power, it has the ability to block demonic powers.

name: ITEM_20150918_006718
text: A package that the merchant Dulke lost.{nl}It contains sundry goods.

name: ITEM_20150918_006719
text: A sweet-smelling jelly that can bring the Spring Light Grass out from hiding.

name: ITEM_20150918_006720
text: Mysterious grass that arises from the ground when it smells honey.

name: ITEM_20150918_006721
text: The second key of Maven. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

name: ITEM_20150918_006722
text: The third key of Maven. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

name: ITEM_20150918_006723
text: The fourth key of Maven. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

name: ITEM_20150918_006724
text: The fifth key of Maven. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

name: ITEM_20150918_006725
text: Symbol than can supply magic energy to the Veinika altar. The magical energies of the altar have discharged over the long years.

name: ITEM_20150918_006726
text: A cloudy liquid with something trapped in it.{nl}Is it really a solvent?

name: ITEM_20150918_006727
text: He claims that taking this will give the user resistance against wicked energies... Let's test it out on monsters.

name: ITEM_20150918_006728
text: A herb needed to treat Naktis' curse.

name: ITEM_20150918_006730
text: Meat stuffed full of medicine that cures gluttony's curse. It must be force fed to cursed pilgrims.

name: ITEM_20150918_006731
text: An old document that describes how one can turn into a demon. Read what's inside.

name: ITEM_20150918_006732
text: A material needed to make a Demon Transform Scroll. A lot of it is needed.

name: ITEM_20150918_006733
text: A scroll that allows the user to transform into a demon at any time. The type of demon depends on the materials used to make it, however.

name: ITEM_20150918_006734
text: A key retrieved from a servant of Naktis.

name: ITEM_20150918_006735
text: Meat from a monster that can be dedicated to a sanctum. Because it's a lean part of the meat, it doesn't smell that much.

name: ITEM_20150918_006736
text: A crest that can find monsters that have eaten the sanctum's insignia.{nl}It's a symbol of the Cleric Master's faith.

name: ITEM_20150918_006737
text: The tough leather of a monster. Its toughness makes it watertight.

name: ITEM_20150918_006738
text: The sixth revelation found in the Great Cathedral. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006739
text: Literature regarding curses and the Demon Lord who controls them. It covers Naktis in depth.

name: ITEM_20150918_006741
text: A tasty candy ball made for the workers at the petrifed city in Kaliss

name: ITEM_20150918_006742
text: Memento of a soldier who died to the Petrifying Frost.

name: ITEM_20150918_006743
text: An ingredient requested by Bokor Edita in order to call forth spirits.

name: ITEM_20150918_006744
text: An elixir that, when used on petrified people, summons their spirits.

name: ITEM_20150918_006745
text: When used on a monster that is being petrified, it thaws them out.

name: ITEM_20150918_006746
text: A petrified sample of a monster in the process of being petrified.

name: ITEM_20150918_006747
text: A comparatively well-reserved record from the Ruklys Era.

name: ITEM_20150918_006748
text: A scroll that contains powerful magic that blocks all sound. Use it on Gargoyle.

name: ITEM_20150918_006749
text: A jewel that contains the energy of fire.

name: ITEM_20150918_006750
text: A jewel that holds an unstable flame spirit.

name: ITEM_20150918_006754
text: Lubricant for the machinery in a mine.

name: ITEM_20150918_006755
text: Parts of the 2nd Floor's Primary Purifier that was broken by monsters.

name: ITEM_20150918_006756
text: Parts of the 2nd Floor's Primary Purifier that was broken by the Petrified Whale.

name: ITEM_20150918_006757
text: Mead that shows the craftsmanship of the brewer.

name: ITEM_20150918_006758
text: Material requested by the Peltasta Master

name: ITEM_20150918_006759
text: Meat for feeding the breeding hawks. Hawks like it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006760
text: The bead that could accumulate the spiritual power. You could either accumulate the spiritual power or pull it out based on how you use it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006761
text: A broken piece of the Eyes of Truth. It can only be restored if you collect all the pieces.

name: ITEM_20150918_006762
text: This allows you to see the substance of a soul. Use it on a unsubstantial monster.

name: ITEM_20150918_006763
text: Has the power to attract wandering souls.{nl}It's necessary to find a condensed grudge.

name: ITEM_20150918_006764
text: A memo written by Hones about a teacher's said. You can know how to release the device installed at Underground Grave of Ritinis. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006765
text: A space magic stone fragment of the broken contract. In order to work correctly, it seems to need the restore operation.

name: ITEM_20150918_006766
text: When you collect more space magic stones, you will reach the hidden place of the master.

name: ITEM_20150918_006767
text: A magic stone used to move the Teleport. You can go a hidden place of the teacher.

name: ITEM_20150918_006768
text: A powder contained the spirit of holy purification gave by Vita. You can purify the evil spirit to use it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006769
text: Remains tied to the contract with the demons. Not free even in death.

name: ITEM_20150918_006770
text: The skeleton that is tied to the contract of the demons. It can't be free even after the death.

name: ITEM_20150918_006771
text: A seal that has the power to suppress all the magical power that Valius created in his lifetime.

name: ITEM_20150918_006772
text: Can be exchanged for a Velheider at the Companion Shop

name: ITEM_20150918_006773
text: Can be exchanged for a hawk at the Companion Shop.

name: ITEM_20150918_006774
text: The seal of Legwyn Family. It broke long time ago so only parts of it are remaining.

name: ITEM_20150918_006775
text: An unknown kingdom's military flag. The flag is too damaged to make out which army's it is.

name: ITEM_20150918_006776
text: A relic of one who died with such strong regret that you can still feel it. It is unknown what kind of person the owner was, or when and how that person died.

name: ITEM_20150918_006777
text: The monster who was the sign of a weak armor. Movement speed increased slightly.

name: ITEM_20150918_006778
text: The activation core of the petrification detector that Cryomancer Kostas asked you to retrieve.

name: ITEM_20150918_006779
text: Military supplies stolen from the Royal Army's guards by Dico Doguldan.

name: ITEM_20150918_006780
text: Rubbing of the petrified book on Ruklys Street

name: ITEM_20150918_006781
text: Supply covered with monster's odor. It smells terrible.

name: ITEM_20150918_006782
text: A powerful bomb that can make a big fuss after a certain time.

name: ITEM_20150918_006783
text: A sticky liquid that can attach even heavy items to anything.

name: ITEM_20150918_006784
text: A dangerous bomb that will explode soon after being thrown.

name: ITEM_20150918_006785
text: Bomb with a high power output. It is extremely loud.

name: ITEM_20150918_006786
text: A propaganda to encourage the surrender sprayed by Royal Army when the rebellion, 600 years ago.

name: ITEM_20150918_006787
text: Research on the Petrifying Frost requested by the Knights of Kaliss.

name: ITEM_20150918_006788
text: A lengthy advertisement noting the kingdom's honor and pride.

name: ITEM_20150918_006789
text: A mark containing Blut's power. He seems to have distributed them among his underling demons.

name: ITEM_20150918_006790
text: An orb that Kupole Arune used to interrogate demons. Hauberk's aid is needed.

name: ITEM_20150918_006791
text: A crystal blessed with spatial powers by Goddess Vakarine. It has been modified by Zydrone, so that humans can use it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006792
text: Hauberk's soul divided itself in order to escape.

name: ITEM_20150918_006793
text: A spectrum sphere created by Kupole Daiva to keep watch on demons. It can be used to find the hiding Hauberk.

name: ITEM_20150918_006794
text: A rune containing the power of Goddess Vakarine.{nl}It absorbs the souls of demons.

name: ITEM_20150918_006795
text: A trinket left by adventurers who entered the Demon Prison. It seems they were killed by demons.

name: ITEM_20150918_006796
text: A token fragment dropped from the Rada Seal. Evidence that Dionys spread riots after he lost his ego.

name: ITEM_20150918_006797
text: A claw found stuck in a demon. It looks like it was attacked by Dionys.

name: ITEM_20150918_006798
text: Kupole Sigita says that other demons will take this tooth as a warning.

name: ITEM_20150918_006799
text: Workers used to use this while constructing the Fortress of the Land. You can easily cause it to explode with fire.

name: ITEM_20150918_006800
text: A strong scented grass that attracts monsters. Rubbing this onto objects will make monsters surround the objects and protect them from danger.

name: ITEM_20150918_006801
text: Digested, severely Damaged Artifacts. They can only barely be recognized by their shape.

name: ITEM_20150918_006802
text: decisions that are found in the petrified monster prolonged exposure to frost. When processing occurs on the Petrifying Frost immunity for a while.

name: ITEM_20150918_006803
text: horsepower catalyst that can be obtained from monsters exposed to steam. It can be reacted in the vapor horsepower.

name: ITEM_20150918_006804
text: Formine Armor parts. It protects one's shoulders.

name: ITEM_20150918_006805
text: Formine Armor parts. It is used to pad one's back.

name: ITEM_20150918_006806
text: Formine Armor parts. The part that wraps around one's waist.

name: ITEM_20150918_006807
text: The tough root of a Red Large Kepa. An ingredient needed for the abdominal section of a front plate.

name: ITEM_20150918_006808
text: The leather of a Jukopus. It can be used to make the abdominal section of a back plate.

name: ITEM_20150918_006809
text: Kindling that was carried by monsters. The wood was dried out more than usual and is useful for maintaining a fire.

name: ITEM_20150918_006810
text: A rare, cold body fluid that can be found from monsters. Use it to cool the altar.

name: ITEM_20150918_006811
text: A bag containing a variety of alchemical tools.

name: ITEM_20150918_006812
text: A piece of paper that had been swallowed by a monster. It looks like someone's portrait.

name: ITEM_20150918_006813
text: A picture frame that had been swallowed by a monster. There is evidence that something was put in here before.

name: ITEM_20150918_006814
text: A scroll that allows you to teleport to the Pardoner Master. Even though it is available only when there is a problem with the sanctum, buying a lot of these would be unreasonable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006815
text: A strong rope obtained from a monster.{nl}It is useful to tie something with it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006816
text: Hardtack that was hidden in a grass pile by someone. There is dirt on it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006817
text: The leaf of a sweet herb. When chewed while taking a bitter medicine, it covers the taste with its sweetness.

name: ITEM_20150918_006818
text: A fully grown white radish freshly picked from the fields. It looks healthy, without blemish.

name: ITEM_20150918_006819
text: Timber that looks usable as firewood. Burn it in a pile in the magic circle.

name: ITEM_20150918_006820
text: Magic doll that Rimas gave to Arunas. It removes unusual energies when burned in a magic circle.

name: ITEM_20150918_006821
text: The bottle which Wizard Limas gave you. It is just a normal bottle.

name: ITEM_20150918_006822
text: A bottle one third of the way filled with the evil aura of an Ellum. It must be fully filled.

name: ITEM_20150918_006823
text: A bottle two thirds of the way filled with the evil aura of an Ellum. It is nearly full.

name: ITEM_20150918_006824
text: A bottle fully filled with the evil aura of an Ellum.

name: ITEM_20150918_006825
text: A bottle one third of the way filled with the evil aura of a Keposeed. It must be fully filled.

name: ITEM_20150918_006826
text: A bottle two thirds of the way filled with the evil aura of a Keposeed. It is nearly full.

name: ITEM_20150918_006827
text: A bottle filled with a Keposeed's wicked aura

name: ITEM_20150918_006828
text: The head of a small statue.{nl}What kind of statue could it be?

name: ITEM_20150918_006829
text: The torso of a small statue.{nl}Its hands are clasped together.

name: ITEM_20150918_006830
text: The lower half of a small statue.{nl}It is hard to identify due to its fragmentation.

name: ITEM_20150918_006831
text: The wings of a small statue.{nl}The wings don't seem avian.

name: ITEM_20150918_006832
text: A wooden hammer that is used to open kegs.{nl}Poorly made, it is not very durable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006833
text: Mucus that a monster spat out. Seems like it would make a good adhesive base.

name: ITEM_20150918_006834
text: Sack of grain retrieved from monsters.{nl}Some of it has been eaten.

name: ITEM_20150918_006835
text: A bitter drink that imbues its consumer with strength.

name: ITEM_20150918_006836
text: A wooden Rod cut from nearby structures.{nl}There are plans to make it into a weapon.

name: ITEM_20150918_006837
text: Leather obtained from monsters.{nl}It can be used to create a variety of weapons.

name: ITEM_20150918_006838
text: The pot that could accumulate the poison from monsters. It looks really old.

name: ITEM_20150918_006839
text: A plow for ploughing fields. It has a keen blade.

name: ITEM_20150918_006840
text: A spade for clearing weeds. It has a sharp point.

name: ITEM_20150918_006841
text: Farm equipment for making furrows. It has a sharp point.

name: ITEM_20150918_006842
text: Farm equipment for removing stones. It is well made.

name: ITEM_20150918_006843
text: Farm equipment for separating fields. It has a lot of sharp points.

name: ITEM_20150918_006844
text: The letter Horacius wrote for borrowing the farm equipment. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006845
text: A Niole pulled out to its roots.{nl}Its root and leaves can be used for consumption.

name: ITEM_20150918_006846
text: A magic stone made by Joana.{nl}They say it can be used to destroy magic circles.

name: ITEM_20150918_006847
text: A seed pouch stolen by monsters.{nl}There are nibble marks on it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006848
text: An unidentifiable lump of meat. Smells fishy.

name: ITEM_20150918_006849
text: Wing of an Orange Dandel. Seems flammable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006850
text: Part 2 of Varkis' research found at Dykyne Fork. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006851
text: Part 3 of Varkis' research found at Neck Cliff of Snake. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006852
text: Part 4 of Varkis' research found nearby Apati Cliff. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006854
text: Said to reveal monsters that have killed pilgrims under the Curse of Rage when sprayed on them. However, this is still experimental.

name: ITEM_20150918_006855
text: Monster have collected a variety of tools stolen from humans. It should be possible to find a rubbing tool here when searching properly.

name: ITEM_20150918_006856
text: It can turn body fluids into acids. Be careful not to touch it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006857
text: Body fluid of a monster that has turned into an acid. Handle it carefully.

name: ITEM_20150918_006858
text: A liquid extract obtained from Craute grass. Monsters like it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006859
text: Common bone powder. It can be used to make a sticky liquid that helps ink stick to surfaces.

name: ITEM_20150918_006860
text: A rubbing of a tombstone given to you by the aspiring Oracle Adrijus at Nuoridin Falls. It says, "The world for the dead of the dead should also exist". It was written by another Oracle-in-training a long time ago, so its importance isn't clear yet.

name: ITEM_20150918_006861
text: A crudely made shovel. It has poor durability and looks like it will break after a single use.

name: ITEM_20150918_006862
text: The container with full of lure traps that were given by Blacksmith. When you shake it, lure traps will fall from it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006863
text: A sticky liquid obtained from monsters. It can be used as an adhesive.

name: ITEM_20150918_006864
text: A bundle of dry brush gathered up. Looks like it would burn well.

name: ITEM_20150918_006865
text: A journal recorded by Eitbaras. It records the inscriptions on the tombstones at the Namu Temple Ruins.

name: ITEM_20150918_006866
text: A bone fragment from a Halloventor Archer. It can be used as an anti-rusting agent.

name: ITEM_20150918_006867
text: The metal plate that Eustace is looking for. Heavily rusted from sitting in the well for so long.

name: ITEM_20150918_006868
text: A cord and magnet that Eustace gave to you. If you attach the rope to the well's pulley system, you can get the metal plate at the bottom.

name: ITEM_20150918_006869
text: Rust powder scraped off a rusty metal plate. Some monsters will react to it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006870
text: A bubbling liquid. Mix it with an acidic solution to create a rust remover.

name: ITEM_20150918_006871
text: Corrosives given to you by Alwida. It can corrode metal plates.

name: ITEM_20150918_006872
text: A metal plate that was laid below vines. It's in good condtion.

name: ITEM_20150918_006873
text: A stick obtained from monsters. It's uniquely metallic.

name: ITEM_20150918_006874
text: A stone with an unusual aura. By rubbing it against a stick one can make a Detection Rod.

name: ITEM_20150918_006875
text: A Detection Rod that can find metal plates. Crudely made, and looks like it won't last long.

name: ITEM_20150918_006876
text: An essence crafted using the core of the Soul Compactor Terminal. Material used to craft the orb that will be used to destroy the Soul Compactor and also allows you to get the detonator for the orb.

name: ITEM_20150918_006877
text: Magical Orb and core of the Soul Compactor terminal crafted from the Soul Essence made by Svitri Gaila and a detonator. When used on the Soul Compactor, it will destroy it through the overloading of souls.

name: ITEM_20150918_006878
text: Keepsakes of the soldiers who came to repair the stone detection device.

name: ITEM_20150918_006879
text: The relics of soldiers who died protecting the Miners' Village.

name: ITEM_20150918_006880
text: Food that the Vubbes plundered in the Miners' Village. Some of it has been eaten.

name: ITEM_20150918_006881
text: Material required to compensate for the Peltasta's assistance.

name: ITEM_20150918_006882
text: Priest Yosana's research report. It contains information on the expression of curses. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006883
text: Priest Roana's research report. It contains information on lifting curses. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006884
text: Priest Prosit's research report. It contains information on the effects of curses and how they propagate. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006885
text: A relic that was once treasured by the Church has, unfortunately, been discarded across the Great Cathedral.

name: ITEM_20150918_006886
text: An orb that can detect holy power.{nl}It can help the user find the Graceful Relic.

name: ITEM_20150918_006887
text: A sample of a demon to solve the secret of the curse.

name: ITEM_20150918_006888
text: The sealed research report that describes the curses that Priest Yosana gathered together.{nl}The priest said it disappeared in an instant.

name: ITEM_20150918_006889
text: It can cleanse demonic fluids with the holy aura of the Great Cathedral. Try using it on demons.

name: ITEM_20150918_006890
text: A holy relic from the Church.{nl}It is said that it can hide its appearance when sensing nearby evil energy.

name: ITEM_20150918_006891
text: A curse that is constantly spreading.{nl}It can't be destroyed in the usual way.

name: ITEM_20150918_006892
text: A dagger which was placed on top of a piece of leather carved with a magic circle.{nl}Something about it feels ominous.

name: ITEM_20150918_006893
text: A Lizardman's sharp claw. The mysterious saplings react to it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006894
text: A soil sample collected from around the Farmer's Cabin. It is severely polluted.

name: ITEM_20150918_006895
text: A soil sample collected from around the Abandoned Workshop. It is severely polluted.

name: ITEM_20150918_006896
text: Body fluid extracted from an Orange Tama.{nl}It is used for druid purification ceremonies.

name: ITEM_20150918_006897
text: A small box found with seedlings. It's full of seeds.

name: ITEM_20150918_006898
text: A dirty bag. Miren's name is embroidered on the inside.

name: ITEM_20150918_006899
text: White fur cut from a Rambear.{nl}It's grey, as if it's been dirtied.

name: ITEM_20150918_006900
text: The root of a grape vine requested by Researcher Monahan. It looks healthy, unlike its stem.

name: ITEM_20150918_006901
text: Pieces of a Stumpy Tree's horn. The farm supervisor said he must have it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006902
text: An antidote that can heal the poisoned farmers.{nl}Get it to them as soon as possible.

name: ITEM_20150918_006903
text: A wooden branch containing druidic powers.{nl}It is said that it can subdue monsters.

name: ITEM_20150918_006904
text: A stone bowl filled with water.{nl}The strange aura it emits seems to attract monsters.

name: ITEM_20150918_006905
text: A golden necklace carved with the symbol of the Shaton family. It's covered in blood.

name: ITEM_20150918_006906
text: A medicine bag that Steward Valen ordered from Klaipeda. It contains the drug to cure an internal disease.

name: ITEM_20150918_006907
text: A monster sample requested by Researcher Gareth. Will this reveal why the crops have been suffering?

name: ITEM_20150918_006908
text: A monster sample requested by the Pyromancer.{nl}It is still warm.

name: ITEM_20150918_006909
text: An antidote that can heal the poisoned miners. The Hunter Master knows the recipe.

name: ITEM_20150918_006910
text: Leather carved with an unknown symbol.{nl}It looks like a magic circle.

name: ITEM_20150918_006911
text: A potion obtained from the Hunter Master. It makes an antidote when mixed with a Ridimed Leaf.

name: ITEM_20150918_006912
text: An ingredient to make an antidote.

name: ITEM_20150918_006913
text: Poison from an unidentified dagger. It seems to be related with the leather marked with a magic circle.

name: ITEM_20150918_006915
text: A device that controls the growth of monsters. It seems to also work on crops.

name: ITEM_20150918_006916
text: An antidote recipe written by the Hunter Master. Combine the detoxifying solvent with the Ridimed Leaf.

name: ITEM_20150918_006917
text: A sample of monsters that was requested by Pyromancer

name: ITEM_20150918_006918
text: It can suppress magic when set up in areas where there is strong magic.

name: ITEM_20150918_006919
text: The crystal which leads to a mysterious place.

name: ITEM_20150918_006920
text: A special potion that only Charlotte knows how to make. It causes plants to wither and die.

name: ITEM_20150918_006921
text: A censer in which Vaidotas has put in a special combination of incenses. The scent weakens Vubbes.

name: ITEM_20150918_006922
text: Chemical agents that cause Vubbes to hallucinate, preventing them from approaching the entrance.

name: ITEM_20150918_006923
text: A lump from a Moa, a predator of Pantos. It smells awful.

name: ITEM_20150918_006924
text: A Fisherman's eye. It feels like it's staring at you.

name: ITEM_20150918_006925
text: A dying essence found in an Ellom's body. It's sticky.

name: ITEM_20150918_006926
text: An Eye of the Soul that can see hidden souls. It was made by the Bokor Master by request from Knight-Commander Oscar, who was investigating the Klaipeda Market missing person incident.

name: ITEM_20150918_006927
text: A necessary ingredient to make the straw doll.

name: ITEM_20150918_006928
text: An orb prepared by the Bokor Master in order to soothe the souls of the unjustly slain people of the town of Andale.

name: ITEM_20150918_006929
text: An Orb of Comfort that has been fully filled. It can soothe the souls of the unjustly slain people of the town of Andale.

name: ITEM_20150918_006930
text: A magical tool of the Cryomancer Master. It can freeze even the soul of a monster.

name: ITEM_20150918_006931
text: A fragment of a monster's soul, solidified in a frosty crystal.

name: ITEM_20150918_006932
text: An orb made by Zubeck used to easily find his secret stash.

name: ITEM_20150918_006933
text: A script needed for repairing the sealed tower in the Uskis Arable Land.

name: ITEM_20150918_006935
text: A potion that the Royal Army had. Used when making a Resounding Bomb.

name: ITEM_20150918_006936
text: A bomb discovered in the Outpost area. Seems like it's become a dud.

name: ITEM_20150918_006937
text: A box with tools to safely remove bombs

name: ITEM_20150918_006942
text: bomb crafted to protect the camp from monster's attack

name: ITEM_20150918_006943
text: The materials to make the certification

name: ITEM_20150918_006944
text: Something helpful to safely pass the magic device.

name: ITEM_20150918_006945
text: The book of a soldier from Ruklys' army in the past. Lots of things are written on it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006946
text: A ring obtained from a soldier's relics

name: ITEM_20150918_006947
text: The fifth revelation found at the Mage Tower. Readable.

name: ITEM_20150918_006948
text: A sample of the poisonous wedge needle used to attack the monks. The Hunter Tracking Master might be able to identify it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006949
text: An antidote that the Hunters always have them with.{nl}It instantly cures a simple poison.

name: ITEM_20150918_006950
text: Ebonypawn's trap. It's in perfect condition.

name: ITEM_20150918_006951
text: A treasured sheet of Monk Wiley's scripture.{nl}It looks like they were scattered during the uproar.

name: ITEM_20150918_006952
text: A commonly found mushroom in the Thorn Forest.{nl}It seems it must be cooked in order to be edible.

name: ITEM_20150918_006953
text: A piece of a Rocktor's leg. Can be used in weapons due to its shape and hardness.

name: ITEM_20150918_006954
text: A thorn found on the Chafperor's forearm. Venom oozes from it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006955
text: A thorn tree that grows on wicked energies. Its thorns are poisonous.

name: ITEM_20150918_006956
text: Water from the spring. It's been contaminated with poison.

name: ITEM_20150918_006957
text: A bowl used to extract the poison out of the contaminated spring water. There's a hollow spot in which the poison collects.

name: ITEM_20150918_006958
text: A leaf attached to the head of a Woodluwa. It can be used as an ingredient for an antidote.

name: ITEM_20150918_006959
text: A medicinal herb that Chevas from the Bastille Company was looking for. He says it will aid against poisonous attacks.

name: ITEM_20150918_006960
text: It's an empty beehive without any honey in it. Where is the honey?

name: ITEM_20150918_006961
text: A sweet-smelling secretion from a Woodluwa. It can soften hardened honeycombs.

name: ITEM_20150918_006962
text: A large cap from the head of a liverwort plant. It exudes a strange smell.

name: ITEM_20150918_006963
text: A fragment that broke off a Stonecon. It twitches ever so slightly.

name: ITEM_20150918_006964
text: An old book from the grave of a dead man. Hunter Natasha may be able to find something of use from this book.

name: ITEM_20150918_006965
text: A letter found in an old book left behind by a dead man. It contains an order for an assassination as well as a confirmation of its execution.

name: ITEM_20150918_006966
text: An aquatic plant that grows in watery environments. It can filter and purify water.

name: ITEM_20150918_006967
text: A crystal ball found in a wooden box at the monastery. Used to activate the device in the prayer hall.

name: ITEM_20150918_006968
text: A strong potion used for removing odors. It has an antiseptic scent to it.

name: ITEM_20150918_006969
text: Scriptures that were scattered by rampaging monsters. Bring them to Mohaim.

name: ITEM_20150918_006970
text: A torch received from Higgith. It is used to cremate bodies.

name: ITEM_20151001_006971
text: - 8% chance to reduce damage by 50% when hit

name: ITEM_20151001_006973
text: A core that was used as a power source. Improper handling may result in a massive explosion. {nl}Obtained from Shaman Dolls.

name: ITEM_20151001_006974
text: A core that was used as a power source. Improper handling may result in a massive explosion. {nl}Obtained from Black Shaman Dolls.

name: ITEM_20151001_006976
text: A cotton good for heat insulation. {nl}Obtained from Shaman Dolls.

name: ITEM_20151001_006978
text: A lot of work was put into all of this research data.

name: ITEM_20151001_006983
text: The first book written about the Roxona Civil War. It appears readable.

name: ITEM_20151001_006985
text: The second book written about the Roxona Civil War. It appears readable.

name: ITEM_20151001_006986
text: A record of the Ruklys Era. It's hardly readable.

name: ITEM_20151001_006989
text: A food pouch given by the Falconer Master.

name: ITEM_20151001_006991
text: Supplies that were secretly delivered by the Monk Master.

name: ITEM_20151001_006993
text: A book with some of the Pardoner Master's transactions recorded in it.

name: ITEM_20151001_006995
text: A plant monster sample for a study requested by the Druid Master.

name: ITEM_20151001_006997
text: It purifies evil energy with the power of the Romuva.

name: ITEM_20151001_007000
text: A locked box, found while exiting Astral Tower, that has several things inside of it.

name: ITEM_20151001_007002
text: A dark blue herb capable of neutralizing a paralysis-inducing poison.

name: ITEM_20151001_007004
text: Obtained from the demons of Demon Lord Hauberk around the Sutatis Trade Route.

name: ITEM_20151001_007006
text: The soul of Demon Lord Hauberk dwells within this fragment. It can be used to neutralize demons.

name: ITEM_20151001_007008
text: A potion made by Agailla Flurry to fulfill a promise to Demon Lord Hauberk. It's impossible to determine its function through name alone.

name: ITEM_20151001_007010
text: Paint requested by Pardoner Erikas for the Scroll of the Dead.

name: ITEM_20151001_007012
text: An item containing magic that can weaken the power of blessed items.

name: ITEM_20151001_007014
text: According to Pardoner Erikas, this scroll can be used to communicate with the souls of the dead. Use it nearby the tomb of Galius Legwyn.

name: ITEM_20151001_007016
text: An incense that can lead one to the memories of the spirits. Used for the Scroll of the Dead.

name: ITEM_20151001_007018
text: A pile of gum plant stems. They can be used to recall a spirits from beyond the grave.

name: ITEM_20151001_007020
text: A blessed crystal which will allow you to return to Pardoner Erikas' forest.

name: ITEM_20151001_007022
text: This fragment contains a piece of Demon Lord Hauberk's soul. Hauberk left it temporarily as a sign of his trust.

name: ITEM_20151001_007023
text: A voodoo doll that Rimas gave to Arunas.{nl}When burned in a magical circle, it removes the evil aura.

name: ITEM_20151001_007025
text: Parts to fix the petrification detector at Coastal Fortress. Pray for the lives of the volunteer soldiers.

name: ITEM_20151001_007027
text: A core containing spirit energy. Bring it to Svitrigaila.

name: ITEM_20151001_007029
text: The last breath that a monster took before it was petrified.

name: ITEM_20151001_007031
text: A barrier stone core that was able to be condensed. Using it during synthesis allows you to use another material as a detonator.

name: ITEM_20151001_007032
text: Magical orb made from a magical core and a detonator. Using it to aggravate spirit energy will cause the energy to overload and explode.

name: ITEM_20151001_007034
text: A monster that converts its food into an oil that glows in the water it lives in.

name: ITEM_20151001_007036
text: An oil that Noctiluca Scintillans produces from their food.

name: ITEM_20151001_007038
text: Moss that glows in the daytime. You can easily see it on rocks.

name: ITEM_20151001_007040
text: A thick liquid that can be obtained from any monster.

name: ITEM_20151001_007042
text: The first pillar piece, engraved with Romuvan patterns.

name: ITEM_20151001_007044
text: The second pillar piece, engraved with Romuvan patterns.

name: ITEM_20151001_007046
text: The third pillar piece, engraved with Romuvan patterns.

name: ITEM_20151001_007048
text: The fourth pillar piece, engraved with Romuvan Patterns.

name: ITEM_20151001_007050
text: A stone that's been dug up. It could be used to repair the sanctuary if it's refined.

name: ITEM_20151001_007052
text: Stone materials used to repair the sanctuary.

name: ITEM_20151001_007054
text: A powder that is used in fireworks or other flares. Often obtained from monsters.

name: ITEM_20151001_007056
text: Many people report all kinds of engraved words in these pieces.

name: ITEM_20151001_007058
text: It is said that holy water from the Nestos will protect the sanctuary from demons.

name: ITEM_20151001_007059
text: A notice board that was passed from Gerda. Put it on the place you've heard of.

name: ITEM_20151001_007061
text: A scroll thats provides you the same benefits as a Kedorlaomer Merchant.

name: ITEM_20151001_007063
text: A divine object which Jurate looked for. It was lost due to Medzio Diena. Only the merchants can read the intaglios that are written on it, which some contain prophecies and regulations. What's written on it is actually becoming a reality.

name: ITEM_20151001_007066
text: This will help you find sacred items.

name: ITEM_20151001_007068
text: A special ink contained within a glass bottle. This special ink was vital for important documents. When important documents needed to be hidden, this ink was used. It's been tossed away and buried since Medis Diena.

name: ITEM_20151001_007070
text: A paper that is likely to contain the records of the Kedorlaomer Merchants. You cannot see clearly what is written on it since monsters used to have it.

name: ITEM_20151001_007072
text: A trap for capturing monsters. As soon as it's placed, it'll start to attract the attention of monsters.

name: ITEM_20151001_007077
text: This, combined with water, can be used as a mortar to build up stones.

name: ITEM_20151001_007080
text: A transparent shell obtained from monsters. It's thick, and doesn't allow water to pass through it.

name: ITEM_20151001_007082
text: Sturdy leather strap obtained from monsters. It's difficult to write in books until you bind them with this.

name: ITEM_20151001_007084
text: Lump of Sturdy Strings for Bookbinding

name: ITEM_20151001_007085
text: The string to bind a book which was made with sticky liquid obtained from a monster.

name: ITEM_20151001_007087
text: A page that contains the records of the Rud Merchants.

name: ITEM_20151001_007088
text: The research materials which Gedas talked about. The amount is enormous.

name: ITEM_20151001_007090
text: The leather of an Orange Lizardman. It might show a reaction to the mysterious seedlings.

name: ITEM_20151001_007092
text: An ingredient that is needed for making a Resounding Bomb. It makes a lot of noise depending on how you use it.

name: ITEM_20151001_007093
text: A bomb carried by the kingdom army guards to face against the monsters.

name: ITEM_20151001_007094
text: It is not destructive, but it makes a lot of noise.

name: ITEM_20151001_007096
text: An old unexploded bomb that was discovered in the outpost area.

name: ITEM_20151001_007098
text: A box containing the tools that to disassemble a bomb.

name: ITEM_20151001_007099
text: You found the Ruklys Army Seal from the monsters. You better show it to Wilhelmina Carriot.

name: ITEM_20151001_007100
text: You have obtained the parchment from the monsters. You better show it to Wilhelmina Carriot.

name: ITEM_20151001_007102
text: Wood made of adequate sizes to set a barricade.

name: ITEM_20151001_007107
text: The bones of a demon. It's a required material to make something to bind a soul with.

name: ITEM_20151001_007109
text: It is used to restrain spirits.

name: ITEM_20151001_007110
text: The Owl Sculpture created by the Dievdirbys Master.

name: ITEM_20151001_007112
text: The parts that are required to repair equipment.

name: ITEM_20151001_007114
text: This item is required to activate the magic circle.

name: ITEM_20151001_007117
text: A memo written by the soldiers of Ruklys.

name: ITEM_20151001_007122
text: A document written about the device to resist against the demons at the Fortress Battlegrounds.

name: ITEM_20151001_007123
text: Revelation of Fortress of the Land

name: ITEM_20151001_007124
text: The seventh revelation found in the Fortress of the Land. Readable.

name: ITEM_20151001_007126
text: A horn that is used when making an order to retreat

name: ITEM_20151001_007128
text: Matches that you have received from Sigis. They are useful for cremating the dead.

name: ITEM_20151001_007129
text: A doll from the grave keeper that possesses magic.

name: ITEM_20151001_007130
text: A soul stone that absorbs the thoughts of the resurrected dead when they were alive.

name: ITEM_20151001_007132
text: A stone that has the property to burn easily. You should be careful so that the flame doesn't get on it.

name: ITEM_20151001_007133
text: This is the token of the religious body of the tree of the truth.

name: ITEM_20151001_007135
text: A list that contains the names of the manor owners at the Kaliss region. You will need a bonfire to burn it.

name: ITEM_20151001_007137
text: A black crystal that was obtained from the resurrected dead. It's a trace of the evil magic that resurrected the dead.

name: ITEM_20151001_007139
text: A part of the list of the manor owners which Carlyle hid. Currently unreadable.

name: ITEM_20151001_007146
text: The paralysis powder that you have received from Leja. When you sprinkle this powder, you can temporarily paralyze a Ferret.

name: ITEM_20151001_007148
text: Food that was was stolen by ferrets.

name: ITEM_20151001_007150
text: Fruit juice extracted from of a gigantic fruit that a ferret obtained. It is in the container made up of fruit peels.

name: ITEM_20151001_007152
text: Corrupted water from an old well. When you drink it, you will suffer pain.

name: ITEM_20151001_007153
text: A sculpture of peace carved by Dievdirbys Widas. When you place it, the ferrets around you will be calmed.

name: ITEM_20151001_007155
text: Grass that makes someone drowsy. You should be careful not to lose your consciousness.

name: ITEM_20151001_007157
text: A scent created by Druid Leja using the herb. When you spread the scent, the ferrets nearby will become unconscious.

name: ITEM_20151001_007159
text: The objective to activate the shrine is written on one of the magical circle shrines.

name: ITEM_20151001_007161
text: Trifelium hair that was taken off as a whole with the leather. You feel warmth by just looking at it

name: ITEM_20151001_007163
text: Among black rocks from the plain, there are many of them that can be used as flints.

name: ITEM_20151001_007165
text: A message from the Mesafasla army to the Stogas squad.

name: ITEM_20151001_007167
text: You would be able to eat it after cooking it.

name: ITEM_20151001_007169
text: These are the main food of the people living in the plateau region.

name: ITEM_20151001_007171
text: It looks like it can be used as a caltrop if you polish it well.

name: ITEM_20151001_007173
text: Unlike its appearance, it is effective in reducing fever.

name: ITEM_20151001_007175
text: Although it doesn't look sharp, it is still a decent handknife to peel off barks from trees.

name: ITEM_20151001_007177
text: When there is no food, you should at least consume this to survive.

name: ITEM_20151016_007178
text: - 5% chance to inflict [Burn] on an enemy for 10 seconds

name: ITEM_20151016_007190
text: A costume fitting for any activity, whether it's for looking into a crystal ball, for knitting or for swinging a weapon.

name: ITEM_20151016_007192
text: Permanently increases your HP by 50. {nl}Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20151016_007194
text: Increases your AoE attack ratio by 3 for 20 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 60 seconds.

name: ITEM_20151016_007196
text: Increases your AoE attack ratio by 3 for 25 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 60 seconds.

name: ITEM_20151016_007198
text: Increases your AoE attack ratio by 3 for 30 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 60 seconds.

name: ITEM_20151016_007200
text: Increases your AoE attack ratio by 3 for 35 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 60 seconds.

name: ITEM_20151016_007202
text: Increases your AoE attack ratio by 3 for 40 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 60 seconds.

name: ITEM_20151016_007203
text: When a demon loses its power, it will also lose its hair, but it may remain in rare circumstances. {nl}Obtained from Elma.

name: ITEM_20151016_007204
text: A rare leather. Even if you find Harugal, you should overcome the danger to obtain this. {nl}Obtained from Harugal.

name: ITEM_20151016_007205
text: Although it's not thick, its density is high, so it is heavy. {nl}Obtained from Minos.

name: ITEM_20151016_007206
text: The research materials from Gedas. After you have completed the quest of Gedas, right-click to use it.

name: ITEM_20151016_007229
text: A bandage soaked in divine water

name: ITEM_20151016_007231
text: A crystal that emanates a unique light. {nl}Obtained from the monsters at Galeed Plateau.

name: ITEM_20151016_007232
text: Oil of the monsters that creates the mysterious light.

name: ITEM_20151016_007234
text: A scroll thats provides you the benefits of the Kedora Merchant Alliance.

name: ITEM_20151016_007236
text: Instructions used for teaching newcomers of the Kedora Merchant Alliance. It is written with ink made of with the blood from monsters.

name: ITEM_20151016_007239
text: A material to make a certification. It looks delicious.

name: ITEM_20151016_007241
text: A material to make a certification. The energies of the earth were absorbed from a monster.

name: ITEM_20151016_007242
text: The egg of the monster. It's an ingredient to make the Restraint Token.

name: ITEM_20151016_007243
text: The bones of a demon. What are these for?

name: ITEM_20151016_007245
text: An orb that can make a person feel uncomfortable. It absorbs the vitalities of demons.

name: ITEM_20151016_007246
text: Forcibly restrain a spirit from the Ruklys Era.

name: ITEM_20151016_007248
text: A sack containing the owl sculpture that was created by the Dievdirbys Master. It should be assembled.

name: ITEM_20151016_007250
text: A required component to repair the device of Ruklys. Look for similar components.

name: ITEM_20151016_007253
text: The paralysis powder that you have received from Leja. When you sprinkle this powder, you can temporarily paralyze a ferret...

name: ITEM_20151016_007256
text: Fruit juice extracted from of a gigantic fruit that a ferret obtained. It is in the container made up of fruit peels.

name: ITEM_20151016_007257
text: A sculpture of peace carved by Dievdirbys Widas. When you place it, the ferrets around you will be calmed.

name: ITEM_20151016_007258
text: A scent created by Druid Leja using the herb. When you spread the scent, the ferrets nearby will become unconscious.

name: ITEM_20151016_007259
text: The orb that was left by the Goddess Laima. You've received the message from Goddess Laima to rescue Goddess Lada.

name: ITEM_20151016_007261
text: Nothing is written on this scroll. As requested by Benes, you should write the behaviors of the ferrets on it.

name: ITEM_20151016_007263
text: A transformation scroll that Benes gave to you. When you use it, you can transform into a ferret.

name: ITEM_20151016_007265
text: A piece of wood that mutated into an appearance of a child due to the spell of Druid Benes.

name: ITEM_20151016_007267
text: A terrible scent that was given by Druid Benes. When you spread it, the ferrets will run away.

name: ITEM_20151016_007269
text: The blood of a demon that you have obtained from a demon. When you sprinkle it on the device of absorbing vitalities, the device will break.

name: ITEM_20151016_007271
text: A scroll of purification created by the Orsha Master. It can purify the earth that is corrupted by the evil energy.

name: ITEM_20151016_007273
text: A seed of the Earth Flower. When you plant it, it will absorb the energy of the earth and the flower will grow.

name: ITEM_20151016_007275
text: A flower of the earth full of vitalities that grew on the land. You can feel its strong vitality.

name: ITEM_20151022_007277
text: Ever since the very first Paladin did, many people throughout the ages have guarded the Tenet Church. All those years of accumulated experience have been drawn upon to create this combination of power and convenience.

name: ITEM_20151022_007278
text: Most attempts at keeping plants in check with other plants after Medzio Diena have failed, but after the ability to drain the energy of plant monsters of a certain fern was discovered, it has been applied to weapons.

name: ITEM_20151022_007279
text: Equipment specialized against beast monsters have developed due to the environment of the Lucas Region. It is rare for a region to be as untouched by the Great Plant Cataclysm as Lucas, and this scarcity became the basis on which this equipment was produced.

name: ITEM_20151022_007280
text: It is uncommon for Kingdom fortresses to be built with wood or dirt. As such, it is a nuisance in strongly fortified regions when the stones or minerals that form castles become monsters and thus require effective weaponry when such incidents occur.

name: ITEM_20151022_007281
text: Agailla Flurry decided to leave one recipe in celebration of completing the epitaph. The recipe, which was all but forgotten for hundreds of years after her death, was only reevaluated after Medzio Diena. Only now the effectiveness of Flurry's recipe against insects is being highlighted.

name: ITEM_20151022_007282
text: The exact origins and creator of this weapon recipe are unknown. Some speculate that it was created by a nameless master, but most experts think that it was created incognito by someone famous due to certain circumstances.

name: ITEM_20151022_007283
text: One does not have to be a priest to embark on a pilgrimage. As long as they look up to the goddess and are on pilgrimage, it matters not if they are mage, archer, or of other professions. Of course, it helps if the weapon they are used to is threatening to demons.

name: ITEM_20151022_007284
text: In a certain period of history, the Istora region was famous as a retirement place for scholars. There was a temporary exchange of various academics in the region achieving new inventions and discoveries. The Istora Sword is one of those achievements.

name: ITEM_20151022_007285
text: The aim of the sacred pact centered around the Tenet Church is the eventual defeat of the Demon Queen. It is said that the creators of this sword prayed that it would be able to gravely wound the Demon Queen.

name: ITEM_20151022_007286
text: Magical application of the stealing energy from competing plants and secretion of harmful substances to weapons is a very difficult task. The fact that it succeeded in less than three years shows the urgency of the situation.

name: ITEM_20151022_007287
text: Regions with relatively less plant growth after Medzio Diena saw an increase in beast activity. This equipment is the result of such regional developments.

name: ITEM_20151022_007288
text: The stones and other material used to build the 3 layer castle wall near the capital rarely mutated into monsters. This was thanks to precautions against various catastrophies dating back to the founding of the kingdom. However, castles in other regions did not have such measures and now require weapons against monsters after Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20151022_007289
text: Agailla Flurry devised a magical weapon that had two advantages in which a non-mage could use it and would exhibit it's true value after Medzio Diena. However, it is still uncertain if she foresaw Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20151022_007290
text: There is a theory that even those who like to throw wild guesses approach with caution. The theory that the original creator of the Krag Sword, based on the techniques applied and when it was first produced, is Ruklys.

name: ITEM_20151022_007291
text: Despite the goddesses interacting with humans in numerous places, it was only natural for the places where they had been or performed miracles to overlap or converge. The production and spreading of goods for those people was inevitable.

name: ITEM_20151022_007292
text: According to certain radicalists, Istora weapons are said to utilize source energy of goddesses. There is no definate proof to their claims.

name: ITEM_20151022_007293
text: The aim of the sacred pact centered around the Tenet Church is the eventual defeat of the Demon Queen. The development of easy to handle weapons that are deadly to demons is only reasonable.

name: ITEM_20151022_007294
text: The application of plant regulation effects based on plants on to blunt weapons is even more difficult. It may weaken the weapon before being used on an enemy.

name: ITEM_20151022_007295
text: The Lukas Rod is one of the earliest applied examples of magic being used to fight beasts in this region.

name: ITEM_20151022_007296
text: Weapons made from weaker materials must be empowered with stronger magic as many Mutant-type monsters are relatively robust.

name: ITEM_20151022_007297
text: Insect monsters before Medzio Diena were few and less ferocious. Those were the good old days where a mage could make do with a simple magically enhanced weapon.

name: ITEM_20151022_007298
text: The people who support the Ruklys origin theory of this weapon say that Ruklys created them in order to give them to his diverse followers. The people that oppose the theory say that although Ruklys is indeed a talented warrior, he lacks the broad experience needed create different weapons.

name: ITEM_20151022_007299
text: Demons were the largest obstacle for pilgrims even before Medzio Diena. These weapons had become a dependable method of defense for pilgrims that could not afford bodyguards.

name: ITEM_20151022_007300
text: The opinion that Istora weapons are linked to divine power originating from the goddesses instead of magic or natural power is refuted by the fact that the weapon demonstrates its abilities against Mutant-type monsters.

name: ITEM_20151022_007301
text: The bowcrafters were once proud that their bow was created in an independent way and had nothing to do with the Astral Tower.

name: ITEM_20151022_007302
text: To craft this bow requires the effort of waiting for the moment a fern blooms at a special time in a place nobody can see. As a matter of fact, all magic that changes the life of a fern into death has roots in such custom rituals.

name: ITEM_20151022_007303
text: According to some, this weapon reacts to the unique scents of animals.

name: ITEM_20151022_007304
text: Projectile weapons must be crafted so the body itself becomes the magic source and continuously transfers energy and makes it so that the user does not need to be involved directly in the process. It is better if the weapon can recover magic on it's own instead of having to put in ample amounts of magic.

name: ITEM_20151022_007305
text: According to some, Agailla Flurry said that even Demon Lord Diena would have been easily defeated if this bow had been in the hands of Lydia Schaffen. Of course it would not be completely ineffective even in the hands of someone else.

name: ITEM_20151022_007306
text: Some say that the reason there is no record of Lydia Schaffen evaluating this bow is because the bow and the recipe did not exist at the time. They say that it is unlikely that, given her personality, there would not be any criticism if the recipe existed during Ruklys. Therefore, they argue that all of these Krag items are later designs.

name: ITEM_20151022_007307
text: Even weapons as light as bows can deal enormous amounts of damage to Mutant-type monsters. If they are Istora weapons.

name: ITEM_20151022_007308
text: The Tenet Crossbow is the most recently designed and produced weapon by the Tenet Church members.

name: ITEM_20151022_007309
text: Before Medzio Diena, the ritual of watching the ferns blooming was thought to been for fulfilling wishes or good luck, but all aspects of human life have completely changed since then.

name: ITEM_20151022_007310
text: This weapon reacts to the slightest movement of the target after hitting it. However, only the finest movement is required making the delay almost non-exinstant.

name: ITEM_20151022_007311
text: Not all Philis weaponry was crafted based on the same magic. In this case, the projectile damages the cause behind the mutation instead of containing magic harmful to the monsters.

name: ITEM_20151022_007312
text: Scholars must receive some credit for the resurgence of Flurry's recipe after Medzio Diena. Their tireless exploration and the advancements in epigraphy were some of the reasons the recipe was revitalized and how the weapon could be realized at an opportune moment.

name: ITEM_20151022_007313
text: The Krag Crossbow is mainly thought to have appeared in Lydia Schaffen's latter years thanks to her records. However, some say that it had existed before that time but had not been mentioned by her.

name: ITEM_20151022_007314
text: The Pilgrim Crossbow was the weapon of choice for pilgrims that were better off. It is only human nature to want to be able to attack from further and more easily than you can with a magic rod.

name: ITEM_20151022_007315
text: The Istora region was once famous as a retirement place for scholars and thanks to their intercourse, saw many discoveries and inventions that are still being improved to this day. In the case of the Istora crossbow, that improvement happened after Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20151022_007316
text: The Tenet Mace is the base of all weaponry related to the Tenet Church. It existed since the first Paladin and is the first weapon which was infused with magic that would later be used on other weapons.

name: ITEM_20151022_007317
text: Some say that the goddesses had hidden mysterious powers in ferns long ago, and think that is why fern observing rituals before Medzio Diena and applying power to weapons after Medzio Diena is possible. No in depth research has been done by theologians or priests despite the ritual being ancient.

name: ITEM_20151022_007318
text: Wild animals are frequently encountered enemies for novices and pilgrims. They must be tamed by magic if they cannot be swayed by the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20151022_007319
text: Some priests think that weapons used against Mutant-type monsters should be crafted with diverse materials. The complicated process of metal reinforcement, filling it with divine energy and infusion of magic are applied simultaneously to this weapon.

name: ITEM_20151022_007320
text: Recipes for maces have been passed through time without being lost. The main reason behind this is because there is a strong atmosphere considering anything related to the legends Maven amongst priests. Thanks to that atmosphere, there were records of Flurry's recipe allowing it to utilized.

name: ITEM_20151022_007321
text: Some believe the weapon has the power to break boulders because of the name.

name: ITEM_20151022_007322
text: It is the weapon of choice for priests when starting a pilgrimage. Whatever the reason may be, there is a definate tendency amongst priests to be comfortable with and prefer maces.

name: ITEM_20151022_007323
text: Opinions are emerging saying that scholars should also help resolve the catastrophies Medzio Diena brought as artifacts such as the Istora Mace are being brought back into the light.

name: ITEM_20151022_007324
text: It is difficult to infuse magic to separable weaponry. It is also hard for ordinary people to figure out if the magic used to fight demons is infused in the shaft or head of spears.

name: ITEM_20151022_007325
text: The magic symbol Koru is hidden on this spear in the form of a fern sprout. Sprouts have long been symbols of great religious import.

name: ITEM_20151022_007326
text: It is inadvisable to use this weapon for hunting even though it may cause greater damage to beasts. It has always been safer to rely on traps and snares when hunting.

name: ITEM_20151022_007327
text: It is said that masters of this weapon can remove it from monsters after throwing it from a great distance and attack with it again. Some however point out that this combat style is inefficient.

name: ITEM_20151022_007328
text: Unfortunately, parts of the Escanciu Spear recipe have been lost. However, substituting the unknown ingredients with others based on different weapons still created the desired effects. The only problem is that it is unkown if they are the ingredients that Flurry first thought of.

name: ITEM_20151022_007329
text: There is no doubt that this weapon is a great help in hunting monsters no matter the circumstances that caused the creator to hide behind the name Krag.

name: ITEM_20151022_007330
text: Wild animals are as much of an obstacle to pilgrims as demons. The spear used to be chosen as it is effective against both enemies, requires less care than projectile weapons and can also be used as a cane.

name: ITEM_20151022_007331
text: According to some theories, the Istora Spear had an original form unlike different Istora weapons which became the roots on which other Istora weaponry was invented.

name: ITEM_20151022_007332
text: It was crafted with the durability to withstand charging Mutant-type monsters.

name: ITEM_20151022_007333
text: Insectoid monsters occasionally attack from the air. Therefore, users of this weapon must prepare against air attacks from insectoid monsters.

name: ITEM_20151022_007334
text: The largest weakness of theory that Krag weapons were crafted by Ruklys is that it cannot explain the fact that the weapon would not be named as such if it had been crafted prior to the betrayal, and that there would not have been enough time to craft it afterwards.

name: ITEM_20151022_007335
text: A weapon that clearly shows that pilgrams truly come from all walks of life. Those that are not afraid of becoming burdens may opt to choose this weapon.

name: ITEM_20151022_007336
text: The Istora Pike is said to be the first Istora weapon to be crafted from methods discovered from the Istora Spear.

name: ITEM_20151022_007337
text: Weapons based on the Tenet Church were not all conceived at the same time. The staff was crafted relatively late when compared to it's simplicity, and was completed when efforts to maintain different ingredients that have different magic retention times succeeded.

name: ITEM_20151022_007338
text: Death was already immanent within the rapid growth behind the explosive increase of plants. It draws as near as life force is used for rapid growth and magic gained from ferns has the same effect on plants.

name: ITEM_20151022_007339
text: Though it may seem contradictory, the people that assited the most in crafting this weapon to be effective against beasts are people that had professions related to the care of animals.

name: ITEM_20151022_007340
text: Infusing magic against Mutant-type monsters is more difficult than one may think. It must repress the tendency of objects trying to mutate after Medzio Diena as well as being susceptible to magic as a weapon.

name: ITEM_20151022_007341
text: Some theorize that the reason Agailla Flurry thought of crafting a weapon effective against insectoid monsters is because nobody had bothered to do so before her.

name: ITEM_20151022_007342
text: Those that support the Ruklys origin theory say that the name was changed as he had been declared as a traitor. However, they cannot explain why the name Krag was chosen.

name: ITEM_20151022_007343
