text: There are numerous locations in the kingdom which contain legends and stories of the goddesses as they have been with us for a long time. It is only natural for there to be pilgrims traveling to those locations and seek measures to make it a safer journey.

name: ITEM_20151022_007344
text: There are some that believe that Mutant-type monsters receive more damage from Istora weapons because they are go against the laws of nature.

name: ITEM_20151022_007345
text: - All Cryomancer skills level +2{nl}  - 15% chance to inflict [Freeze] on an enemy for 3 seconds when attacking with an Ice property skill

name: ITEM_20151022_007347
text: Thanks to the resurgence in Istora weaponry, some scholars in the Istora region have invented radically new weapons. This weapon is a representative sample.

name: ITEM_20151022_007355
text: - All Fencer skills level +2{nl} - 3% chance of inflicting additional Holy property damage

name: ITEM_20151022_007356
text: Long ago, a goddess suggested the crafting of objects to the other goddesses. Most of the goddesses that heeded their colleague's suggestion mainly did so out of amusement, but the goddess that suggested it meant to leave the objects containing the divine powers of the goddesses in the world for the generations to come. One of those arrangements are these gloves

name: ITEM_20151022_007357
text: A long time ago, several goddesses made objects containing divine power for their own amusement. It is said that they did so in the Goddess' Ancient Garden but it is difficult to know if this is true. Whatever the case may be, the objects crafted at the time, such as these boots, are still proving their worth.

name: ITEM_20151022_007358
text: The fact that the authority of the goddesses is indirectly being used against enemies through the objects they crafted carries great significance even if the goddesses did not put their heart and souls into crafting them.

name: ITEM_20151022_007359
text: Long ago, when the goddesses crafted mystical objects for their amusement in the Goddess' Ancient Garden, some were crafted by coating existing ones with their divine power. These clothes are such examples.

name: ITEM_20151022_007360
text: It is uncertain if whether the Goddess' Ancient Garden where these gloves were crafted indicates the same location as the Goddess' Ancient Garden known today. Whatever the location may be, the gloves were certainly made in the Goddess' Ancient Garden.

name: ITEM_20151022_007361
text: The fact that there are no separate recipes for Ogva equipment is indirect proof that indicates that the origins lie with the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20151022_007362
text: Of the many theories, the theory that Laima was the first goddess to propose the crafting of Ogva equipment to the goddesses is the most convincing.

name: ITEM_20151022_007363
text: It is unknown if the Goddess' Ancient Garden in which Ogva equipment was said to have been crafted indicates the same location that is known today or how long ago the events took place. However, it is widely believed that it took place before written history.

name: ITEM_20151022_007364
text: Some believe that there is an all powerful piece of equipment that contains extreme amounts of divine power based on the fact that Ogva equipment is completed by the goddesses' divine power and spend their lives trying to find it. Of course, all such efforts resulted in failure and it is unknown if there actually is such a piece of equipment. However, those searches did result in the discovery of previously unknown equipment such as these gloves.

name: ITEM_20151022_007365
text: We cannot know which powers were given to the various pieces of equipment by certain goddesses long ago in the Goddess' Ancient Garden. However, we can make assumptions. These boots most likely have the divine power of Zemyna.

name: ITEM_20151022_007366
text: Some complain that the goddesses should have given this piece of equipment better durability and strength when compared to others.

name: ITEM_20151022_007367
text: It is unknown how Ogva equipment were spread and revealed to the world. However, too much time has passed to find those origins.

name: ITEM_20151022_007368
text: There have been attempts to control plants with other plants since Medzio Diena. These pieces of equipment are one of the successfully applied cases of those attempts.

name: ITEM_20151022_007369
text: It is a difficult task to magically apply the self protection substances of ferns to weapons after Medzio Diena. The goddesses must be thanked for the fact that those efforts succeeded.

name: ITEM_20151022_007370
text: There are two methods in crafting magical equipment. One is to follow the recipe from the beginning and the other is to infuse pre-existing equipment. It is the latter in the case of this piece of equipment.

name: ITEM_20151022_007371
text: It was relatively easy to apply the magic derived from ferns that saw explosive growth after Medzio Diena to offensive equipment. There are cases where the effects changed or weakened in the case of protective equipment such as in the case of this outfit.

name: ITEM_20151022_007372
text: The effort of waiting for the moment a fern blooms in a special place where noone can see is required to craft these gloves. The patience and concentration is rewarded by the gloves enhancing the accuracy of the wearer.

name: ITEM_20151022_007373
text: The ritual of watching a fern bloom before Medzio Diena was thought to be a custom for wish fulfillment or good luck, but just like all life has changed afterwards, is now a method of applying magic to protective equipment such as this.

name: ITEM_20151022_007374
text: Some are of the belief that the fern observing rituals and the reason that power can be applied to equipment after Medzio Diena is because the goddesses hid mystical powers in ferns long ago. No in depth research has been done by theologians or priests despite the ritual being ancient.

name: ITEM_20151022_007375
text: The magic symbol Koru is hidden on this outift in the form of a fern sprout. Sprouts have long been symbols of great religious import.

name: ITEM_20151022_007376
text: The individual rings that comprise these gloves have been crafted through the application of magical powers symbolized by fern buds. Magical equipment with this sort of power may not be craftable if the vegetation abnormality disappears one day.

name: ITEM_20151022_007377
text: All vegetation that saw explosive growth after Medzio Diena possess some degree of life and energy absorption. To apply this ability to equipment and allow it to absorb energy from the earth is a very difficult task.

name: ITEM_20151022_007378
text: Magic extracted from ferns can be made to possess either light seeking or shunning characteristics. However, it is made to resist darkness even if it is theoretically possible to make it resist light due to cost and practicality reasons.

name: ITEM_20151022_007379
text: There was a time when Divdirbys master Tesla used to roam the kingdom. Some pieces of magic equipment have tales of his travels. People usually accept such legends even though it is uncertain how the sculptor priest Tesla influenced the crafting of these gloves.

name: ITEM_20151022_007380
text: There is a legend of Tesla crafting these boots after being pricked by a thorn in the foot whilst passing Sirdgela Forest. Whether the forest was filled with thorns or if Tesla really crafted the boots after such an experience is not important. Nobody has gone to ask Tesla even though he is alive and well.

name: ITEM_20151022_007381
text: Sirdgela equipment is full of legend and story. Some say that these pants were crafted with cloth woven from thread gathered from brambles. There are many people that are fond of the figure of the lonely girl who makes thread from brambles regardless of whether those tales are true or not.

name: ITEM_20151022_007382
text: Those that like to seek the stories related to magical items say that these robes were crafted when Tesla decided become a priest as well as an ordinary sculptor. The psychology of people whom like to attach mystical stories to Sirdgela equipment is a field worth researching.

name: ITEM_20151022_007383
text: The reason Sirdgela equipment has more diverse and mystical stories than other magical equipment may be influenced by the unique environment of being a Thorn Forest. However, if that is the case, it means that all the stories are from after Medzio Diena making them works of fiction.

name: ITEM_20151022_007384
text: According to legend, there were many soldiers going missing in or near Sirdgela, and these boots were crafted by the families and friends looking for their lost ones.

name: ITEM_20151022_007385
text: Developments in the use of leather gained from wild animals that have always infested Sirdgela Forest are said to have been the origins behind this outfit.

name: ITEM_20151022_007386
text: It is said that many wild animals existed in Sirdgela even before the increase of monsters after Medzio Diena. These gloves are said to have existed since then.

name: ITEM_20151022_007387
text: Although this is only one of the many theories that surrounds Sirdgela equipment, it is said that these boots have been traditionally crafted in the Sirdgela region to traverse rough terrain.

name: ITEM_20151022_007388
text: It becomes evidence of an item being crafted long ago in a different environment if magical properties that are unrelated to the weather of a location is infused with equipment.

name: ITEM_20151022_007389
text: Philis Gloves are said to have had more magic before Medzio Diena. The reasons behind the weakening of magic after the collapse of the 3 layer castle wall on Medzio Diena remains unknown.

name: ITEM_20151022_007390
text: Philis equipment is characterized by it's ability to provide it's wearers with pleasantness in closed environments.

name: ITEM_20151022_007391
text: This equipment, which used to be the full-dress uniform of the guards of the 3 layer castle wall, had special magical treatment for reasons only known by the leading members of the army. However, it seems that those reasons will be difficult to figure out as all the high ranking officers are dead.

name: ITEM_20151022_007392
text: The regulation issued uniforms of the guards of the 3 layer castle wall were produced in various forms according to their needs. These gloves were produced with ordinary siege warfare in mind.

name: ITEM_20151022_007393
text: The regulation issued uniforms of the guards of the 3 layer castle wall were produced in various forms according to their needs. These boots were produced with ordinary siege warfare in mind.

name: ITEM_20151022_007394
text: Unlike other pieces of Philis equipment, this piece did not exist before Medzio Diena. It was recently infused with magical properties out of necessity.

name: ITEM_20151022_007395
text: It was only issued to the outer wall guards during the early years of the kingdom. It was thought to be useful under the assumption that the outer wall was taken. It was later issued to all 3 walls as tactics and weapons of siege warfare changed.

name: ITEM_20151022_007396
text: It is the most useful equipment with magical properties not only all castle guards including those on the 3 layers. It has existed as a favorite of many guards for a long time.

name: ITEM_20151022_007397
text: This was equipment issued to guards, especially those that were in charge of attacking with fire on the 3 layer castle wall. An interesting theory that is brought up even now is that those guards may have been able to stop the catastrophic growth of vegetation from the capital which is now in ruins.

name: ITEM_20151022_007398
text: Although it is a strange phenomenon, the activities of mages and production of magical items is relatively active in the Allerno Barony when compared to other fiefs. This phenomena has increased dramatically after Medzio Diena and these gloves have appeared in such circumstances.

name: ITEM_20151022_007399
text: The increase in magical items in the Allerno barony is hard to explain especially when it has always been an agricultural region. Whatever the reason may be, the people fighting in the region can attribute these boots to that phenomenon.

name: ITEM_20151022_007400
text: At first glance, it may not seem strange that there are many magical items such as this outfit because there has been an influx of mages to the Allerno barony. However, this is not the truth and the increase in magical items and new inventions are being caused by something else.

name: ITEM_20151022_007401
text: Some mages tried to find if whether the new appearances of magical items in the Allerno region is due to demons but failed to do so. Items that resist darkness such as this are proof that the theory is unlikely.

name: ITEM_20151022_007402
text: Whatever the reason behind the sudden appearance of items may be, they are actively gathering and issuing such items to men in Allerno barony. This may be the reason behind mounting conflicts between the residents and soldiers in the region.

name: ITEM_20151022_007403
text: It is certain that the Allerno region is being magically influenced from the outside. Although it may not be an impressive amount, the fact still stands that these boots regardless of their performance show new methods of magic infusion.

name: ITEM_20151022_007404
text: Another strange point about the magical items that have appeared in the Allerno region is that the mages that come here do not seek them. The items that are discovered are being used by residents or soldiers.

name: ITEM_20151022_007405
text: The current lord of Allerno has hired mages and craftsmen in order to further enhance the equipment that already has strong defensive powers. It is said that such moves are hiding other reasons.

name: ITEM_20151022_007406
text: If the lord of Allerno did not simply hire the mages and craftsmen to enhance the magical equipment, there is a chance that his goal may be connected to why such items are suddenly appearing.

name: ITEM_20151022_007407
text: The lord of Allerno wishes that rarer and stronger magical items will be discovered in his lands. While greed is also behind such thinking, it is also difficult to reproduce the items that have been discovered.

name: ITEM_20151022_007408
text: The lord of Allerno is trying to wear this equipment after enhancing it. It is said that he hired mages and craftsmen for this very reason.

name: ITEM_20151022_007409
text: There are cases of divine power residing in items that had been carried by priests for a long time. Perelin gloves were crafted as a successful result of trying to have these happenings occur reliably when needed.

name: ITEM_20151022_007410
text: There are cases in which the divine power of goddesses indwells and shows new powers in trivial items that poor pilgrims were carrying on their pilgrimage. Equipment with the name Perelin are such items.

name: ITEM_20151022_007411
text: It cannot be known what type of protection is indwelling in which pilgrim's items. However, there is some regularity even though generalities have not been discovered. Otherwise, these items would not be able to have the name Perelin.

name: ITEM_20151022_007412
text: Many different kinds of experiments are enacted in order to craft Perelin items. The most widely known experiment was to have the pilgrims wear the equipment until divine power resides in it. The results indicate that this does not increase the chance of divine power indwelling in the equipment.

name: ITEM_20151022_007413
text: There are increased chances of items becoming Perelin items in the case of making pilgrims perform various tasks whilst wearing the equipment such as these gloves. However, it cannot be seen as a precise recipe as the exact moment that they receive divine power is unknown.

name: ITEM_20151022_007414
text: The effects of Perelin items do not disappear even if given to other people after realizing that they have become Perelin items during the pilgrimage. There is no firm principle behind the creation of Perelin items even though pilgrims that have had a piece of equipment turn into Perelin items before usually are able to have more.

name: ITEM_20151022_007415
text: Inquiries of whether pilgrims living pious lives makes the authority of goddesses reside in items and whether the creation of items with even more profound abilities is possible is still ongoing. It is only natural if taking the tough living conditions after Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20151022_007416
text: It is unknown why such phenomena occurs to pilgrims instead of pious priests that stay in one place. It is made even more unclear by the fact that there are certain cases proving otherwise. The most simple answer is that everything is done in the will of the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20151022_007417
text: Although it may seem obvious, these Perelin gloves appear frequently on Paladins.

name: ITEM_20151022_007418
text: Perelin items do not always appear on priests. There are numerous cases in which Perelin gloves have appeared on warrior type believers.

name: ITEM_20151022_007419
text: The principle behind the natural appearance of Perelin items may never be realized. However, people keep trying to find it thanks to the divine protection that they provide.

name: ITEM_20151022_007420
text: According to legend, the first person to obtain Perelin equipment was the first Paladin master. However, it is unclear if this is the truth as the Tenet Church refuses to verify such trivial stories.

name: ITEM_20151022_007421
text: Many mages have crafted numerous magical items in the mage tower since Agailla Flurry's death. Most of the creators are anonymous despite several of the items still being used to this day. These are designated as Turn equipment.

name: ITEM_20151022_007422
text: Turn equipment have nothing more in common than the fact that they have their origins in the Mage tower. They are simply named as such due to the need to indicate equipment from the tower after Flurry.

name: ITEM_20151022_007423
text: Some Turn equipment is suspected to have been made by the same mage due to the similarities in their effects. As in the Turn pants and the Turn robe. But the possibility that they may have been crafted by different mages of different times can't be ruled out.

name: ITEM_20151022_007424
text: There was a time when the mages of the Mage Tower after Flurry's death isolated themselves from the world and focused on their experiments and research. Although there were many whimsical inventions during that time, the only partially practical inventions that remain are these Turn gloves.

name: ITEM_20151022_007425
text: According to some, Turn equipment may have had better power in the beginning. However, there are no remaining items or recipes due to the reclusive nature of mages. Most of the equipment left has about the same amount of magic as these boots.

name: ITEM_20151022_007426
text: There are several cases where they were created out of necessity of mages. It is said that Turn leather pants were created on the spot to protect mages when conducting experiments with lightning.

name: ITEM_20151022_007427
text: There are several cases where they were created out of necessity of mages. It is said that Turn leather tunics were created on the spot to protect mages when conducting experiments with lightning.

name: ITEM_20151022_007428
text: Some Turn equipment has been reinforced or applied in various ways while being used outside of the Mage Tower. The first known case of such enhancements are these gloves.

name: ITEM_20151022_007429
text: There was a time where metallic equipment was not crafted because of the many experiments conducted by mages after Flurry's death. Therefore, the existing metallic Turn equipment may have originated from mages but have been completed by anonymous contributors outside of the Mage Tower.

name: ITEM_20151022_007430
text: Unlike other metallic Turn equipment, Turn plate leggings are being crafted by mages. It is said that they were used when mages were attempting to fly.

name: ITEM_20151022_007431
text: Metallic equipment was not made for centuries after Flurry's death because there was a shortage of metals thanks to the many experiments conducted by mages. As such, even though the existing metallic Turn equipment may have originated from mages, the actual craftsmen are anonymous people from outside the Mage Tower.

name: ITEM_20151022_007432
text: The Druid Master from Shaton and tried to make the region safer after Medzio Diena by providing or helping the crafting of equipment. There are cases in which non-combatant farmers have received help from these gloves.

name: ITEM_20151022_007433
text: The Druid Master is sending several of her disciples to Shaton to perform various tasks not only out of the love of her hometown but also becuase it is related to her Nature Restoration Plan. The local residents are imitating a few of the simple magic equipment that are used to keep the disciples safe.

name: ITEM_20151022_007434
text: The Druid Master does not put restrictions on the Shaton locals imitating the magical equipment that she provided. Therefore, some are being used by people from neighboring regions or explorers, such as these pants.

name: ITEM_20151022_007435
text: People being harassed by monsters after Medzio Diena require easily obtainable magical equipment. However, such support is not easy to receive due to several complications. The situation is bad enough that sometimes soldiers fighting monsters on the front lines are not able to obtain equipment they need. The fact that the Druid Master is using her power and resources for the Shaton region is a small but noble act.

name: ITEM_20151022_007436
text: Shaton equipment provides diverse amenities for the livelihood of the locals even if they do not fight monsters. Even farmers and lumberjacks need to be accurate.

name: ITEM_20151022_007437
text: Some settlers from the Shaton region have disappeared with the equipment. It is unclear if they made a run for it after obtaining equipment or have fallen victim to monsters. Both are equally as likely to have happened. The fact that many of those that have disappeared are people that have obtained boots suggests a certain possibility.

name: ITEM_20151022_007438
text: The percentage of settlers in the Shaton region being burned while working has decreased dramatically after this outfit has been issued.

name: ITEM_20151022_007439
text: The Druid Master also freely gave help to the nobles of the Shaton region. As a result, the nobility of Shaton was able to increase their survivability when combating monsters.

name: ITEM_20151022_007440
text: Some express their concerns that the way the Druid Master unconditionally gave magical items to the Shaton nobility might have been a bad idea. They argue that metallic equipment such as these leggings need not have been provided. In the end however, what is more important is whether the people using the equipment do so with good or bad intentions.

name: ITEM_20151022_007441
text: There are some of the belief that it is more important that people are protected from monsters even if they are abusing the Druid Master's goodwill. Such people praise the Druid Master for providing metallic armor.

name: ITEM_20151022_007442
text: Many people have found various means to donate to the Tyla Monastery which is a historic religious facility. Those donations became the foundations to the emergence to magical equipment unique to the Tyla Monastery.

name: ITEM_20151022_007443
text: Some of the Tyla Monastery equipment was improved with the consent of the original donor. Many people could receive the benefits of such equipment because the Tyla Monastery does not monopolize these items.

name: ITEM_20151022_007444
text: The equipment made by the wealth and magical equipment donated to the Tyla Monastery helped people greatly when the surrounding region became a thorn forest. Of course the people that benefited the most were the monks of the Monastery.

name: ITEM_20151022_007445
text: The reason why the Tyla Monastery receives particularly more contributions and donations is because it has historically been more lenient towards rulebreakers. The Tyla Monastery has treated sinners and lawbreakers alike gently focusing on reformation instead of punishment in accordance to the Monastery's traditions.

name: ITEM_20151022_007446
text: Tyla Monastery has been able to play it's role as a strict self-sufficient religious belief community for priests for a long time without losing sight of the original ideals thanks to it's principles of being strict towards monks and tolerant of outsiders. As such, some magical equipment here has been used in everyday life instead of combat as can be similarly observed in other regions. This is the representative example of such equipment.

name: ITEM_20151022_007447
text: Meeting goddesses before Medzio Diena was not uncommon. Even so, criminals who were shameful of their past deeds wished the Tyla Monastery would be a window between themselves and the goddesses and the many that were reformed donated to the Monastery providing the foundations of current Tyla Monastery equipment.

name: ITEM_20151022_007448
text: Even equipment that may have been thought to be useless due to the climate of Tyla Monastery became useful after Medzio Diena. This piece of equipment is such a case.

name: ITEM_20151022_007449
text: Even the royal family is on the donator list of Tyla Monastery. Many people can wear good metallic equipment thanks to the fact that the Monastery does not hesitate even in distributing royal gifts if useful to the people.

name: ITEM_20151022_007450
text: Tyla Monastery was generous in the distribution of all magical equipment they deem can be useful to the people since the royal family did not attach any strings when gifting equipment to the monastery. That is how many people have benefited from these boots.

name: ITEM_20151022_007451
text: This piece of equipment has become much more important after the expansive growth of the Thorn Forest near the Tyla Monastery after Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20151022_007452
text: It is said that this equipment used to have different magical properties. They say that different magical properties were infused after Medzio Diena because of the expansive growth of the Thorn Forest.

name: ITEM_20151022_007453
text: The costumes have remained invariably faithful to tradition for the past thousand years.

name: ITEM_20151022_007459

name: ITEM_20151022_008304

name: ITEM_20151022_008333

name: ITEM_20151022_008335

name: ITEM_20151022_008337

name: ITEM_20151224_009640

text: Collected pages of Priest Irma's Journal.

name: ITEM_20151224_009647
text: A note found in a smoking bundle of grass. Half of the content is burnt.

text: A drug created coincidentally from Germeja's failure. The monsters will fight against each other if it's used on them.

name: ITEM_20151224_009649
text: A note left by Priest Gelija. This might be the decisive clue since Gelija is so thorough.

name: ITEM_20151224_009650
text: A whistle that can call Jolly to your location.{nl}Blow the whistle if Jolly is too far away.

name: ITEM_20151224_009652
text: The blood of monsters found in Rohonsa Cliff. Is it contaminated due to the demons?

name: ITEM_20151224_009654
text: A bag filled with medicine and bandages.

name: ITEM_20151224_009655
text: A red crystal once held by demons. It wouldn't be out of the question to feel threatened by it.

name: ITEM_20151224_009656
text: A wood piece held by demons emitting a corruptive energy. Can it drive out the curse?

name: ITEM_20151224_009657
text: A mysterious pack held by every demon. It might be related to the curse.

name: ITEM_20151224_009658
text: A mysterious pack held by every demon. Using it seems to be the only way to find out what it does. Here goes nothing!

name: ITEM_20151224_009661
text: Twinkling pearl powder prepared by the Priest Auranas. It can be used on demons...

name: ITEM_20151224_009663
text: A demon's plans thwarted by bishops and priests who risked their lives to stop them. It cannot be read due to it being written in the demon's language.

name: ITEM_20151224_009665
text: It's filled with medicines and bandages.

name: ITEM_20151224_009667
text: A cloth blessed by Priest Gelija with holy water to remove fragments from the statue of Marnox.

name: ITEM_20151224_009669
text: A map left by Urbonas which was found in Paupys Crossing. A certain area of Ashaq Underground Prison 1F is marked.

name: ITEM_20151224_009676
text: An orb that was just barely restored.

name: ITEM_20151224_009686
text: It's acidic enough to dry up plants.

name: ITEM_20151224_009688
text: This seems to be the herb described by Ash as having small leaves.

text: A shirt belonging to a traveling merchant. Rose would see fit that Laswi smells it. It has a sour smell.

text: A scroll with nothing written on it. Observe the ferrets like Benes requested and write down their behavior patterns on this scroll.

name: ITEM_20151224_009735
text: A purification scroll made by the Druid Master. It is said to purify grounds contaminated with evil energy.

name: ITEM_20151224_009736
text: A pendulum used to find hidden objects. It sometimes seems to react when hunting monsters.

name: ITEM_20151224_009737
text: It seems one might be able to easily find stones to use as flints in the plateau's black boulders.

name: ITEM_20151224_009740
text: Tusks are a Pokuborn's main weapon. They look like they could be used to make shields.

name: ITEM_20151224_009744
text: A magical item used to count the number of enemies defeated in combat. Peltasta use it to pass their advancement test.

name: ITEM_20151224_009746
text: Just plain wormwood. Its bitter taste will give you a hard time if you try to eat it.

name: ITEM_20151224_009747
text: Like its name suggests, it works as a great remedy to stop hemorrhages.

name: ITEM_20151224_009749
text: A flower that blooms only at night. It offers anti-inflammatory effects.

name: ITEM_20151224_009751
text: A chisel for stonecrafting made by the blacksmith in Orsha for the Submaster.

name: ITEM_20151224_009754
text: A mysterious crystal given by the Krivis Submaster with a request to purify monsters.

name: ITEM_20151224_009755
text: The energy of the Sadhu Master is crystallized here.

name: ITEM_20151224_009756
text: Traces left by Hoplites using monsters for training.

name: ITEM_20151224_009757
text: Damanged Hoplite armor parts left behind after a fierce battle.

name: ITEM_20151224_009758
text: A type of drug said to be drunk by Barbarians during their training period. Those who drink it deliberately will have their strength reduced. The effects of the drug can be canceled at will.

name: ITEM_20151224_009760
text: Papayams are known to have a distinctively greasy pulp.

name: ITEM_20151224_009761
text: A holy relic cursed with an energy that attracts demons. How many more relics will be cursed?

name: ITEM_20151224_009763
text: A disc found in the Wandering Sanctuary.{nl}It's said to sometimes glow a red light.

name: ITEM_20151224_009765
text: An unidentified fragment.{nl}It glows an ominous red light.

name: ITEM_20151224_009767
text: Requested by Samsonas as tribute to offer to the goddesses. Could this be considered a proper tribute?

name: ITEM_20151224_009769
text: A diary partially burnt by fire. A lot of it is damaged, which makes it difficult to read.

name: ITEM_20151224_009770
text: Note With Content From Burnt Diary

name: ITEM_20151224_009771
text: A note containing the only legible parts of the burnt diary.

name: ITEM_20151224_009773
text: A painting partially burnt by fire. It portrays a bizarrely-shaped object similar to a gem and an unknown monster.

name: ITEM_20151224_009775
text: A special herb that exudes a very particular smell. It is said to be used in erasing traces of people's scent.

name: ITEM_20151224_009777
text: A material used as bait to attract Hydras.{nl}Could Hydras really like this meat?

name: ITEM_20151224_009779
text: A plant that grows a yellow flower. It can be chewed in case of emergency as it offers strong painkilling effects.

name: ITEM_20151224_009781
text: Grease made from monster lard. Highly flammable.

name: ITEM_20151224_009783
text: A highly flammable lard. It becomes even more flammable after being refined.

name: ITEM_20151224_009785
text: Tribute to be offered to a suspicious obelisk.{nl}It contains monster meat.

name: ITEM_20151224_009787
text: A sparkly blue fragment discovered in Sicarius.{nl}It looks like it would be used to activate a device.

name: ITEM_20151224_009789
text: A sparkly red fragment discovered in Sicarius.{nl}It looks like it would be used to activate a device.

name: ITEM_20151224_009791
text: A key made of sparkly blue fragments.{nl}Used to activate a certain device.

name: ITEM_20151224_009793
text: A compass able to read spells. It can be used to find objects containing protection spells.

name: ITEM_20151224_009794
text: An orb given by Mihail. It can be used to store the magic of defeated monsters.

name: ITEM_20151224_009795
text: An orb filled with magic. Mihail intends to use it to blow up the magic supply device.

name: ITEM_20151224_009797
text: An amulet prepared by Melchioras.{nl}It is said to lift protection spells.

name: ITEM_20151224_009799
text: A pouch filled with Magic Concentration Orbs

name: ITEM_20151224_009800
text: Page 1 of a diary from someone named Ardel, a former resident of the Delmore Castle.

name: ITEM_20151224_009801
text: Page 2 of a diary from someone named Ardel, a former resident of the Delmore Castle.

name: ITEM_20151224_009802
text: Page 3 of a diary from someone named Ardel, a former resident of the Delmore Castle.

name: ITEM_20151224_009804
text: An arrow that once pierced a Charcoal Walker.{nl}It looks like it can still be used.

name: ITEM_20151224_009806
text: A crystal that finds objects hidden behind magic. Use it to find the magic supply device.

name: ITEM_20151224_009808
text: A wooden board able to be used as a barricade. Taken from an old wooden crate.

name: ITEM_20151224_009810
text: A mushroom able to boost Melchioras' power.{nl}It doesn't look very tasty.

name: ITEM_20151224_009812
text: Sap that oozes out of a Charog's body. It smells awfully foul.

name: ITEM_20151224_009814
text: A means to affect the souls of monsters.

name: ITEM_20151224_009816
text: A crystal for collecting sinister magic. Attach it to the device to destroy it.

name: ITEM_20151224_009818
text: An amplifier carried by Black Maizes. An item wanted by Revelator Mihail.

name: ITEM_20160224_009821
text: Once the heir of one the more prestigious families fashioned their hair this way, many followed suit. It must be said however, it's difficult to capitalize on its charm without being attractive in the first place.

name: ITEM_20160224_009822
text: A hairstyle imitated by many, restored from around the time of the Millenary. However, it was mostly done by nobility due to it being difficult to cut and maintain.

name: ITEM_20160224_009824
text: Some say that a mere hairstyle cannot be a way to show one's respect for the goddesses.{nl}However, goddesses also have their preferences.

name: ITEM_20160224_009826
text: A hairstyle that's come into fashion each time the kingdom was at peace. This hairstyle signifies longing for the peace of times past, before Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20160224_009827
text: According to some rumors, General Ramin was able to find the princess half buried in the ruins of the old capital thanks to this hairstyle.

name: ITEM_20160224_009828
text: This hairstyle has an inornate natural beauty about it. Much like the blessings of the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20160224_009830
text: Originally a hairstyle for esteemed daughters attending the Royal Girl's School in the old capital, it has since been imitated by many women.

name: ITEM_20160224_009832
text: A metaphor that best fits this hairstyle is that it's as if the sanctity of the Goddess Statue has descended upon one's hair. Not the wooden statue of course.

name: ITEM_20160224_009851
text: - Deals additional damage equal to 50% of an enemy's block value when using a basic attack

name: ITEM_20160224_009865
text: - 2% chance to deal additional damage equal to the ammount of your SP recovery rate

name: ITEM_20160224_010162
text: If you combine the letters 'TREE', 'SAVIOR' or 'TREEOFSAVIOR', you can exchange it for a Lucky Box with the Magic Association NPC.

name: ITEM_20160224_010172
text: Obtained from the Lolopanther Area in the Earth Tower.

text: A diary that Faustas maintained while conducting forbidden experiments. Readable.

name: ITEM_20160224_010186
text: A diary that Elluma wrote on the way to Vedas Plateau. Readable.

name: ITEM_20160224_010190
text: A stone with strange letters written on it.

name: ITEM_20160224_010195
text: Rune Stone of the First Master

name: ITEM_20160224_010196
text: A rune stone made by the first master of the Rune Casters.

name: ITEM_20160224_010198
text: Material of a rune stone. In order to become a Rune Caster, you must create a rune stone of your own.

name: ITEM_20160310_010202
text: Lolopanthers are beings who once served Goddess Zemyna. Although most of them are human, not all of them are.

name: ITEM_20160310_010203
text: Not many records remain of those who served Goddess Zemyna in their times. But we can witness sections of the goddess' history through names such as those of a few historical places; and especially the names of weapons such as this.

name: ITEM_20160310_010204
text: In light of this situation where the only way left to meet Goddess Zemyna was to climb up the Earth Tower, it'll allow us to restore old history from the names remaining in the tower. We are also left with more opportunities to obtain some pretty powerful magical weapons.

name: ITEM_20160310_010205
text: The cost to maintain this bow is pricey, except for those who serve the Fletcher Master. People like Lydia Schaffen, the one who founded the Astral Tower.

name: ITEM_20160310_010206
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master himself had received this bow recently.

name: ITEM_20160310_010207
text: Some records go as far as calling it a small siege weapon.

name: ITEM_20160310_010208
text: - Causes an explosion after every 10th consecutive attack.

name: ITEM_20160310_010209
text: Ores and products of the earth can transform into a powerful weapon with the connivance of the goddess.

name: ITEM_20160310_010210
text: This truly makes you proud to be under the protection of the goddess of the earth.

name: ITEM_20160310_010211
text: Some people believe that Lolopanther equipment is made without the permission of the goddess, and is simply taking advantage of her absence.

name: ITEM_20160310_010212
text: Others believe Goddess Zemyna bestowed the right to freely use any material that grows on her land. If that wasn't the case, it would be impossible to mine the materials. However, this does not mean that we have the absolute right to do what we want.

name: ITEM_20160310_010213
text: The history of the Lolopanthers is surprisingly long. Unlike other weapons, the Lolopanther Dagger dates back to before the kingdom was founded.

name: ITEM_20160310_010214
text: One legend told that Goddess Zemyna's temple itself was a pillar of the earth. The legend is now forgotten, but the staff celebrating the legend remains to this day.

name: ITEM_20160310_010215
text: Warsis Creak has succeeded in developing a new type of weapon from the Lolopanther Musket. However, it is unknown when and how this happened.

name: ITEM_20160310_010216
text: A weapon as firm as the ground, light as a feather, and strong as a rock.

name: ITEM_20160310_010217
text: The masters who deal with gunpowder regularly use it with newly designed or discovered weapons. The same can be said for this cannon. Quicktongue, however, hardly shares any new discoveries and is likely considering his military career.

name: ITEM_20160310_010218
text: Those who dare to belittle the weapons grown by the goddess are doomed to have their blood fed to her earth.

name: ITEM_20160310_010219
text: Those who worship the great goddess will receive the wisdom through one's humility. This equipment proves that this is true not only for clerics, but for wizards too.

name: ITEM_20160310_010220
text: Whoever carries this will become the master of the earth and receive its grace with every step. However, maintaining this equipment is a problem for humans in regard to cost, which is of no concern to the goddess.

name: ITEM_20160310_010221
text: Regardless of what rights the goddess of the earth may give, those who carry and use this equipment do so to their own abilities. Do you not wonder whether it possesses an even greater power?

name: ITEM_20160310_010222
text: With every new piece of equipment, the power bestowed by the goddess of the earth is imparted on it.

name: ITEM_20160310_010223
text: Users of this equipment may not realize, but designers and artisans know that obtaining the blessing of Goddess Zemyna when using leather is not as easy as it is for cloth or metal. Thanks to their effort, it shines today on the battlefield.

name: ITEM_20160310_010224
text: Compared to other leather equipment, it is more readily blessed by Goddess Zemyna since it comes into direct contact with the ground.

name: ITEM_20160310_010225
text: Some Lolopanther equipment was not also made using the power of the owner of the tower, Goddess Zemyna, but also of the invading demons. In this case, it is important to maintain balance for equipment.

name: ITEM_20160310_010226
text: Many of the efforts to take away the power of the demons and what they were targeting remains unknown. The answers lay buried in the history of the Earth Tower.

name: ITEM_20160310_010227
text: The goddess of the earth is glad to offer humans the ores forged at her hands. However, she does not look kindly on those who take her gifts for granted.

name: ITEM_20160310_010228
text: The goddess of the earth may have allowed humans to carry weapons; that does not mean she hopes they will bring war and bloodshed. There is a special reason to make use of this particular piece of equipment.

name: ITEM_20160310_010229
text: This piece of equipment helps your two legs stand firm on Goddess Zemyna's territory.

name: ITEM_20160310_010230
text: Your faith in Goddess Zemyna and your courage need to stand forever - as firm as the earth. You must stay resolute if you receive this equipment.

name: ITEM_20160310_010231
text: The grace of the goddess of the earth is in your heart; the time to show the world your bravery has come.

name: ITEM_20160310_010232
text: It is possible to focus the power of all the goddesses in an object to increase one's abilities. It is said that the first person to ever succeed in this type of magic infusion was a nun from Saalus Convent.

name: ITEM_20160310_010233
text: Among the efforts to combine holy and magic power while eliminating conflicting elements, a few objects were made that were both a success and a failure. This bracelet is an example of such paradoxical creations.

name: ITEM_20160310_010234
text: This piece of equipment will help you pierce through the demonic darkness.

name: ITEM_20160310_010235
text: This bracelet works by strenghtening the war spirit of those who wear it. It is very powerful, but it does not come without some drawbacks.

text: Research materials stolen from Gatre by the demons.

name: ITEM_20160310_010268

name: ITEM_20160310_010270

name: ITEM_20160310_010272

name: ITEM_20160310_010282
text: is what it says. Deliver it to a Necromancer named Lemija.

name: ITEM_20160310_010283
text: A letter from a soldier. It seems to have been written to their family, but it was never delivered.

name: ITEM_20160310_010285

name: ITEM_20160310_010287

name: ITEM_20160310_010289

name: ITEM_20160310_010291
text: Objects obtained from monsters. They seem to be souvenirs for the soldier.

name: ITEM_20160310_010293
text: A ring given by the Assistant Commander of Vedas Plateau. Deliver it to Royal Army Officer Retia.

name: ITEM_20160310_010295
text: A reagent chemical found in an abandoned tent. It seems to have been created for an experiment.

name: ITEM_20160310_010297
text: Tree leaves used as weapons by Spions. They are softer than they look.

name: ITEM_20160310_010299
text: A reagent chemical made by Lucienne to kill the giant vines in Nahash Forest.

name: ITEM_20160310_010301
text: The teeth of a Spion. They are surprisingly tough.

name: ITEM_20160310_010303
text: A neutralizing agent given by Vaidotas. It contains a substance able to neutralize Lucienne's Reagent.

name: ITEM_20160310_010305
text: Herb seeds Lucienne has asked you to plant. It seems they're going to be used to make a reagent.

name: ITEM_20160310_010307
text: A sphere given by a villager. It is said to prevent attacks when filled with demon souls.

name: ITEM_20160310_010308
text: Red blood collected from a demon. It is impossible to find out what its use is.

name: ITEM_20160310_010310
text: A sphere purified by the abbot. It exudes divine energy.

name: ITEM_20160310_010311

name: ITEM_20160310_010313

name: ITEM_20161005_011306
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither a goddess or a demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. The reason why this weapon that the goddesses couldn't use was crafted remains a mystery until now. Recently, it has been said that there are people capable of crafting new types of Tevhrin equipment in secret.

name: ITEM_20161005_011309
text: Solmiki is a being that had served the goddesses. The equipment was made in his name in order to commemorate his deeds.

name: ITEM_20161005_011312
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. It is said that a goddess had sacrificed herself for the creation of this equipment.

name: ITEM_20161005_011317
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. It is said that only three humans know why it was crafted.

name: ITEM_20161005_011320
text: The fact that there is no other way to meet Goddess Zemyna but to go to the Earth Tower gives people an opportunity to obtain powerful equipment.

name: ITEM_20161005_011323
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. Most bow related legends involve Lydia Schaffen, but there are always exceptions.

name: ITEM_20161005_011326
text: The practicality of this weapon is questionable as it requires the most upkeep of any bow, but nobody questions its effectiveness in combat.

name: ITEM_20161005_011329
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. The reason why this weapon that the goddesses couldn't use was crafted remains a mystery until now. Recently, it has been said that there are people capable of crafting new types of Tevhrin equipment in secret.

name: ITEM_20161005_011331
text: - Increases all Quarrel Shooter skill levels by {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl} - Increases skill level of Running Shot by {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

name: ITEM_20161005_011332
text: An item that even the Quarrel Shooter Master is seeking. It is rumored that the conditions required to acquire it are insanely difficult to meet.

name: ITEM_20161005_011335
text: It appears to fire arrows that have been blessed by the Goddesses or magical arrows.

name: ITEM_20161005_011338
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither Goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. The reason why this weapon that the goddesses couldn't use was crafted remains a mystery until now. The challenge in creating the equipment was maintaining the divine energy needed to craft it while keeping the goddesses out of the picture.

name: ITEM_20161005_011340
text: This piece of equipment, which is occasionally discovered by those with devout faith, is known to rescue it's user with hidden powers.

name: ITEM_20161005_011343
text: - Increases all Priest skill levels by {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2

name: ITEM_20161005_011344
text: This equipment is more focused on self-defense than being used in the battlefield.

name: ITEM_20161005_011350
text: This shield is sturdy enough to almost be called indestructable. It wouldn't be a surprise to find that it is blessed.

name: ITEM_20161005_011353
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. The reason why this weapon that the goddesses couldn't use was crafted remains a mystery until now. Whatever the reason may be, it can only be hoped that it will be used in the name of the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20161005_011354
text: - Increases damage by 50% when using [Spear Throw]

name: ITEM_20161005_011357
text: Despite its appearance, it is extremely deadly. Those that look down upon it for its toy-like facade will quickly regret it.

name: ITEM_20161005_011360
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither Goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. Even so, it is hoped that this weapon will be used to pierce the enemies of the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20161005_011363
text: This piece of equipment is so effective that some wonder if it was created by stealing the power of the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20161005_011367
text: The creator of this dagger had the honor of being rewarded to some in the past despite the crafter known for crafting unwieldy equipment.

name: ITEM_20161005_011371
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither Goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. The crafting of such weapons is always challenging, but the staff is known to be the least difficult.

name: ITEM_20161005_011374
text: It is rumored that the Kupoles provided the best quality crystals and gems needed to craft this staff.

name: ITEM_20161005_011376
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. The reason why this weapon that the goddesses couldn't use was crafted remains a mystery until now. Recently, it has been said that there are people capable of crafting new types of Tevhrin equipment in secret.

name: ITEM_20161005_011379
text: Ore from extremely deep beneath the earth was used to craft this weapon for the sake of keeping it up to the other Solmiki equipment' standards.

name: ITEM_20161005_011382
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. The reason why this weapon that the goddesses couldn't use was crafted remains a mystery until now. Recently, it is said that there are people capable of crafting new types of Tevhrin equipment in secret. The connection between this weapon and the Hutton family is unknown.

name: ITEM_20161005_011384
text: Unlike the other Solmiki weapons, the Hutton family had participated in its crafting process.

name: ITEM_20161005_011386
text: Long ago, a weapon that neither goddess nor demon could use was crafted; it was called the Tevhrin. The reason why this weapon that the goddesses couldn't use was crafted remains a mystery until now. Recently, it is said that there are people capable of crafting new types of Tevhrin equipment in secret.

name: ITEM_20161005_011390
text: It is said that the participation of the Cannoneer Master is required to craft a new type of cannon.

name: ITEM_20161005_011396
text: This tunic was crafted by using the designs of a well-known tailor. While it is sturdy, it does look like it was made to be used as dress-wear.

name: ITEM_20161005_011398
text: This equipment was loved in the south of Orsha before Medzio Diena, and was used while hunting and travelling.

name: ITEM_20161005_011400
text: While mostly used for ceremonial purposes, it saw its fair share of combat as well.

name: ITEM_20161005_011405
text: An improvement on an old design which was made to have a strong resistance against hits.

name: ITEM_20161005_011407
text: This piece of equipment was crafted using the techniques of a far away land. It has cotton in certain places to reinforce it.

name: ITEM_20161005_011409
text: This piece of equipment, which has its roots in a kingdom that prospered long ago, now looks marginally different from when it was popular.

name: ITEM_20161005_011415
text: Solmiki is a being that had served the goddesses. No piece of equipment made to commemorate his deeds is of shoddy quality.

name: ITEM_20161005_011417
text: Many renowned priests participated in the blessing of this piece of equipment, which was crafted to commemorate Solmiki's deeds.

name: ITEM_20161005_011419
text: Those who admire the blessings applied to Solmiki equipment ought to also pay their respects to the blacksmiths who had worked on every miniscule detail.

name: ITEM_20161005_011434
text: It is rumored that the Kupoles had to make numerous requests to Goddess Zemyna to bless this piece of equipment with strong divine energy.

name: ITEM_20161005_011436
text: Goddess Zemyna does not always bless Solmiki equipment. The Kupoles do so in her place in such cases.

name: ITEM_20161005_011438
text: Kupoles are not serious and solemn all the time; they know how to have fun as well. The magic on this particular piece of equipment shows their playful side.

name: ITEM_20161005_011453
text: It allows the wearer to move more easily thanks to it being well-tempered.

name: ITEM_20161005_011455
text: It has relatively good magic defense as it was magically treated during the crafting process.

name: ITEM_20161005_011457
text: It is rumored that a certain Kupole that had failed to find any other wizard to infuse this piece of equipment managed to finish it with the help of Owyn Dilven.

name: ITEM_20161005_011459
text: It is rumored that the inventor of these boots managed to infuse its magic with the help of Yena Havindar.

name: ITEM_20161005_011461
text: Master Phillip is rumored to have held a celebratory ritual when this piece of equipment was crafted.

name: ITEM_20161005_011478
text: This piece of equipment was crafted with magical attack and defense in mind, as well as to not get in the way of conjuring magic. It is said to be almost unnoticeable when worn in everyday life as well.

name: ITEM_20161005_011480
text: It has different types of magic infused on each glove, and will only show its full potential when both are equipped. There isn't much of a reason behind this except, perhaps, the inventor being bored of doing things the conventional way.

name: ITEM_20161005_011482
text: This piece of equipment was also created in order to commemorate Solmiki, and those that use it do so as well to spread the words of the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20161005_011483
text: A necklace with the powers of Goddess Zemyna. It will not last long as it is too crude to hold the power of the goddesses. Upon pick-up, use within 14 days.

name: ITEM_20161005_011485
text: It is rumored that this necklace used to be worn by an great ancient warrior.

name: ITEM_20161005_011487
text: It is rumored that this was once worn by an ancient wizard. However, nobody is sure of the truth...

name: ITEM_20161005_011489
text: It is being rumored that this necklace once adorned the neck of an ancient guardian. However, not everyone believes that this is true.

name: ITEM_20161005_011491
text: It is rumored that this necklace once adorned the neck of an ancient wizard. However, not everyone believes that this is true.

name: ITEM_20161005_011493
text: Made as a set with the bracelets, it is similarily difficult to guess when they were first crafted. However, you can see traces of some letters written on the back.

name: ITEM_20161005_011495
text: A piece of equipment that was named after Solmiki, who once served Goddess Zemyna. It is also called a wearable Goddess Statue thanks to its effects.

name: ITEM_20161005_011498
text: A bracelet that contains special powers.

name: ITEM_20161005_011501
text: A bracelet that contains even more special power.

name: ITEM_20161005_011504
text: It is unknown when or how this was crafted. It doesn't make one feel particularly nice due to its gloomy look.

name: ITEM_20161005_011506
text: It is said that four Kupoles that served Goddess Zemyna had infused different kinds of magic into this piece of equipment.

name: ITEM_20161005_011511
text: Your appearance will change if you equip this. Upon pick-up, use within 1 minute.

name: ITEM_20161005_011513
text: Equipment for a Ranger Circle 3. Use it to wear it.

name: ITEM_20161005_011516
text: It is capable of kicking up winds. Anybody hit by those winds will most likely be extremely annoyed.

text: Increases a character's maximum HP by 6650 for 3 minutes. Also increases physical and magic defense by 133. Right-click to use. Cooldown of 120 seconds.
