name: ITEM_20161005_011599
text: Increases a character's maximum HP by 9650 for 3 minutes. Also increases physical and magic defense by 193. Right-click to use. Cooldown of 120 seconds.

name: ITEM_20161005_011628
text: Use to obtain 3 randomly chosen EXP Cards. Ranging from Lv2 - Lv10.

name: ITEM_20161005_011630
text: Contains a recipe for a weapon.

name: ITEM_20161005_011632
text: Contains a recipe for a piece of armor.

name: ITEM_20161005_011634
text: Contains a recipe for a piece of accessory.

name: ITEM_20161005_011644
text: Can use once per day. Use it to obtain something special.

name: ITEM_20161005_011646
text: It's a not-so-stable cube. It shows movement to revert back to its original property.

name: ITEM_20161005_011650
text: Helps awaken an item without reducing the potential of an equipment. Usable for 1 minute after being acquired.

name: ITEM_20161005_011651
text: Essential magic powder for any Enchanter.

name: ITEM_20161005_011653
text: A magical scroll that can be used in a variety of situations.

name: ITEM_20161005_011655
text: A red ball of fur. Used for crafting items.

name: ITEM_20161005_011657
text: It seems to be more glossy than ordinary leather.

name: ITEM_20161005_011659
text: A thorn of some sort of plant. It is quite large.

name: ITEM_20161005_011661
text: It is difficult to determine whether this is the horn of some animal or simply a horn shapped rock.

name: ITEM_20161005_011663
text: A piece of leather that almost appears to be embroidered with gold.

name: ITEM_20161005_011665
text: It is unknown how or where it was crafted, but it is not gold.

name: ITEM_20161005_011666
text: Required in order to use the Gender Switch skill.

name: ITEM_20161005_011668
text: You will be able to create a Mirror of Truth by collecting these and purchasing a recipe from the Item Merchant of Fedimian.

name: ITEM_20161005_011670
text: Yellow paper that is used to craft talismans.

name: ITEM_20161005_011771
text: An empty spellbook. You will be able to use spells once you write them down.

name: ITEM_20161005_011773
text: It is much heavier than it looks. It is said to be able to call upon wheels that are elsewhere.

name: ITEM_20161005_011775
text: Used to enhance gems. It drastically increases the EXP of a gem. Upon pick-up, use within 14 days.

name: ITEM_20161005_011778
text: Amplifies your voice. Use [/y 'chat'] to send your message to all maps in your server.{nl}Can be used from Lv. 40. Upon pick-up, use within 14 days.

name: ITEM_20161005_011849
text: A stone capable of summoning a Homunculus. Right-click to summon.

name: ITEM_20161005_011863
text: Blue Orb: Black Temple Slave Assassin

name: ITEM_20161005_011907
text: Blue Orb: Red Wizard Shaman Doll

name: ITEM_20161005_011976
text: Red Orb: Black Temple Slave Assassin

name: ITEM_20161005_012020
text: Red Orb: Red Wizard Shaman Doll

name: ITEM_20161005_012076
text: The Cave of Legends : Revised Edition Volume 1

name: ITEM_20161005_012077
text: A book containing information on mysterious locations within the Kingdom.

name: ITEM_20161005_012078
text: The Cave of Legends : Revised Edition Volume 2

name: ITEM_20161005_012079
text: The Cave of Legends : Revised Edition Volume 3

name: ITEM_20161005_012080
text: Summary of the Royal Family Tree

name: ITEM_20161005_012081
text: Records obtained after helping Investigation Team Leader Ella. It contains the royal family's genealogy, but seems to be an old book as it doesn't include the names of the most recent 15 kings. Right-click to read.

name: ITEM_20161005_012082
text: A history book obtained after helping Investigator Gasper. Lucid Winterspoon's memorandum, which has a few blank pages here and there. Right-click to read.

name: ITEM_20161005_012083
text: A history book obtained after helping Investigator Horatio. It appears to be about the interactions between the Kedora Merchant Alliance and the demons. Right-click to read.

name: ITEM_20161005_012084
text: According to one source, the book is written by the Alchemist Master to teach those who will follow him. Right-click to read.

name: ITEM_20161005_012086
text: You can obtain rewards by taking certain combinations to the Magic Association NPC in town.

name: ITEM_20161005_012095
text: You can obtain one of two types of bands.

name: ITEM_20161005_012097
text: You can obtain one of two types of bands.

name: ITEM_20161005_012099
text: You can obtain one of two types of necklaces.

name: ITEM_20161005_012102
text: Restores your HP and SP by 512 every 2 seconds for 15 seconds.{nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown of 30 seconds.

name: ITEM_20161005_012103
text: An ingredient to make dumplings. It exudes a pleasant nutty scent.

name: ITEM_20161005_012104
text: An ingredient to make dumplings. Highly sought after by Honey Dumpling enthusiasts.

name: ITEM_20161005_012105
text: An ingredient to make dumpling dough. Place the fillings inside the dough to make your dumplings.

name: ITEM_20161005_012106
text: An ingredient to make dumplings. It looks nice and ripe.

name: ITEM_20161005_012107
text: A sweet dumpling made of various ingredients. It may look difficult to cook, but the tasty treat is worth it. {nl} Increases +2 movement speed, +5000 maximum HP and SP for 15 minutes.

name: ITEM_20161005_012108
text: A king-size dumpling made of several ingredients. It smells sweet and looks absolutely delicious. {nl} Grants everyone in your party +4 movement speed, +1 AoE attack ratio and +25% EXP gain.

name: ITEM_20161005_012110
text: A memo that was given to you by Kupole Jore. Write down any clues that you find.

name: ITEM_20161005_012112
text: A piece of paper with nothing on it. You feel a faint trace of magic.

name: ITEM_20161005_012113
text: Documents used to maintain the equipment at Inner Wall District 8.

name: ITEM_20161005_012116
text: A wooden stick that you could find anywhere.

name: ITEM_20161005_012118
text: It looks shoddy, but you might be able to get a few swings out of it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012120
text: A mysterious rock that is used to check magic circles.

name: ITEM_20161005_012121
text: Maintenance Documents for Inner Wall District 9

name: ITEM_20161005_012122
text: Documents containing information on the equipment at Inner Wall District 9.

name: ITEM_20161005_012124
text: A scroll used to control some of the equipment at Inner Wall District 9.

name: ITEM_20161005_012125
text: A piece of paper containing action plans for all the walls on the 'Day of Revelations'.

name: ITEM_20161005_012127
text: It contains information regarding the classified equipment at District 9.

name: ITEM_20161005_012128
text: Emergency orders. It states that the person receiving the orders is to move immediately.

name: ITEM_20161005_012130
text: A piece of paper containing Kupole Milda's investigation records. You may be able to find the core by reading it carefully.

name: ITEM_20161005_012132
text: A magic stone that allows you to disarm the defenses by activating the management stone.

name: ITEM_20161005_012134
text: A core that was at the Outer Wall. It is said to have been prepared by Goddess Laima, but there is an ominous aura about it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012136
text: Supplies that Vincentas' Squad left behind while they were retreating. There may be something useful.

name: ITEM_20161005_012138
text: A bomb used by the military. Seems to be powerful enough.

name: ITEM_20161005_012140
text: Antidote issued by the military. A bit more effective than one would presume.

name: ITEM_20161005_012142
text: A fragment from what was obstructing the road. No clue as to where it may be used.

name: ITEM_20161005_012144
text: Keepsake from a soldier from Vincentas' Squad that was murdered by Ebonypawn.

name: ITEM_20161005_012146
text: A mark of of the assassin Ebonypawn. Looks like some sort of identification card for members of the Astral Tower.

name: ITEM_20161005_012148
text: Supplies that were being moved by the Supply Soldier's Spirit.

name: ITEM_20161005_012150
text: The keepsakes of soldiers stationed on the wall.

name: ITEM_20161005_012152
text: A report written by a scout before his or her death.

name: ITEM_20161005_012154
text: You are able to feel an extremely faint sense of divine power.

name: ITEM_20161005_012156
text: A bead that is emmiting divine power. It is said to have been left by a forgotten goddess.

name: ITEM_20161005_012158
text: An object that was brought in from another Kingdom by the Kedora Merchant Alliance. It is unknown as to what it is used for.

name: ITEM_20161005_012160
text: A Spiritual Orb that reacts to the Spiritual Stone. The reactions will differ from time to time.

name: ITEM_20161005_012173
text: An object brought by the Kedora Merchant Alliance from another Kingdom. It has a Divine Spirit residing in it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012175
text: The Gohei that maintains the barrier. It is said that the barrier will react if the Gohei is used in front of it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012177
text: A crystal borrowed from the Chronomancer Master, Lucid Winterspoon, that allows you to take a peek back in time. It is said to contain the powers of Goddess Gegute.

name: ITEM_20161005_012179
text: Magic essence that is obtained after defeating the monsters at Zima Suecourt. Used to power the magic source at Devries Controller.

name: ITEM_20161005_012181
text: Magic sources that were scattered around the Central Laboratory's Magic Source. Can be used to activate the Central Laboratory's Magic Source.

name: ITEM_20161005_012183
text: A discharged magic source. Can be used to collect magic from the surrounding area.

name: ITEM_20161005_012185
text: A book that introduces locations mentioned in legends after Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20161005_012187
text: Records and objects that appear to belong to Heranda.

name: ITEM_20161005_012189
text: An antidote that Gigho begged for you to look for.

name: ITEM_20161005_012191
text: The necklace of Edeline, the lover of Priest Celvica.

name: ITEM_20161005_012193
text: Appears to be records from people who had stayed in Alembique Cave.

name: ITEM_20161005_012195
text: Stalactite chunk that Alta found on the monsters.

name: ITEM_20161005_012196
text: A rare, cold body fluid that can be found from monsters. Use it to cool the altar.

name: ITEM_20161005_012200
text: Seeds that will bloom into Vaivora's Koru.

name: ITEM_20161005_012202
text: Can be used as a vessal to hold divine power if purified.

name: ITEM_20161005_012204
text: An Arcus Bracken that was raised under the influence of divine energy. Used to purify Gosaru Essence.

name: ITEM_20161005_012207
text: One of the ingredients required for Oscaras' experiments.

name: ITEM_20161005_012210
text: Phamer Bracken, one of the ingredients required for Oscaras' experiments.

name: ITEM_20161005_012212
text: One of the ingredients required for Oscaras' experiments.

name: ITEM_20161005_012214
text: Tranquilizer given by Oscaras to use while obtaining monsters for the experiments. It is effective once the monsters are weakened.

name: ITEM_20161005_012216
text: A bottle to gather water for Oscaras' experiments.

name: ITEM_20161005_012218
text: A soil sample used for Oscaras' experiments.

name: ITEM_20161005_012219
text: A bottle containing water used for Oscaras' experiments.

name: ITEM_20161005_012221
text: A Bunkeybo, which is required for Oscaras' experiments.

name: ITEM_20161005_012223
text: A Bunkeyto, which is required for Oscaras' experiments.

name: ITEM_20161005_012227
text: Bunkeyto Essence. Used as an ingredient in the cure.

name: ITEM_20161005_012228
text: Ponpon Essence which will be used as an ingredient in the cure. Only what reacts to the magic in the Bunkeyto Essence will be used.

name: ITEM_20161005_012230
text: Vink Flowers which react to a monster's magic by glowing red.

name: ITEM_20161005_012235
text: Fur that still has a strong Vilkas stench.

name: ITEM_20161005_012237
text: A recipe given to you by the Fletcher Master that allows you to craft the Flechette Detection Device.

name: ITEM_20161005_012239
text: Romplenuka magic essence which is required to craft the Flechette Detection Device.

name: ITEM_20161005_012241
text: Vilkas magic essence which is required to craft the Flechette Detection Device.

name: ITEM_20161005_012243
text: A device that will help you find the Flechette.

name: ITEM_20161005_012245
text: An arrow that had been used by Lydia Schaffen.

name: ITEM_20161005_012248
text: Documents containing methods to dispel the transformation magic casted on King Kadumel's Monument.

name: ITEM_20161005_012250
text: An orb used to dispel the transformation magic casted on King Kadumel's Monument

name: ITEM_20161005_012252
text: An object required to recharge the orb.

name: ITEM_20161005_012256
text: A detector that is able to sense the magic from transformation spells.

name: ITEM_20161005_012262
text: An essence that has been cleansed by Priest Gherriti. Can be used to hold divine energy.

name: ITEM_20161005_012264
text: A herb that is good for reducing any paralytic affects. Priest Lintas would appreciate any that you can find.

name: ITEM_20161005_012266
text: Grass that will make Gosaru saliva even more acidic.

name: ITEM_20161005_012268
text: An orb that keeps ingredients from decomposing. The Necromancer Master uses it to test the skills of any apprentice as there are not many that can properly utilize it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012270
text: Blue Beetow salivary glands that have a distinct odor.

name: ITEM_20161005_012272
text: Half-digested grass that the Alchemist Master uses to craft incense.

name: ITEM_20161005_012274
text: A bug that is used by the Alchemist Master to craft incense. Usually lives on Akhlass Humps.

name: ITEM_20161005_012276
text: A seal crafted for apprentices not used to controlling evil spirits.

name: ITEM_20161005_012278
text: The blood of a Beast-type monster.

name: ITEM_20161005_012280
text: The fluids of a Plant-type monster.

name: ITEM_20161005_012282
text: Book that the Sage Master is looking for.

name: ITEM_20161005_012284
text: An orb that absorbs magic. Used to see if a person is skilled enough to become an Enchanter.

name: ITEM_20161005_012285
text: Decree written by the Inquisitor Master.

name: ITEM_20161005_012287
text: A book about heresy and heretics

name: ITEM_20161005_012289
text: A talisman given by the Taoist Master for people to learn about how to use it. Although nothing is drawn on the Strange Yellow Paper, the talisman will show various effects at once.

name: ITEM_20161005_012291
text: lngredients required by the Necromancer Master

name: ITEM_20161005_012293
text: Seal given by the Featherfoot Master which can be used to dispell curses. Can only dispell weak curses.

name: ITEM_20161005_012295
text: Objects from soldiers that were killed in Khonot Forest. They seem to be cursed.

name: ITEM_20161005_012297
text: Orb used to purify demonic energy.

name: ITEM_20161005_012299
text: A cocoon made by moth larvae that only live in the White Tree Forest. Can obtain strong string from it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012301
text: A flower on Flowlevi's head. Dry it well and seeds are edible.

name: ITEM_20161005_012302
text: Wood used to craft lumber for repair.

name: ITEM_20161005_012304
text: Tools used to craft lumber for repairing fences.

name: ITEM_20161005_012308
text: Grass that is used to purify the toxic water.

name: ITEM_20161005_012310
text: Water poisoned by White Tree toxin.

name: ITEM_20161005_012311
text: Sack of Cable Car Spare Parts

name: ITEM_20161005_012312
text: A sack that contains materials to repair the cable car.

name: ITEM_20161005_012314
text: Fragment from a Magic Core that was broken by a demon. The Teleportation Magic Circle won't activate without a Magic Core.

name: ITEM_20161005_012316
text: Essence obtained after defeating a demon. You feel an evil magic.

name: ITEM_20161005_012320
text: The Magic Core that formerly provided magic to the teleportation magic circle. It is still unstable and must be looked after with care.

name: ITEM_20161005_012322
text: Sleep Powder that can put Tala Tribespeople to sleep. It is said to be uneffective against others.

name: ITEM_20161005_012324
text: A necklace taken from the violent Tala Tribe. The gem has been blackened.

name: ITEM_20161005_012326
text: Purified Tala Tribe Necklace. The gem is glowing blue.

name: ITEM_20161005_012328
text: A magic stone that had been in the possesion of demons. It may fool the restraining device.

name: ITEM_20161005_012329
text: Realized restoration energy. You can feel a warm feeling.

name: ITEM_20161005_012331
text: Unstable restoration energy. It will not be easy to realize it without the help of Medena.

name: ITEM_20161005_012333
text: Moss that grew under the influence of the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave's divine energy. It is glowing.

name: ITEM_20161005_012334
text: The core that used to be within the Green Zolem. It's an intricately crafted device that moves by magic.

name: ITEM_20161005_012336
text: Purified core of a Zolem, which had been moving through evil energy. It has become stronger than the original core.

name: ITEM_20161005_012338
text: A Detection Stone used to find hidden objects. It was given to you by Kupole Medena.

name: ITEM_20161005_012340
text: Siute's Pendant. It will shield you from evil magic as it contains protective spells.

name: ITEM_20161005_012342
text: Saule's divine utensil that you received from Serija. It contains the power to control Dalia's seal.

name: ITEM_20161005_012344
text: Restored form of Saule's divine utensil. While it does contain power to resist evil energies, the orb has been weakened, only allowing a one-time use.

name: ITEM_20161005_012346
text: Completed bait. Tyronas Hydra really likes this.

name: ITEM_20161005_012347
text: A sparkly blue fragment discovered in Sicarius. It looks like it could be used to activate a device.

name: ITEM_20161005_012348
text: A sparkly red fragment discovered in Sicarius. It looks like it could be used to activate a device.

name: ITEM_20161005_012350
text: Pag Clamper's Core. It is required to fill Jaonus Altar with divine energy. Does it really have anything to do with divine energy?

name: ITEM_20161005_012351
text: Keepsakes Containing the Resentment of the Dead

name: ITEM_20161005_012352
text: Keepsakes taken from the coffin. It is said to contain the resentment of the dead. Does it really have anything to do with filling the altar with divine energy? This is becoming even more suspicious.

name: ITEM_20161005_012354
text: A doctrine that has been scribbled on a piece of paper. It looks extremely shoddy. "Death is our only true God."

name: ITEM_20161005_012356
text: A doctrine that has been scribbled on a piece of paper. It looks extremely shoddy. "We become complete by bathing in the blood of humans."

name: ITEM_20161005_012358
text: A doctrine that has been scribbled on a piece of paper. It looks extremely shoddy. "Creed - Sacrifice humans and complete death."

name: ITEM_20161005_012360
text: A Pag Doper's oil bottle. It has a strange scent. Can you light fires with this oil?

name: ITEM_20161005_012362
text: A doctrine that has been scribbled on a piece of paper. It looks extremely shoddy and is also damaged, making it difficult to read. "Death is the greatest blessing of all."

name: ITEM_20161005_012363
text: The book of judgement given to you by Judge Rymis. It is said to give its owner immense divine power if there is anyone who refuses to convert or accept judgement.

name: ITEM_20161005_012365
text: A strange smelling fluid from Nuttafly and Nuttabug. According to Kupole Lina, it is used as a base ingredient in supplements.

name: ITEM_20161005_012367
text: Leaves that have fallen near trees. Kupole Lina says that supplements are created with these, and monster fluids.

name: ITEM_20161005_012369
text: A strange smelling bottle that holds Kupole Lina's supplement. You have been asked to fill empty bottles with it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012370
text: Medicine you've been given to be use while collecting monster essence. Weakened monsters will be paralyzed by it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012372
text: Rodejokel essence that was requested by Kupole Lina. You will have to paralyze weakened Rodejokels in order to obtain it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012374
text: Glimmering powder gathered from Nuttafly. It is used to activate Magic Spheres.

name: ITEM_20161005_012376
text: Blue moss that is said to grow in Nheto Forest. Said to be found under boulders in fall.

name: ITEM_20161005_012378
text: A dark yellow herb. Cesaris has asked you to gather yellow herbs that stand out in between the red leaves.

name: ITEM_20161005_012380
text: A whistle that can call Iyran to your location. Blow the whistle if Iyran is too far away.

name: ITEM_20161005_012382
text: Vhelis roots found by Iyran. You can't see the difference.

name: ITEM_20161005_012384
text: A mysterious brown powder. It is sprinkled over the logs that Lumberjack Dowedas had asked you to bring.

name: ITEM_20161005_012386
text: A blood sample that Chronomancer Ida asked you to bring. It has not had the time to solidify yet.

name: ITEM_20161005_012388
text: A blood sample taken at the request of Chronomancer Ida. It solidified as soon as you left Nheto Forest.

name: ITEM_20161005_012390
text: A report written by Forest Ranger Bronius at the request of Chronomancer Ida. It contains information about leaves and Blue Nheto Moss.

name: ITEM_20161005_012392
text: A report written by Herbalist Cesaris at the request of Chronomancer Ida. It contains information about 6 types of herbs.

name: ITEM_20161005_012394
text: A report written by Lumberjack Dowedas at the request of Chronomancer Ida. It contains information about the weather, climate and aging circles.

name: ITEM_20161005_012395
text: Report on the Relation Between the Forest and Medzio Diena

name: ITEM_20161005_012396
text: A report you have received from the Chronomancer about the forest. Right-click to read.

name: ITEM_20161005_012398
text: A fragment from a shoddy rag doll. Perhaps this is the doll mentioned in Morkus' dairy.

name: ITEM_20161005_012400
text: Thick stems that had been buried underground. Can be used to craft a leaf whistle.

name: ITEM_20161005_012402
text: Willitte's shovel. A sturdy shovel despite being extremely worn. It seems to be more than capable of digging up bulky roots.

name: ITEM_20161005_012404
text: Potion used to remove dye. Morkus wishes to spray this on a green tree.

name: ITEM_20161005_012406
text: A necklace that Morkus found on the ground. You seem to remember seeing it being used somewhere...

name: ITEM_20161005_012408
text: A report written by Chronomancer Ida to be given to the Chronomancer Master. It contains information about the situation in Nheto Forest.

name: ITEM_20161005_012409
text: Orders written in unreadable demon letters. Kupoles may be able to make sense of it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012412
text: The Kupole has asked you to gather the demon's strength. Defeat demons in the surrounding area with this orb in order to collect their energy.

name: ITEM_20161005_012414
text: An Orb of Divine Detection crafted by the Kupole. It will react to any divine energy in the area.

name: ITEM_20161005_012416
text: Essence collected from demons. Used to craft an alarm that will detect any incoming demons.

name: ITEM_20161005_012419
text: A fragment suspected of being a trace of Ausrine. It appears to have marks of something being engraved on it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012421
text: A fragment suspected of being a trace of Ausrine. It seems to be a damaged mirror. Perhaps it was used in some sort of ritual.

name: ITEM_20161005_012423
text: A fragment suspected of being a trace of Ausrine. It seems to be a piece of glass from something bigger. It reacts to divine energy.

name: ITEM_20161005_012425
text: Orders written in unreadable demon letters. It seems to be different from the one you previously found. The Kupoles may be able to make sense of it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012427
text: A stone fragment you found in the ruins. Looks like it's a fragment from the destroyed altar.

name: ITEM_20161005_012429
text: An object that appears to be a trace of Ausrine. It is a wooden statue that is severely damaged.

name: ITEM_20161005_012431
text: An object that appears to be a trace of Ausrine. It is a severely damaged necklace that may have been used as part of a ritual.

name: ITEM_20161005_012433
text: A Magic Stone fragment that contains a demon's power. Kupole Leda seems to plan on crafting a divine energy Detection Orb by using debris from the Interferance Magic Circle and the fragment.

name: ITEM_20161005_012435
text: Kupole Leda seems to plan on crafting a divine energy Detection Orb by using debris from the Interferance Magic Circle and the fragment.

name: ITEM_20161005_012437
text: Gosal Horn. The Falconer Master has told you to obtain this horn by defeating the Gosal in Khonot Forest to prove your skills.

name: ITEM_20161005_012439
text: A crystal given to you by the Hackapell Master. It is said to use the Sanctuary's energy to cure illness. You have been tasked with charging it with energy as the Hackapell Master is too busy to do so on behalf of the Pardoner Master.

name: ITEM_20161005_012441
text: An old coin found recently on the coast. Said to be extremely valuable.

name: ITEM_20161005_012443
text: A red crystal that has been passed down the Hummil Family. It reacts to any blue crystals near it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012445
text: A blue crystal that has been passed down the Hummil Family. It reacts to any red crystals near it.

name: ITEM_20161005_012447
text: Documents containing unrecognizable letters. It is in bad shape, as it was abandoned in the grass. Difficult to read, but has a seal in the shape of a tree.

text: Freshly fried shrimp. Mmm yum.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161130_012959
text: It better not be half-eaten.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161130_012960
text: Useful to get out of an awkward situation. Or, to abort the situation entirely.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161130_012961
text: Just by splashing your hair, you can fend off pursuers.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161130_012962
text: Because 20/20 vision is so mainstream.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161130_012963
text: What is growing inside the head?{nl} Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161130_012964
text: Some say it calls for rain.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

text: Don't know which key is the right one.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

text: It makes you look like a man who is good with bow and arrow.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161130_012971
text: You are not dead yet. Just saintly.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

text: The ore used to be misidentified as iron but it was later discovered that it possesses a slightly different property. It is now used in a special way.

text: The sequel to the Encyclopedia of Masters written by the Sage Master. Right-click to read.

name: ITEM_20161214_013206
text: A journal recorded by Itebaras. It records the inscriptions on the tombstones at the Namu Temple Ruins.

name: ITEM_20161214_013211
text: In some places, sticky taffy is offered to students as a wish to do well in their exams. Increases EXP gains by 30% for 30 minutes. Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20161214_013213
text: Revitalize your body and mind after a stressful exam period. Recovers 600 HP and 200 SP every 10 seconds for 30 minutes. Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20161214_013215
text: A sweet treat to stimulate brain activity. Increases movement speed by 2 for 30 minutes. Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20161214_013217
text: A token made as a proof of the treaty made between the demons and Goddess.

name: ITEM_20161214_013219
text: A token made to signify the treaty between the demons and Goddess.

name: ITEM_20161214_013221
text: A stone slate containing the terms of the treaty. Can only be read with the Tokens of the Treaty.

name: ITEM_20161214_013223
text: A review by Revelator Mihail, can be obtained as a part of a collection.

name: ITEM_20161214_013225
text: The note that has the inscription of the ring that a wandering soul on Letas Stream was obessessing over.  Can be added to your collection.

name: ITEM_20161214_013227

name: ITEM_20161214_013229
text: A cure for Nobreer pandemic. Not perfected yet.

name: ITEM_20161214_013231
text: A solution made to test whether the element causing the Nobreer epidemic is airborne.

name: ITEM_20161214_013233
text: A magic stone that detects the energy of Nobreer Pandemic.

name: ITEM_20161214_013235

name: ITEM_20161214_013237

name: ITEM_20161214_013239

name: ITEM_20161214_013241

name: ITEM_20161214_013243
text: The core of the demonic plague.

name: ITEM_20161214_013244

name: ITEM_20161214_013246

name: ITEM_20161214_013248

name: ITEM_20161214_013250

name: ITEM_20161214_013252

name: ITEM_20161214_013254
text: A bag that contain stationery items that Wilhelmina Carriot gave you to write down certain things about the Fortress of the Land.

name: ITEM_20161214_013256
text: Arghidas of Amanda Grave Robbers who is deep undercover and infiltrated the Dico gang has sent a comrade to deliver the goods to Wilhelmina Carriot. However, the comrades have not returned and now Arghidas wants you to deliver it to Wilhelmina Carriot.

name: ITEM_20161214_013258
text: A letter written by the Rose siblings to the people of Knidos Jungle.

name: ITEM_20161214_013260
text: A letter written by Anne to Rose.

name: ITEM_20161214_013262
text: A piece of Sword Pell. The Highlander Submaster will be livid. Begging and crying for her forgiveness might not be enough.

name: ITEM_20161214_013264
text: A toolbox containing tools to make a sword pell.

name: ITEM_20161214_013266
text: Woodin's Sturdy Tree. Perfect for making a sword pell.

name: ITEM_20161214_013269

name: ITEM_20161214_013273
text: Looks like some sort of a ritual device. Perhaps the head of Bellai Forest Village might know something about it.

name: ITEM_20161214_013274
text: Ritual Device Used in Bellai Forestr Village

name: ITEM_20161214_013277

name: ITEM_20161214_013293

name: ITEM_20161214_013294
text: On the ring it says "May Dominic and I live together happily ever after."

name: ITEM_20161214_013311

name: ITEM_20161214_013313

name: ITEM_20161214_013316
text: A letter sent to the Fencer Master for the book. It details the contents about the Fencer Master and an inquiry to confirm.

name: ITEM_20161214_013317
text: A letter sent to the Necromancer Master for the book. It details the contents about the Necromancer Master and an inquiry to confirm.

name: ITEM_20161214_013319
text: A reply to the Sage Master written by the Druid Master. It features the Druid Master's life story from the childhood to the masterhood.

name: ITEM_20161214_013321
text: A reply written by the Fencer Master. It features the connection between the Fencer Masterhood and her family and why the role came to her after Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20161214_013323
text: A reply written by the Necromancer Master. It features the story behind her way to the masterhood and her achievements.

name: ITEM_20161214_013325
text: A book heavily weathered and damaged. Only the letters on its cover are  barely legible. Take this to the Fencer Master.

name: ITEM_20161214_013327
text: The crystal given to you by the Linker Master for the investigation. The Master requested you to defeat Gazing Golem.

name: ITEM_20161214_013329
text: A small fragment fallen out of Gazing Golem. What was the Linker Master investigating?

name: ITEM_20161214_013331
text: The Magic Core of Gazing Golem, it gives an impression of gazing into my soul.

name: ITEM_20161214_013333
text: A device made by the Linker Master to track the demons linked to Gazing Golem. It is said that when it is installed, the identity of the one who has sent Gazing Golem. Set this up on the spot told by the Linker Master without getting detected by Gazing Golem.

name: ITEM_20161214_013335
text: A magic stone devised by the Linker Master. It disrupts Gazing Golem's perception and render you invisible to it. Caution: Getting too close to the target will get you detected.

name: ITEM_20161214_013337
text: A certificate written by Druid Master Gina Greene. It says that

name: ITEM_20161214_013339
text: or his family can be paid the amount written by Gina Greene from the Kedora Alliance or the Pardoner Master.

name: ITEM_20161214_013340
text: Herbalist Calsis' diary. In it, he wrote about his trip to Dadan Jungle and about his daughter.

name: ITEM_20161214_013342
text: These flowers go by the name of Arzeli. They are very expensive and are said to relieve the symptoms of any disease.

name: ITEM_20161214_013343
text: The powder given by Baron Muchausen. He claimed it has the exorcising effect. Does it though?

name: ITEM_20161214_013345
text: A bag containing a crystal made and given by Baron Muchausen. He did say it drives out monsters. Does it? I mean, really, I have my doubts.

name: ITEM_20161214_013347
text: The dried leaves requested by Baron Muchausen. The leaves in the forest are always dried up nowadays.

name: ITEM_20161214_013348
text: The reagent made by Baron Muchausen. Mixed with dried leaves and Goddess knows what. Will it work?

name: ITEM_20161214_013350
text: The crystal the Baron Munchause gave you. He said it drives ghosts away. Like always, it is a rather odd and peculiar object.

name: ITEM_20161215_013361
text: A memorial to the child soldiers who lost their lives near the Ayer Lake during the last battle of the war period that would later give origin to the Kingdom. According to records, these soldiers would charge in first, pounding on small drums.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013363
text: A hat worn by royal guards during the foundation of the Kingdom. After Sawsel's reign, it came to be worn only during the Winter Festival.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013365
text: Don't eat it, wear it!{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013367
text: It's a cupcake. It's a bunny. Thought you might find it funny.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013369
text: With the law put forward by King Malkiel, regular people became able to wear crown accessories too, as long as they didn't look too similar to the official royal crown.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013371
text: Try wearing this crown and playing king, it could be fun.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013373
text: Notice the red, flat part of this hat. That's its main feature.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013375
text: Believe it or not, this hat is made of many different materials: leather, fur, and a variety of cloth textures.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013377
text: If you don't mind people thinking you had one glass too many, you can wear this headband on your face and pretend you have a big red nose.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013379
text: Contrary to what it may seem, this hat is not made of glass. So what is the clear material around the globe? Guess.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013381
text: What? This isn't the Rudolph you were expecting? Too bad.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20161215_013383
text: Is this hat white with red stripes, or red with white stripes? In reality, both stripe colors were added to this hat in the same amount!{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170307_013546
text: The weather is so nice, how about a picnic?{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170307_013548
text: An orange-flavored chocolate candy worn as hair accessory.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170307_013550
text: A cake shaped like a crown. Notice the cute heart on top.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170307_013552
text: A hair accessory featuring pink heart and a lovely ribbon.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170307_013554
text: Choux pastry cream topped with pink candy. Yes, it's a hair accessory.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170307_013556
text: Choux pastry cream topped with sweet biscuit. Yes, it's a hair accessory.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170307_013558
text: Sweet strawberry cake served in a glass. Careful not to spill it!{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170307_013560
text: Nothing is sweeter or lovelier than heart-shaped candy.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170313_013563
text: This weapon mimics the aesthetics of a sword said to have been used by a well-known figure. The blade is made to wound the enemy, while the back protects against the attacks from the opponent's sword.

name: ITEM_20170313_013565
text: This sword may look bulky, but don't confuse it for a jungle knife; it's a lot more nimble than it looks and its easy grip is loved by swordsmen everywhere.

name: ITEM_20170313_013567
text: The first record of umbrellas comes from the era of King Rowmel. Like an umbrella will protect you from the rain, so will this weapon protect you from danger.

name: ITEM_20170313_013569
text: The highly ergonomic design of this sword will make it feel like an extension of your arm.

name: ITEM_20170313_013571
text: A dagger said to have been favored by swordsmen in the Northern regions. Outstanding performance both as a weapon and a work of art.

name: ITEM_20170313_013573
text: Production of this two-handed sword, of which the bright blue material of the blade has always been unknown, is now said to be possible.

name: ITEM_20170313_013575
text: The reason why there are no records of umbrellas from the foundatin of the Kingdom is because they didn't find popular use until more people began living in cities. Before this time, country folk either worked under the rain or made use of cloaks to stay dry.

name: ITEM_20170313_013577
text: Recommended by merchants as the best combat weapon for two-handed sword users.

name: ITEM_20170313_013579
text: Some magicians create Baule Spheres by combining a crystal ball with a well-crafted short rod that allows it to display its full magic potential.

name: ITEM_20170313_013581
text: Originally used by Bokors and other curse practitioners, with the addition of magic properties this rod has become a tool for magic.

name: ITEM_20170313_013583
text: The original design of Sketis equipment is said to have originated during the reign of King Themomel.ome historians believe the name comes from the sense of protection evoked by umbrellas.

name: ITEM_20170313_013585
text: The carved inscription reads, "The path of the pilgrim is not one of strength, but one of spirit."

name: ITEM_20170313_013587
text: The performance of this bow is said to have been increased by the Devil's Ore stones that adorn it. From the reviews of those who have used it, however, it seems that was only a rumor.

name: ITEM_20170313_013589
text: The polished wood of the grip and limbs, combined with the magic properties of the two crystal spheres, give this bow enough of a boost to stand out from similarly-ranked bows.

name: ITEM_20170313_013591
text: In the beginning, this weapon was known as the umbrella that would protect the Kingdom from rainy days.

name: ITEM_20170313_013593
text: This bow was not made for hunting. If you hunt an animal with this bow, do not eat it.

name: ITEM_20170313_013595
text: The added star ornaments on the stirrup allow for a more precise aim with this crossbow.

name: ITEM_20170313_013597
text: With a body of consecrated wood and adorned with blessed gems, this crossbow was created to magnify its the weapon's potential to the fullest.

name: ITEM_20170313_013600
text: In the beginning, this weapon was known as the umbrella that would protect the Kingdom from rainy days.

name: ITEM_20170313_013602
text: Although not a weapon of choice of the royal army, it was fairly well used by soldiers guarding the Kingdom's roads.

name: ITEM_20170313_013604
text: Despite appearing heavy, this mace is made from a light ore that allows for easy handling regardless of muscular strength.

name: ITEM_20170313_013606
text: This mace was created by the kingdom's finest blacksmiths and craftsmen, and displays unparalleled grace and performance in combat.

name: ITEM_20170313_013608
text: The first Sketis Maces were mostly used by Priests. They were said to include the inscription, "Under the sun, under the rain, the goddesses we serve."

name: ITEM_20170313_013610
text: Unlike other Pajoritas equipment, this mace is said to have originated after Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20170313_013612
text: A type of shield made from animal bones and hides.

name: ITEM_20170313_013614
text: A shield made to the image of a coat of arms used in the southern region of the kingdom. Its biggest advantage is the durability offered by the iron plate base and leather cover.

name: ITEM_20170313_013616
text: Please keep a safe distance from your enemies. Alternatively, use this shield.

name: ITEM_20170313_013618
text: The maker hid a funny inscription in this shield: "Note - not a sled."

name: ITEM_20170313_013620
text: The thin blade of this spear is designed like an asymetric spatula to deliver sharp blows to the enemy.

name: ITEM_20170313_013622
text: It may be called Golden due to its color, but the base material it is made of is far more resistant than gold. Any good blacksmith will be able to tell the difference.

name: ITEM_20170313_013624
text: Feeling unsatisfied with your weapon? Try the Sketis Spear and feel the difference!

name: ITEM_20170313_013626
text: Many fearless adventurers left with this spear to battle the most fierce and powerful monsters. It is unknown whether they succeeded.

name: ITEM_20170313_013628
text: A variation of the Halberd, this spear's blade is mostly decorative, being better suited for piercing attacks rather than slashing ones.

name: ITEM_20170313_013630
text: This pike features a special ergonomic design intended for securing a firm grip and maximum convenience in battle.

name: ITEM_20170313_013632
text: The Sketis Pike will never hurt you. Your enemies, on the other hand...

name: ITEM_20170313_013634
text: In the past, the use of this pike was forbidden in jousts.

name: ITEM_20170313_013636
text: Unlike most daggers, this one features a double blade with a gap in between that makes it apt for both piercing and slashing. The irregular shape of the blades also creates wounds that are more difficult to heal.

name: ITEM_20170313_013638
text: A dagger possessing a similar look to the Crystaras. Its bright blue blade is made of an unknown mineral.

name: ITEM_20170313_013640
text: Use it wisely to surprise your enemies.

name: ITEM_20170313_013642
text: Be careful of the spirit imbued in this weapon. It might harm you.

name: ITEM_20170313_013643
text: Black market dealers are known to be good at making weapons like these, especially when it comes to the Black Staff.

name: ITEM_20170313_013645
text: The making of this staff is rather simple, consisting of a plain wooden body and a magic amplifying crystal. Its power, however, is out of the ordinary.

name: ITEM_20170313_013647
text: This weapon is said to have been inspired by an old relic, the cane used by a saint who captured an ancient demon goddess.

name: ITEM_20170313_013649
text: Conceptually, the umbrella conveys an image of protection like a shield, at the same time possessing a pointed end evoking a sense of attack. For the makers of Sketis equipment, this is quite an interesting concept to work with.

name: ITEM_20170313_013651
text: The inscription in this staff reads, "For best portability, try the Pajoritas Rod."

name: ITEM_20170313_013653
text: Portable and convenient, but deals sure damage to any foe.

name: ITEM_20170313_013655
text: The inscription in this pistol reads, "Please don't blow on the muzzle after firing this pistol."

name: ITEM_20170313_013657
text: An elegant piece of equipment used in knight ceremonies during the kingdom's period of prosperity.

name: ITEM_20170313_013659
text: The inscription reads, "Approved by Alfred Hutton." Unfortunately, it is impossible to determine the validity of that statement.

name: ITEM_20170313_013661
text: Don't judge a weapon by its weight. This cannon will be your best friend.

name: ITEM_20170313_013663
text: Originally, this musket wasn't related to other Pajoritas equipment, until it was given the Pajoritas name by an unknown maker. It has since been further developed, confirming that the Pajoritas name did have a positive influence on its design and performance.

name: ITEM_20170313_013665
text: Once used as an alliance uniform in days of economic prosperity, today it is worn for slightly  different purposes.

name: ITEM_20170313_013667
text: A garment said to have originated from the East. Despite being made of leather, it is still a fairly breathable piece.

name: ITEM_20170313_013669
text: As a piece of equipment made from layers of iron plate, it was initially specialized to resist arrow attacks. These days, however, it has evolved to protect against all types of attacks equally.

name: ITEM_20170313_013671
text: A uniform worn by the kingdom's wizard combatants. Being able to wear this piece was considered a big honor in those days.

name: ITEM_20170313_013673
text: A uniform worn by the kingdom's rangers. In those days, rangers were treated with the same reverence as knights.

name: ITEM_20170313_013675
text: The official uniform of the kingdom's knight order.

name: ITEM_20170313_013677
text: Marone equipment originated from a religious order. In year 215 of the Kingdom, clerics began to divide into different orders, each developing their own style of equipment. Over time, these religious equipment items became more often used by those not related to an order.

name: ITEM_20170313_013679
text: Prakeh equipment remains as a heritage from the era of King Chaspael. The lack of beauty in each item reflects the hardship of living in those times.

name: ITEM_20170313_013681
text: Razna equipment is named after a species of monster currently extinct. According to legends, the last few were isolated in a special location, as they were considered dangerous by demons and goddesses alike. The association between this monster and the equipment it's named after remains a mystery.

name: ITEM_20170313_013683
text: Keyarc equipment was once once amongst the most popular items made by the Kedora Alliance. After Medzio Diena, the Alliance is once again selling this equipment, although it is unsure how much profit it can yield given that they are now being produced by other organizations as well.

name: ITEM_20170313_013685
text: Barghar equipment was born of an attempt to reproduce Ruklys' legendary magic resistance equipment. It may not be as effective as Ruklys', but it is fairly useful nonetheless.

name: ITEM_20170313_013687
text: The first person to ever wear this equipment was Geoffrey Parecius, grandfather of current Lancer Master Noer Parecius. He is said to have been close to the Black family, possessing a strong interest in equipment making himself as well.

name: ITEM_20170313_013695
text: Marone equipment originated from a religious order. In year 215 of the Kingdom, clerics began to divide into different orders, each developing their own style of equipment. Over time, these religious equipment items became more often used by those not related to an order.

name: ITEM_20170313_013708
text: Marone equipment originated from a religious order. In year 215 of the Kingdom, clerics began to divide into different orders, each developing their own style of equipment. Over time, these religious equipment items became more often used by those not related to an order.

name: ITEM_20170313_013721
text: Marone equipment originated from a religious order. In year 215 of the Kingdom, clerics began to divide into different orders, each developing their own style of equipment. Over time, these religious equipment items became more often used by those not related to an order.

name: ITEM_20170313_013728
text: Made from the experiments of ancient Pyromancers, it enhances the effects of Fire magic.{nl}- Cannot be transcended.

name: ITEM_20170313_013730
text: A necklace for those who care about speed and strength, and nothing else. "Obstinate" is a good word to describe the type of people who may enjoy this piece of equipment.

name: ITEM_20170313_013732
text: The wizard who created this necklace is said to have had a hard time accepting compromises in life. This necklace itself was not exactly what they intended, either.

name: ITEM_20170313_013734
text: The creator of this necklace clearly valued function over form.

name: ITEM_20170313_013736
text: A necklace created to counterbalance the disadvantages of the Pejnus Necklace.

name: ITEM_20170313_013739
text: The intense power of this bracelet is felt even before you wear it. Your enemies will feel it too as you attack.

name: ITEM_20170313_013741
text: Contrary to what rumors say, wearing this bracelet will not make you wiser. If you're a magic user and the wisdom you're looking for is attack power, that's a different story then.

name: ITEM_20170313_013743
text: Hit ten times strong, and it's okay to miss once. That's what brave general Donahue thought.

name: ITEM_20170313_013745
text: Designs like the one of this bracelet were popular around the time of the millenary. It was worn by gentlemen to attend banquets, although nowadays it is mostly a tradition among magic users.

name: ITEM_20170313_013747
text: A memorial to the child soldiers who lost their lives near the Ayer Lake during the last battle of the war period that would later give origin to the Kingdom. According to records, these soldiers would charge in first, pounding on small drums.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170313_013761
text: May this dagger stand between you and your opponents.

name: ITEM_20170313_013763
text: A weapon this practical is bound to be mass-produced.

name: ITEM_20170313_013765
text: This rod is a perfect example of simplicity in design. That doesn't mean its power is any weaker, however.

name: ITEM_20170313_013767
text: This weapon manages to ease up the action of shooting with a two-handed bow without losing much of its power.

name: ITEM_20170313_013769
text: The modified version of the Fedimian Turret is said to be a fairly recent innovation.

name: ITEM_20170313_013771
text: The same name applies to this club even when it isn't made in Fedimian.

name: ITEM_20170313_013773
text: The Alchupiz is a weapon that changes according to the wishes of the people.

name: ITEM_20170313_013775
text: After Partisan-style spears became popular, they started to be produced for the aristocracy, including this modified version.

name: ITEM_20170313_013777
text: Some people have trouble telling the top of this staff from its bottom.

name: ITEM_20170313_013779
text: A simple piece of equipment to help you in combat.

name: ITEM_20170313_013781
text: The history of weapons isn't made solely from war or the tastes of the aristocracy. The merchants in Fedimian, for example, have created various types of equipment and handicrafts over time. This, of course, happened with the help from the goddesses, who work to advance our civilization.

name: ITEM_20170313_013786
text: Who knew the Minivern's defense could be this useful.

name: ITEM_20170313_013788
text: A piece of armor that holds well over time and can used in different ways by those with the right know-how.

name: ITEM_20170313_013790
text: If you wear them, you can see how little noise they make.

name: ITEM_20170313_013792
text: Favored by those looking to achieve swift, precise movements.

name: ITEM_20170313_013795
text: Originally, the practical weapons were manufactured in the form of entry-level weapons.

name: ITEM_20170313_013803
text: Sometimes, there's a person who doesn't know what is the top of the cane.

name: ITEM_20170313_013809
text: Available to use upon reaching a certain level. The rewards inside the chest vary depending on how many Level Up Chests you have already opened. Right-click to open.

name: ITEM_20170313_013811
text: A cube obtained from the Bokor Master. It contains an item from one of the following collections: Fasika Plateau, Galeed Plateau. Right-click to open.

name: ITEM_20170313_013813
text: A cube obtained from Merrisa. It contains an item from one of the following collections: Manahas, Genar Field. Right-click to open.

name: ITEM_20170313_013815
text: A cube obtained from Priest Daram. It contains an item from one of the following collections: Grand Corridor, Main Chamber. Right-click to open.

name: ITEM_20170313_013817
text: A cube obtained from the Hackapell Master. It contains an item from one of the following collections: Istora Ruins, Namu Temple Ruins. Right-click to open.

name: ITEM_20170313_013819
text: A cube obtained from the Warlock Master. It contains an item from one of the following collections: Mokusul Chamber, Underground Grave of Ritinis. Right-click to open.

name: ITEM_20170313_013821
text: A cube obtained from Lucienne Winterspoon. It contains an item from one of the following collections: Nahash Forest, Vera Coast. Right-click to open.

name: ITEM_20170313_013823
text: A cube obtained from Villager Duncan. It contains an item from one of the following collections: Elgos Monastery Annex, Elgos Monastery Main Building. Right-click to open.

name: ITEM_20170313_013825
text: A cube obtained from Gatre. It contains an item from one of the following collections: Barha Forest, Alemeth Forest. Right-click to open.

name: ITEM_20170313_013827
text: A cube obtained from Soldier Heulen. It contains an item from the following collection: Ibre Plateau. Right-click to open.

name: ITEM_20170313_013829
text: A card used to enhance a card. Increases a card's EXP by 500.

name: ITEM_20170313_013831
text: The less-advanced techniques used to produce magnifying glasses mean that they often have low durability. Multiple magnifying glasses may be required to identify a single item.

name: ITEM_20170313_013833
text: A sturdy ore material, often used to make the body of various types of equipment.

name: ITEM_20170313_013835
text: Right-click to use. Upon use, the companion is immediately registered.{nl}This companion can be mounted without a riding skill.{nl}This companion increases the character's physical attack and maximum HP.

name: ITEM_20170313_013836
text: A book with Eitbaras's records. It is a compilation of the tombstone inscriptions found at the Namu Temple Ruins. Right-click to read.

name: ITEM_20170313_013837
text: Demetrius' research records. Right-click to read.

name: ITEM_20170313_013838
text: A collection of torn diary pages found in Andale Village. Right-click to read.

name: ITEM_20170313_013839
text: A king-size dumpling made of several ingredients. It smells sweet and looks absolutely delicious. {nl} Grants your party members +4 movement speed, +1 AoE attack ratio and +25% EXP gains.

name: ITEM_20170313_013840
text: Consumes all your remaining instanced dungeon daily entries, while multiplying the amount of items and EXP obtained in a single run by that number of entries.

name: ITEM_20170313_013842
text: Use this fire cracker to celebrate a happy occasion or congratulate a friend.

name: ITEM_20170313_013849
text: Can be used from Lv 260 and above.{nl}The Hethran Badge takes its name from the former head of the Kedora Alliance. Despite no longer being used within the Alliance itself, it is still regarded by some as a symbol of exclusivity and stability.

name: ITEM_20170313_013851
text: Can be used from Lv 300 and above.{nl}The Hethran Badge takes its name from the former head of the Kedora Alliance. Despite no longer being used within the Alliance itself, it is still regarded by some as a symbol of exclusivity and stability.

name: ITEM_20170313_013853
text: The Hethran Badge takes its name from the former head of the Kedora Alliance. Despite no longer being used within the Alliance itself, it is still regarded by some as a symbol of exclusivity and stability.

name: ITEM_20170313_013855
text: Velghehunt is a material fabricated by imbuing magic into sapphires via alchemy. Using any method other than the Winterspoon's to create it will not produce the characteristic star shape.

name: ITEM_20170313_013857
text: Until the first few eras after the birth of the Kingdom, Sadiefi Crystals were found exclusively in some locations of the Crystal Mine. Nowadays they have become even rarer and difficult to obtain.

name: ITEM_20170313_013861
text: All fossil ores, like Asaghatel, are said to contain the memories of the goddesses. That means that if you have no recollection of the goddesses, you will not think of these fossils either.

name: ITEM_20170313_013863
text: Legends say Etenium was created when humanity lived underground, under the protection of the goddess. That would mean that the Etenium obtained today was created in prehistoric times.

name: ITEM_20170313_013867
text: Some gems were influenced by Medzio Diena to evolve into different varieties. One of them was the Ounen Mineral, which evolved into the beautiful shape we know today.

name: ITEM_20170313_013871
text: Medzio Diena affected different types minerals in various ways. Pharlam Fragments, which were once smooth, gained a shattered appearance along with magic properties.

name: ITEM_20170313_013875
text: Ever since Medzio Diena, people have been curious about the uses of the different types of wood it modified. Plafeanpoe is one of them.

name: ITEM_20170313_013878
text: This scroll is infused with a magic that tells your distance from hidden dice.

name: ITEM_20170313_013880
text: This scroll shows you a mirage of the die you're looking for, but once you find it, the die loses part of its effects. Can only be used 2 times.

name: ITEM_20170313_013882
text: This scroll is infused with a magic that reveals hidden dice.

name: ITEM_20170313_013884
text: Records stolen from the convent by the demons.

name: ITEM_20170313_013886
text: A claw obtained by defeating the Rafene in the Lake Mission. The Enchanter Master is looking for it.

name: ITEM_20170313_013887
text: A horn obtained by defeating the leader monsters inside the Castle Dungeon.  The Enchanter Master is looking for it.

name: ITEM_20170313_013889
text: No known owner or method of use. It can, however, be used to open locked objects.

name: ITEM_20170313_013891
text: A scroll given by the Chronomancer Master for you to investigate the Martuis Storage Room with.

name: ITEM_20170313_013892
text: An old tool of unknown mechanisms sought after by the Enchanter Master.

name: ITEM_20170313_013894
text: A sample of sap obtained from deep-dwelling organisms sought after by the Enchanter Master.

name: ITEM_20170313_013897
text: Magic Tracer Map: Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 1

name: ITEM_20170313_013898
text: Magic Tracer Map: Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 1

name: ITEM_20170313_013900
text: A bag of seeds given by Louise.

name: ITEM_20170313_013902
text: An old, abandoned bowl. Contains dirty water. Can it even be used for anything?

name: ITEM_20170313_013904
text: A piece of paper with a rubbed copy of the writings on the tombstone. Take it to someone knowledgeable who can help you decipher it.

name: ITEM_20170313_013906
text: A special orb given by the Bokor Master to help detect cursed objects.

name: ITEM_20170313_013907
text: It may look like a simple piece of mirror, but it contains the energy of a powerful curse.

name: ITEM_20170313_013908
text: A piece of paper with a rubbed copy of the runes. It contains a lot of unfamiliar runes.

name: ITEM_20170313_013910
text: Essence obtained from Dawn Maiden monsters. As monsters possessing the ability to place frost curses, their essence is equally as gelid.

name: ITEM_20170313_013912
text: These herbs exude a soothing, light fragrance.

name: ITEM_20170313_013914
text: Bees are said to enjoy the scent of this flower.

name: ITEM_20170313_013916
text: A scented candle made for the bees.

name: ITEM_20170313_013918
text: A trumpet borrowed from the Miko Master to appease a divine spirit.

name: ITEM_20170313_013920
text: A device needed to find the evil spirit hidden in the Mokusul Chamber.

name: ITEM_20170313_013922
text: A box found at the Elgos Monastery Annex. From how heavy it is, it seems to be full of valuable objects.

name: ITEM_20170313_013924
text: A box unlocked by the Corsair Master. Return it to the village residents at the Elgos Monastery Annex.

name: ITEM_20170313_013926
text: A document organized by Gatre containing the notes from Sarma's research.

name: ITEM_20170313_013927
text: There seems to be something written in it, but it's hard to tell what it is. Try and collect all the pieces first.

name: ITEM_20170313_013929
text: After putting together the torn pages, it looks like it's part of a ledger. The name 'Kedora Merchant Alliance' is written on it, so it seems that's the institution it belongs to.

name: ITEM_20170313_013932
text: An orb given by Kupole Meile. It can be used to appease those who have been petrified.

name: ITEM_20170313_013934
text: A type of grass requested by Lucienne Winterspoon for her research

name: ITEM_20170313_013938
text: A letter written by the Chaplain Master for you to deliver to the Priest Master.

name: ITEM_20170313_013940
text: A pouch containing a very decent amount of holy powder, provided by the Priest Master.

name: ITEM_20170313_013942
text: Remains of Carnivore left on the spot where it was defeated. Why did Lucienne Winterspoon's alchemy experiment fail?

name: ITEM_20170313_013944
text: An orb given by the Warlock Master for you to absorb the evil spirit.

name: ITEM_20170313_013946
text: A piece of sheet music given by the Miko Master.

name: ITEM_20170313_013947
text: A royal order granted by Princess Gaivile. Something feels strange about the document.

name: ITEM_20170313_013948
text: Vaidotas' special chemical that can reveal invisible ink.

name: ITEM_20170313_013950
text: A type of flower used to make special chemicals.

name: ITEM_20170313_013952
text: A type of flower used to make special chemicals.

name: ITEM_20170313_013954
text: A bottle made to contain water.

name: ITEM_20170313_013958
text: A copy of the royal order with hidden writings in invisible ink.

name: ITEM_20170313_013959
text: The royal order with the invisible writings erased.

name: ITEM_20170313_013961
text: An official document to appoint a new Appraiser Master.

name: ITEM_20170313_013964
text: A bag with accessories made by Accessory Merchant Jurus.

name: ITEM_20170313_013966
text: A certificate verifying the authenticity of the Fencer Master's family heirloom.

name: ITEM_20170313_013967
text: A certificate verifying the authenticity of Accessory Merchant Jurus' accessories.

name: ITEM_20170313_013970
text: The first fragment of wand that seems to be broken in pieces.

name: ITEM_20170313_013972
text: The second fragment of wand that seems to be broken in pieces.

name: ITEM_20170313_013974
text: A wand restored from broken fragments. Having already been destroyed once, it looks a little unstable.

name: ITEM_20170313_013977
text: A plain dagger. The name 'Edward' is engraved in it.

name: ITEM_20170313_013979
text: A sturdy-looking bow. The name 'Edward' is engraved in it.

name: ITEM_20170313_013981
text: An unknown flower growing in the Tamas' habitat.

name: ITEM_20170313_013983
text: A flask given by Edward for you to collect Cyst fluid.

name: ITEM_20170313_013985
text: A flask filled with Cyst fluid.

name: ITEM_20170313_013987
text: A herb exuding a delicate fragrance. It smells slightly sweet, too.

name: ITEM_20170313_013989
text: A flower of intricate tones and a peculiar scent.

name: ITEM_20170313_013991
text: A large chunk of meat. It looks rather tough.

name: ITEM_20170313_013993
text: A fragrance Bastille was carrying. It sure smells potent.

name: ITEM_20170313_013995
text: A glass flask given by Hunter Bastille for you to collect honey from the Pendrosiums.

name: ITEM_20170313_013997
text: A flask filled with Pendrosium honey.

name: ITEM_20170313_013999
text: A sphere made to activate blocking devices.

name: ITEM_20170313_014001
text: A bizarrely frightening Loftlem eye. It looks disgusting.

name: ITEM_20170313_014003
text: The spores of dead liverwort. They look like they could fly away with the slightest breeze.

name: ITEM_20170313_014005
text: A vividly-colored stone able to provoke hallucinations in demons.

name: ITEM_20170313_014007
text: Pieces of stone taken from the bodies of Moya monsters. The way they sparkle makes them look like gems at a glance.

name: ITEM_20170313_014009
text: A crystal fragment from the wand of a Saltisdaughter monster. It possesses a slight glow.

name: ITEM_20170313_014011
text: An old stone with a faded glow. It looks like someone used it to create a magic circle in the Flooded District a long time ago.

name: ITEM_20170313_014013
text: A bag with emergency food supplies obtained from inside a chest.

name: ITEM_20170313_014015
text: A heavy bag containing something unknown.

name: ITEM_20170313_014017
text: An old, faded ring. It features a small inscription on the inside.

name: ITEM_20170327_014018
text: Looks like you got fooled...{nl}Can be used for 7 days after being obtained.

name: ITEM_20170327_014021
text: An April Fools' feather.{nl}Use it to trick your friends and enemies.

name: ITEM_20170327_014023
text: A cube obtained from a little trickster.{nl}It doesn't look "legit" at all.

name: ITEM_20170327_014025
text: Grants party members +4 movement speed, +1 AoE attack ratio and +25% EXP gains for 30 minutes.{nl}Can only be used on March 28, 2017.

name: ITEM_20170330_014026
text: Squire Master Justina Legwyn is extremely talented not only in equipment repair but in production as well. After her designs became popular, she attached her name to them in honor of the Legwyns' fallen family legacy.

name: ITEM_20170330_014027
text: Marone equipment originated from a religious order. In year 215 of the Kingdom, clerics began to divide into different orders, each developing their own style of equipment. Over time, these religious equipment items became more often used by those not related to an order.

name: ITEM_20170330_014028
text: Receive set item effects by wearing all of the Sugar accessories.

name: ITEM_20170330_014030
text: According to the legend, it is possible to place other objects inside the necklace using a special kind of magic. The objects placed inside of it are thought to disappear into the realm of the demons.

name: ITEM_20170330_014032
text: After Medzio Diena, species of plants mutated into monsters, and combinations that were previously impossible became viable. For example, the combination of once-inanimate objects and materials obtained from existing monsters resulted in new kinds of equipment, the Symaere Necklace being one of them.

name: ITEM_20170330_014033
text: Receive set item effects by wearing all of the Sugar accessories.

name: ITEM_20170330_014034
text: Receive set item effects by wearing all of the Sugar accessories.

name: ITEM_20170330_014036
text: Legends say this piece of equipment is made from the same material of the pipes used in demon buildings. Given the environmental differences between their realm and ours, it's hard to tell what conditions their pipes are made to endure. We can merely guess what characteristics this piece of equipment may possess.

name: ITEM_20170330_014038
text: After Medzio Diena, species of plants mutated into monsters, and combinations that were previously impossible became viable. For example, the combination of once-inanimate objects and materials obtained from existing monsters resulted in new kinds of equipment, the Symaere Bracelet being one of them.

name: ITEM_20170330_014040
text: The Basme Bracelet is said to originate from the demon realm and have a mind of its own. At any second the teeth that adorn it can come to life and attack its wearer.

name: ITEM_20170330_014042
text: Rumor has it this piece of equipment was designed by Demon King Kartas. It is said that Kartas himself soon forgot about it, but his most ferocious subordinates started to produce it in large quantities until it infiltrated our world.

name: ITEM_20170330_014044
text: This piece of equipment not only has a mind of its own, it is also suspected to manipulate other beings. Its wearer is said to wake up from dreams which they cannot remember, dreams in which they conversate with the accessory.

name: ITEM_20170330_014046
text: Try not to look into the eyes of this piece. Sometimes its eyes will be closed, but when they are open it may look like they are alive.

name: ITEM_20170330_014047
text: Equipment for a Highlander Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the effects of Skyliner.

name: ITEM_20170330_014048
text: Equipment for a Swordsman Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the effects of Restrain.

name: ITEM_20170330_014053
text: Equipment for a Wizard Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the effects of Magic Missile.

name: ITEM_20170330_014055
text: Equipment for a Pyromancer Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the effects of Fire Pillar.

name: ITEM_20170330_014061
text: Equipment for an Archer Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the effects of Multi Shot.

name: ITEM_20170330_014062
text: Equipment for a Quarrel Shooter Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the effects of Running Shot.

name: ITEM_20170330_014063
text: Equipment for a Ranger Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the effects of Barrage.

name: ITEM_20170330_014068
text: Equipment for a Priest Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the effects of Mass Heal.

name: ITEM_20170330_014069
text: Equipment for a Dievdirbys Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the animation when carving Goddess Statues.

name: ITEM_20170330_014070
text: Equipment for a Monk Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the effects of Double Punch.

name: ITEM_20170330_014071
text: Equipment for a Cleric Circle 3.{nl}Right-click to equip.{nl}- Changes the effects of Heal.

name: ITEM_20170330_014078
text: An ornament commonly placed on the heads of horses.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014080
text: A traditional hair ornament, commonly used by women for outdoor activities.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014081
text: A corolla of purple flowers.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014082
text: All you need are some eggs, sugar and salt to make it.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014083
text: A cute hair accessory with a blue ribbon and lace details.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014084
text: A pudding made with strawberries. Yum.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014085
text: A hair accessory in the shape of butterfly wings. the black lace and golden details give it an aura of opulence.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014086
text: A hair accessory adorned with a heart decoration in the middle.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014087
text: An accessory made with bison horns and flower embellishments.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014088
text: A small corolla.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014089
text: A balloon shaped like a dog. Be careful not to burst it.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170330_014090
text: Use to grow a sprout containing all the grace of the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20170330_014095

name: ITEM_20170420_014532
text: while equipped{nl}  - Stacks when equipping the same item

name: ITEM_20170420_014533

name: ITEM_20170420_014535
text: A fitted uniform symbolizing your status in school. Wear to change your appearance.

name: ITEM_20170420_014544
text: A sailor costume invoking the romance of cherry blossom season. Wear to change your appearance.

name: ITEM_20170420_014547
text: A safe outfit to wear to a wedding. Wear to change your appearance.

name: ITEM_20170420_014549
text: A dress for the friends of the bride. Wear to change your appearance.

name: ITEM_20170420_014552
text: Yes! This is it!{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20170420_014554
text: Primary weapon of the cavalry, optimized for slashing. The guard on the hilt helps protect the user's hand.

name: ITEM_20170420_014556
text: A Nodachi with a length 'just right' can amplify its slashing power and dominate the space between the wielder and their foe.

name: ITEM_20170420_014558
text: Legends say that evil wizards were the first to start using this weapon.

name: ITEM_20170420_014560
text: A staff widely enjoyed by wizards of the past, but for no particular reason.

name: ITEM_20170420_014562
text: It is presumably named after the place where its inventor came from.

name: ITEM_20170420_014564
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master uses this to teach beginners.

name: ITEM_20170420_014566
text: Seasoned clerics attack the enemy in a multitude of ways using the ornament at the head of this mallet.

name: ITEM_20170420_014568
text: A standard, military-issue weapon for common soldiers.

name: ITEM_20170420_014570
text: Alchemically crafted weapons are being re-evaluated and are trending with the resurgence of the monsters.

name: ITEM_20170420_014572
text: Minivern's high defense becomes a great gift for crafters after it dies, like in this armor.

name: ITEM_20170420_014574
text: A piece of armor that holds well over time and can used in different ways by those with the right know-how.

name: ITEM_20170420_014576
text: Favored by those looking to achieve swift, precise movements.

name: ITEM_20170420_014578
text: If you wear them, you can see how little noise they make.

name: ITEM_20170420_014580
text: The true power of this blade is its ability to cleave everything between you and your enemy.

name: ITEM_20170420_014582
text: This sword has absorbed the experience of an elite soldier. Whether you are a mercenary or not, if you enjoy fighting you will appreciate this sword.

name: ITEM_20170420_014584
text: This weapon is a staff condensed with magic through complicated methods.

name: ITEM_20170420_014586
text: This staff symbolizes many virtues. Justice, truth, space and more.

name: ITEM_20170420_014588
text: The archers from the Astral Tower do not care for this bow. However, others living in these treacherous times might find this bow useful.

name: ITEM_20170420_014590
text: In the old days, the majority of the body from this equipment was made by silver. The silver products were famous in Fedimian.

name: ITEM_20170420_014592
text: It has a form to display the unique character of this town, but the material is not silver.

name: ITEM_20170420_014594
text: The Royal Army used it for the ceremony, but many warriors find it useful during real battles.

name: ITEM_20170420_014596
text: After Partisan-style spears became popular, they started to be produced for the aristocracy, including this modified version.

name: ITEM_20170420_014598
text: The previous Skirmisher equipment is being crafted with improved qualities as the monsters go rampant since Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20170420_014603
text: A normal sword regardless of the power with a magic. Of course, If there are people who ignore the power of this sword, they can be damaged by this sword.

name: ITEM_20170420_014605
text: Don't you feel a foreboding presence from the enemy? It seems this isn't over yet.

name: ITEM_20170420_014607
text: According to the stories passed down through time, this staff was meant to possess a very powerful magic force. Its creator, however, passed away before they could imbue the magic in it, resulting in the state it has today.

name: ITEM_20170420_014609
text: According to an old saying, the origin of the cane is related to the Demon Lord Helgasercle.

name: ITEM_20170420_014611
text: Unlike its name, this bow will be welcomed by any archer. Rogues aren't the only ones who prefer this bow.

name: ITEM_20170420_014613
text: Careful attention of the user is necessary to avoid ruining the fine structure of this equipment. Its craftmenship adds a layer of complexity compared to regular weapons, which give credence to its value.

name: ITEM_20170420_014615
text: Blacksmiths and those with another job often buy this to actually use it.

name: ITEM_20170420_014617
text: If one feels that his weapon deals additional damages on the demons, that's just a feeling.

name: ITEM_20170420_014619
text: Even if multiple weapons share the same origin, some of them can develop further than the others.

name: ITEM_20170420_014621
text: A simple piece of equipment to help you in combat.

name: ITEM_20170420_014623
text: This equipment was loved in the south of Orsha before Medzio Diena, and was used while hunting and traveling.

name: ITEM_20170420_014636
text: A necklace containing the blessing of Kupoles.

name: ITEM_20170420_014638
text: A bracelet containing the blessing of Kupoles.
