name: ITEM_20170726_015153
text: - 1% chance of inflicting Bleeding for 15 seconds, dealing 50% of damage equal to the amount of your attack every 1.5 seconds

name: ITEM_20170726_015154
text: No one knows how Jukopus gave this weapon its abilities. The Winterspoon family seems to know, but do not share it.

name: ITEM_20170726_015156
text: The Fyrmes Necklace contains a small portion of divine power, which is the source of its greenish color. It also symbolizes the desire to never witness the end of our world as we know it.

name: ITEM_20170726_015158
text: The symbol engraved in the center is said to have evolved from an ancient rune. So much so, it is used by rune masters to teach their pupils.

name: ITEM_20170726_015160
text: The Mejstra Necklace was developed by a skilled master of dreams. It gives its wearer the ability to extract power from their dreams into reality.

name: ITEM_20170726_015162
text: The Svijes Necklace features the characteristics of the Fyrmes Necklace at a more developed level. In this necklace, the divine power has altered the nature of the piece itself.

name: ITEM_20170726_015164
text: The method use to create the first Atikha Necklace is known only in the northern regions of the Kingdom. It was merchants who discovered a way to produce them using easier to find materials.

name: ITEM_20170726_015166
text: Features the phrase, "Let the voice of the Goddess enter my heart, let it become my strength," engraved in very small lettering on the back.

name: ITEM_20170726_015168
text: The Lynnki Sit Necklace is known for imbuing its wearer with the power of its original owner, with the first owner gaining the power of the necklace's maker. Nothing is lost in this process, as the necklace merely adds the power of the previous owner to the current wearer, without taking any power away from those who come into contact with it.

name: ITEM_20170726_015170
text: This necklace was discovered by a maker looking for a way to equip two items at once. Considering its accidental discovery, the effects it possesses are quite extraordinary.

name: ITEM_20170726_015172
text: The body includes an engraved sentence claiming the origins of this piece in a shattered dagger owned by a goddess.

name: ITEM_20170726_015174
text: This necklace inherited the style of those created during the Kingdom's heydays. Currently, it assumes a more modern stance on that style, although its performance is lacking compared to the original pieces.

name: ITEM_20170726_015176
text: The Fyrmes Bracelet symbolizes an eternal cycle, represented by the looped metal rings. It is also a reminder of the will of the goddesses to banish the demons and their chaos.

name: ITEM_20170726_015178
text: According to merchant rumors, the fact that this piece possesses a single stat is the fault of a beginner's mistake.

name: ITEM_20170726_015180
text: The Mejstra Bracelet symbolizes the life added to an eternal cycle. Many were the makers who devoted themselves to maintaining the symbolism in this piece.

name: ITEM_20170726_015182
text: According to legends, the Svijes Bracelet was first created by a wizard known to have ventured into the realm of demons. After his body was discovered, the bracelet was the only way to confirm his identity.

name: ITEM_20170726_015184
text: When the Atikha Bracelet was first produced, the process of joining the two semicircles that compose it was very important. Today the bracelet is made from a single piece, which makes it more dangerous but easier to craft even by inexperienced makers.

name: ITEM_20170726_015186
text: This piece represents the power obtained from allowing the voice of the goddesses to reach one's heart.

name: ITEM_20170726_015188
text: The Lynnki Sit Bracelet is said to store and accumulate the power of its wearer and return it when necessary. This means that, unless the wearer is in a combat situation, it will be difficult to witness the effects of this bracelet. That said, it remains to be proven whether this makes any difference to actual combat performance.

name: ITEM_20170726_015190
text: This bracelet was made to help sacrifice the last elements maintaining the wearer's life to allow them to deliver one ultimately powerful blow. It all depends on whether the wearer's resistance is higher than the enemy's.

name: ITEM_20170726_015192
text: The red gems in this bracelet symbolize the blood of the enemy. The inner surface reads, "Never fear, only fight."

name: ITEM_20170726_015194
text: This bracelet inherited the style popular during the Kingdom's heydays. Contrary to its delicate appearance, this piece boasts very good resistance, a characteristic which it transfers into its wearer as well.

name: ITEM_20170726_015196
text: Wear it at a fancy chateau somewhere, you'll fit right in. Use to change your appearance.

name: ITEM_20170726_015203

name: ITEM_20170912_015498
text: More than protection, the attire of a gladiator is first and foremost about showmanship. A perfect armor decreases the enjoyment of the audience, which is why the Murmillo's covers only half of the body.

name: ITEM_20170912_015499
text: The cloth around the neck allows a Shinobi to cover their face when necessary. Doing so tells the adversary that they are a Shinobi without revealing their identity.

name: ITEM_20170912_015500
text: Fencers require costly, high-quality garments, as even those of humble origins are connected with the higher classes through education or war. The Hutton family has long promoted the use of official uniforms for lower-class Fencers, which resulted in the extravagant fashions of traditional Fencer clothing being all but eliminated. This helped boost the status of lower-class Fencers, and it was the first step towards popularizing the occupation.

name: ITEM_20170912_015501
text: Dragoons, often descendants of nobility, tend to dress in a slightly ostentatious fashion. This, of course, does not diminish their ability in combat.

name: ITEM_20170912_015502
text: Templars first started to wear the purple mantle as they began to separate themselves from the clergy by order of the empire. One could say the mantle is a symbol of royal authority over the church.

name: ITEM_20170912_015503
text: Lancer garments are made with a type of metallic fabric that can maintain a good degree of malleability.

name: ITEM_20170912_015504
text: Class garments are often adopted by the nobility for fashion purposes, regardless of their relation to the job. The same cannot be said for Sage clothing. Despite their trendy appearance, Sage clothes are produced with strong-smelling chemicals which, while helpful in keeping bookworms at bay, make the outfits unattractive to fashion-oriented folk.

name: ITEM_20170912_015505
text: Warlocks may not be the most popular class in the social sphere, but their presence has long been customary at all kinds of gatherings. Because of this, Warlock garments are purposely made to look appropriate for balls and formal parties.

name: ITEM_20170912_015506
text: Featherfoots originate from outside the kingdom and research on them is scarce. Because of this, little is known about the elements of their clothing.

name: ITEM_20170912_015507
text: Despite their light appearance, Rune Caster garments are made to protect the wearer against the cold, while allowing for movement in warmer weather. This is a reflection of the climate in which Rune Caster clothing is produced.

name: ITEM_20170912_015508
text: Enchanters tend to value efficiency and performance over appearance, which is why their clothing is often simple and unadorned.

name: ITEM_20170912_015509
text: Appraisers are known to be fond of comfortable clothing, although they tend to wear formal garments whenever they are required to contact with higher-class customers. This outfit is an example of that.

name: ITEM_20170912_015510
text: The thick material of Falconer clothes is resistant to the hawk's claws, while also protecting them from damage.

name: ITEM_20170912_015511
text: Cannoneer outfits were originally similar to typical blacksmith clothing. With time, however, the class gained a higher status and its attire began to look more elegant.

name: ITEM_20170912_015512
text: Today's Musketeer garb is an exact replica of the royal honor guard uniforms worn centuries ago. Curiously, the honor guard now wears a modern version of those uniforms.

name: ITEM_20170912_015513
text: The purpose of Mergen attire in its culture of origin continues to be unknown in the kingdom. So far, the Mergen Master has provided no clues to this mystery.

name: ITEM_20170912_015514
text: Chaplain clothing combines colors and elements symbolizing the goddesses to convey a sense of security to battling soldiers. Despite this, the philosophy behind Chaplain garments does not allow for their adaptation to real combat situations.

name: ITEM_20170912_015515
text: These garments are known to be highly resistant to dirt, allowing them to last for longer periods of time without washing. Not only that, they are designed for easy laundering.

name: ITEM_20170912_015516
text: Traditionally, the ornaments in Kabbalist clothing each represent a different academic achievement. However, the lack of enforcement of this custom by the current Kabbalist Master has made it so that even beginners have started to wear the ornaments freely.

name: ITEM_20170912_015517
text: The Inquisitor's stole was originally worn only in occasions of judgement. Today, with the goddesses disappeared, it is worn at all times to help propagate the Inquisitors' doctrine.

name: ITEM_20170912_015518
text: Taoist garments are reminiscent of the style based in past academic traditions.

name: ITEM_20170912_015519
text: Miko clothing reflects the traditions of its culture of origin, resulting in a visible contrast with the local fashions of the kingdom. With the emerging status of Mikos in society, their style is also likely to influence future trends in the kingdom.

name: ITEM_20171128_015911
text: A piece of equipment that represents the laurel wreath, a symbol of Nachel I, who was considered to be King of the Kingdom.

name: ITEM_20171128_015933
text: Masinios is a wizard who lived in the era of King Frienel. He came up with a very unique idea, which was to combine the power of magic with machinery and this is one of the results of his application. This sword is a product near the end of his life which reflects latter days of his research.

name: ITEM_20171128_015960
text: - 1% chance on attack per nearby enemy, up to 10%, to gain a stack. Upon gaining 5 stacks, gain the [War Mode] status for 10 seconds{nl} {nl}War Mode{nl} - Physical Attack {img green_up_arrow 16 16}120 AoE Attack Ratio {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl} - Physical Defense {img red_down_arrow 16 16} 400 Maximum HP {img red_down_arrow 16 16}2000

name: ITEM_20171128_015961
text: Because magic can resolve a lot of issues with ease, there was no need for a mechanism to transfer physical forces such as gears. However, Masinios was preoccupied with the idea of transferring magical power thorough machines. Only that this two-hand sword was created in his early days of his research. But due to that fact, the magical effect from this weapon is rather quite strong.

name: ITEM_20171128_015988
text: - 10% chance on skill attack to gain SPR {img green_up_arrow 16 16}5{nl}Stacks up to 10 times

name: ITEM_20171128_015989
text: For an equipment made by Masinios, it has a very wizard-like design.

name: ITEM_20171128_016016
text: - 10% chance on attack to decrease Critical Resistance by {img red_down_arrow 16 16}10 for 5 seconds{nl}Stacks up to 20 times

name: ITEM_20171128_016017
text: Rumor has it all, but when this bow was revealed to the world, Lucid Winterspoon mentions that it would have been nice if Masinios had actually experienced combat as a different class and broadened his thinking. Of course, this cannot be confirmed as she rarely answers questions about people who lived in the same era as her past.

name: ITEM_20171128_016044
text: - All Quarrel Shooter skill levels {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl}  - Running Shot skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

name: ITEM_20171128_016045
text: Rumor has it that many of the later wizards laughed at the fact that Masinios was not able to create an amazing production method for the crossbow where he could demonstrate the advantage of machinery. Another rumor is that Lucid Winterspoon admonished such mages that they were only entitled to say such a thing if they worked on magic theory even half as hard as Masinios and held two master seats.

name: ITEM_20171128_016072
text: - 30% chance to deal a 2000 Lightning property attack

name: ITEM_20171128_016073
text: A weapon that uses a physical pipe to magnify magical power instead of jewels which were used by the majority of the great mages of that era. This was a very Masinios-like decision and the product of his early mid days.

name: ITEM_20171128_016095
text: This is the result of improving the mace made by Masinios himself. Due to the fact that the mace and two-handed mace are distinctly different in performance from each other, it can be seen that it was not his intention. Rather, it can be said that he felt it was okay that this performance came as a result of him trying.

name: ITEM_20171128_016115
text: - Final Block Rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2%{nl}  - 8% chance to reduce damage by {img red_down_arrow 16 16}50% when hit

name: ITEM_20171128_016116
text: - Final Block Rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}3%{nl}  - All Peltasta skill levels {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1 {nl}  - All Rodelero skill levels {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

name: ITEM_20171128_016125
text: A shield made at the request of an anonymous noble at the time of Masinios. Since then, the recipe was kept a secret, but according to the will of Masinios, it was revealed to the world after his death. This post-death release process has been commonly applied to products that he has made upon the request of several nobles to fund his research.

name: ITEM_20171128_016154
text: - 5% chance on attack to deal additional damage equal to your Lightning property attack * 10

name: ITEM_20171128_016155
text: Masinios was so absorbed in future machinery and could not get enough that he changed his name to Masinios. Because of this, his previous name was forever buried in the darkness of history, never to be known. However, the Masinios Spear is made by the recipe he designed before his renaming, so his name can be traced through the magical power left in the recipe. Since Masinios is not such a popular person from the past, no one has tried so far.

name: ITEM_20171128_016183
text: - 10% chance on attack to reduce Stamina by 1.5 and apply the [Collision] status. [Collision] will change to [Collision Aftershock] when stacked 10 times within 10 seconds. {nl} {nl} Collision Aftershock{nl} - Applies Slow debuff for 10 seconds {nl} - Physical Defense {img red_down_arrow 16 16}800

name: ITEM_20171128_016184
text: This pike is said to have been made to the needs of a certain nobleman when Masinios was no longer paid by the Mages' Association. Wizards of the time would not have been able to understand Masinios, who was researching machinery that could hardly be called magical research.

name: ITEM_20171128_016214
text: According to rumors, it is said that the recipe was devised at the request of a famous Shinobi of that time. Of course, from Masinios' circumstance the greatest reason was the procurement of funding for his research.

name: ITEM_20171128_016241
text: Once Masinios understood that the devices installed by Agailla Flurry in the Mage Tower operated not on magical power, but the collection and accumulation of a certain power, he applied the same principles to the staff which provided high magic amplification considering the materials and effort required.

name: ITEM_20171128_016245
text: When weapons were introduced in the kingdom, there were many directions for the development. With this weapon, the emphasis is on making it smaller, the convenience for consecutive shootings, and the satisfaction for design.

name: ITEM_20171128_016264
text: - Full Metal Jacket skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1{nl}  - Limacon skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1{nl}  - Pistol Shot skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

name: ITEM_20171128_016265
text: The opinion on the weapon is that while Masinios understood magic and machinery, he did not understand gunpowder, which is why the pistols were made this way.

name: ITEM_20171128_016286
text: - 15% chance on attack to gain the [Sharpening] status for 5 seconds. When [Sharpening] stacks 5 times, your next basic attack will hit 5 times. {nl} {nl}Sharpening{nl} - Critical Attack {img green_up_arrow 16 16}60

name: ITEM_20171128_016287
text: There are conflicting reasons as to why Masinios as a wizard decided to devote himself to machines, but one theory is that this was due to the penultimate wizard, Agailla Flurry. It is said that he was attracted to the machine within the very Mage Tower she created.  This rapier is said to be crafted during the period of time when Masinios favored magic and considered machinery as just an addition.

name: ITEM_20171128_016306
text: - Sweeping Cannon skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1{nl}  - Bazooka skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

name: ITEM_20171128_016307
text: It is of common opinion to say that the gears, including the gears in the Mage Tower, are not devices that use magic, but rather a device that draws a certain power and collects it in the tower. Masinios misunderstood this point and immersed himself in machinery, so the weapons he invented could have been much better, but they are not. This is also true of the cannon.

name: ITEM_20171128_016325
text: - 10% chance when critically attacking to decrease the enemy's Block {img red_down_arrow 16 16}400

name: ITEM_20171128_016326
text: The Masinios musket was a completely new musket design created in the latter half of Masinios' life. It is considered a success among his attempts to combine magic and machinery.

name: ITEM_20171128_016340
text: A top made using eagle feathers for flare. The feathers are not easily removed due to quality craftsmanship.

name: ITEM_20171128_016342
text: A top made from a special ivy. They are environmentally friendly.

name: ITEM_20171128_016344
text: Made with overlapping plates. Due to this imbrication, moving around in it is quite comfortable.

name: ITEM_20171128_016406
text: The material used here allows for the draping piece of cloth on the left side to shine uniquely under different lighting conditions.

name: ITEM_20171128_016408
text: The creator of this piece must have been deeply affected by Medzio Diena and the subsequent rampaging of his farm's crops. Or maybe he just really likes pumpkins.

name: ITEM_20171128_016410
text: Unlike the place where the darkness descends or the place where it is bright, it is the equipment that always stands out without taking the time zone.

name: ITEM_20171128_016424
text: Pants made from eagle feathers for flare. The feathers are not easily removed due to the quality of craftsmanship.

name: ITEM_20171128_016426
text: Pants made from special ivy. They are environmentally friendly.

name: ITEM_20171128_016428
text: Made with overlapping plates. Due to this imbrication, moving around in it is quite comfortable.

name: ITEM_20171128_016490
text: The white fur works nicely for decoration, but it's also enchanted to provide exceptional magic defense.

name: ITEM_20171128_016492
text: It is said that the eye of a pumpkin provides more detectability. However, most people think that is just a rumor.

name: ITEM_20171128_016494
text: After the rumor of relativity between Ausura and this equipment vanished, the effectiveness of this equipment became famous. Most of all the actual demand will be the main reason after Medzio Diena.

name: ITEM_20171128_016508
text: Boots made from the beaks of eagles.

name: ITEM_20171128_016510
text: Boots made from a special ivy. They are environmentally friendly.

name: ITEM_20171128_016512
text: Made with overlapping plates. Due to this imbrication, moving around in it is quite comfortable.

name: ITEM_20171128_016574
text: Considering vast verdant areas, the basic color of Laitas equipment was chosen as green. There is no need to mention the helpful magic for the wearer to cross those terrains.

name: ITEM_20171128_016576
text: There is one superstition that the pumpkin's eyes on this piece can actually detect an enemy's weakness. Believing in a superstition enough can make it true.

name: ITEM_20171128_016578
text: It is said that this equipment was named after Demon Lord "Ausura" who was created by Gesti herself, but it seems this is just mere coincidence. There is no reason that Man would praise the name of the Demon. And for Ausura this is still an ill news since even maybe Ausura is a Demon Lord but still, there are many superiors still ahead.

name: ITEM_20171128_016594
text: Gloves made from special ivy. They are environmentally friendly.

name: ITEM_20171128_016596
text: Made with overlapping plates. Due to this imbrication, moving around in it is quite comfortable.

name: ITEM_20171128_016658
text: Smiths, Alchemists, Wizards whom going through this most desperate time in Kingdom are concentrating on the development of new pieces of equipment. After Four Year from Medzio Diena, that effort finally pays off with new inventions and craftings. It is believed that Laitas Series will be in front of all those new inventions.

name: ITEM_20171128_016660
text: After you make holes for the pumpkin's eyes, nose, and mouth, you'll be able to fit your fingers through them and use them for heavy lifting. Being unaesthetic is fun!

name: ITEM_20171128_016662
text: It is a common mistake that people confuses that Ausura equipment named after Demon Lord Ausura. The existing of Ausura is known to few whom well knows about the demonic world. This is just a mere coincidence.

name: ITEM_20171128_016664
text: Although it is quite common, this Costume is worn by amateur Matadors who have limited experience dealing with beasts. There are some Matador also wear this to represent themselves as an expert in this particular field.

name: ITEM_20171128_016667
text: A Matador wearing this costume signifies that they have dealt with some of the most deadly beasts.

name: ITEM_20171128_016670
text: A costume only worn by veteran Matadors who are experienced with dealing with a large variety of beasts.

name: ITEM_20171128_016673
text: This Costume is created in honor to the first Shadowmancer.

name: ITEM_20171128_016676
text: When Shadowmancer Master Ubik started researching about the Eclipse, she presented this type of costume to her apprentices who achieved improvements in research.

name: ITEM_20171128_016681
text: A costume given to every Bullet Marker that represents the dawn of days when firearms first came into use.

name: ITEM_20171128_016684
text: Matcher is known as an inventor of the match and as the one who enhanced the use of gunpowder. He is a member of the Winterspoon family but is more well known by his nickname. The Bullet Marker Master named this costume after him to commemorate his achievements and hard work.

name: ITEM_20171128_016687
text: This Costume symbolizes earnest integrity. According to Flint this costume is as cool as a well-dried fuse.

name: ITEM_20171128_016690
text: This costume inspired from the Cult of Zealot's apprentice combat training

name: ITEM_20171128_016693
text: There are two great factions in the Cult of Zealots. This costume is inspired from the costume of a Zealot whom exalted from Laima's faction.

name: ITEM_20171128_016696
text: Based on the present between Loremasters of Jurate and Cult of Zealots, this Costume improved its design until nowadays. Unfortunately, the stream between those two factions is not really amiable.

name: ITEM_20171128_016698
text: Look! There's a pretty butterfly!{nl}Can be exchanged for medals in the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20171128_016699
text: A hair ornament containing the power of the goddess' wings.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20171128_016700
text: In some regions people dance while wearing this to cast away evil spirits.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20171128_016712

name: ITEM_20171128_016721
text: A result of rudimentary research attempting to increase the quality of staves by combining several items.

name: ITEM_20171128_016725
text: - 3% chance to inflict [Stun] on an enemy for 3 seconds

name: ITEM_20171128_016732
text: Death was already immanent within the rapid growth behind the explosive increase of plants. It draws as near as life force is used for rapid growth and magic gained from ferns has the same effect on plants.

name: ITEM_20171128_016748
text: In the past, only archers who completed the training in the Astral Tower could use this weapon.

name: ITEM_20171128_016752

name: ITEM_20171128_016759

name: ITEM_20171128_016760
text: This rod's nickname is 'The Staff of Patience.' Legends say that Agailla Flurry, the greatest wizard in history, devised this rod to train her apprentices.

name: ITEM_20171128_016763
text: - 100% critical rate on Beast-type enemies{nl}- {img red_down_arrow 16 16}25% damage on non-Beast-type enemies

name: ITEM_20171128_016764
text: Prior to Medzio Diena, hunters rarely used this bow. It might sound strange, but the bow would cause excessive damage to the prey.

name: ITEM_20171128_016770
text: After Medzio Diena, the equipment that were used for the hunting and the adventures are receiving the spotlight. As the number of violent monsters increases, the adventurous hunting which was unique before is becoming daily lives.

name: ITEM_20171128_016789
text: - Staff attacks (C Key) increase damage equal to 200% of your magic attack

name: ITEM_20171128_016791
text: - Attacks will reduce an enemy's critical resistance by {img red_down_arrow 16 16} 8 for 20 seconds (Max Stacks: 20)

text: - All Quarrel Shooter skill levels {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2

name: ITEM_20171128_016794

name: ITEM_20171128_017113

name: ITEM_20171128_017115

name: ITEM_20171128_017117
text: The sacred treasure of Jurate that tradition person Ugnius had. It was said that it was a necklace worn by a priest who conducted rituals and ordinances.

name: ITEM_20171128_017119
text: Jurate's second artifact, although the Demons sealed it, it is a mirror that was used in rituals and as a sanctuary that washed away demonic energy using the aura of the sea.

name: ITEM_20171128_017120
text: Luxuriously decorated water. They are said to be water bottles containing water for purification Ritual. The traitor, Ugnius, went to Letave Plateau and asked him to fill up the water of the sea.

name: ITEM_20171128_017122
text: Blue moss. It is said to be used for ritual burning after being dried.

name: ITEM_20171128_017124

text: In the early days of the Kingdom, this precious ore could not be mined without the blessing of a goddess. Nowadays, it's not that difficult. This piece is small enough to fit in a box. Collection item.

text: A handful of common weeds brought by Dexter the cat. From the teeth marks, he seems to have ripped them off with his mouth. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20180320_017647
text: A mallet brought by Dexter the cat. It looks like it was used for a long time. Where in the goddesses' realm did Dexter get this?

name: ITEM_20180320_017649
text: A small fish brought by Dexter the cat. It must have been caught just now, it's still jumping about. Does Dexter go fishing? Collection item.

name: ITEM_20180320_017651
text: A rusty screw brought by Dexter the cat. It's pretty rusty all over. Dexter's owner should be worried that his cat was carrying this in his mouth. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20180320_017653
text: An unripe apple brought by Dexter the cat. It's going to be a couple of days until it's good to eat. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20180320_017655
text: Torn pieces of wood brought by Dexter the cat. They are quite small, enough to be carried by Dexter with his mouth. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20180320_017657
text: A knife brought by Dexter the cat. It looks worn out and unkempt. Someone should really teach Dexter not to bring home such dangerous things. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20180320_017658

name: ITEM_20180320_017659

name: ITEM_20180320_017660

name: ITEM_20180320_017661

name: ITEM_20180320_017662

name: ITEM_20180320_017663

name: ITEM_20180320_017664

name: ITEM_20180517_018260
text: Dragons can be biologically classified by how magic affects them. For one, it's been proven that dragons belong in the same broad category as Beast type monsters, due to how similarly they react to specific types of magic.

name: ITEM_20180517_018262
text: - 5% chance to inflict [Bleeding] on enemies for 30 seconds every 1.5 seconds when using Shark Cutter{nl} - A basic attack will hit 5 successive times every 5 times you apply [Bleeding] to enemies{nl} - {img red_down_arrow 16 16} 50% reduced damage of [Ghost] armor-type targets

name: ITEM_20180517_018264
text: Dragons have been known to store the divine vital force they find spread throughout the world in their bodies, in the hopes of gathering the power to defy future goddesses. That vital force, however, can also be used by humans to produce weapons. An example of that is Teliavelis' gear series, where the designs take inspiration from dragons.

name: ITEM_20180517_018266
text: Some speculate that goddesses like Austeja are for the preservation of dragons as a means to provide some kind of security for humans in the future. Teliavelis, on the other hand, believes that it is simply a proof of the goddesses' respect for all living creatures.

name: ITEM_20180517_018268
text: It is said that those who are spiritually sensitive can discern the energy of both goddesses and dragons in this weapon. The combination of such contrasting powers remains forever unfamiliar to those who experience it.

name: ITEM_20180517_018270
text: Many artisans believe they can produce Velcoffer equipment from regular materials. However, Teliavelis has shown that it takes a talented blacksmith to be able to handle materials containing the power of the goddesses.

name: ITEM_20180517_018271
text: - All Quarrel Shooter skill levels {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl}  - Running Shot skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

name: ITEM_20180517_018272
text: - Increases Running Shot skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

name: ITEM_20180517_018273
text: - All Quarrel Shooter skill levels {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl}  - Running Shot skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

name: ITEM_20180517_018275
text: This weapon is produced with real dragon scales, although one knows for sure how Teliavelis obtains them.

name: ITEM_20180517_018277
text: Teliavelis is the only blacksmith known to have mastered the technique required to quickly solidify metal components. Some believe he uses the intense cooling properties of dragons when casting the metal.

name: ITEM_20180517_018279
text: Although its handle is made of metal, this weapon produces no unwanted vibration when hitting the target. You could say that it is proof of Teliavelis' extraordinary talent.

name: ITEM_20180517_018281
text: According to a recently uncovered Exorcist report, after its design was initially revealed, this shield caught the attention of several high-ranking demons. Realistically, of course, it is highly unlikely that any of them will ever possess one.

name: ITEM_20180517_018283
text: Some artisans and wizards suspect that Teliavelis may have gotten the Velcoffer Spear and Pike designs confused when crafting this weapon. The difference is merely visual, however, as it doesn't affect the weapons' performance.

name: ITEM_20180517_018284
text: - Deals {img green_up_arrow 16 16}235 additional damage when using [Impaler]

name: ITEM_20180517_018286
text: The ornaments may resemble a pair of wings, but this weapon is not intended to be thrown over long distances.

name: ITEM_20180517_018288
text: Some believe that the blade is made not from metal, but dragon bone. Unfortunately, dragon bones are a rare material, making this claim almost impossible to confirm.

name: ITEM_20180517_018289
text: - 20% chance of dealing additional Fire property damage equal to 33% of your character level for 10 sec when using Hell Breath.

name: ITEM_20180517_018291
text: Teliavelis hopes this weapon will once become a symbol of victory over the dragons for humans and goddesses.

name: ITEM_20180517_018293
text: After the reappearance of dragons, Flint Winterwood is said to be researching new ways to create stronger, heat-resistant weapons by using dragon materials.

name: ITEM_20180517_018295
text: Despite its design, this sword provides decent protection to both hands and wrists. Some users, however, say that holding it can feel like touching the inside of a dragon's mouth.

name: ITEM_20180517_018297
text: Recently, the Cannoneer Master has announced her opposition to the use of this weapon for military purposes. She firmly believes that the Royal Army should not mass-produce rare weapons like this one.

name: ITEM_20180517_018300
text: Experts who have used this weapon tend to have a good impression of it. Its only flaw, they say, is that it can be hard to clean without getting injured. Fortunately, at least, it doesn't seem to backfire any sparks when used.

name: ITEM_20180517_018302
text: Surprisingly, the Velcoffer Robe is the most difficult piece to produce out of the entire Velcoffer gear series. This is because the robe is made from very delicate materials.

name: ITEM_20180517_018304
text: Many believe, mistakenly, that Velcoffer equipment is made with dragon leather. While it is true that Teliavelis uses dragon materials in his gear, this piece does not include any dragon leather components.

name: ITEM_20180517_018306
text: One legend says that Froster Lord used the power of Giltine to freeze over the world of the dragons a long time ago. Such strong magic can only be undone if Giltine herself allows her powers to be used again.

name: ITEM_20180517_018308
text: Some say that Teliavelis has several ideas ready for future gear series, ideas no one has ever thought of before. Apparently, he is just waiting for the right time to reveal them.

name: ITEM_20180517_018310
text: According to Teliavelis, after Medzio Diena the magic used to enhance equipment items has been irreversibly changed. Therefore, in his gear he prefers to focus on the performance, leaving the magic components open to more diverse setups.

name: ITEM_20180517_018312
text: According to legends, the most powerful dragons are still alive in the dragon world. As long as their realm is dominated by the Froster Lord, however, the dragons will remain trapped there, unable to escape.

name: ITEM_20180517_018314
text: Although they maintain their traditional style to this day, the original Sausis boots were unimaginably faster.

name: ITEM_20180517_018316
text: One legend says that Velcoffer originally worked as a guard for an even stronger dragon. Whether that was true or not, the dragon he was said to work for is no longer alive.

name: ITEM_20180517_018318
text: A few Class Masters believe that, if Teliavelis was involved in producing equipment for the goddesses, that could constitute proof that he is part of the Amzinas. The other Amzinas, however, have never confirmed whether that is true or simply a rumor.

name: ITEM_20180517_018320
text: No one knows for sure if there are other dragons besides Boruta and Velcoffer roaming our world, but the possibility is there. Especially after Medzio Diena, these creatures have had more opportunities than ever to escape their confinement.

name: ITEM_20180517_018322
text: While many consider Teliavelis a great craftsman, some believe that there is something more to his originality. It is thought that his pieces were designed with the wisdom of the goddesses, and that he is merely their maker and conveyer.

name: ITEM_20180517_018324
text: Sometimes, finished pieces of Velcoffer gear are found in our world. Strangely enough, they don't seem to have been made by humans, which has led magic Class Masters to assume that the goddesses possessed the original versions of Teliavelis' items.

name: ITEM_20180517_018326
text: Legends tell that one powerful dragon named Boruta crossed over to our world a long time ago. They say that, compared to him, Velcoffer is still a relatively young dragon.

name: ITEM_20180517_018327
text: - Adds {img green_up_arrow 16 16}50% Skill Factor when using the following skills{nl}- Fireball{nl} - Fire Wall{nl} - Fire Pillar{nl} - Hell Breath{nl} - Flame Ground{nl} - Meteor{nl} - Incineration{nl} - Prominence{nl} - Combustion{nl} - Immolation

name: ITEM_20180517_018328

name: ITEM_20180517_018330
text: Considering that this necklace can drop from defeated demons, one would think that it does not distinguish between the good and bad nature of the wearer. On the other hand, it could also mean that the necklace is likely to betray its lawful owner.

name: ITEM_20180517_018332
text: There is a strong possibility that Demon Goddess Ragana is connected to this piece. She is said to belong to a trinity of demon deities.

name: ITEM_20180517_018334
text: Dragons can be biologically classified by how magic affects them. For one, it's been proven that dragons belong in the same broad category as Beast type monsters, due to how similarly they react to specific types of magic. Use to change your appearance.

name: ITEM_20180517_018336
text: A Matador who wears this costume is one with a deep understanding of the behavioral and biological traits of all beasts, as well as the longs history of the demonic world.

name: ITEM_20180629_018614
text: As a Pied Piper, influencing minds is an important task. Those who have mastered this art are more than qualified to wear this costume.

name: ITEM_20180629_018617
text: An outfit that makes reference to a very famous scene in Pied Piper lore. It is said that the Pied Piper enticed the children with candy and persuaded them to follow along.

name: ITEM_20180629_018620
text: It is said that truly legendary Pied Pipers can move even mountains to dance and follow along. There has yet to be such a person, but Pied Pipers with extraordinary skills are handed down this outfit.

name: ITEM_20180629_018625
text: Exorciser is a term describing a beginner Exorcist. It used to refer to a shaman before the establishment of the Kingdom and now it is embroidered on the garments of the Exorcists.

name: ITEM_20180629_018628
text: On becoming an Exorcist of the highest expertise, one learns that the true meaning of the term Exorcist is "The Oath of the Soul Binder". This costume is bestowed upon those who have learned this true meaning.

name: ITEM_20180629_018631
text: The scrolls of rituals used during an exorcism are written in crimson ink. The design of this costume was inspired by the color of the exorcism scrolls.

name: ITEM_20180629_018634
text: A long time ago, the Royal Family granted Exorcists judicial power when a possession was identified to be genuine. This costume was created in celebration of that moment in history and the Exorcist Master who mediated such an outcome. Only those wearing this costume will be granted judicial power by law.

text: This item is a symbol of the Exorcist's faith. Those who carry the beacon on their backs have vowed to shine their light on the world even if they end up crucified. Story is told of a famous Exorcist who destroyed all demons within the vicinity of the beacon by allowing himself to be crucified. But, of course, there are few demons who will equal in power to an Exorcist who carries the beacon on their back.

name: ITEM_20180827_019064
text: This piece of equipment disappeared along with Nicopolis at the time of the experiment. Then, with the influence of Medzio Diena, it somehow found its way back into our world. It is said to have reappeared near the Starlit Lake because of the magic rituals Pbeta executed in order to defeat Solcomm there.

name: ITEM_20180827_019067
text: One of the reasons why the Owyn family is active in the region of Nicopolis is the strange reappearance of old weapons that were thought to have vanished along with the city. After studying the returned weapons, Owynia Dilben sought the help of the Bullet Marker Master to produce new copies of the equipment. Curiously, however, until they gain a proper owner, the newly-created weapons seem to disappear and reappear at random times.

name: ITEM_20180827_019071
text: One of the reasons why the Owyn family is active in the region of Nicopolis is the strange reappearance of old weapons that were thought to have vanished along with the city. After studying the returned weapons, Owynia Dilben sought the help of the Bullet Marker Master to produce new copies of the equipment. Curiously, however, until they gain a proper owner, the newly-created weapons seem to disappear and reappear at random times.

name: ITEM_20180827_019073
text: - Grants 5% chance per attack of applying additional Fire property damage equal to 16% of your minimum magic attack every second for 10 seconds.

name: ITEM_20180827_019090
text: - Final Block Rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1%{nl}  - 1% chance to regenerate 40 HP every second for 5 seconds when taking damage

name: ITEM_20180827_019118
text: Among the old Nicopolis items that have reappeared after Medzio Diena, many are weapons, but armor items are relatively rare. There is no telling where the people who wore these items disappeared to, but some seem to have left behind their clothing.

name: ITEM_20180827_019120
text: Among the old Nicopolis items that have reappeared after Medzio Diena, many are weapons, but armor items are relatively rare. There is no telling where the people who wore these items disappeared to, but some seem to have left behind their clothing.

name: ITEM_20180827_019154
text: - 10% chance of inflicting the Curse of Sausis debuff.{nl}Cooldown 10 sec{nl}{nl}Curse of Sausis{nl}- Reduces the target's movement speed by 10 and critical resistance by 100.

name: ITEM_20180827_019155
text: This style of gloves is thought to have been worn by Sausis. His frost powers are known to be virtually insuperable.

name: ITEM_20180827_019160
text: A necklace created by the Class Masters who are working to maintain secrecy in the Astral Tower resistance army. Its magic values have been kept intentionally low, as overly powerful equipment can reveal the social status of both the wearer and the sponsor.

name: ITEM_20180827_019162
text: This necklace has its own name engraved on the back. Many believe that the Linker Master engraved the words in an ambiguous manner so as to both reveal her identity and leave room for speculation.

name: ITEM_20180827_019164
text: Engraved here as several sets of initials which could be interpreted as the names of current Masters connected to the Astral Tower.

name: ITEM_20180827_019166
text: No one knows for sure who the original owner of this necklace was. According to a famous anecdote, they became frustrated after several failed attempts at tweaking its properties and ultimately decided to sell it.

name: ITEM_20180827_019168
text: The owner of this necklace attacked their enemy from behind and disappeared without a trace. No one saw who they were, or what they looked like.

name: ITEM_20180827_019170
text: - When worn, prevents summons from being knocked back.

name: ITEM_20180827_019171
text: The summons walked forward, mighty and powerful. The sight was akin to that of an enormous army advancing.

name: ITEM_20180827_019173
text: A bracelet left behind by the Himil family at the time they separated from the Schaffenstar. The family later realized their mistake, but being in the possession of the bracelet's recipe, they did not demand to have it returned. It is said that the Schaffenstar themselves were unaware of the bracelet's whereabouts for a long time.

name: ITEM_20180827_019175
text: Lydia Schaffen used many accessories throughout her lifetime, some of which have since been divided and reconstructed. This bracelet is one of such accessories.

name: ITEM_20180827_019177
text: Although they were rare, the Schaffenstar is known to have had its heretics, meaning those who wished to free themselves from the shadow of Lydia Schaffen. These people never managed to make much of an impact, but recently some of their remaining objects were put to use by Elder Adaux.

name: ITEM_20180827_019179
text: Be careful not to injure yourself with the sharp metal parts. The identity of the owner of this bracelet remains unknown.

name: ITEM_20180827_019181
text: There is no escape from a powerful attack. One blow is all it takes.

name: ITEM_20180827_019183
text: The owner of this bracelet was fully invested in their summons. The bracelet is a result of their incessant efforts.

name: ITEM_20180827_019531
text: Title given to players selected for the monthly BEST event.

name: ITEM_20180827_019533
text: Title given to players selected for the monthly BEST event 5 times.

name: ITEM_20180827_019535
text: Title given to players selected for the monthly BEST event 10 times.

name: ITEM_20180827_019536
text: A Bokor can summon zombies by using this capsule. You must know the [Zombify] skill in order to use it and the maximum zombie count is the same as from [Zombify].

name: ITEM_20180827_019537
text: This object is rumored to bring bad luck to its owner. Most recently, it is thought to have led to the death of a member of the Green family.

name: ITEM_20180827_019539
text: Relic kept by the priests of Baltinel Memorial.

name: ITEM_20180827_019541
text: Objects belonging to the rescued Kupoles.

name: ITEM_20180827_019543
text: Tool used by the demons to hunt the Kupoles.

name: ITEM_20180827_019545
text: Magic tool in the shape of a necklace created by Kupole Grisia to trick Kupole Velad.

name: ITEM_20180827_019547
text: Things Kupole Grisia is trying to deliver to Velad.

name: ITEM_20180827_019549
text: A magic-blocking scroll given by Owynia Dilben. Use it to control the magic of the sculptures in Starry Town.

name: ITEM_20180827_019551
text: Found in Starry Town Square. A powerful electric current is flowing through it.

name: ITEM_20180827_019552
text: Record of newly-arrived residents in Feline Post Town.

name: ITEM_20180827_019555
text: Powder found stuck to a monster. Can be used to detect substances in chemical solutions.

name: ITEM_20180827_019557
text: A solution produced by the Exorcist Master to detect signs of possession and find the Teal Specter hiding in Feline Post Town.

name: ITEM_20180827_019559
text: Solution made for finding the Teal Specter hiding in the artist's body.

name: ITEM_20180827_019561
text: A device that detects minute manifestations of magic.

name: ITEM_20180827_019563
text: A scroll that can make objects levitate.

name: ITEM_20180827_019565
text: Old research documents written in a mysterious hieroglyphic script.

name: ITEM_20180827_019567
text: Bottle used for collecting the materials that make up the starry stairs in the clock tower square.

name: ITEM_20180827_019569
text: A net used for catching fish.

name: ITEM_20180827_019571
text: A fish from the lake. It is still alive.

name: ITEM_20180827_019572
text: Documents with information on how to operate the Water Facilities.

name: ITEM_20180827_019574
text: A written note, penned by someone who was likely in a hurry. It is stained with blood.

name: ITEM_20180827_019576
text: A shining Magic Stone. It looks filled with magic and ready to be used.

name: ITEM_20180827_019578
text: A bag for collecting purified water.

name: ITEM_20180827_019580
text: Small plants that grow on the lake. They give off a strong divine energy.

name: ITEM_20180827_019582
text: Powder made from refined Rias Weeds.

name: ITEM_20180827_019583
text: A bag full of purified water.

name: ITEM_20180827_019589
text: A stone that can detect magic. It looks expensive.

name: ITEM_20180827_019591
text: Part of an ancient disc. You need the other half in order to read what is written on it.

name: ITEM_20180827_019594
text: Orb created to reveal demons who are disguised as humans.

name: ITEM_20180827_019596
text: A stone imbued with the magic energy of the lake.

name: ITEM_20180827_019597
text: A stone that absorbs specific types of energy.

name: ITEM_20180827_019599
text: Contains instructions on how to craft an arrow using the method developed by the Fletcher Master.

name: ITEM_20180827_019601
text: A material that emits a faint shine, at times found on the continent. Rumors say it can be used to produce powerful tools.

name: ITEM_20180827_019603
text: A type of Obsidian possessing a distinctive red color. It's imbued with the magic energy of the lake.

name: ITEM_20180827_019605
text: A type of feather that is exceptionally malleable and robust.

name: ITEM_20180827_019607
text: A highly poisonous plant, avoided even by insects.

name: ITEM_20180827_019609
text: A trap made with Ziburyte poison.

name: ITEM_20180827_019611
text: Lean meat obtained from a Humming Duke.

name: ITEM_20180827_019613
text: A water plant that grows on the lake. It possesses outstanding purifying properties.

name: ITEM_20180827_019615
text: A blue orb imbued with magic. It disappears if taken outside of Baubas Cave.

name: ITEM_20180827_019617
text: A blue crystal containing concentrated magic. Its uses are unknown. The crystal disappears if taken outside of Baubas Cave.

name: ITEM_20180827_019619
text: A red crystal containing concentrated magic. Its uses are unknown. The crystal disappears if taken outside of Baubas Cave.

name: ITEM_20180827_019621
text: A yellow crystal containing concentrated magic. Its uses are unknown. The crystal disappears if taken outside of Baubas Cave.

name: ITEM_20180827_019623
text: A device used to suppress the magic of portals.

name: ITEM_20180827_019625
text: A bomb for destroying portals. Use it to eliminate the portals created by the demons.

name: ITEM_20180827_019626
text: A magic stone fragment that was being held by a demon. Kron wants to use it to create a bomb that can destroy the magic protecting the defensive devices.

name: ITEM_20180827_019628
text: A bomb made from magic stone fragments. It may be slow to detonate, but the explosion it produces is powerful enough.

name: ITEM_20180827_019630
text: This lever can be connected to the first defensive device in order to deactivate the trap.

name: ITEM_20180827_019632
text: A document obtained from nearby demons containing instructions from a superior. They describe what to do on 4F.

name: ITEM_20180827_019634
text: This lever can be connected to the second defensive device in order to deactivate the trap.

name: ITEM_20180827_019636
text: A key belonging to Elder Henika. It exudes an unpleasant energy. You will need it to use the elevator to 21F.

name: ITEM_20180827_019638
text: Emergency medicine commonly provided to members of the Schaffenstar. It includes a powerful antidote. Somehow it was in the hands of a demon.

name: ITEM_20180827_019640
text: A handle that controls the barrier that's hiding the first defensive device on 12F. You can connect it to the control device and turn the handle to disable it.

name: ITEM_20180827_019642
text: A key belonging to Elder Adaux. It exudes an unpleasant energy. You will need it to use the elevator to 21F.

name: ITEM_20180827_019644
text: A scroll being kept by the Schaffenstar members guarding the control device. You can use it to find magic sources hidden nearby.

name: ITEM_20180827_019646
text: This lever can be connected to the defensive device in order to deactivate the trap.

name: ITEM_20180827_019648
text: A key to the General Office on 20F, taken from the demons. It can be used to find another key.

name: ITEM_20180827_019650
text: Another key to the General Office on 20F. It can be used with the other office key to operate the elevator to 21F.

name: ITEM_20180827_019652
text: An arrow given by Byle. It may not be powerful enough to stop Elder Henika, but it can weaken the demons.

name: ITEM_20180827_019654
text: A key belonging to Elder Cezaris. It exudes an unpleasant energy. You will need it to use the elevator to 21F.

name: ITEM_20180827_019656
text: Traces of magic found scattered around. Byle wants to use them to overload the demon devices.

name: ITEM_20180827_019657
text: The tenth Revelation, found at the Astral Tower. Readable.

name: ITEM_20180827_019659
text: A red bookmark that can be used to decipher the code used in the Fantasy Library. You need to place all the bookmarks in the correct order to open the portal.

name: ITEM_20180827_019661
text: A yellow bookmark that can be used to decipher the code used in the Fantasy Library. You need to place all the bookmarks in the correct order to open the portal.

name: ITEM_20180827_019663
text: A green bookmark that can be used to decipher the code used in the Fantasy Library. You need to place all the bookmarks in the correct order to open the portal.

name: ITEM_20180827_019665
text: A blue bookmark that can be used to decipher the code used in the Fantasy Library. You need to place all the bookmarks in the correct order to open the portal.

name: ITEM_20180827_019666
text: Story of the Legendary Archer and Arrow Maker. Readable.

name: ITEM_20180827_019667
text: No target is invisible for a trained archer! Readable.

name: ITEM_20180827_019668
text: Advice on the use of tools given by Lydia Schaffen to her apprentices. Readable.

name: ITEM_20180827_019669
text: The challenges faced by Lydia Schaffen and her solutions. Readable.

name: ITEM_20180827_019670
text: Essential Reading for Linkers: Finding The Nexus Point Of All Ego. Not readable.

name: ITEM_20180827_019671
text: A book sought after by the Sage Master. Not readable.

name: ITEM_20180827_019672
text: A research paper on armors used during the rule of King Kadumel. Not readable.

name: ITEM_20181017_019674
text: An armband accessory celebrating 1 year of TOS.

name: ITEM_20181017_019680
text: Legends tell of a celestial rabbit that lives on the Moon and is often seen pounding rice in its mortar. Like all rabbits, it's as cute as a button.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.{nl}Hair dyes do not apply.

name: ITEM_20181017_019682
text: A sweet dumpling featuring an aromatic herb filling.

name: ITEM_20181017_019684
text: - 10% chance per Strike attack to increase Critical Rate by 2x for 5 sec

name: ITEM_20181017_019685
text: The Wastrel itself has no interest in artifacts returned from the past. It's the powerful magic accumulated in its body that attracts old artifacts and even connects them to it.

name: ITEM_20181017_019687
text: {nl} {nl}Sharp Blade{nl} - Critical attacks delivered with a One-handed Sword apply a buff that increases critical attack by +250 for 10 sec{nl} {nl}- While Sharp Blade is active, every critical attack increases your critical attack values by an additional +80{nl}(Max. increase: 400)

name: ITEM_20181017_019688
text: This piece of equipment disappeared with the accident of Nicopolis, but it returned to our world around the same time as the Asiomage and the Quipmage.

name: ITEM_20181017_019690
text: - Increases movement speed while Cyclone is active

name: ITEM_20181017_019691
text: Ancient artifacts attracted by the Wastrel are known to interact with the monster's peculiar magic. One cannot tell what new kinds of magic may arise from those interactions.

name: ITEM_20181017_019693
text: The Quipmage was always interested in expanding his influence. To achieve this, he had plans to recruit mercenaries and provide them with weapons that could surpass the power of those used by the Royal Army.

name: ITEM_20181017_019694
text: - 1% chance to reduce an enemy's magic defense by 50% of your own magic defense and {img green_up_arrow 16 16} increase physical defense for 30 seconds with a basic attack (Does not apply to boss monsters)

name: ITEM_20181017_019696
text: The Asiomage is notably fond of this weapon, as it provides an increase in intelligence. More than a tool, it serves as a sort of mood-boosting toy to the monster.

name: ITEM_20181017_019698
text: A long time ago, a wizard created a giant lock and key, and with that they produced this weapon. Despite its appearance, however, it's often used as a cane for walking.

name: ITEM_20181017_019700
text: All the equipment that disappeared during the accident of Nicopolis has returned in the exact same conditions, without any signs of the time that has passed.

name: ITEM_20181017_019702
text: {nl} {nl}Animal Friend: Rabbit{nl} - Skill attacks grant a 10% chance of summoning a rabbit, which applies one of two buffs.{nl} {nl} - Smiley Bunny: Critical Rate +20 per stack for 10 sec, triggers Angry Bunny after 3 stacks.{nl} - Angry Bunny: AoE Attack Ratio +2, final buff applied by rabbit (duration 15 sec).

name: ITEM_20181017_019703
text: The Asiomage is carrying out research to improve the equipment originally developed by his other self, the Quipmage. This item, for example, is already more effective than when it first returned to our world.

name: ITEM_20181017_019705
text: All Nicopolis equipment has returned to our world in the exact same conditions as when it disappeared, from its basic components down to the coatings of oil, now centuries old.

name: ITEM_20181017_019707
text: The Asiomage is not fond of this weapon. He still remembers being used as a living bullseye in past experiments, particularly for crossbows.

name: ITEM_20181017_019709
text: Some wizards of old Nicopolis were secretly opposed to the Kingdom, but in order to feign support, they developed a few weapons that make use of divine power. This is one of such weapons.

name: ITEM_20181017_019711
text: {nl} {nl}Summon Shaman Doll{nl}  - One-handed Blunt weapon attacks grant a 10% chance of summoning a shaman doll (duration 5 sec, max. 1 doll).{nl} {nl}  - Destroy the doll to deal damage all around in proportion to its HP.{nl}  (Shaman doll HP: 30,000-50,000)

name: ITEM_20181017_019712
text: Some scientists complain that the name of this item is arbitrary, as it bears no resemblance to owls whatsoever.

name: ITEM_20181017_019714
text: Some of the items attracted by the Wastrel's bodily magic are actually harmful to it. Otherwise, the Wastrel would be even more powerful than it is now.

name: ITEM_20181017_019716
text: - Demolition skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl}  - God Smash skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2

name: ITEM_20181017_019717
text: This weapon is said to have been intended for an army of Golem monsters. It is unknown whether the Quipmage or the Asiomage have any memory of that fact.

name: ITEM_20181017_019719
text: - Final Block Rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2%{nl}  -  5% chance of resisting rank 2 or lower status ailments

name: ITEM_20181017_019720
text: Fortunately for everyone, the Wastrel does not use this shield for protection. However, the shield is said to ease the pain of generating new equipment items.

name: ITEM_20181017_019722
text: - Final Block Rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2%{nl} {nl} Eye of the Asiomage{nl} - Provocation targets {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

name: ITEM_20181017_019723
text: Unlike other Asio items, this one faithfully represents the style and conventions popular in old Nicopolis before the great accident.

name: ITEM_20181017_019725
text: Most items that contain magic gems have negative effects on the Wastrel's body. That can be considered a fortunate occurrence.

name: ITEM_20181017_019727
text: A spear designed by a wizard. The Quipmage doesn't seem to have thought that the shape of this weapon would pose any problem.

name: ITEM_20181017_019729
text: Of all the items attracted by the Wastrel, some are incorporated physically, while some have only their magic properties absorbed. Physically assimilated objects are thought to be constantly prodding the body of the Wastrel.

name: ITEM_20181017_019731
text: The Asiomage is missing crucial memories about his line of equipment, while the Quipmage wonders why he remembers such useless information. This is thought to be the reason why there is still no upgraded version of the Asio Pike.

name: ITEM_20181017_019733
text: {nl} {nl}Black & White Mask{nl}ENH: Additional Holy property attack +30 per weapon enhancement stage starting from +10{nl} {nl}TRA: Additional Dark property attack +30 per transcendence stage{nl}(Max. increase in additional Holy/Dark attack: 300)

name: ITEM_20181017_019734
text: This item is thought to flow in the veins of the Wastrel. Although the monster's blood and circulatory system are very different from that of most living beings, it still seems to cause the Wastrel pain when it passes through certain regions of its body.

name: ITEM_20181017_019736
text: - Dagger attacks in stealth mode increase damage by 15%

name: ITEM_20181017_019737
text: The Quipmage intended to use this weapon to assassinate the Pervading Queen and the Teal Specter. All three of these wizards had plans to annihilate the others, each through their own methods.

name: ITEM_20181017_019739
text: In the early days of this weapon, it was common for it to break down into three pieces. Large amounts of magic were used to increase its durability, so much so that, now, it will not break even when it is fused into the Wastrel.

name: ITEM_20181017_019741
text: Unlike the Asio Rod, the Asio Staff is known to bring down the spirits of the Asiomage. The intelligence boost causes him to relive even more memories of his turbulent past.

name: ITEM_20181017_019743
text: - Full Metal Jacket skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl}  - Retreat Shot skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2

name: ITEM_20181017_019744
text: Due to the gap created by Medzio Diena, the Wastrel's living quarters have begun to attract common items found in the present. This means that the Wastrel is not only surrounded by weapons like this pistol, but also by miscellaneous items like worn-out shoes and broken chairs.

name: ITEM_20181017_019746
text: {nl} {nl}Target Set{nl} - Pistol attacks grant a 20% chance of applying the Target Set debuff.{nl} {nl} - Target Set deals 5,000-7,000 damage to 10 nearby enemies when it reaches 3 stacks.{nl} {nl} - Damage increased by 30% per nearby enemy affected by Target Set (max. increase: 700%).

name: ITEM_20181017_019747
text: The Asiomage is quite proud of this weapon. He began designing his own gunpowder weapons after returning to our world.

name: ITEM_20181017_019749
text: Weapons like these with low slashing power can easily end up lodged in the Wastrel's body. Fortunately for the Wastrel, however, they do not cause him pain.

name: ITEM_20181017_019752
text: Although the original designer of this weapon was the Pervading Queen, the Asiomage is the one currently developing it. The Pervading Queen has long lost interest in the production of equipment.

name: ITEM_20181017_019753
text: - Sweeping Cannon skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1{nl}  - Cannon Barrage skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

name: ITEM_20181017_019755
text: - Attacks in Bazooka status grant a 10% chance of applying the same damage as the previous attack.

name: ITEM_20181017_019756
text: Seeing as so many weapons are absorbed into the Wastrel's body, one would think at least some of them would be deployed inside of it.

name: ITEM_20181017_019758
text: - Sweeping Cannon skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl}  - Siege Burst skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2

name: ITEM_20181017_019759
text: The Asiomage was heavily influenced by the excessive scholarly fervor that is typical of wizards, which led him to create unnecessary weapons for no apparent reason.

name: ITEM_20181017_019761
text: This weapon was not absorbed into the Wastrel's body by traveling through the gap that appeared during Medzio Diena. It is said to have been carried by an adventurer who attempted to defeat the Wastrel.

name: ITEM_20181017_019763
text: After returning to our world and learning that many bird species had mutated into monsters, the Asiomage made plans to create his own army of birds to carry this weapon. A rather birdish thought, one might say.

name: ITEM_20181017_019765
text: Legends tell of a celestial rabbit that lives on the Moon and is often seen pounding rice in its mortar. Like all rabbits, it's as cute as a button.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20181017_019767
text: Undercover envoys of the royal court were special agents who scoured the Kingdom looking for outlaws and troublemakers.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20181017_019770
text: Becoming a royal scholar was no easy task: only the Kingdom's brightest minds were allowed to serve in the court.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20181017_019773
text: These robes were worn by undercover royal envoys to carry out top-secret missions.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20181017_019775
text: The chessboard is much more than part of game; it is a true battlefield.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20181017_019777
text: This medal was used by undercover envoys to reveal their identity to higher officials and request aid for their missions. Now, it has been re-imagined as a hair accessory.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20181017_019779
text: This style of hat was used to avoid the harsh sunlight on long trips to faraway regions.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20181017_019781
text: Those of the noble classes commonly wore this style of hat when walking or riding outside in the sun.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20181017_019797
text: Let's show everyone your support! Voooooooo! Event item.

name: ITEM_20181017_019798
text: It lets you dig. Event item.

name: ITEM_20181017_019799
text: Ah! You found something! Event item.

name: ITEM_20181017_019800
text: Work on your biceps. Event item.

name: ITEM_20181017_019801
text: Bursting the little plastic bubbles is the most satisfying feeling ever. Event item.

name: ITEM_20181017_019802

text: A highly trained Assassin always walks a fine line between life and death. It is said that this mask grants them the gift of life when an Assassin's life is in peril.{nl}It cannot be dyed.
