name: ITEM_20190104_020070
text: - All Quarrel Shooter skill levels {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl}  - Additional non-property attack of 3,000 damage

name: ITEM_20190104_020074
text: A weapon commonly used by scouts.

name: ITEM_20190104_020076
text: Decent performance at an affordable price.

name: ITEM_20190104_020078
text: A pistol made of wood. It may not look convincing, but it certainly is affordable.

name: ITEM_20190104_020081
text: A pistol made of wood. The interior is lined in metal for additional power and stability.

name: ITEM_20190104_020083
text: Bullets are reloaded by turning the large cylinder. The rotating parts can sometimes malfunction, but that doesn't interfere with the use of the pistol.

name: ITEM_20190104_020089
text: Allows you to attack over long distances.

name: ITEM_20190104_020092
text: The Sketis line of equipment is said to have been designed during the reign of King Themomel.

name: ITEM_20190104_020094
text: The sharp blade allows you to pierce through enemies with ease. It can also be used to attack with Pommel Attack and Cross Guard.

name: ITEM_20190104_020100
text: Weapon of choice for those who have just moved on from their training cannon. Unfortunately, here extravagance does not correlate with performance.

name: ITEM_20190104_020104
text: The item can no longer be used. Inquire with the Weapon Change Helper NPC

name: ITEM_20190104_020106
text: This item was designed as a remodeled version of a training musket. Rather than performance, however, the focus of the design was on ornamentation. The intention was to mimic the appearance of Lolopanther, although it doesn't possess the same splendor.

name: ITEM_20190104_020110
text: - Triggers the Ignas - Immunity buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Ignas - Immunity{nl} - Grants a (2.5 * Ignas - Immunity stacks)% chance of resisting debuffs of Lv 2 and below.

name: ITEM_20190104_020111
text: It is hard to tell what methods Ignas used to craft this item from the essence of Ziburynas. If he was able to harness the full power of the essence, he certainly would have created much stronger equipment.

name: ITEM_20190104_020113
text: - Activates the Jab buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Jab{nl} - Triggers Ignas - Jab when you attack in stealth mode.{nl} {nl} Ignas - Jab{nl} - Increases physical and magic critical attack by (300 * Jab stacks). (10 sec duration)

name: ITEM_20190104_020114
text: No one knows exactly why Ignas produced different pieces of equipment from such varied materials. Some believe he intended to target enemies other than the Resistance.

name: ITEM_20190104_020116
text: - Activates the Wrath buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Wrath{nl} - Grants a (5 * Wrath stacks)% chance of triggering Ignas - Wrath whenever you are attacked. {nl} {nl}Ignas - Wrath{nl} - Maximum attack + 250 (max. 3 stacks, 10 sec duration)

name: ITEM_20190104_020117
text: Given how the Astral Tower is located in the middle of a lake, the likelihood of a surprise attack is significantly low. One wonders, then, what Ignas' intentions were behind the making of this plate armor.

name: ITEM_20190104_020119
text: - Triggers the Ignas - Immunity buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Ignas - Immunity{nl} - Grants a (2.5 * Ignas - Immunity stacks)% chance of resisting debuffs of Lv 2 and below.

name: ITEM_20190104_020120
text: One could assume that Ignas only possessed a limited amount of the Essence of Ziburynas, seeing as how he used fairly little of it on his line of equipment.

name: ITEM_20190104_020122
text: Were it not for production constraints, a full Schaffenstar army equipped with Ignas' items would become the strongest in the Kingdom. One could even argue that would be enough to defeat any other armed forces in the nation 4-to-1.

name: ITEM_20190104_020124
text: When he created these pants, Ignas mentioned that they were designed as testing equipment for Schwarzer Reiters and other mercenaries from the Astral Tower.

name: ITEM_20190104_020126
text: - Activates the Tactics buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Tactics{nl} - Triggers Ignas - Tactics with every critical attack.{nl} {nl}Ignas - Tactics{nl} - Increases magical critical attack by (125 * Tactics stacks){nl}(Max. 2 stacks, 10 sec duration)

name: ITEM_20190104_020127
text: The Astral Tower includes flooring of many types, including wire mesh floors. These boots were created to protect the wearer's feet from all kinds of floor materials.

name: ITEM_20190104_020129
text: - Activates the Scrutiny buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Scrutiny{nl} - Triggers Ignas - Scrutiny with every successful evasion.{nl} {nl}Ignas - Scrutiny{nl} - Increases critical rate by (70 * Scrutiny stacks). (10 sec duration)

name: ITEM_20190104_020130
text: Some pieces are said to contain the inscription, "Schaffenstar under the stars, the world under Schaffenstar."

name: ITEM_20190104_020132
text: - Activates the Fortitude buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Fortitude{nl} - (5 * Fortitude stacks)% chance to trigger Ignas - Fortitude on successful block.{nl} {nl}Ignas - Fortitude{nl} - Physical and magic defense +300{nl}(Maximum of 5 stacks for 10 sec duration)

name: ITEM_20190104_020133
text: According to Elder Ramunas' experiments, extracting the Essence of Ziburynas from Ignas' equipment is not as easy as it may seem. He believes, however, that a magic Class Master may be able to achieve just that one day.

name: ITEM_20190104_020135
text: Looking at how each piece of Ignas' equipment is adorned with Schaffenstar symbols, one can assume that these would be the items used by its members, had he remained as head of the organization.

name: ITEM_20190104_020137
text: According to reports from his early career, Ignas predicted that any act of treason within the Schaffenstar would be met with three obstacles: Lydia Schaffen's provisions, the Three-Layered Castle Wall, and Class Master neutrality. These gloves, however, provide a clue as to which Master he foresaw as an ally.

name: ITEM_20190104_020139
text: The claws in these gauntlets are useful not just in combat situations, but also in the daily life of Schaffenstar members, especially when it comes to cleaning the external walls of the Astral Tower.

name: ITEM_20190104_020140
text: - Increases magic critical attack by a value equal to {img green_up_arrow 16 16}40% of your HP recovery rate at the time of equipping this item{nl} - Reduces HP recovery rate to 0

name: ITEM_20190104_020142
text: A different magic object was used to alter the nature of these jewels, and the resulting magic power was then spread throughout the rest of the ornaments.

name: ITEM_20190104_020144
text: This necklace was created from an attempt to divide a single property into two beneficial directions. That is, indeed, the way in which Kite Moor magic is operated.

name: ITEM_20190104_020146
text: The person who crafted this piece believed that its original maker had committed a mistake. In order to bring out the item's hidden power, they collected accessories of different kinds and brought them together as one.

name: ITEM_20190104_020148
text: The body includes an engraved sentence claiming the origins of this piece in a shattered dagger owned by a goddess.

name: ITEM_20190104_020150
text: The old power of Lynnki is now seemingly gone. Instead, this accessory has received a form of divine power that will never fade away.

name: ITEM_20190104_020152
text: A new method has been found to produce this accessory which generates an even stronger magic that protects the life of its wearer.

name: ITEM_20190104_020154
text: The combination of different accessories in this piece has given it an even greater power.

name: ITEM_20190104_020156
text: The inscription on the back may have faded, but its meaning lives on in the form of powerful magic.

name: ITEM_20190104_020159
text: Dragon magic doesn't traditionally apply in our world, but it is possible to make it work with sufficient training. The magic in this seal is a result of such efforts, i.e. the closest humans have ever gotten to experiencing the fruits of Boruta's work.

name: ITEM_20190104_020165
text: A seal offered by Kaze to those who aid her cause.

name: ITEM_20190104_020171
text: A spooky vampire costume. Use to change your appearance.

name: ITEM_20190104_020174
text: A costume granted to guilds who succeeded in seizing a Spot. Use to change your appearance.{nl}The costume will be deleted at the end of the next GTW season.

name: ITEM_20190104_020176
text: A costume granted to guilds who succeeded in seizing a Spot. Use to change your appearance.

name: ITEM_20190104_020178
text: Hoppity-hop your way into any party with this sexy bunny costume. Use to change your appearance. Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20190104_020180
text: Garments worn by Giltine's followers when attending secret assemblies.{nl}Use to change your appearance.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20190104_020182
text: Templar attire awarded by King Gliehel following the Second War of Succession during which the Templars contributed greatly. It is reflective of attires worn by Templars during that time.

name: ITEM_20190104_020183
text: Due to their nature of pursuing connections among things, Linkers prefer a simple and plain outfit that will remind one of nothing at all. They say they do this so that people will not have a standardized view of Linkers.

name: ITEM_20190104_020184
text: Changes your appearance and effects when equipped.{nl}- Changes Bear visual effects.

name: ITEM_20190104_020185
text: Changes your appearance and effects when equipped.{nl}- Changes Deploy Pavise visual effects.

name: ITEM_20190104_020187
text: The garment worn by the newcomers to the underworld.

name: ITEM_20190104_020191
text: Outfit that shows that the wearer has the respect of fellow Outlaws and lives by the Outlaw Master's rules.

name: ITEM_20190104_020193
text: Formal suit worn by those eligible to attend the meetings held by the Outlaw Master.

name: ITEM_20190104_020199
text: This outfit symbolizes that an Assassin is now ready to spread one's wings and leave the nest.

name: ITEM_20190104_020201
text: Outfit symbolizing that an Assassin is capable enough to protect those in the Assassin's nest and to dispose of invaders that pose a threat against the Assassins.

name: ITEM_20190104_020203
text: This outfit recognizes the wearer as a fully fledged Assassin with the respect and recognition of their peers.

name: ITEM_20190104_020206
text: Outfit awarded to Assassins that have reached a level where they are capable of surviving any arduous mission that they may undertake.

name: ITEM_20190104_020327
text: [Re:Build] Masinios Weapons obtained from the Masinios Weapon Selection Box can only be transcended once, and enchanced using only +11 or +5 Transcendence Vouchers.

name: ITEM_20190104_020375
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}The Wastrel itself has no interest in artifacts returned from the past. It's the powerful magic accumulated in its body that attracts old artifacts and even connects them to it.

name: ITEM_20190104_020377
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Ancient artifacts attracted by the Wastrel are known to interact with the monster's peculiar magic. One cannot tell what new kinds of magic may arise from those interactions.

name: ITEM_20190104_020379
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}A long time ago, a wizard created a giant lock and key, and with that they produced this weapon. Despite its appearance, however, it's often used as a cane for walking.

name: ITEM_20190104_020381
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}All the equipment that disappeared during the accident of Nicopolis has returned in the exact same conditions, without any signs of the time that has passed.

name: ITEM_20190104_020383
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}All Nicopolis equipment has returned to our world in the exact same conditions as when it disappeared, from its basic components down to the coatings of oil, now centuries old.

name: ITEM_20190104_020385
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Some wizards of old Nicopolis were secretly opposed to the Kingdom, but in order to feign support, they developed a few weapons that make use of divine power. This is one of such weapons.

name: ITEM_20190104_020387
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Some of the items attracted by the Wastrel's bodily magic are actually harmful to it. Otherwise, the Wastrel would be even more powerful than it is now.

name: ITEM_20190104_020389
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Fortunately for everyone, the Wastrel does not use this shield for protection. However, the shield is said to ease the pain of generating new equipment items.

name: ITEM_20190104_020391
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Most items that contain magic gems have negative effects on the Wastrel's body. That can be considered a fortunate occurrence.

name: ITEM_20190104_020393
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Of all the items attracted by the Wastrel, some are incorporated physically, while some have only their magic properties absorbed. Physically assimilated objects are thought to be constantly prodding the body of the Wastrel.

name: ITEM_20190104_020395
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}This item is thought to flow in the veins of the Wastrel. Although the monster's blood and circulatory system are very different from that of most living beings, it still seems to cause the Wastrel pain when it passes through certain regions of its body.

name: ITEM_20190104_020397
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}In the early days of this weapon, it was common for it to break down into three pieces. Large amounts of magic were used to increase its durability, so much so that, now, it will not break even when it is fused into the Wastrel.

name: ITEM_20190104_020399
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Due to the gap created by Medzio Diena, the Wastrel's living quarters have begun to attract common items found in the present. This means that the Wastrel is not only surrounded by weapons like this pistol, but also by miscellaneous items like worn-out shoes and broken chairs.

name: ITEM_20190104_020401
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Weapons like these with low slashing power can easily end up lodged in the Wastrel's body. Fortunately for the Wastrel, however, they do not cause him pain.

name: ITEM_20190104_020403
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Seeing as so many weapons are absorbed into the Wastrel's body, one would think at least some of them would be deployed inside of it.

name: ITEM_20190104_020405
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}This weapon was not absorbed into the Wastrel's body by traveling through the gap that appeared during Medzio Diena. It is said to have been carried by an adventurer who attempted to defeat the Wastrel.

name: ITEM_20190104_020407
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}This piece of equipment disappeared with the accident of Nicopolis, but it returned to our world around the same time as the Asiomage and the Quipmage.

name: ITEM_20190104_020409
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}The Quipmage was always interested in expanding his influence. To achieve this, he had plans to recruit mercenaries and provide them with weapons that could surpass the power of those used by the Royal Army.

name: ITEM_20190104_020411
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}The Asiomage is notably fond of this weapon, as it provides an increase in intelligence. More than a tool, it serves as a sort of mood-boosting toy to the monster.

name: ITEM_20190104_020413
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}The Asiomage is carrying out research to improve the equipment originally developed by his other self, the Quipmage. This item, for example, is already more effective than when it first returned to our world.

name: ITEM_20190104_020415
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}The Asiomage is not fond of this weapon. He still remembers being used as a living bullseye in past experiments, particularly for crossbows.

name: ITEM_20190104_020417
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Some scientists complain that the name of this item is arbitrary, as it bears no resemblance to owls whatsoever.

name: ITEM_20190104_020419
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}This weapon is said to have been intended for an army of Golem monsters. It is unknown whether the Quipmage or the Asiomage have any memory of that fact.

name: ITEM_20190104_020421
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Unlike other Asio items, this one faithfully represents the style and conventions popular in old Nicopolis before the great accident.

name: ITEM_20190104_020423
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}A spear designed by a wizard. The Quipmage doesn't seem to have thought that the shape of this weapon would pose any problem.

name: ITEM_20190104_020425
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}The Asiomage is missing crucial memories about his line of equipment, while the Quipmage wonders why he remembers such useless information. This is thought to be the reason why there is still no upgraded version of the Asio Pike.

name: ITEM_20190104_020427
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}The Quipmage intended to use this weapon to assassinate the Pervading Queen and the Teal Specter. All three of these wizards had plans to annihilate the others, each through their own methods.

name: ITEM_20190104_020429
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Unlike the Asio Rod, the Asio Staff is known to bring down the spirits of the Asiomage. The intelligence boost causes him to relive even more memories of his turbulent past.

name: ITEM_20190104_020431
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}The Asiomage is quite proud of this weapon. He began designing his own gunpowder weapons after returning to our world.

name: ITEM_20190104_020433
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}Although the original designer of this weapon was the Pervading Queen, the Asiomage is the one currently developing it. The Pervading Queen has long lost interest in the production of equipment.

name: ITEM_20190104_020435
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}The Asiomage was heavily influenced by the excessive scholarly fervor that is typical of wizards, which led him to create unnecessary weapons for no apparent reason.

name: ITEM_20190104_020437
text: Event item; does not allow for Ichor extraction.{nl}After returning to our world and learning that many bird species had mutated into monsters, the Asiomage made plans to create his own army of birds to carry this weapon. A rather birdish thought, one might say.

name: ITEM_20190104_020455
text: The most basic equipment. Can be leveled to 170 depending on the user's level.

name: ITEM_20190104_020466
text: A balloon created to look like the incense burners used by Giltine's followers for making wishes.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20190104_020468
text: A pair of wings made to look like they belong to a child Giltine.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20190104_020471
text: A doll owned by Giltine as a child.{nl}Some absurd rumors claim Giltine became a demon after losing her precious doll.{nl}The toy is influenced by the energy of its owner, and is known to mimic their movements.{nl}The doll mimics basic attack, sub attack and premium movements, with special gestures for rest and personal shop modes.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20190104_020474
text: A bracelet symbolizing the act of thievery on the surface. It is actually named after the greatest Outlaw Master in the Kingdom's history.

name: ITEM_20190104_020476
text: Display's Giltine's thorns on the ground every time you jump.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Exchange Shop.

name: ITEM_20190104_020478
text: The recipe for this sword was created a long time ago when an Alchemist of the Winterspoon family claimed that he could craft a better sword than a blacksmith.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020480
text: The size of the enemy does not matter when a weapon is forged with one's heart and soul. You can expect this weapon to deal greater damage to bigger foes.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020482
text: You cannot draw strength from a wandering soul. But upon success, you can use it to create an item that draws the user's inner strength.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020484
text: Death was already imminent within the rapid growth behind the explosive increase of plants. It draws as near as life force is used for rapid growth and magic gained from ferns has the same effect on plants.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020486
text: The bow's power is drawn from the wrath the vengeful spirits have against all of the living.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020488
text: This item lets you deal ungodly amounts of damage against beasts.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020490
text: Results have shown that this item is powerful against Mutant-type monsters. However, nobody knows why.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020492
text: It displays great power against demons, but this is mostly because of its alchemical and magical properties rather than its divine attributes.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020494
text: Alchemically crafted weapons are being re-evaluated and are trending with the resurgence of monsters.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020496
text: Allows you to attack over long distances.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020498
text: The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020500
text: Many priests, wizards and warriors use this personally as an advantage in battle. Although, this weapon is not officially supported by the Royal Army.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020502
text: A pistol made of wood. It may not look convincing, but it certainly is affordable.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020505
text: Useful when having a free hand is more important than having more attack power.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020507
text: With advancements in battle techniques, the weight of a shield has become a secondary consideration. This shield design is heavily influenced by this trend.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020509
text: This is a by-product of the period in history when wizards and priests did not coexist peacefully. Because of Maven, those troubles disappeared, but the craft manual is being still used in many areas.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020514
text: Even just a century ago, this was used only in the Kingdom's southern region. It is becoming more common in other areas nowadays.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020519
text: Some monster ingredients can be turned into different materials by being heat treated. The comfortable Veris Boots use such methods.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020521
text: One of the benefits of Medzio Diena is that crafters have found ways to reuse monster remains for stronger armor.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020523
text: Many choose these boots for their magic evasion rather than their defense.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020525
text: They are believed to provide great camouflage and have agile, evasive properties.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020527
text: Many adventurers name their best sword after this weapon. This was the name of the sword wielded by an ancient warrior chosen by a goddess.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020529
text: A good sword that has long been regarded as a necessity when facing demons.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020531
text: A weapon made for wizards and only wizards. Thus, wizards usually ignore the flaws of this staff.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020533
text: The fire at the tip may go out, but it won't be due to it running out of fuel.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020535
text: For an unknown reason the spell bound to this bow has become a curse to both the foe and the user. Regardless, the bow is still used by archers for its merits.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020537
text: In the past, only archers who completed training in the Astral Tower could use this weapon.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020539
text: Recipes for maces have been passed through time without being lost. The main reason behind this is because there is a strong atmosphere considering anything related to the legends of Maven amongst priests. Thanks to that atmosphere, there were records of Flurry's recipe allowing it to utilized.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020541
text: A powerful spear devised to pierce through the target's armor.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020543
text: Even if your assessment is on the line, you can't deny that Ruklys was a great warrior. This spear created during the civil war has many uses.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020545
text: The Sketis line of equipment is said to have been designed during the reign of King Themomel.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020547
text: Used as a support weapon but very capable of defending or deflecting enemy attacks.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020549
text: Don't worry about damaging the engraved runes, just give it your all with your strikes and hits.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020551
text: A pistol made of wood. The interior is lined in metal for additional power and stability.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020554
text: With this, you can put your target's miserable life to an end.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020556
text: Don't think this item is poor just because of its form. It possesses strong durability and a good appearance that distinguishes it from other weapons.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020558
text: Since the pattern was adopted from a tribal society outside the kingdom, this equipment shows the improvements as time passed by.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020563
text: One theory suggests that the Vubbes found this recipe before humans did. Very light, but also very hard.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020565
text: Since Medzio Diena, many items crafted from new materials, like these pants, have been replacing traditional ones.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020567
text: Some Gribas can sense the scent of their kind from these boots.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020569
text: Equipment made from monster ingredients are said to be tougher, though there is no evidence that supports this claim.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020571
text: Under the stabilized royal regime, the Metal Plate armor has developed with various reasons even when there weren't any large scale wars going on. The requests of the aristocrats who didn't forget the importance of military training were accepted many times and as a result, the shape of this item was formed.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020576
text: People will even go so far as to say that this weapon is overly cruel.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020578
text: The unusual fan-shaped blade offers potential to amplify its power and versatility to be adapted in many techniques.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020580
text: This rod's nickname is 'The Staff of Patience.' Legends say that Agailla Flurry, the greatest wizard in history, devised this rod to train her apprentices.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020582
text: In the recipe for this weapon, instructions are written on how to obtain help from Goddesses Saule and Gabija during the crafting process.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020584
text: Prior to Medzio Diena, hunters rarely used this bow. It might sound strange, but the bow would cause excessive damage to the prey.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020586
text: Because monster bones are sometimes cursed, a seal is attached to this weapon.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020588
text: Since the emergence of monsters, many maces underwent exterior changes.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020590
text: A modified one-handed Espontoon spear.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020592
text: Originally popular in the remote territories of the kingdom, the spear has become widely produced after the Civil War.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020594
text: The sharp blade allows you to pierce through enemies with ease. It can also be used to attack with Pommel Attack and Cross Guard.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020597
text: Despite appearing heavy, this mace is made from a light ore that allows for easy handling regardless of muscular strength.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020599
text: Bullets are reloaded by turning the large cylinder. The rotating parts can sometimes malfunction, but that doesn't interfere with the use of the pistol.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020601
text: Weapon of choice for those who have just moved on from their training cannon. Unfortunately, here extravagance does not correlate with performance.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020603
text: This item was designed as a remodeled version of a training musket. Rather than performance, however, the focus of the design was on ornamentation. The intention was to mimic the appearance of Lolopanther, although it doesn't possess the same splendor.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020605
text: In the past, there were many shields crafted by Fedimians. Since Medzio Diena, a variety of them has made a surprising comeback.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020607
text: The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020620
text: According to a theory, this sword is also used in conflicts amongst the demons.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020622
text: There's a saying that claims that 'offense is the best defense.' Prove it with this weapon.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020624
text: A magical rune is used to amplify the power of this rod.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020626
text: A group of wizards succeeded in crafting a powerful Maledoom while they were developing a crafting process for Maledic.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020628
text: A bow preferred by the cavalry.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020630
text: A weapon that is easy to reload.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020632
text: It is said that the inventor of this weapon lived long before the founding period of the kingdom. It is incredible that its recipe has survived to this date.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020636
text: This equipment will help you in battle.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020639
text: This mace was created by the kingdom's finest blacksmiths and craftsmen, and displays unparalleled grace and performance in combat.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020641
text: Portable and convenient, but deals sure damage to any foe.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020643
text: Don't judge a weapon by its weight. This cannon will be your best friend.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020645
text: Originally, this musket wasn't related to other Pajoritas equipment, until it was given the Pajoritas name by an unknown maker. It has since been further developed, confirming that the Pajoritas name did have a positive influence on its design and performance.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020647
text: Its weight limits the wearer's actions, but this is more than compensated by its efficacy and defensive capabilities.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020649
text: The city went to ground after Ruklys' civil war near the Roxona, the recipe crafted at that time was still alive. These recipes have passed on and survived for many years through not only Kadumel but also other eras.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020654
text: Some people say this weapon is directly related to Ruklys, but that's not a fact. However, it's certain that the master craftsman of Roxona was the first founder of it before the city was petrified.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020659
text: Some people think about the disaster that encountered Roxona, it would be great if these weapons have an immunity against the petrification. Although, sorry for the Petrified City of Roxona, it's surely that this weapon is better than the other side.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020664
text: The blade's large crescent edge cuts with immense power.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020666
text: The unusual fan-shaped blade offers the potential to amplify its power and versatility to be adapted in many techniques.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020669
text: You can face foes without magic with this staff.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020671
text: This bow requires a lot more strength from the user than expected. The view of the arrow in flight will leave a sense of satisfaction.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020673
text: Even the Quarrel Shooter Master himself could not obtain this bow until recently.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020678
text: A rapier crafted by a lost recipe restored after Medzio Diena through the efforts of many blacksmiths. It performs admirably despite not being a complete restoration.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020680
text: Be careful of the spirit imbued in this weapon. It might harm you.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020682
text: Unlike other Pajoritas equipment, this mace is said to have originated after Medzio Diena.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020684
text: The inscription in this pistol reads, "Please don't blow on the muzzle after firing this pistol."{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020687
text: There is a peculiar magic flowing through this musket, but no known way to awaken it; it is, for now, a dormant musket.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020689
text: The greatest strength of the Tower Shield is that it covers more than other shields despite it being difficult to use due to its weight.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020691
text: From long time ago, many wizards bought this equipment when they accumulated enough money. This equipment fulfills the needs of performance as well as the needs of design.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020696
text: This equipment possesses more privacy than it looks. Also, the light reflection is weak in the night time so the scouts have used this equipment often.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_020701
text: The pattern of the foot soldiers that was adopted from the beginning of the Kingdom has continued until now. At times in the past, the soldiers wore this and aligned in front of the 3-layer castle walls.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance has made many preparations for Saviors over the years. This is one of the items that was prepared by them for your arrival.

name: ITEM_20190104_021102
text: In the early days of the Kingdom, this precious ore could not be mined without the blessing of a goddess. Nowadays, it's not that difficult. This piece is small enough to fit in a box. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021103
text: Fragment of a green stone. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021104
text: This stone is a mix of many colors. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021105
text: Though red like a ruby stone, this mineral isn't as scarce. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021106
text: Fragment of a black translucent stone. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021107
text: A green precious stone, known in legends to protect humans from evil spirits. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021108
text: Fragment of a brown precious stone. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021109
text: A handful of common weeds brought by Dexter the cat. From the teeth marks, he seems to have ripped them off with his mouth. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021110
text: A mallet brought by Dexter the cat. It looks like it was used for a long time. Where in the goddesses' realm did Dexter get this?

name: ITEM_20190104_021111
text: A small fish brought by Dexter the cat. It must have been caught just now, it's still jumping about. Does Dexter go fishing? Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021112
text: A rusty screw brought by Dexter the cat. It's pretty rusty all over. Dexter's owner should be worried that his cat was carrying this in his mouth. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021113
text: An unripe apple brought by Dexter the cat. It's going to be a couple of days until it's good to eat. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021114
text: Torn pieces of wood brought by Dexter the cat. They are quite small, enough to be carried by Dexter with his mouth. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021115
text: A knife brought by Dexter the cat. It looks worn out and unkempt. Someone should really teach Dexter not to bring home such dangerous things. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021116
text: A Dimensional Search Scroll given by Kupole Rugile. Use it to check the dimensional crack that is being invaded by the demons. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021117
text: A crystallized fragment of a distorted dimension. It radiates light in many different colors. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021118
text: A core containing demonic energy. Kupole Danute used this with the Dimensional Essence to create protection crystals. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021119
text: A source of magic used to charge the Flicid Collapsing Device. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021120
text: A glowing tool dropped by a Carapace. The beads embedded in the center are shining with bright blue light. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021121
text: A match, the kind provided by supply soldiers. Used for various purposes. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021122
text: This arrow was found in a demon that fought Leonardas in a fierce battle. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021123
text: Leaves that grow from Lily Velly and Jelly Velly monsters. They look moist, as if they were just watered. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021124
text: It looks like it was just cut off, but at the same time it's wet with water from the lake and it emits a mysterious energy. Collection item.

name: ITEM_20190104_021125
text: A water bottle, like those distributed by supply soldiers. It looks rusty in some places, so it probably doesn't belong to Leonardas. Collection item.

text: - Increases Throw Rete duration by +5 seconds

name: ITEM_20190611_022480
text: Many Retiarii have studied for a way to prevent bladed weapons from cutting through the net, but nobody had ever thought that using spears was the answer to their problem.

name: ITEM_20190611_022483
text: {nl} {nl}Iron Will{nl} - Immunity to status ailments of rank 3 and below for 2 seconds when the following skills are used{nl} {nl} - Steed Charge{nl} - Joust{nl} - Rhongomiant{nl} - Dragon Fall{nl}

name: ITEM_20190611_022484
text: A catalyst is required when performing the rites to seal away a great power. A dagger of a magic stone is often used, but a spear was used in this case because the seal needed to keep two different dimensions apart.

name: ITEM_20190611_022487
text: - Marks an enemy when a critical hit lands on a target.{nl} {nl}Marking{nl} - Marked targets will be visible to enemies even when hidden for a duration of 15 seconds.

name: ITEM_20190611_022488
text: The only reason the Tomb of the White Crow did not crumble into ruin was because of the ores embedded in its unstable grounds. This dagger is made using the ores found in the Tomb.

name: ITEM_20190611_022490
text: {nl} {nl}Hasisas - Amplify{nl} - Amplifies the critical damage increase effect of Hasisas to 3% per skill level

name: ITEM_20190611_022491
text: There is a fervent debate on whether it is alright to harness the power of the Skiaclipse in performing assassinations.{nl}The Assassins believe that their targets should not feel threatened before their blade slashes the neck. Despite the debate, this dagger is still commonly used as there are assassinations that just cannot be failed.

name: ITEM_20190611_022494
text: {nl} {nl}Spirit Companionship{nl} - Invocation creates 2 evil spirits at a time

name: ITEM_20190611_022495
text: Shadowmancer's cast magic that manipulates shadows but they could not conquer darkness itself. This staff allows them to achieve this goal to a certain extent.

name: ITEM_20190611_022497
text: {nl} {nl}Hexing - Dissemination{nl} - Defeating a target under the Hexing debuff spreads it to 5 nearby enemies one time.

name: ITEM_20190611_022498
text: The evil powers used by the Skiaclipse cannot fully be harnessed by humans. To be able to wield this staff, one must be ready to face perilous situations at all times.

name: ITEM_20190611_022500
text: {nl} {nl}Meteor - Armageddon{nl} - Meteor skill will apply its damage over 5 hits.{nl} Effects do not stack with Meteor: Flame Ground attribute.

name: ITEM_20190611_022501
text: When you fight against a magician who yields this staff, watch out for the sky. It will most likely fall on your head in a short while.

name: ITEM_20190611_022504
text: {nl} {nl}Fanning - Rapid Shot{nl}- Increases Fanning duration by +1 second

name: ITEM_20190611_022505
text: Skiaclipse's will allows the wielder of the pistol to pull the trigger at lightning fast speeds, but a misfire occurs every once in a while. Be careful.

name: ITEM_20190611_022508
text: {nl} {nl}Battle, Advanced Orders - Harmony{nl} - Allows the effects of Battle Orders and Advanced Orders to stack.

name: ITEM_20190611_022509
text: When holding a sharp weapon, one often gets the urge to test it out. This rapier, crafted using the Skiaclipse's powers, makes the wielder want to stab anything that bleeds.

name: ITEM_20190611_022511
text: {nl} {nl}Epee Garde - Expertise{nl} - Increases Epee Garde duration by +15 seconds

name: ITEM_20190611_022512
text: Skiaclipse's spirit gives the wielder boundless stamina to keep fighting until all who stands in his or her way falls.

name: ITEM_20190611_022515
text: {nl} {nl}Flash Support{nl} - Blinds a maximum of 5 targets and makes hidden enemies visible within 300 range when using Siege Burst.

name: ITEM_20190611_022516
text: Flares were an essential item in the Tomb as it had no sun. This cannon was originally devised to use as a flare but it has been modded to become a powerful weapon after Skiaclipse's demise.

name: ITEM_20190611_022519
text: {nl} {nl}Eye of the Tiger - Concentration{nl} - Increases the times Eye of the Tiger's effects are applied by {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2 times.

name: ITEM_20190611_022520
text: The wing-shaped device attached to the musket helps stabilize the trajectory of the fired bullet.

name: ITEM_20190611_022523
text: A robe made to mimic the Skiaclipse's wings. Made of highly magic resistant materials, it almost looks transparent when caught in the corner of one's eyes.

name: ITEM_20190611_022525
text: The curse put on this armor was changed into a blessing by some unknown means. All who wore this armor claims that it felt as if the armor had taken control of their bodies in battle.

name: ITEM_20190611_022527
text: The armor has been purified over a long period of time. Despite this, you can still feel Skiaclipse's evil energy.

name: ITEM_20190611_022529
text: - Applies Skiaclipse - Compassion buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Skiaclipse - Compassion{nl} - Healing {img green_up_arrow 16 16}(5 * buff stack)%

name: ITEM_20190611_022530
text: This item was crafted to overpower the powerful Skiaclipse. However, the demons of the other dimension always surpass our expectations so it is uncertain how useful it will be when new powerful demons arrive.

name: ITEM_20190611_022532
text: - Applies Skiaclipse - Assault buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Skiaclipse - Assault{nl}- Damage increased by +(1.25 * buff stack)%{nl}- Threat decreased by -(5 * buff stack)%

name: ITEM_20190611_022534
text: - Applies Skiaclipse - Iron Wall buff when equipped{nl} - 5% chance to apply Skiaclipse - Exalt when hit{nl} {nl}Skiaclipse - Iron Wall{nl} - Damage received reduced by -(1.25 * Iron Wall buff stack)%{nl}Skiaclipse - Exalt{nl}- Maximum HP increased by +(5 * Exalt buff stack)% (Duration: 10 seconds)

name: ITEM_20190611_022539
text: You may become cursed when equipped light-heartedly. Only those with a strong will can wear Skiaclipse gear.

name: ITEM_20190611_022541
text: Sage Master Rhupas Kehel was interested more in how the materials were transported than where the leather actually came from.

name: ITEM_20190611_022543
text: Creating an alloy out of Pyranium and Cryonium was believed to be impossible but the dark magic of the Skiaclipse was found to act as an emulsifier and made it possible to mix the two ores to create a new alloy, which was used to create this item.

name: ITEM_20190611_022551
text: Different magic users draw magic from different parts of their body and some are even known to draw their power from their feet. These boots are made especially for such magic users.

name: ITEM_20190611_022553
text: Leather boots are usually crafted with agility in mind, but these boots have been made to be the toughest of the leather boots known to man. The Skiaclipse's feather was used as the main material.

name: ITEM_20190611_022555
text: These boots were made for stomping on enemies than to protect the wearer's feet. There's nothing more satisfying than the sounds of bones crushing beneath you.

name: ITEM_20190611_022563
text: The equipment that Eclipse Ubik cares most about are her gloves because precise control is required when manipulating shadows. The Skiaclipse Gloves have been designed by Eclipse Ubik herself to amplify the wearer's magic.

name: ITEM_20190611_022565
text: It is said that those who use the Skiaclipse gear acquire great power and, in return, lose their sense of morality.

name: ITEM_20190611_022567
text: The wearer becomes more efficient with arms but their personality becomes more aggressive. At times, the Skiaclipse's will seems to block incoming attacks.

name: ITEM_20190611_022574
text: Although they were rare, the Schaffenstar is known to have had its heretics, meaning those who wished to free themselves from the shadow of Lydia Schaffen. These people never managed to make much of an impact, but recently some of their remaining objects were put to use by Elder Adaux.

name: ITEM_20190611_022576
text: Costume for disguising yourself as a Varnaclipse. Use to change your appearance.

name: ITEM_20190611_022581
text: Use to change your appearance.{nl}- Changes the skill animation for Heal.

name: ITEM_20190611_022586
text: Restores 1152 HP immediately and additionally restores 1152 HP every 2 seconds over 15 seconds. Right-click to use.

name: ITEM_20190611_022587

name: ITEM_20191024_023229
text: - 10% chance to apply Berserk buff on self for a 5-second duration with Strike attacks{nl} {nl}Berserk{nl} - Critical rate 2x (cannot be stacked)

name: ITEM_20191024_023231
text: {nl} {nl}Lightning Rod{nl} - Deals additional attack by casting Thunder Strike when performing Slash attacks{nl}on targets under Storm Bolt debuff{nl}(Cooldown 0.1 sec){nl} {nl}Thunder Strike Skill Factor: (Storm Bolt skill level x 12)%

name: ITEM_20191024_023232
text: This weapon is high risk, high reward. It makes of demonic powers that puts its wielder at risk in order to amplify the output of damage.

name: ITEM_20191024_023234
text: {nl} {nl}Cower{nl} - Applies a debuff that reduces the physical attack value of target by -1,000 for 5 seconds when using Bash (max. 5 stacks)

name: ITEM_20191024_023235
text: The items created by the Chesha are highly sought after by scholars due to the way they manipulate the magical energy to harness its power. Due to the variety of its possible application, it is also commonly used in crafting of weapons.

name: ITEM_20191024_023238
text: Weapons are known to yield to the will of its wielder but at times the opposite could also be true. Do not underestimate the power this weapon possesses.

name: ITEM_20191024_023240
text: {nl} {nl}Sharp Reaction{nl}- Recovers own HP in amount equal to (Player's HP Recovery value x 3){nl} - Cooldown 10 seconds

name: ITEM_20191024_023241
text: Items crafted by the Chesha was amazing in that their special properties could be stacked as much as you want. This sword's durability is a product of such properties found in Chesha-made equipment.

name: ITEM_20191024_023243
text: {nl} {nl}Rune Refinement{nl} - Rune of Justice final damage {img green_up_arrow 16 16} 50%{nl}- Recovers 30 SP for every time Rune of Justice hits accurately

name: ITEM_20191024_023244
text: No one thought that this rod could be refined to be used with the divine power of the goddesses. But thanks to the efforts put in by many craftsmen, we can now use this rod with whatever power we wish to.

name: ITEM_20191024_023246
text: {nl} {nl}Ice Breaker{nl}- Additional +100% critical rate applied when attacking a frozen target

name: ITEM_20191024_023247
text: Cheshas have devised a magical staff in order to calm the angered Misrus. You plant one staff on the ground and hit it with the other to resonate the magical power hidden within the staff, which calms Misrus. Nobody knows where this magical power originates from to this day.

name: ITEM_20191024_023249
text: {nl} - Multi Shot final damage {img green_up_arrow 16 16}100%{nl} {nl}3% chance to apply Quickness buff that lasts 6 seconds{nl}- Multi Shot cooldown removed while buff is active

name: ITEM_20191024_023250
text: The superfluous ornaments adorned on the bow is a testament to the craftsmanship that was required to craft it. It is imbued with powerful magic that increases its wielder's concentration momentarily for greater aim.

name: ITEM_20191024_023252
text: - Triple Arrow skill final damage {img green_up_arrow 16 16}25%

name: ITEM_20191024_023253
text: Cheshas are terrified of Misrus. Because of this, they have decided to feed Misrus by shooting its food attached to arrows from a crossbow. This is the exact same bow used by Cheshas when feeding Misrus and is of fine build. Despite its origin, it serves its purpose as a weapon better than most other crossbows out there.

name: ITEM_20191024_023255
text: {nl}{nl} - Crossbow basic attack damage {img green_up_arrow 16 16} 35%{nl}- Attack ricochets on enemies near the target (target number: 2)

name: ITEM_20191024_023256
text: The wing-shaped ornaments are highly regarded by arms afficionados.  Appraisers put a hefty price on this item on the account of its detailed adornments.

name: ITEM_20191024_023258
text: {nl} {nl} - Block and Shoot damage increase buff activates when a Pavise is hit while under Block and Shoot buff

name: ITEM_20191024_023260
text: {nl} {nl}Saving Prayer{nl}- Healing increases in proportion of Heal: Overload stacks{nl}1 stack: Healing {img green_up_arrow 16 16}60{nl}2 stacks: Healing {img green_up_arrow 16 16}240{nl}3 stacks: Healing {img green_up_arrow 16 16}600

name: ITEM_20191024_023261
text: One needs to look back at oneself before wielding this weapon. Responsibility is something that extends much farther than simply defeating one's enemy.

name: ITEM_20191024_023263
text: {nl} {nl}Awaken Mind{nl}- Damage reduced effect increases as Heal: Overload stacks{nl}- Damage reduction 6% per stack, max. 30% reduction

name: ITEM_20191024_023264
text: Misrus' breath is fused with saliva that holds great magical power. This weapon has been reinforced with Misurs' saliva, which has caused the weapon to become discolored.

name: ITEM_20191024_023266
text: {nl} {nl}Overpower{nl}- Skill final damage increases based on the difference of STR between self and target when using Smite{nl}- Max. +145% increase (0.25% increase per STR difference of 1)

name: ITEM_20191024_023267
text: The demons have long feared Moringponia's great power. Even after its death, they refuse to let their guard down because of this.

name: ITEM_20191024_023270
text: This two-handed blunt weapon has been created with Misrus' bodily fluids which has been used to cool down hot metal repeatedly for reinforcements and also to fuse the weapon with magical powers.

name: ITEM_20191024_023271
text: - Final Block Rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2%{nl}  - 5% chance of resisting all removable debuffs

name: ITEM_20191024_023273
text: - Final Block Rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2%{nl}- 3 second Berserk buff when an attack is blocked{nl} {nl}Berserk{nl} - Critical rate x2 (cannot be stacked)

name: ITEM_20191024_023274
text: A demonic equipment are at times very valuable to humans due to their hostile nature, which makes them perfect for use in combat. Blacksmiths who craft such equipment hope that humans do not exploit these weapons to use in evil acts.

name: ITEM_20191024_023276
text: - Final Block Rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2%{nl} {nl}Resonance{nl}- SP +3,500 when using Magic Shield for 60 second duration

name: ITEM_20191024_023277
text: This is a replica of a shield found within Misrus' stomach. It is believed that this shield belonged to a Chesha who wished to defend itself from Misrus. While it was an ordinary shield to begin with, it has over time absorbed the magic energy inside Misrus' stomach and became a powerful artefact.

name: ITEM_20191024_023279
text: {nl} {nl}- Additional critical rate for Finestra{nl}Critical rate changed to 4% per skill level

name: ITEM_20191024_023280
text: The make of the weapon affects heavily on how effective the weapon will be in combat especially for one-handed weapons. The weapon must be well balanced in weight for the wielder to truly unleash its potential.

name: ITEM_20191024_023282
text: {nl} {nl}Expulsion{nl}- Reduces target's SP by -50{nl}when attacking a target under Shock or Rete debuff{nl}- Additional SP reduction equal to (Target's INT + SPR)/3

name: ITEM_20191024_023283
text: Spear crafted using Misrus' magic. You can feel the spear vibrate with power when you concentrate. It is suspected that the vibration is caused by the volatility of Misrus' magic.

name: ITEM_20191024_023284
text: {nl} {nl}Iron Will{nl} - Immunity to removable status ailments for 2 seconds when the following skills are used{nl} {nl} - Steed Charge{nl} - Joust{nl} - Rhongomiant{nl} - Dragon Fall{nl}

name: ITEM_20191024_023286
text: {nl} {nl}Collision{nl}- Additional +100% critical rate for Rhongomiant{nl}- Rhongomiant stun duration +2 seconds

name: ITEM_20191024_023287
text: The spikes here act as sort of conductors of magical energy which pierce the skin and deliver torment. It is made to inflict pain that is unparalleled on this earth.

name: ITEM_20191024_023289
text: {nl} {nl}Overpower{nl}- Ignors block against targets under Gae Bulg

name: ITEM_20191024_023290
text: This pike has been crafted using the crafting technique of the Chesha with repeated reinforcements. It takes an ordinary blacksmith much more skill and time to craft when compared with other pikes of similar build.

name: ITEM_20191024_023292
text: {nl} {nl}Stealth Strike{nl} - Additional +100% critical rate for Backstab, Behead

name: ITEM_20191024_023293
text: It is a beautifully crafted dagger that is more than enough to make onlookers green with envy.

name: ITEM_20191024_023295
text: {nl} {nl}Wild Dance{nl}- Taglio continues until remaining STA becomes 1{nl}- Cannot recover STA while casting Taglio

name: ITEM_20191024_023296
text: This dagger was created by improving upon a dagger that was found within the depths of the sewers. It was later revealed that the dagger was crafted using Misrus' claw, although no one knows who managed to steal the beast's claw.

name: ITEM_20191024_023298
text: {nl} {nl}Rising Flame{nl}- Creates a flame pillar that lasts 5 seconds when an enemy is defeated using Fire property magic (max. 3 pillars){nl}- Flame pillars do damage equal to caster's Flame Ground skill every 0.5 second

name: ITEM_20191024_023299
text: This weapon looks very much like the one wielded by Moringponia. It is just as powerful but you must always be careful not to become engulfed by the power this weapon possesses.

name: ITEM_20191024_023301
text: {nl} {nl}Flood{nl}- Casts Lv. 8 Slow when Water Shikigami hits target{nl}(Duration: 5 seconds)

name: ITEM_20191024_023302
text: It is difficult to replicate the innate powers found in demonic weapons. But with excellent craftsmanship and elbow grease, it is possible to come close to reproducing the powers that the originals can produce.

name: ITEM_20191024_023304
text: {nl} {nl}Gravity Curve{nl}- Duration of Heavy Gravity {img green_up_arrow 16 16} 5 seconds{nl}- Reduces the damage received from Missile attacks by -50% for allies within the area of Heavy Gravity{nl} {nl}[Arts]

name: ITEM_20191024_023308
text: {nl} {nl}Aggress - Complacency{nl}- Increases the damage received by enemies afflicted by the debuff from Aggress by 30%

name: ITEM_20191024_023309
text: A bullet cursed with the soul of a begrudged demon is effective in making the enemy suffer. But you must always be aware that this curse may come back to haunt you some day.

name: ITEM_20191024_023312
text: It is fatiguing to be shooting a bullet enchanted with the power of a demon lord. This revolver has underwent special procedures in order to lessen the burden from the shooter.

name: ITEM_20191024_023314
text: {nl} {nl}Finishing Shot{nl}- Quick Draw's last overheat's final damage {img green_up_arrow 16 16}300%

name: ITEM_20191024_023315
text: It was originally devised to fire tranquilizers that will put Misrus to sleep but was abandoned when they found out that Misrus could not be subdued in such a way. Despite the failure, it was still a great weapon as is.

name: ITEM_20191024_023316
text: {nl} {nl}Epee Garde - Expertiese{nl} - Epee Garde's final damage +10% when critical occurs

name: ITEM_20191024_023319
text: The blade of the rapier is designed to provide sharp aim, enabling the wielder to take the target's life at a single strike.

name: ITEM_20191024_023321
text: - Attaque Composee number of hits {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2

name: ITEM_20191024_023322
text: A lot of the weapons gathered by the Chesha from the Outer Walls districts were of high quality. We don't know who these weapons belonged to but some of them have immense power. Not recognizing the weapon's value, the Chesha have been using this rapier as a fork to use in feeding Misrus.

name: ITEM_20191024_023325
text: Staring into this cannon's muzzle has a mesmerizing effect.

name: ITEM_20191024_023327
text: {nl} {nl}Sweeping Cannon - Napalm{nl}- Applies 5 second of debuff when Sweeping Cannon hits{nl}- Additionally deals 10% of the damage dealt every second

name: ITEM_20191024_023328
text: The Chesha had used this cannon to shoot the cannon ball into the Misrus' mouth in order to subdue it. Even if they had managed to blow one head off, they would have been eaten alive by its other head.

name: ITEM_20191024_023329
text: {nl} {nl}Eye of the Tiger - Concentration{nl} - Eye of the Tiger duration {img green_up_arrow 16 16}3 seconds

name: ITEM_20191024_023331
text: {nl} {nl}Musket Overheat{nl}- Buff applied 1 second after using Prime and Load{nl}- Critical rate increases according to the cooldown time on Prime and Load{nl}- Under 40 sec: Critical rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}30{nl}- 45~50 sec: Critical rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}60{nl}- 55~60 sec: Critical rate {img green_up_arrow 16 16}150{nl}Buff is maintained while Prime and Load is on cooldown

name: ITEM_20191024_023332
text: This rifles long shaft helps stabilize the collision of magical energy that occurs when bullets are fired. The widened muzzle also helps to spread the knockback that occurs from the sheer force that occurs when firing.

name: ITEM_20191024_023334
text: {nl} {nl}Ambush - Exterminator{nl}- Ambush skill final damage {img green_up_arrow 16 16}30%{nl}- Target dismounted from companion and unable to mount again for 10 sec when Ambush hits

name: ITEM_20191024_023335
text: The Chesha have gathered weapons in order to prepare for Misrus' rampage. This musket was one of the weapons they had found while searching the Outer Walls district. It was heavily modified in order to be effective against Misrus, so it is also highly effective in battling demons and monsters.

name: ITEM_20191024_023336
text: - Triggers the Ignas - Immunity buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Ignas - Immunity{nl} - Grants a (2.5 * Ignas - Immunity stacks)% chance of resisting all removable debuff.

name: ITEM_20191024_023338
text: - Activates Moringponia - Backlight buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Moringponia - Backlight{nl}- Resistance against Blind state {img green_up_arrow 16 16} (number of stacks x 7)

name: ITEM_20191024_023339
text: Plate is material that maintains its shape even under heavy modification. Being made of plate, this armor has also suffered tremendous amounts of stress for it to reach its current state of perfection.

name: ITEM_20191024_023341
text: - Activates Moringponia - Winterize buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Moringponia - Winterize{nl} - Resistance against Freeze state {img green_up_arrow 16 16} (number of stacks x 7)

name: ITEM_20191024_023342
text: The fur used to craft this robe has been colored with the dye created using Moringponia's magic. The end product of this volatile process is rather impressive.

name: ITEM_20191024_023344
text: - Activates Moringponia - Zen buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Moringponia - Zen{nl}- Resistance against Stun state {img green_up_arrow 16 16} (number of stacks x 7)

name: ITEM_20191024_023345
text: At first, the magic used in crafting this armor caused it to erode quickly. It was later found that demon bones had the power to hold back the erosion process. It is something that is not understood fully but no other magic has this property.

name: ITEM_20191024_023347
text: - Activates Misrus - Harden buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Misrus - Harden{nl}- Physical and Magic Defense {img green_up_arrow 16 16} (number of stacks x 800) for 15 seconds when using SP Potion

name: ITEM_20191024_023348
text: A plate armor created by mixing Misrus' bonemeal with molten metal. It was not easy to grind Misrus' bones into dust but the results were more than satisfactory.

name: ITEM_20191024_023350
text: - Activates Misrus - Lucid buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Misrus - Lucid{nl}- SPR {img green_up_arrow 16 16} (number of stacks x 30) for 15 seconds when using HP Potion

name: ITEM_20191024_023351
text: There were many cloth armor scattered around the sewers. It seemed that the Chesha were fond of cloth armor. Some of the cloth armor found in the sewers were of high craftsmanship.

name: ITEM_20191024_023353
text: - Activates Misrus - Potential buff when equipped{nl} {nl}Misrus - Potential{nl}- Max. Physical and Magic Attack {img green_up_arrow 16 16} (number of stacks x 250) for 10 seconds when using HP Potion

name: ITEM_20191024_023354
text: Crafted using the leather that has been wrapped around Misrus' body. It is highly durable and great armor can be crafted using it.

name: ITEM_20191024_023374
text: It lightens the heart, preparing the wearer for the weary road ahead.
